101011101.description: Swings the scythe continuously to slash at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

101011201.description:
Uses her scythe to slash at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. When Forbidden Blade is in cooldown, tap on the skill again to launch another Forbidden Blade strike while causing to self DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> HP (DMG is capped at <color=#E78300>30%</color>). Hits landed with this second cast of Forbidden Blade deal <color=#E78300>{2}</color> more Non-DoT DMG and grants an <color=#E78300>8%</color> Ultimate Skill charge. Can be used once every cooldown.
Use of Forbidden Blade does not interrupt normal attacks.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>{4}</color> Traces on every skill hit.

101011202.description:
Throws her scythe at the target and retrieves it, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Traces on every skill hit.

101011203.description: Unleashes a powerful slash attack on the locked-on enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Recovers <color=#E78300>{2}</color> HP when an enemy is defeated using the skill. Effect can trigger once every skill cast.

101011208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of New Pact - Verthandi and The Innocence - Osiris.
Deals Physical DMG equal to New Pact - Verthandi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and all members of the team receive a <color=#E78300>{5}</color> boost to their Mod Index Multiplier for this skillchain.
Also deals Physical DMG equal to The Innocence - Osiris' ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and when an enemy hit is landed all members of the team recover HP equal to <color=#E78300>{6}</color> of her ATK.

101011209.description:
Leaps into the air, throws her scythe at the target and retrieves it, causing up to <color=#E78300>12</color> instances of DMG along the way for Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Recovers HP equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK upon hit.

Gains a <color=#E78300>8%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when Osiris or her Teammate takes DMG. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds.

101011281.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of The Innocence - Osiris and Living Soul - Osiris.
Deals Physical DMG equal to The Innocence - Osiris' ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and when a hit is landed on the enemy all members of the team recover HP equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> of her ATK.
Also deals Wind DMG equal to Living Soul - Osiris' ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and when she enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode all members of the team are granted a DMG boost equal to (<color=#E78300>10% + 0.2%</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>) until <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode ends.

101011305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks and can Dodge two consecutive times. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge effect: Entering Zero Time slows all enemy movements significantly for <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101013101.description:
Launches a stream of attacks on the locked-on enemy, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Fire Warp: Hold down on the Normal Attack button to cast this skill. Asura unleashes a linear attack through space, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>220%</color> of ATK. When Asura is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state, the Fire Resistance of enemies hit is lowered by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds.
Fire Warp (Enhanced): Each time the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state ends, or when the Mod re-enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state in said state, or when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> is extended, the next cast of Fire Warp is enhanced. Hold down on the Normal Attack button to cast this skill. Asura unleashes a heavy fist attack through space, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>440%</color> of ATK.
Using Fire Warp does not interrupt normal attacks.

<color=#297DE0>Energy: </color>Grants <color=#E78300>3</color> Energy every second.

101013111.description:
Launches a stream of attacks on the locked-on enemy, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Fire Warp: Hold down on the Normal Attack button to cast this skill. Unleashes a linear attack through space, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>220%</color> of ATK. When Asura is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state, the Fire Resistance of enemies hit is lowered by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds.
Fire Warp (Enhanced): Each time <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state starts or ends, the next cast of Fire Warp is enhanced, and this skill can only be cast when Asura is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state by holding down on the Normal Attack button, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>660%</color> of ATK in total being dealt to enemies within a small AoE. <color=#E78300>12</color> Energy is also granted. Enemy hits landed lower the enemy's Fire Resistance for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>5</color> times.
The higher the number of hits landed with normal attacks when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state, the higher Non-DoT DMG dealt with Fire Warp. DMG boost is removed when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> ends.
Using Fire Warp does not interrupt normal attacks.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>3</color> Energy every second.

101013201.description: Enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state and increases Fire DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds. Rāhu's Fists warp to the locked-on enemy's location during the attack, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total.

101013202.description: Enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state, and increases Fire DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds. Casts a forcefield that traps enemies within range, ignoring any control immunity the enemy has and preventing them from gaining any Control Resistance for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds. When the forcefield explodes, it deals to all enemies within range Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> of ATK.

101013203.description: Enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state, and increases Fire DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds. Opens a crack in the ground beneath the locked-on enemy, and draws all surrounding enemies to it. A heavy Rāhu Fist then bursts out of the crack, attacking enemies in range and dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total.

101013208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Surefire - Zenkibo Tengu and Rāhu - Asura.
Deals Physical DMG equal to Surefire - Zenkibo Tengu's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and after a hit is landed on the enemy all members of the team are granted max Traces.
Also deals Fire DMG equal to Rāhu - Asura's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and hits landed also lower the enemy's Fire RES by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color> seconds.

101013209.description:
Leaps up and pounds on the target location with Rāhu and casts four fire columns, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK. Enemies hit have their Fire Resistance lowered by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds.

Grants a<color=#E78300>15%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when Asura or a Teammate triggers Zero Time; triggers only once every <color=#E78300>0.5</color> seconds.

101013305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101015101.description:
Swings the Sun Disc of Judgment at enemies, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

Passive:
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101501)>Sunglint</material> caps at <color=#E78300>200</color> points.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Gains Divine Grace when Normal Attacks hit.

101015201.description:
Launches a grappling hook at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK. After landing a hit, rushes at the enemy, gains Super Armor and the ability to block incoming DMG. Successfully blocking DMG during this period resets the CD of Tear & Devour. Shortens the skill's remaining CD by <color=#E78300>50%</color> when failing to rush at the enemy.
Within <color=#E78300>3</color>s after Lioness Pursuit hits, Lioness Pursuit is replaced by Lioness Sawblade and Sawblade Rumble is replaced by Sawblade Dance. After any of these skills is cast, Skills 1 and 2 return to their original forms.
Lioness Sawblade: Leaps up and slams the Sun Disc of Judgment downward, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total. This skill has a CD of <color=#E78300>12</color>s.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>25</color> Divine Grace when Lioness Pursuit hits. Restores Divine Grace to full when damage is successfully blocked while rushing at the enemy.

101015202.description:
Slams the Sun Disc of Judgment to the ground, dealing DMG to the surrounding area then falling back, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Gains Unyielding during cast.
Sawblade Dance: Swings the sawblade in a circle, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total. This skill has a CD of <color=#E78300>12</color>s.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>2</color> Divine Grace when any but the final strike of Sawblade Rumble hits. Gains <color=#E78300>15</color>Divine Grace when the final strike of Sawblade Rumble hits.

101015203.description:
Lacerates enemies with the Sun Disc of Judgment, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Gains Unyielding during cast and automatically expends Divine Grace to continuously attack the enemy. Each strike expends an additional <color=#E78300>25</color> Divine Grace and gains <color=#E78300>25</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101501)>Sunglint</material>, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total. Each strike lowers the enemy's Physical RES by <color=#E78300>3%</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s upon landing a hit. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>6</color> times.
When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101501)>Sunglint</material> is no less than <color=#E78300>100</color>, holding Normal Attack expends <color=#E78300>100</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101501)>Sunglint</material> to unleash the Foe Shredder skill.
Foe Shredder: Slams the Sun Disc of Judgment down, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total, and launches 3 sawtooth waves made of Divine Grace, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> of ATK.

101015208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Flowfly Mist - Shu and The Lioness - Sekhmet.
Deals Thunder DMG equal to Flowfly Mist - Shu's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). Increases the whole team's Combat Resources charge speed by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s. Also increases Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>25%</color> upon <color=#E78300>each</color> Normal Attack hit. Stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times. The Crit DMG boost effect expires when the Combat Resources charge speed boost expires.
Deals Physical DMG equal to The Lioness - Sekhmet's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). Grants the whole team with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101502)>Potential Unleashed</material> for <color=#E78300>{7}</color>s. Restores HP to all teammates equal to her ATK × (<color=#E78300>62% + 2%</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). Upon hitting, the whole team's Skill DMG increases by <color=#E78300>{8}</color> for <color=#E78300>{9}</color>s.

101015209.description:
Unleashes her power within and grants the whole team with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101502)>Potential Unleashed</material> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s, restoring HP to the whole team equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of her ATK.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101502)>Potential Unleashed</material>: Increases Physical DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

Gains <color=#E78300>8%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when enemies are inflicted with Armor Break. Effect can only trigger once every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

101015305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101016101.description:
Brandishes the Wasteland Fiend to launch a series of attacks, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK. Hold down the Normal Attack button at the fifth strike of normal attack to unleash a special normal attack, Explosive Slash, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total. Landing a hit in this way will cause an explosion that deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK each time. Every <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101601)>Pressure Tank Mark</material> active expends <color=#E78300>10</color> Divine Grace and causes <color=#E78300>1</color> additional explosion. Explosive Slash does not interrupt the strike count of the normal attack.
Spinning Slash: Expends all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101601)>Pressure Tank Marks</material> active and launches a spinning slash attack, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK in total. <color=#E78300>Each</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101601)>Pressure Tank Mark</material> expended grants <color=#E78300>1</color> stack of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101602)>Burst-threshold</material> and <color=#E78300>15</color> Divine Grace. Each stack of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101602)>Burst-threshold</material> increases DMG dealt by the Mod by <color=#E78300>10%</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s. Casting Assault Tactic or Siege Tactic within <color=#E78300>5</color>s of casting Spinning Slash also triggers Chainsaw Mode for said skill.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101603)>Chainsaw Overdrive Mode</material>: Enhances normal attacks. Does not grant Divine Grace during this mode, and every hit landed with the first five strikes expends <color=#E78300>10</color> Divine Grace, dealing additional Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{6}</color> ATK in total. This mode can last <color=#E78300>10</color>s or until Divine Grace runs out.

Passive:
Only <color=#E78300>4</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101601)>Pressure Tank Marks</material> can be owned at a time.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace upon normal attack hits.

101016201.description:
Greatsword Mode: Crushes sideways with the Wasteland Fiend, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Gains Super Armor for a short period of time while crushing the enemy. Switches to Chainsaw Mode upon hitting.
Chainsaw Mode: Stabs the enemy with the Wasteland Fiend, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total. Upon landing a skill hit, hold down the skill button to attack continuously expending Divine Grace and get <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101601)>Pressure Tank Mark</material> for every <color=#E78300>25</color> Divine Grace expended, increasing DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>10%</color> and dealing additional Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total. Increases Non-DoT skill damage by <color=#E78300>10%</color> when in Modified Mode. Switches back to Greatsword Mode after casting.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> When attacked by the enemy in the Super Armor state granted by this skill, blocks enemy damage and grants <color=#E78300>100</color> Divine Grace.

101016202.description: Brandishes the Wasteland Fiend to slash both horizontally and vertically at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101601)>Pressure Tank Mark</material> when the same enemy is hit with both horizontal and vertical slashes. When landing a hit with either the horizontal or vertical slash, hold down to expend Divine Grace and continue slashing at the enemy, with horizontal slashes dealing additional Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total and vertical slashes dealing additional Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total. Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101601)>Pressure Tank Mark</material> for every <color=#E78300>25</color> Divine Grace expended.

101016203.description:
Greatsword Mode: Brandishes the Wasteland Fiend to unleash a series of slashes, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Switches to Chainsaw Mode upon hitting an enemy.
Chainsaw Mode: Inserts the Wasteland Fiend into the ground to emanate shockwaves that deal AoE Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total. Hold down the skill button to expend Divine Grace to continue the casting. For every <color=#E78300>25</color> Divine Grace expended, gains <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101601)>Pressure Tank</material> Mark, increases DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>10%</color>, and deals to the enemy additional Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total. Increases Non-DoT Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>10%</color> when in Modified Mode. Switches back to Greatsword Mode after skill casting.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace when landing a hit in Greatsword Mode.

101016208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Wasteland Fiend - Kingu and Ryugiri - Kagutsuchi.
Deals Physical DMG equal to Wasteland Fiend - Kingu's ATK ×(<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>his Ultimate Skill level</color>) and the Mod enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101603)>Chainsaw Overdrive Mode</material>. Increases the Skill DMG of all members of the team by <color=#E78300>{7}</color> for <color=#E78300>{8}</color>s when the Mod lands a hit.
Deals Fire DMG equal to Ryugiri - Kagutsuchi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>his Ultimate Skill level</color>) and the Mod enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105801)>Wildfire</material> state for <color=#E78300>18</color>s, increasing the Fire DMG of all members of the team by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s when the Mod lands a hit.

101016209.description:
Overloads the Wasteland Fiend, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Inflicts Armor Break on enemies hit and reduces their DEF by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s. Triggers <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101603)>Chainsaw Overdrive Mode</material> after skill casting and grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101602)>Burst-threshold</material> equal to the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101601)>Pressure Tank</material> Marks limit for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s.

Gains an <color=#E78300>8%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate triggers Extremity Dodge. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

101016281.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Rage Serpent - Marduk and Wasteland Fiend - Kingu.
Deals Physical DMG equal to Rage Serpent - Marduk's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>his Ultimate Skill level</color>), and all members of the team take <color=#E78300>{8}</color> less damage for <color=#E78300>{9}</color>s when the Mod lands a hit. Inflicts Armor Break on enemies hit and reduces their DEF by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s.
Deals Physical DMG equal to Wasteland Fiend - Kingu's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>his Ultimate Skill level</color>) and the Mod enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101603)>Chainsaw Overdrive Mode</material>. All members of the team gain <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101602)>Burst-threshold</material> equal to the Mod's <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101601)>Pressure Tank</material> stack limit for <color=#E78300>{7}</color>s when the Mod lands a hit.

101016305.description:
Quickly dodges enemy attacks. Dodge may be triggered twice consecutively. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect. Dodge will not interrupt the strike count of the normal attack. In Assault Tactic and Siege Tactic's Chainsaw Mode, trigger a non-mobile Dodge to interrupt the skill, then follow up with a normal attack within <color=#E78300>0.8</color>s to cast Spinning Slash.
Dodge effect: Entering Zero Time slows all enemy movements significantly for <color=#E78300>2</color>s and grants <color=#E78300>30</color> Divine Grace. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101017101.description: Swipes the claws at the enemy, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101701)>Divine Gaze</material> state for <color=#E78300>9</color>s when the last strike of the normal attack hits.

101017201.description:
Pounces forward and deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Skill casting grants the following additional effect when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101701)>Divine Gaze</material> state: Reduces the Shadow RES of locked-on enemies hit by <color=#E78300>9%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101701)>Divine Gaze</material> state expires immediately after this skill is cast.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace upon each skill hit.

101017202.description:
Leaps into the air and goes out of sight for a short time. Then, claws at the enemy upon reappearance, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK. Skill casting grants the following additional effect when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101701)>Divine Gaze</material> state: Inflicts Stun on the first enemy hit for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101701)>Divine Gaze</material> state expires immediately after this skill is cast.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace upon each skill hit.

101017203.description:
Expends <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace to enter <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101701)>Divine Gaze</material> state for <color=#E78300>9</color>s. When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101701)>Divine Gaze</material>, Bastet's Caprice becomes Goddess's Execution instead. Bastet's Caprice does not interrupt the strike count of normal attack.
Goddess's Execution: Unleashes Shadow Divine Power to deal AoE Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101701)>Divine Gaze</material> state expires immediately after this skill is cast.

101017208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Jin-ei - Kuninotokotachi and Ailuros - Bastet.
Deals Physical DMG equal to Jin-ei - Kuninotokotachi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her average skill level</color>) and reduces the Physical, Fire, Thunder, Wind, and Shadow RES of enemies hit by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s.
Also deals Shadow DMG equal to Ailuros - Bastet's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). Increases Non-DoT Ultimate Skill DMG dealt to normal enemies by <color=#E78300>0.5%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> HP the enemy has, up to a <color=#E78300>50%</color> boost in total. Increases Non-DoT Ultimate Skill DMG dealt to elite enemies and bosses by <color=#E78300>0.5%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> Mod Index the enemy has, up to a <color=#E78300>50%</color> boost in total. Enemies in Modified Mode are taken to have a <color=#E78300>100%</color> Mod Index.

101017209.description:
Unleashes Shadow Divine Power to cast judgment on the enemy, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Increases Non-DoT Ultimate Skill DMG dealt to normal enemies by <color=#E78300>0.5%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> HP the enemy has, up to a <color=#E78300>50%</color> boost in total. Increases Non-DoT Ultimate Skill DMG dealt to elite enemies and bosses by <color=#E78300>0.5%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> Mod Index the enemy has, up to a <color=#E78300>50%</color> boost in total. Enemies in Modified Mode are taken to have a <color=#E78300>100%</color> Mod Index.

Gains an <color=#E78300>8%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when the enemy's Shadow RES is reduced. Effect can trigger up to once every <color=#E78300>1</color>s.

101017305.description:
Quickly dodges enemy attacks. Dodge will not interrupt the strike count of the normal attack and can be triggered two times consecutively. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge effect: Tap Normal Attack button within <color=#E78300>3</color>s of triggering Extremity Dodge to teleport behind the locked-on enemy for another skill attack, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Mod goes into <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101701)>Divine Gaze</material> state upon hitting an enemy. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds

101019101.description: Shu launches an attack on the enemy to her front with her lance, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK.

101019201.description:
Leaps into the air and attacks the enemy with her lance, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. As she lands, she summons <color=#E78300>3</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101901)>Sacred Gale Crystals</material> that appear in front of her, and each crystal deals to the enemy Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>{3}</color> Traces on every skill hit.

101019202.description:
Shu summons a rapidly moving hurricane in front of her, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Traces on every skill hit.

101019203.description:
Skill deals to the enemy a certain amount of DMG depending on the number of Traces expended at skill cast.
<color=#E78300>1</color> Trace: Deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
<color=#E78300>2</color> Traces: Deal Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.
<color=#E78300>3</color> Traces: Deal Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total.

101019208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Tidal Song - Poseidon and Gusty Lance - Shu.
Deals Water DMG equal to Tidal Song - Poseidon's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and restores to all members of the team HP equal to her ATK × (<color=#E78300>60% + 2%</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>).
Also deals Wind DMG equal to Gusty Lance - Shu's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>) and her Modifying Level is changed to <color=#E78300>Ω</color>.

101019209.description:
Dashes with her lance for a certain distance, attacking and dealing to enemies in her path Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK, and changing her Modifying Level to <color=#E78300>Ω</color>. When an enemy is defeated using Wind Drill, Shu also enters Zero Time for <color=#E78300>4</color> seconds.

An <color=#E78300>8%</color> Ultimate Skill charge is granted when Shu or a Teammate expends Traces.

101019233.description:
Skill deals to the enemy a certain amount of DMG depending on the number of Traces expended at skill cast. When the number of enemies hit is <color=#E78300>1</color>, the non-DoT Crit Rate and Crit DMG of said skill hit is increased.
<color=#E78300>1</color> Trace: Deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
<color=#E78300>2</color> Traces: Deal Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.
<color=#E78300>3</color> Traces: Deal Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total.

101019281.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Gusty Lance - Shu and Early Sakura - Ookuninushi.
Deals Wind DMG equal to Gusty Lance - Shu's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and her Modifying Level is raised to <color=#E78300>Ω</color>.
Also deals Physical DMG equal to Early Sakura - Ookuninushi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and when a hit is landed on the enemy the cd of Skill 3 is reset for all members of the team.

101019282.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Gusty Lance - Shu and Living Soul - Osiris.
Deals Wind DMG equal to Gusty Lance - Shu's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and the skillchain cast also changes her Modifying Level to <color=#E78300>Ω</color>.
Also deals Wind DMG equal to Living Soul - Osiris' ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and when she enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld mode</material> all members of her team are granted a DMG boost equal to <color=#E78300>10% + 0.2%</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color> until <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode ends.

101019305.description:
Quickly dodges enemy attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge Effect: Gathers surrounding enemies around Shu and interrupts their attacks. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101021101.description:
Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK.

In the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102102)>Dawnlight</material> state:
 Expends <color=#E78300>1%</color> of current <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102101)>Luminous Echo</material> every <color=#E78300>0.1</color>s the state persists. Grants Unyielding and forbids the casting of any skills.
Repeatedly tap normal attack to execute 5 strikes, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK. On the fifth strike, expends all Rage to increase the fifth strike's Non-DoT ATK by <color=#E78300>0.2%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1</color> Rage expended.
If the Mod has <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102101)>Luminous Echo</material>, long press normal attack after the fourth strike to deal a special normal attack. Continue holding or repeatedly tap normal attack while the special attack is underway to deal Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK. Follow up with another normal attack to continue from the normal attack's fifth strike.
If the Mod's <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102101)>Luminous Echo</material> has been <color=#E78300>exhausted</color>, long press normal attack to expend all Rage and exit the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102102)>Dawnlight</material> state, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> of ATK, while also inflicting Sluggish on the locked-on enemy, slowing their movement speed to <color=#E78300>50%</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s.

Passive:
The Mod doesn't automatically gain Ultimate Skill charge. Rather, Ultimate Skill charge is restored to max when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102101)>Luminous Echo</material> is full.
Casting Daybreak Quartet and Sunrise Rhapsody grants Unyielding.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color>Normal attack hits grant Rage outside of the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102102)>Dawnlight</material> state. In the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102102)>Dawnlight</material> state, the special normal attack grants Rage when it hits.

101021201.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}, {2}, {3}, {4}</color> of ATK successively. Every strike landed on a locked-on enemy inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102103)>Harmonizing Chord</material> on the enemy, up to <color=#E78300>4</color> stacks. Hits on enemies with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102103)>Harmonizing Chord</material> grant <color=#E78300>6.25%</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102103)>Luminous Echo</material> for <color=#E78300>every</color> stack of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102101)>Harmonizing Chord</material> the enemy carries. This skill resets to its first strike upon exiting <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102102)>Dawnlight</material>.

101021202.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK. Hits on enemies with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102103)>Harmonizing Chord</material> clear <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102103)>Harmonizing Chord</material>, granting <color=#E78300>6.25%</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102101)>Luminous Echo</material> for <color=#E78300>every</color> stack of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102103)>Harmonizing Chord</material> cleared.

101021203.description:
Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK. Grants a progressively larger increase to Non-DoT Base DMG the further the Mod is from the locked-on enemy, for a total increase of up to <color=#E78300>200%</color>. For <color=#E78300>3</color>s after Daybreak Quartet hits, this skill changes to Sunrise Rhapsody.
Sunrise Rhapsody: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK. The final strike dealt to enemies with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102103)>Harmonizing Chord</material> clears <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102103)>Harmonizing Chord</material>, granting <color=#E78300>6.25%</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102103)>Luminous Echo</material> for <color=#E78300>every</color> stack of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102101)>Harmonizing Chord</material> cleared. This skill has a <color=#E78300>7</color>s CD.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color>When Sunrise Symphony hits, grants a certain amount of Rage depending on how far the Mod is from the locked-on enemy.

101021208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Dawnray - Artemis and Chord of Convallaria - Athena.
Deals Physical DMG equal to Dawnray - Artemis' ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). If she is not in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102102)>Dawnlight</material> state, Dawnray - Artemis enters the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102102)>Dawnlight</material> state, increasing the Non-DoT Crit Rate of her teammates' normal attacks by <color=#E78300>8.2% + 0.2%</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color> for <color=#E78300>14</color>s.
Deals Physical DMG equal to Chord of Convallaria - Athena's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), while also increasing nearby teammates' Normal Attack DMG by <color=#E78300>20% + 1%</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s, and decreasing the DMG she takes by <color=#E78300>{6}</color> for <color=#E78300>{7}</color>s. She enters the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material> state, restores Divine Grace to full, and resets her <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> stack count. Every time Sword Majalis is Harmonious while Chord of Convallaria - Athena is in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material> state, her nearby teammates also generate a Sonic Boom.

101021209.description: Enters the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102102)>Dawnlight</material> state, increasing the Non-DoT Crit Rate of teammates' normal attacks by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>14</color>s.

101021305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect. Outside the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102102)>Dawnlight</material> state, using a normal attack within <color=#E78300>2</color>s of Extremity Dodge changes the first strike of the normal attack to deal Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK. Following up with another normal attack continues from the normal attack's second strike.
Dodge effect: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>3</color>s. Dodge effect triggers only once every <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

101022101.description:
In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102201)>New Moon</material>:
Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK. On the third strike of the normal attack, New Moon's Shadow: Harmony changes to New Moon's Shadow: Sonata and New Moon Aglow: Harmony changes to New Moon Aglow: Sonata. Outside the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102207)>Veil Over The Full Moon</material> state, the normal attack's fifth strike grants <color=#E78300>20</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material>.

In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102202)>Full Moon</material>:
Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK. On the fifth strike of the normal attack, Full Moon's Shadow: Harmony changes to Full Moon's Shadow: Sonata and Full Moon Aglow: Harmony changes to Full Moon Aglow: Sonata.

Passive:
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material> is capped at <color=#E78300>100</color>. When a skill is changed to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102206)>Elegy</material>, other skills can't be changed to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102205)>Sonata</material>.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Normal attacks grant Divine Grace when they hit.

101022201.description:
In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102201)>New Moon</material>:
New Moon's Shadow: Harmony: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK.
New Moon's Shadow: Sonata: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK. Creates a field lasting <color=#E78300>8</color>s that inflicts Sluggish on enemies within, slowing their movement speed to <color=#E78300>50%</color>. Also replaces this skill with New Moon's Shadow: Elegy for <color=#E78300>8</color>s.
New Moon's Shadow: Elegy: Expends all Divine Grace to detonate the field, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK. Increases this skill's Non-DoT Base DMG by <color=#E78300>0.4%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace expended.
Hitting an enemy with this skill grants <color=#E78300>20</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material>. If more than <color=#E78300>50</color> Divine Grace is expended, grants an additional <color=#E78300>20</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material>.

In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102202)>Full Moon</material>:
Full Moon's Shadow: Harmony: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> of ATK.
Full Moon's Shadow: Sonata: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> of ATK and generates an orb that gathers enemies for <color=#E78300>8</color>s. The orb deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{6}</color> of ATK. Also replaces this skill with Full Moon's Shadow: Elegy for <color=#E78300>8</color>s.
Full Moon's Shadow: Elegy: Expends all Divine Grace to detonate the orb, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{7}</color> of ATK. Increases this skill's Non-DoT Base DMG by <color=#E78300>0.4%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace expended.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace</color>: New Moon's Shadow: Harmony and Full Moon's Shadow: Harmony grant Divine Grace when they hit.

101022202.description:
In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102201)>New Moon</material>:
New Moon Aglow: Harmony: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK.
New Moon Aglow: Sonata: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK and places a mark on the first enemy hit for <color=#E78300>8</color>s. Also replaces this skill with New Moon Aglow: Elegy for <color=#E78300>8</color>s.
New Moon Aglow: Elegy: Teleports to the marked enemy, expending all Divine Grace to deal Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK. Increases this skill's Non-DoT Base DMG by <color=#E78300>0.4%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace expended.
Hitting an enemy with this skill grants <color=#E78300>20</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material>. If more than <color=#E78300>50</color> Divine Grace is expended, grants an additional <color=#E78300>20</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material>.

In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102202)>Full Moon</material>:
Full Moon Aglow: Harmony: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> of ATK.
Full Moon Aglow: Sonata: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> of ATK and generates an orb that deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{6}</color> of ATK <color=#E78300>every</color> second for <color=#E78300>8</color>s. When the orb disappears, it deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{7}</color> of ATK. Also replaces this skill with Full Moon Aglow: Elegy for <color=#E78300>8</color>s.
Full Moon Aglow: Elegy: Expends all Divine Grace to detonate the orb, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{8}</color> of ATK. Increases this skill's Non-DoT Base DMG by <color=#E78300>0.4%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace expended.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color>New Moon Aglow: Harmony and Full Moon Aglow: Harmony grant Divine Grace when they hit.

101022203.description:
In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102201)>New Moon</material>:
Only usable at max <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material>. Switches to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102202)>Full Moon</material>, replacing New Moon's Shadow with Full Moon's Shadow: Harmony and New Moon Aglow with Full Moon Aglow: Harmony. Enters the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102207)>Veil Over The Full Moon</material> state.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102207)>Veil Over The Full Moon</material>: Increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> and Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{3}</color>. Reduces DMG taken by <color=#E78300>{4}</color> and grants Super Armor.

In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102202)>Full Moon</material>:
Expends <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material> every <color=#E78300>0.12</color>s.
When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material> is <color=#E78300>exhausted</color>, exits the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102207)>Veil Over The Full Moon</material> state.
Only usable when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material> is <color=#E78300>exhausted</color>. Switches to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102201)>New Moon</material>, replacing Full Moon's Shadow with New Moon's Shadow: Harmony and Full Moon Aglow with New Moon Aglow: Harmony, and dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK.

101022208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Serene Moon - Selene and Puppet Master - Hades.
Deals Shadow DMG equal to Serene Moon - Selene's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>) and generates <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102208)>New Moon Splendor</material> or <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102209)>Full Moon Brilliant</material> depending on her current form. Increases all teammates' Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s.
Deals Shadow DMG equal to Puppet Master - Hades' ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). If her Divine Grace changes while casting this skill, it is immediately set to <color=#E78300>50</color> for <color=#E78300>48</color>s. Increases all teammates' Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{7}</color> for <color=#E78300>{8}</color>s, and increases Independent DMG by <color=#E78300>{9}</color> for <color=#E78300>{10}</color>.
This Ultimate Skillchain has a <color=#E78300>40</color>s CD (unaffected by other attributes).

101022209.description:
In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102201)>New Moon</material>:
Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK and generates <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102208)>New Moon Splendor</material> for <color=#E78300>24</color>s.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102208)>New Moon Splendor</material>: Continuously taunts all normal and elite enemies in range.

In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102202)>Full Moon</material>:
Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK and generates <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102209)>Full Moon Brilliant</material> for <color=#E78300>24</color>s.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102209)>Full Moon Brilliant</material>: Inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102210)>Lunar Eclipse</material> on up to <color=#E78300>3</color> enemies in range.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102210)>Lunar Eclipse</material>: When the enemy takes damage, other enemies with this status also take <color=#E78300>30%</color> of the damage as Shadow DMG.

When the Mod enters the battlefield, both the Mod and other Mods who have a preset Ultimate Skillchain with this Mod get <color=#E78300>35%</color> Ultimate Skill charge.

When the Mod or the Mod's teammates crit, they get <color=#E78300>3%</color> Ultimate Skill charge. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

101022305.description:
Quickly dodges enemy attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect. In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102202)>Full Moon</material>, Dodge won't interrupt the normal attack strike count. Grants Unyielding during Extremity Dodge for <color=#E78300>{1}</color>s.
Dodge effect: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>3</color>s. Dodge effect triggers only once every <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

101024101.description:
Launches a series of attacks, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit's</material> Joint Attack: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.

Passive:
The <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> automatically attacks the enemy locked on by it using either a joint normal attack or a joint skill attack until the enemy is defeated. If the Mod's target differs from the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit's</material>, when a Mod's skill hits, the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> will shift its focus to the Mod's locked-on enemy. The <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit's</material> Joint Attack is not regarded as a skill cast by the Mod. The <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> may last on the field for up to <color=#E78300>30</color>s or until the enemy locked on by it is defeated, whichever comes first.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when the normal attack hits.

101024201.description:
Focus the Divine Power to launch a ranged attack on the target, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Increases the Mod's Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s upon hitting an enemy. When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> is on the field, skill cast also deals additional Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK, and hitting an enemy will change Skill 3 to Jackal's Gaze. The <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> will immediately launch a joint attack on the target locked on by the Mod.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit's</material> Joint Attack: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> ATK in total.

101024202.description:
Focus the Divine Power to launch a crescent slash attack on the target, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Increases the Mod's Shadow DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s upon hitting an enemy. When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> is on the field, skill cast also deals additional Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK, and hitting an enemy will change Skill 3 to Jackal's Wild Slash. The Jackal Spirit will immediately launch a joint attack on the target locked on by the Mod.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit's</material> Joint Attack: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> ATK in total.

101024203.description:
Summons the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> to attack the Mod's locked-on target if the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> is not yet present on the field, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total to the surrounding area. The <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total to the surrounding area. When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> is already on the field, the skill will be replaced with Jackal's Gaze instead.
Jackal's Gaze: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total. The <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> will immediately launch a joint attack on the enemy locked on by the Mod and then follow up with a ray attack upon skill hit, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK in total. Jackal's Gaze has a CD of <color=#E78300>8</color>s.
Jackal's Wild Slash: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> ATK in total. The <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> will immediately launch a joint attack on the enemy locked on by the Mod and then follow up with another claw attack upon skill hit, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{6}</color> ATK in total. Jackal's Wild Slash has a CD of <color=#E78300>8</color>s.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit's</material> Joint Attack: Approaches the enemy and then deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{7}</color> ATK in total.
When the Mod casts Spirit Guide, Jackal's Gaze, or Jackal's Wild Slash, the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> will take on the Mod's current stats.

101024208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Jackal - Anubis and Croc Rage - Sobek.
Deals Shadow DMG equal to Jackal - Anubis' ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>his Ultimate Skill level</color>). Anubis becomes one with the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> for <color=#E78300>15</color>s. Also resets the his skill CD when Anubis casts the skill. When the skill hits, increases the ATK of all team members by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> and increases their Ultimate Skill charge speed by <color=#E78300>{8}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s.
Deals Water DMG equal to Croc Rage - Sobek's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>his Ultimate Skill level</color>). Increases the Melee DMG of all team members by <color=#E78300>{7}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s when the skill hits.

101024209.description:
May be cast only when the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> is on the field. The Mod becomes one with the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> for <color=#E78300>15</color>s, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Upon skill casting, increases all team members' ATK by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s and resets skill CD.
When the Mod and the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> are in one, Skill 3 will be replaced with Jackal's Wild Slash instead and has a CD of <color=#E78300>8</color>s. Each time a normal attack is launched or a skill is cast, an additional attack will be triggered, dealing more damage.
The first strike of a normal attack will trigger a stab attack which deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK in total. The stab can be triggered once every <color=#E78300>2.5</color>s.
Other strikes of the normal attack will trigger a claw attack that deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> ATK in total.
Casting Jackal Charge deals additional Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{6}</color> ATK in total, and the remaining CD of Jackal Charge will be shortened by <color=#E78300>5</color>s upon hitting an enemy.
Casting Jackal Whirl deals additional Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{7}</color> ATK in total, and the remaining CD of Jackal Whirl will be shortened by <color=#E78300>5</color>s upon hitting an enemy.
Casting Jackal's Wild Slash deals additional Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{8}</color> ATK in total.

Gains <color=#E78300>2.5%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when a teammate or the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> defeats an enemy or when the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit's</material> Joint Attack hits. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

101024281.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Rage Serpent - Marduk and Jackal - Anubis.
Deals Physical DMG equal to Rage Serpent - Marduk's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>his Ultimate Skill level</color>), while also reducing DMG dealt to all teammates by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s. Inflicts Armor Break on enemies hit, reducing their DEF by <color=#E78300>{7}</color> for <color=#E78300>{8}</color>.
Deals Shadow DMG equal to Jackal - Anubis' ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>his Ultimate Skill level</color>). Anubis becomes one with the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> for <color=#E78300>15</color>s, resetting his skill CDs and reducing the remaining CD of his Ultimate Skill by <color=#E78300>5</color>s. Increases teammates' ATK by <color=#E78300>{9}</color> for <color=#E78300>{10}</color>s when the skill hits, while also increasing his Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{11}</color> and his Shadow DMG by <color=#E78300>{12}</color> for <color=#E78300>{13}</color>s.

101024305.description:
Quickly dodges enemy attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect. Follow up with a normal attack within <color=#E78300>1</color>s of triggering Extremity Dodge to launch a skill attack that deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. At the same time, the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> will launch a joint attack using Jackal Whirl on the Mod's locked-on enemy.
Dodge effect: Grants <color=#E78300>20</color> Rage. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

101026101.description:
Launches a series of strikes at the locked-on target, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> A normal attack that results in a hit grants Divine Grace.

101026201.description:
Fires a large number of bullets in the target direction, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Skill can be charged up to <color=#E78300>2</color> times by holding down on the button, and each charge expends <color=#E78300>20</color> Divine Grace and increases the skill DMG dealt with the skill on hit by <color=#E78300>30%</color>. Enemies hit by a fully charged Bullet Hail are also afflicted with Scorch for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds.
Scorch: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK every <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds.

101026202.description: Hammers into the ground, unleashing an explosion at the feet of the locked-on enemy which deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Hold down on the button to charge the skill up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times. Each charge expends <color=#E78300>25</color> Divine Grace and increases the non-DoT skill DMG dealt with the skill on hit by <color=#E78300>30%</color>. Casting the skill at full charge also unleashes an additional two ring-shaped explosions of even magnitude, with all three explosions dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.

101026203.description: Directs a stream of flames towards the target, attacking enemies in range and dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Nuadha can move slowly while skill is being cast.

101026208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Croc Rage - Sobek and Airgetlam - Nuadha.
Deals Water DMG equal to Croc Rage - Sobek's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>his Ultimate Skill level</color>), and when a hit is landed on the enemy all members of the team are granted a <color=#E78300>{5}</color> Melee DMG boost for <color=#E78300>{6}</color> seconds.
Also deals Fire DMG equal to Airgetlam - Nuadha's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>his Ultimate Skill level</color>), and when a hit is landed on the enemy all members of the team are granted <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102601)>Overload</material> for <color=#E78300>10</color> seconds.

101026209.description:
Hammers at the enemy, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Skill cast grants all members of the team the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102601)>Overload</material> effect for <color=#E78300>10</color> seconds.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102601)>Overload</material>: Grants Unyielding, and when the Mod is hit the attacker is dealt Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.

An <color=#E78300>8%</color> Ultimate Skill charge is granted when the enemy is afflicted with Scorch. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>0.5</color> seconds.

101026281.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Ryugiri - Kagutsuchi and Airgetlam - Nuadha.
Deals Fire DMG equal to Ryugiri - Kagutsuchi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>his Ultimate Skill level</color>), and when a hit is landed on the enemy all members of the team are granted a <color=#E78300>{5}</color> Fire DMG boost for <color=#E78300>{6}</color> seconds.
Also deals Fire DMG equal to Airgetlam - Nuadha's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>his Ultimate Skill level</color>), and when a hit is landed on the enemy all members of the team are granted <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102601)>Overload</material> for <color=#E78300>10</color> seconds.

101026305.description:
Nuadha quickly dodges enemy attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge Effect: The next cast of Bullet Hail or Ground Blast automatically occurs at full charge and does not expend Divine Grace. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101027101.description: Attacks the enemy with the anchor again and again, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

101027201.description:
Dashes and strikes at the enemy, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Traces on every skill hit.

101027202.description:
Swings the anchor to attack the target with one heavy hit, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Hold down the skill button to charge, with Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total dealt on a full charge. When, on skill cast the target enemy is in Freeze, skill is immediately charged to full.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>{3}</color> Traces each time a skill cast results in a hit.

101027203.description: Swings the anchor to attack enemies with a row of ice spikes, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. When the spikes hit, the enemy hit is inflicted with Freeze for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

101027208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Drifting Flurry - Leviathan and Frost Fang - Vidar.
Deals Ice DMG equal to Drifting Flurry - Leviathan's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), as well as inflicts Freeze on all enemies on the field for <color=#E78300>{6}</color> seconds.
Also deals Ice DMG equal to Frost Fang - Vidar's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and when an enemy hit is landed all enemies on the field also have their Ice RES lowered by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{7}</color> seconds.

101027209.description:
Dives into the ground and moves towards the locked-on enemy. At the destination, she jumps and attacks, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Enemies hit are afflicted with Freeze for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

Skill grants a <color=#E78300>8%</color> Ultimate Skill charge for <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds when Freeze is inflicted on the enemy.

101027221.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect. Within <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds of the Dodge effect being triggered or a successful Break-fall while Dodge is not in cooldown, tap on Normal Attack to launch a skill attack using the anchor and deal Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total, as well as inflict Freeze on enemies hit.
When in Break-fall or when Dodge is triggered: Ice DMG dealt is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. Effect is removed on next hit. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds.

101027281.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Waverender - Skadi and Drifting Flurry - Leviathan.
Deals Ice DMG equal to Waverender - Skadi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), as well as increases the charge skill DMG of the team by <color=#E78300>{6}</color> for <color=#E78300>{7}</color> seconds upon skillchain hit.
Also deals Ice DMG equal to Drifting Flurry - Leviathan's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), as well as inflicts Freeze on all enemies on the field for <color=#E78300>{5}</color> seconds.

101027305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge: Leviathan's Ice DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>, and is removed after the next enemy hit. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

101028101.description:
Swings Mjölnir to attack the enemy continuously, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Following up its derivative skill with a normal attack will start the normal attack from the fourth strike and grants Unyielding for <color=#E78300>2</color>s during the follow-up.

Passive:
Every hit landed with a normal attack or skill attack grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> points, which can stack up to <color=#E78300>100</color>. <color=#E78300>7</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> are expended every <color=#E78300>0.5</color>s. Gains <color=#E78300>9</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> for each normal attack hit and <color=#E78300>15</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> for each skill hit, and gains <color=#E78300>15</color> more <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> for each skill hit in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102802)>Thunder Frenzy</material> state. Every <color=#E78300>1</color> point of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> increases Independent DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>0.3%</color>, with the effect maxed out when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> is at <color=#E78300>80</color>.
Enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102802)>Thunder Frenzy</material> state for <color=#E78300>2</color>s when casting a derivative skill, with effect duration extended by <color=#E78300>0.01</color>s for every <color=#E78300>1</color> point of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> owned (up to an extension of <color=#E78300>1</color>s).
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102802)>Thunder Frenzy</material>: Becomes Invincible for a short time upon entering the state. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> will not be automatically expended during this state, and Mod deals <color=#E78300>{2}</color> more Thunder DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace when a hit is landed with the fifth strike of a normal attack.

101028201.description:
Rushes toward the enemy with Mjölnir in hand, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. For a short time after skill cast, skill is replaced by the derivative skill: Hammerstrike, which can only be cast as a follow-up to Quivers Underground.
Hammerstrike: Attacks surrounding enemies with Mjölnir, expending <color=#E78300>3</color> Traces to deal Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace when a hit is landed with Quivers Underground.

101028202.description:
Swings Mjölnir wildly, pulling in nearby enemies for a short time and dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Within a short time after skill cast, this skill will be replaced by the derivative skill: Rumblestrike, which can only be cast as a follow-up to Rumbles Faraway.
Rumblestrike: Spins Mjölnir and then smashes it into the ground, expending <color=#E78300>3</color> Traces to deal Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace when a hit is landed with Rumbles Faraway.

101028203.description:
Swings Mjölnir, then smashes it into the ground, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Within a short time after skill cast, this skill will be replaced by the derivative skill: Tremblestrike, which can only be cast as a follow-up to Trembles Deep Within.
Tremblestrike: Swings Mjölnir and smashes it into the ground again, expending <color=#E78300>3</color> Traces to deal Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace when a hit is landed with Trembles Deep Within.

101028208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Comet R4Y - Zenkibo Tengu and Roaring Thunder - Thor.
Deals Light DMG equal to Comet R4Y - Zenkibo Tengu's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and increases the Light DMG of all teammates by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s.
Deals Thunder DMG equal to Roaring Thunder - Thor's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and sends the Mod into <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102803)>Thunder Rage</material> state. When she lands a hit while in this state, increases Skill DMG of all members of the team by <color=#E78300>{7}</color> for <color=#E78300>{8}</color>s.

101028209.description:
Summons the Járngreipr gloves that unleash the power of raging thunder, and also enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102803)>Thunder Rage</material> state. Skill cast grants all Trace Mods on the team a <color=#E78300>{1}</color> Skill DMG boost for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102803)>Thunder Rage</material>: Grants Control Immunity and DMG Immunity, though Mod may not move or cast skills or Dodge. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> buffs are raised to max. Expends all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> with no further automatic expenditure, then grants <color=#E78300>7</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> every <color=#E78300>0.2</color>s thereafter. Keep tapping the attack button to keep casting skill attacks with Járngreipr which deal Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total. The second strike of the attack also sends down five thunderbolts in front, with each dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK. Unleashes one last fist attack automatically when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> is at max, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> ATK, then exits <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102803)>Thunder Rage</material> state immediately after.

Gains a <color=#E78300>4%</color> Ultimate Skill charge for each Trace expended by the Mod or a teammate.

101028281.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Roaring Thunder - Thor and Living Soul - Osiris.
Deals Thunder DMG equal to Roaring Thunder - Thor's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and sends the Mod into <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102803)>Thunder Rage</material> state. When she lands a hit while in this state, increases the Skill DMG of all Trace Mods on the team by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> until <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode ends.
Deals Wind DMG equal to Living Soul - Osiris's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and sends the Mod into <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode, increasing DMG dealt by all members of the team by (<color=#E78300>20% + 0.2%</color> × <color=#297DE0>their Ultimate Skill level</color>) until <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode ends.

101028282.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Flowfly Mist - Shu and Roaring Thunder - Thor.
Deals Thunder DMG equal to Flowfly Mist - Shu's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). Landing a hit on the enemy increases the combat resource gain rate of members of the team by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s. Every <color=#E78300>1</color> hit landed on the enemy with a Normal Attack increases Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>25%</color> (effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times). Crit DMG buff expires at the same time as the combat resource buff.
Also deals Thunder DMG equal to Roaring Thunder - Thor's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). When Thor lands a hit while in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102803)>Thunder Rage</material>, all members of the team deal <color=#E78300>{7}</color> more Skill DMG and <color=#E78300>{8}</color> more Thunder DMG for <color=#E78300>{9}</color>s.

101028305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks and can Dodge two consecutive times. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect. Following up an Extremity Dodge with a normal attack will start the normal attack from the fourth strike and grants Unyielding for <color=#E78300>2</color>s. Gains <color=#E78300>15</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> points.
Dodge effect: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>3</color>s. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101032101.description: Uses his greatsword to continuously attack the enemy, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Tyr is also granted max Traces as he enters the battlefield.

101032106.description:
Uses his greatsword to continuously attack the enemy, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Tyr is also granted max Traces as he enters the battlefield. When the greatsword type held is Sword of Queen, the way the normal attack takes place is changed.
When holding the Sword of Queen: Tyr launches an attack using the Sword of Queen, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.

101032201.description:
Tyr switches to another greatsword type and deals to the enemies around him Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. This skill may also be cast by tapping on the skill button during a normal attack. Doing so does not interrupt the normal attack but does not cause DMG either. However, the remaining cooldown time is shortened by <color=#E78300>2.5</color> seconds.
Greatswords are switched in the following order: Sword of Knight, Sword of Rook, then Sword of Queen.

<color=#297DE0>Traces: </color>When the skill is directly cast, Tyr is granted <color=#E78300>2</color> Traces. When the skill is cast over the course of a normal attack, Tyr is granted <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace.

101032202.description:
Brings the greatsword down upon the target, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Skill cast also grants the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103202)>King Mark</material> corresponding to the type of greatsword used and places the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103201)>King</material> on the battlefield for <color=#E78300>30</color> seconds. When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103201)>King</material> is on the field, tap to cast the skill again, with <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace expended in the process to launch a specific attack depending on the greatsword type in question.
Sword of Knight: The greatsword falls again, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.
