Sword of Queen: Tyr launches the greatsword at the target, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> of ATK in total.

101032203.description:

Skill cast inflicts Shackle on the enemy for <color=#E78300>1.5</color> seconds, and as Tyr cleaves down on the enemy from on high additional DMG is also dealt. (The quantum of the additional DMG is based on the number of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103202)>King Marks</material> expended.) Shackle is removed from the enemy upon hit.
<color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103202)>King Mark</material>: Deals Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.
<color=#E78300>2</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103202)>King Marks</material>: Deal Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total.
<color=#E78300>3</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103202)>King Marks</material>: Deal Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> of ATK in total.

101032208.description:

Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>5</color> times.

Deals Physical DMG equal to New Pact - Verthandi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and all members of the team are also granted a <color=#E78300>{7}</color> boost to their Mod Index Multiplier for that skillchain.

This effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times.

101039209.description:
The Max HP of all members in the team is raised by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>. The effect, which stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times, restores to the entire team HP equal to <color=#E78300>{3} + {1} of Poseidon's ATK</color>.

When Poseidon or a Teammate Break-falls, an <color=#E78300>8%</color> Ultimate Skill charge is also granted.

101041101.description:
Swings the greatsword continuously, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK.

Passive:
When Mod is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material> state, <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104102)>Harmony Judgement</material> occurs in the latter half of each normal attack strike, Adagio Vibrato, Moderato Legato or Presto Tremolo. (A follow-on attack dealt at the right time is determined Harmonious.) Grants the Unyielding effect for <color=#E78300>2.5</color>s and <color=#E78300>1</color> stack of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> for <color=#E78300>7</color>s each time a strike is judged as Harmonious. The duration of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> is reset when an attack fails to be judged as Harmonious. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> can stack up to <color=#E78300>105</color> times. A Sonic Boom occurs when a normal attack is judged as Harmonious. <color=#E78300>Each</color> hit landed by the Sonic Boom deals Normal Attack Physical DMG to surrounding enemies equal to <color=#E78300>261.6%, 293.6%, 329.6%, 349.2%, 392%, 440%, or 493.8%</color> ATK depending on the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> stack count. Harmonious strikes do not interrupt the normal attack strike count.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace upon normal attack hits when Mod is not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material> state.

101041201.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK. When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> stack count is a multiple of <color=#E78300>3</color>, Adagio Vibrato deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK, and restores HP equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK of the Mod after a hit lands. While in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material> state, an Adagio Vibrato cast and judged as Harmonious increases Non-DoT DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>.

101041202.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK. When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> stack count is a multiple of <color=#E78300>5</color>, Moderato Legato deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK, and inflicts Armor Break on enemies hit while reducing their DEF by <color=#E78300>{4}</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s. While in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material> state, a Moderato Legato cast and judged as Harmonious increases Non-DoT DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>.

101041203.description:
Skill may only be cast when Divine Grace is full. Deals Physical DMG to surrounding enemies equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK, triggers <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material> state, resets the CD of Adagio Vibrato, Moderato Legato and Presto Tremolo, and replaces Concerto Chordblade with Presto Tremolo.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material>: Expends <color=#E78300>3</color> Divine Grace every <color=#E78300>0.375</color>s. Other attributes do not affect this Divine Grace expenditure. When Divine Grace reaches <color=#E78300>0</color>, <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material> state ends and Concerto Chordblade goes into CD.
Presto Tremolo: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK. When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> stack count is a multiple of <color=#E78300>7</color>, Presto Tremolo deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK, with each stack of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> present increasing Non-DoT DMG dealt by the Mod by <color=#E78300>1%</color>. Increases the Non-DoT DMG dealt by Presto Tremolo by <color=#E78300>{4}</color> when it is judged as Harmonious. Presto Tremolo has a CD of <color=#E78300>12</color>s.

101041209.description:
Skill casting restores Divine Grace to full, resets the existing <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> stack count, and triggers <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material> state. During this <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material> state, a Sonic Boom also occurs around the teammates whenever a normal attack is judged as Harmonious. Skill casting also increases all teammates' normal attack DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

Gains an <color=#E78300>8%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when Stun is inflicted on the enemy. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

101041305.description:
Quickly dodges enemy attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect. Casting Dodge does not interrupt the strike count of normal attacks. When Mod is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material> state, Extremity Dodge either triggers <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104102)>Harmony Judgement</material> or resets the current judgement and starts a new one.
Dodge effect: Deals Physical DMG to the attacker and other surrounding enemies equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK and inflicts Stun on them for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds.

101042101.description:
Controls two puppets that take turns to attack the enemy, Leuce with sharp claws and Mintha with her armored fists, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Launches attack with puppet strings instead when Leuce and Mintha cannot be controlled, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.

Passive:
Grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic</material> Mark every <color=#E78300>6</color>s when Mod has at least <color=#E78300>25</color> but no more than <color=#E78300>75</color> Divine Grace, up to a maximum of <color=#E78300>4</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic</material> Marks. For <color=#E78300>each</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic</material> Mark owned, increases Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>3%</color> and Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>5%</color>.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Expends <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace when Leuce lands a hit with a normal attack or a skill, and gains <color=#E78300>3</color> Divine Grace when Mintha lands a hit with a normal attack or a skill. The expenditure/gain of Divine Grace from Leuce and Mintha is not affected by other attributes.

101042201.description:
Switches around the puppets, and the next time Puppet Show: Prelude or Puppet Show: March is cast, Leuce and Mintha both go into <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104202)>Dance Partner</material> mode. When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic</material> Mark count is at max, hold down on the Normal Attack button to expend all of the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic Marks</material>, which causes Leuce and Mintha to go into <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104203)>Dance Duo</material> mode.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104203)>Dance Duo</material>: Increases the Mod's Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>, Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{3}</color>, and Fixed DMG by <color=#E78300>6,000</color> for <color=#E78300>9</color>s; Leuce and Mintha launch a joint attack, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total for <color=#E78300>5.5</color>s. When in Dance Duo state, skills can not be cast, no <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic</material> Marks are granted, and Leuce and Mintha can not gain or expend any Divine Grace.
Casting Shadow Dance Twirl when Dodge is not in CD triggers the Dodge effect against the locked-on enemy. Dodge effect goes into CD after this effect is triggered.

101042202.description:
Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total when Leuce is the puppet being operated. While the skill is in action, inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104205)>Darksea</material> on the enemy for <color=#E78300>12</color>s. Inflicting <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104205)>Darksea</material> multiple times does not refresh the duration.
Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total when Mintha is the puppet being operated. While the skill is in action, inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104204)>Deathswamp</material> on the enemy for <color=#E78300>8</color>s. Inflicting <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104204)>Deathswamp</material> multiple times does not refresh the duration.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104205)>Darksea</material>: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK every <color=#E78300>2</color>s for <color=#E78300>12</color>s.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104204)>Deathswamp</material>: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK every <color=#E78300>2</color>s for <color=#E78300>8</color>s.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104202)>Dance Partner</material>: Replaces Puppet Show: Prelude with Puppet Show: Waltz, in which Leuce and Mintha launch a joint attack, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> ATK in total.

101042203.description:
Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total when Leuce is the puppet being controlled. Leuce also slightly drags surrounding enemies while the skill is in action.
Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total when Mintha is the puppet being controlled. Mintha also slightly drags surrounding enemies while the skill is in action.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104202)>Dance Partner</material>: Replaces Puppet Show: March with Puppet Show: Rondo. Leuce and Mintha launch a joint attack, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total.

101042208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Puppet Master - Hades and Drowsie - Oneiroi.
Deals Shadow DMG equal to Puppet Master - Hades' ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and all members of the team go into Energy and Divine Grace recovery state for the next <color=#E78300>12</color>s upon skillchain cast. Grants <color=#E78300>25</color> Energy and Divine Grace if Energy and Divine Grace are at <color=#E78300>30</color> or lower at the time of triggering. Triggers only once every <color=#E78300>3</color>s. Increases DMG of all Olympus Mods on the team by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s when the skillchain hits.
Also deals Light DMG equal to Drowsie - Oneiroi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>).

101042209.description:
Restores Mod's Divine Grace to <color=#E78300>50</color> every <color=#E78300>3</color>s for <color=#E78300>12</color>s upon Ultimate Skill cast. Increases all team members' Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>3%</color>, Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>15%</color> for <color=#E78300>{1}</color>s for <color=#E78300>each</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic</material> Mark owned, and deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.

Grants a <color=#E78300>3%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when a Mod or a teammate attack crits. Triggers only once every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

101042305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge effect: The attacker is significantly slowed for <color=#E78300>4</color>s. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101048101.description:
Fires a series of shots at the locked-on target, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Energy every second.

101048201.description: Shoots a laserbeam at the target, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total and inflicting Shackle to enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

101048202.description: Summons airstrikes to bomb the target area, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

101048203.description: Unleashes a continuous Pulsation attack of <color=#E78300>16</color> strikes at the target, with each strike dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK.

101048208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Darkstar - Hel and Comet R4Y - Zenkibo Tengu.
Deals Shadow DMG equal to Darkstar - Hel's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and increases the Shadow DMG of all teammates by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s upon hit.
Also deals Light DMG equal to Comet R4Y - Zenkibo Tengu's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and increases the Light DMG of all teammates by <color=#E78300>{7}</color> for <color=#E78300>{8}</color>s upon hit.

101048209.description:
Launches several missiles at enemies in the target area, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Restores <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Energy to the team upon each missile hit.

Gains <color=#E78300>8%</color> of Ultimate Skill charge when the enemy is inflicted with Shackle. Triggers only once every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

101048211.description: Launches <color=#E78300>9</color> rounds of bombardment at the enemy to her front, with each round dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK. Also inflicts on enemies hit Shackle for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s. Bombarding the same target multiple times in a row during a single bombardment reduces the DMG dealt on subsequent hits.

101048305.description:
Quickly dodges enemy attacks, and Dodge can be cast 2 consecutive times. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge Effect: Inflicts the attacker with Shackle for <color=#E78300>{1}</color>s. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

101049101.description:
Slashes five times at the enemy with the cursed blade, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

Passive:
Generates an <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104901)>Ice Mirror</material> that follows her after launching the third strike of a Normal Attack or casting Higan: Frostdance or Higan: Bonechill.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104901)>Ice Mirror</material>: Shatters after a brief delay. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104901)>Ice Mirror</material> shards can also hit the Mod but no DMG will be dealt. Instead, she will launch the skill attack: Broken Mirror: Dark when hit by the shards, dealing to the enemy Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total and gaining <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104902)>Mirrorwalk</material> effect for a short time. If the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104901)>Ice Mirror</material> shatters but the shards don't hit the Mod, the Mod will launch the skill attack: Broken Mirror: Secret, dealing to the enemy Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104902)>Mirrorwalk</material>: When this effect is active, gains Unyielding. Higan: Frostdance and Higan: Bonechill will be replaced with their corresponding derivative skills. Casting the fifth strike of her Normal Attack will expend <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104902)>Mirrorwalk</material> effect and summon <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> for a skill attack on the enemy, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK in total.
When the Mod triggers Extremity Dodge from dodging the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104901)>Ice Mirror</material> shards, <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> will be summoned for a skill attack on the enemy, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> ATK in total.
Within <color=#E78300>1</color>s after triggering Extremity Dodge, tap on the Normal Attack button to unleash a follow-up attack that deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{6}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Gains Rage when a normal attack hits.

101049201.description:
Swiftly unleashes a slash at the enemy, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.
Mirrorbloom: Frostdance (derivative): Grants Unyielding when this skill is cast. Summons <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> and launches a dash-and-slash with her, expending <color=#E78300>35</color> Rage and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104902)>Mirrorwalk</material> effect. The Mod deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total, while <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total.
Higan: Frostdance and Mirrorbloom: Frostdance share a CD.

101049202.description:
Brandishes the cursed blade, performing a horizontal sweep then an upward flick, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.
Mirrorbloom: Bonechill (derivative): Grants Unyielding when this skill is cast. Summons <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> and unleashes a spinning slash with her, expending <color=#E78300>40</color> Rage and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104902)>Mirrorwalk</material> effect. The Mod deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total, while <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total.
Higan: Bonechill and Mirrorbloom: Bonechill share a CD.

101049203.description:
Summons <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> and gathers icy Divine Power at the front. Hold down on the skill button to go into a parry stance, then release or wait until the time runs out to launch an attack, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Attack shortens the remaining CD of the skill by <color=#E78300>40%</color>.
If the Mod takes a hit while in the parry stance, she then gains the following effects: Blocks the damage. Inflicts Freeze on the attacker for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s. ATK increases by <color=#E78300>{4}</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s. Gains <color=#E78300>20</color> Rage. Unleashes a slash attack along with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> to deal Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total, while <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total.

101049208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of So-ei - Kuramitsuha and Flower of Yomi - Izanami.
Deals Ice DMG equal to So-ei - Kuramitsuha's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105502)>Congeal</material> to the Ice Mod on the team with the highest ATK for <color=#E78300>15</color>s. When this skillchain hits, increases the Skill DMG of all Rage Mods on the team by <color=#E78300>{7}</color> for <color=#E78300>{8}</color>s.
Deals Ice DMG equal to Flower of Yomi- Izanami's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and increases the Ice DMG dealt by all members of the team by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s.

101049209.description:
Summons <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> from the Ice Mirror From Afterlife, then unleashes icy Divine Grace and slashes the enemy with her, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK, while <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK. When this skill is being cast, increases the Ice DMG dealt by all members of the team by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s, and inflicts Freeze on the enemy at the front (Freeze will be removed upon hit).

Grants a <color=#E78300>3%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate attack crits. Effect can trigger only once every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

101049305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge effect: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>2</color>s. Increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds.

101050101.description:
Buzenbo swings her katana continuously to slash at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces: </color>When the final strike of the attack results in a hit, <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Trace is granted. The total of number of Traces that can be obtained this way is capped at <color=#E78300>1</color>.

101050201.description:
Buzenbo launches three strikes at the target, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces: </color>Grants <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Traces on every skill hit.

101050202.description:
Buzenbo launches a cross light blade attack in the shape of a cross at the target, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces: </color>Grants <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Traces on every skill hit.

101050203.description:
Buzenbo launches an Iaido move and unleashes a blade array at the locked-on enemy. Traces can be expended in the <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds following skill cast to launch the next move of Scarlet: Scattered Flowers (the attack range of the blade array will also be increased). There are a total of three moves in Scarlet: Scattered Flowers, and Traces obtained with Scarlet Skandha Slash are expended first.
Scarlet: Scattered Flowers Move I: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Scarlet: Scattered Flowers Move II: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.
Scarlet: Scattered Flowers Move III: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total.

101050208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Shinku - Buzenbo Tengu and Shinri - Tsukuyomi.
Deals Thunder DMG equal to Shinri - Tsukuyomi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and when a hit is landed on the enemy, all members of the team get a Thunder DMG boost of <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color> seconds.
Also deals Physical DMG equal to Shinku - Buzenbo Tengu's ATK ×(<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and a hit landed on the enemy triggers Zero Time, slowing all enemy movements significantly for <color=#E78300>5</color> seconds. All members of the team are granted a <color=#E78300>7.5%</color> Ultimate Skill charge for <color=#E78300>every</color> additional enemy hit.

101050209.description:
Buzenbo dashes in the direction of the locked-on target, slashing away, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Skill cast triggers Zero Time for <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds.

When Buzenbo or a Teammate crits with a skill or Ultimate Skill cast, a <color=#E78300>4%</color> Ultimate Skill charge is granted; triggers only once every <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds.

101050221.description:
Slashing by Buzenbo sends a cross light blade flying towards the locked-on target, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Enemies hit are also afflicted with Armor Break for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> When the first strike of the attack results in a hit, <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace is granted; hits with the cross light blade granting another <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace.

101050281.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Jin-ei - Kuninotokotachi and Shinku - Buzenbo Tengu.
Deals Physical DMG equal to Jin-ei - Kuninotokotachi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her average skill level</color>), and hits landed on the enemy lower their Physical, Fire, Thunder, and Wind Resistance by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s.
Also deals Physical DMG equal to Shinku - Buzenbo Tengu's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and enters Zero Time upon hit, slowing all enemy movements significantly for <color=#E78300>5</color> seconds. All members of the team are granted a <color=#E78300>7.5%</color> Ultimate Skill charge for <color=#E78300>every</color> additional hit.

101050305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Dodge can be used two consecutive times. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds, and grants a <color=#E78300>2%</color> Ultimate Skill charge. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101052101.description:
Fires two volleys using the Rage Serpent, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Then, calls in a drone in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105202)>Storm Mode</material> to bombard enemies in the front up to 12 times, with each bombardment dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK. When the Base DMG buff of Skill 1, Total Firepower, is active, the last strike of the normal attack also summons a drone in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105202)>Storm Mode</material> that rolls forward and launches three cannon shots, with each shot dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK.

Passive:
Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Firepower for every <color=#E78300>1</color> Energy expended. When the third strike of the normal attack concludes and Marduk reloads, gains <color=#E78300>40</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105201)>Firepower</material>. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105201)>Firepower</material> cap: <color=#E78300>300</color>. When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105201)>Firepower</material> is full, hold down the Normal Attack button to unleash Hissing in Rage.
Hissing in Rage: Maxes out the Rage Serpent's firing rate for a firepower deluge that expends <color=#E78300>12</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105201)>Firepower</material> every <color=#E78300>0.2</color>s. Executes a <color=#E78300>5</color>-strike attack. Each strike deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> of ATK. Effect lasts <color=#E78300>5</color>s and no <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105201)>Firepower</material> is granted during this time.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Restores <color=#E78300>2</color> Energy every second, and <color=#E78300>{3}</color> Energy every time a normal attack or Hissing in Rage hits.

101052201.description:
Fires three consecutive cannon shots at the enemy with the Rage Serpent, with each shot dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK. Increases the Base DMG of all team members' Skill 1 by <color=#E78300>5%</color> for <color=#E78300>5</color>s upon each hit. Effect can stack up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times. Refreshes and extends the duration by <color=#E78300>1</color>s for each stack. Each cannon shot also grants <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Energy. If there are cannon shots not fired by the end of the skill cast, each shot not fired reduces the remaining CD of the skill by <color=#E78300>20%</color>. When Energy is full, the skill is replaced with Firepower Assist.
Firepower Assist: Expends <color=#E78300>30</color> Energy and calls in ranged bombardment to enemies in the front, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total. When Hissing in Rage is active with Energy at max, Firepower Assist will be cast automatically and the required Energy will be expended automatically, too.

101052202.description:
Bombards the enemy with the Rage Serpent, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total and inflicting Stun on all enemies within range for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s. Upon landing a hit, calls in a drone in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105203)>Rafale Mode</material> to conduct an area bombardment, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total. Skill casting reduces <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105201)>Firepower</material> expenditure by <color=#E78300>20%</color> for <color=#E78300>7</color>s.
When the Mod or a teammate lands a hit with this drone, reduces the skill's CD by <color=#E78300>0.4</color>s (up to a reduction of <color=#E78300>6</color>s in total) and increases the skill's Energy cost by <color=#E78300>2</color> (up to a boost of <color=#E78300>30</color> points of Energy in total).

101052203.description:
Throws an implosion grenade that deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total and pulls in the enemies for a short time. Then, calls in a drone in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105204)>Bourasque Mode</material> to conduct an area bombardment, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total. Skill casting increases the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105201)>Firepower</material> gain rate by <color=#E78300>20%</color> for <color=#E78300>7</color>s.
When the Mod or a teammate lands a hit with this drone, reduces the skill's CD by <color=#E78300>0.4</color>s (up to a reduction of <color=#E78300>6</color>s in total) and increases the skill's Energy cost by <color=#E78300>2</color> (up to a boost of <color=#E78300>30</color> points of Energy in total).

101052209.description:
Calls in several drones in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105207)>Torrent Mode</material> to bombard the target area up to 12 times, with each bombardment dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK and inflicting Armor Break on enemies hit, reducing their DEF by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s.

Grants a <color=#E78300>6%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate successfully expends Energy. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

101052221.description:
Bombards the enemy with the Rage Serpent, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total and inflicting Stun on all enemies within range for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s. Upon landing a hit, calls in a drone in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105205)>Whirlwind Mode</material> to scan and bombard the target area. When there are teammates on the field, reduces the enemy's certain type of RES based on said teammates' DMG type and DMG amount by <color=#E78300>5%</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s. Same effects can stack up to <color=#E78300>2</color> times.
When the Mod or a teammate lands a hit with this drone, reduces the skill's CD by <color=#E78300>0.4</color>s (up to a reduction of <color=#E78300>6</color>s in total) and increases the skill's Energy cost by <color=#E78300>2</color> (up to a boost of <color=#E78300>30</color> points of Energy in total).

101052231.description:
Throws an implosion grenade that deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total and pulls in enemies for a short time. Then, calls in a drone in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105206)>Hurricane Mode</material> to drop up to 6 traps with Sluggish debuff and continuous damage in the target area, with each trap dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total over time, and slowing enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s. The slowing effect can stack and will increase slightly with each stack.
When the Mod or a teammate lands a hit with this drone, reduces the skill's CD by <color=#E78300>0.4</color> s (up to a reduction of <color=#E78300>6</color>s in total) and increases the skill's Energy cost by <color=#E78300>2</color> (up to a boost of <color=#E78300>30</color> points of Energy in total).

101052305.description:
Quickly dodges enemy attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge effect: Reduces damage taken by the Mod by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>, and further reduces damage taken by <color=#E78300>0.1%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105201)>Firepower</material> owned by the Mod. Effect lasts <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds.

101055101.description:
Brandishes the naginata to perform five slashes, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

Passive:
Following up any strike of the Normal Attack with Frostbreaker or So-ei Strike within a short time will not interrupt the Normal Attack strike count.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Gains Rage when a normal attack hits.

101055201.description: Dashes forward twice while slashing with the naginata, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

101055202.description: With Divine Power of ice condensed at the tip of her blade, triggers an explosion of ice crystals in the target area, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

101055203.description:
Swings the naginata and thrusts forward, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.
This skill can be cast following up any strike of Normal Attack, a regular Frostbreaker, Shadowswayer, or Moonshatter attack, which will result in various derivative modes of Frostbreaker.
Casting Frostbreaker after a Normal Attack strike or a regular Frostbreaker: Deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.
Casting Frostbreaker after Shadowswayer: Performs a sweep all around, then leaps in the air to slash at the enemy, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total.
Casting Frostbreaker after Moonshatter: Leaps into the air and stabs at the target, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK in total.
The Ice RES of enemies hit by a follow-up Frostbreaker will be lowered by <color=#E78300>10%</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s.

101055208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of So-ei - Kuramitsuha and Shinri - Tsukuyomi.
Deals Ice DMG equal to So-ei - Kuramitsuha's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105502)>Congeal</material> to the Ice Mod on the team with the highest ATK for <color=#E78300>15</color>s. When this skillchain hits, increases the Skill DMG of all Rage Mods on the team by <color=#E78300>{9}</color> for <color=#E78300>{10}</color>s.
Deals Thunder DMG equal to Shinri - Tsukuyomi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and increases the Thunder DMG dealt by all members of the team by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s, as well as Tsukuyomi's Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{7}</color> for <color=#E78300>{8}</color>s.

101055209.description:
Slashes at the enemy with a large amount of Divine Power of ice condensed on the blade, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Grants the Ice Mod on the team with the highest ATK the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105502)>Congeal</material> state for <color=#E78300>15</color>s.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105502)>Congeal</material>: Grants Super Armor, reduces DMG taken by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>, and increases Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>35%</color>; further increases Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>1%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> Ice DMG So-ei - Kuramitsuha has. This Crit DMG buff from <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105502)>Congeal</material> state is capped at <color=#E78300>120%</color>. Also inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105501)>Frost</material> on enemies hit. Effect can trigger only once every <color=#E78300>1</color>s.

Grants a <color=#E78300>15%</color> Ultimate Skill charge whenever the Mod or a teammate triggers Zero Time. Effect can trigger only once every <color=#E78300>0.5</color>s.

101055281.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Waverender - Skadi and So-ei - Kuramitsuha.
Deals Ice DMG equal to Waverender - Skadi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2} </color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). Landing a hit on the enemy increases the charged Skill DMG of all members of the team by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s.
Also deals Ice DMG equal to So-ei - Kuramitsuha's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). At time of sklllchain casting, the friendly Ice Mod with the highest ATK also goes into <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105502)>Congeal</material> state for <color=#E78300>15</color>s. Landing a hit on the enemy increases the Skill DMG of all members of the team by <color=#E78300>{7}</color> for <color=#E78300>{8}</color>s.

101055305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Within a short time after any strike of Normal Attack, a regular Frostbreaker, Shadowswayer, or Moonshatter attack is launched, a Non-mobile Dodge can be triggered to unleash a So-ei Strike, unleashing frost energy condensed from Divine Power on the enemy. Doing so will result in various modes of So-ei Strike depending on what the preceding attack is.
Casting So-ei Strike after a Normal Attack or regular Frostbreaker: Deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.
Casting So-ei Strike after Shadowswayer: Deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.
Casting So-ei Strike after Moonshatter: Deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total.
Every hit landed with So-ei Strike inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105501)>Frost</material> on the enemy for <color=#E78300>10</color>s, which can stack up to <color=#E78300>7</color> times. When an enemy in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105501)>Frost</material> is hit with an Ice attack by any member of the team, for every <color=#E78300>1</color> stack of Frost the enemy has, increases Non-DoT Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>0.8%</color>.
Dodge effect: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemies for <color=#E78300>3</color>s. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Gains Rage when a So-ei Strike hits.

101056101.description:
Unleashes fist and kick strikes against the target, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.
Landing a hit using Shinra: Ragestomp or Shinra: Thunderweave enhances the skill.
The last strike of the enhanced version of Thunder Fist summons an additional lightning strike against enemies in range, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>3</color> Energy every second.

101056201.description:
Delivers two kicks to the locked-on enemy, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.
Landing a hit with the final strike of a normal attack or Shinra: Thousandbolt enhances the skill.
The second strike of the enhanced version of Shinra: Ragestomp also inflicts Stun on enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

101056202.description:
Attacks the locked-on enemy with a flurry of kicks, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.
Landing a hit with the last strike of a normal attack or Shinra: Thousandbolt enhances the skill.
Tap repeatedly with the enhanced version of Shinra: Thunderweave to get additional kicks. Every kick deals Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK.

101056203.description:
Unleashes a string of attacks at the locked-on enemy to deal Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total, then launches one last punch to deal Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK.
Landing a hit using Shinra: Ragestomp or Shinra: Thunderweave enhances the skill.
The final punch of the enhanced version of Shinra: Thousandbolt automatically charges up to <color=#E78300>3</color> stacks, and can be unleashed with a subsequent tap or when charge is full, dealing Thunder DMG equal to either <color=#E78300>{3}</color>, <color=#E78300>{4}</color>, or <color=#E78300>{5}</color> ATK depending on how many stacks it has.

101056208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Thundertusk - Kali and Waverender - Skadi.
Deals Thunder DMG equal to Thundertusk - Kali's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and all teammates get a <color=#E78300>10%</color> DMG boost for <color=#E78300>{5}</color> seconds when hitting the enemy. Increases DMG dealt by an additional <color=#E78300>0.4%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> Combat Resources possessed by the Mod, up to a maximum of <color=#E78300>40%</color>.
Also deals Ice DMG equal to Waverender - Skadi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>).

101056209.description:
Kali gathers lightning energy and fires in the target direction, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Skill cast also grants all Energy Mods on the team a <color=#E78300>{2}</color> DMG boost for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds.

Grants a <color=#E78300>15%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when Kali or a teammate triggers Dodge. This effect triggers once every <color=#E78300>0.5</color> seconds.

101056305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect. Triggering Extremity Dodge while Shinra: Thousandbolt is charging will not interrupt the charge and Mod may continue with it when they are not hit.
Dodge effect: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101058101.description:
Brandishes his nodachi and slashes at the enemy, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Each time an attack results in a hit, his DMG taken is reduced by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>10</color> times.

Passive:
Tap on the Normal Attack button within <color=#E78300>7</color> seconds of landing a hit with Ashen: Blacken, Secret Sword: Blacken, Ashen: Charge, Secret Sword: Charge, or Ashen: Smelt to cast the skill: Fiery Dance: Alt.
Fiery Dance: Alt.: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>255%</color> of ATK in total. Skill cast grants Kagutsuchi Unyielding for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds. Every <color=#E78300>3</color> times Fiery Dance: Alt. is cast, the skill: Fiery Dance: Burst is triggered.
Fiery Dance: Burst: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>360%</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>3</color> Energy every second. Hits landed with Fiery Dance: Alt. also grant <color=#E78300>10</color> Energy each time.

101058201.description:
Unleashes two sweeping attacks, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
 Ashen: Blacken: Alt: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK. This skill has a <color=#E78300>12</color>s cd and is replaced with the derivative skill Secret Sword: Blacken.
Secret Sword: Blacken: Unleashes an upwards attack, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total. This skill has a <color=#E78300>6</color>s cd.

101058202.description:
Rushes and stabs at the locked-on enemy, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Ashen: Charge: Alt: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK. This skill has a <color=#E78300>12</color>s cd and is replaced with the derivative skill Secret Sword: Charge.
Secret Sword: Charge: Kagutsuchi cross-slashes a total of two times, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total. This skill has a <color=#E78300>6</color>s cd.

101058203.description:
Swings his nodachi upwards, casting a sword wave that deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Skill cast also sends him into <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105801)>Wildfire</material> state for <color=#E78300>18</color> seconds and resets the cd of Ashen: Blacken, Ashen: Blacken: Alt, Ashen: Charge, and Ashen: Charge: Alt.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105801)>Wildfire</material>: Ashen: Blacken is replaced with Ashen: Blacken: Alt, Ashen: Charge is replaced with Ashen: Charge: Alt. Every normal attack is regarded as a skill attack.

101058208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Firebrand - Tyr and Ryugiri - Kagutsuchi.
Deals Fire DMG equal to Ryugiri - Kagutsuchi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>his Ultimate Skill level</color>), and when a hit is landed on the enemy all teammates gain a <color=#E78300>{6}</color> Skill DMG boost and a <color=#E78300>{7}</color> Ultimate Skill DMG boost for <color=#E78300>{8}</color> seconds.
Also deals Fire DMG equal to Ryugiri - Kagutsuchi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>his Ultimate Skill level</color>), and when a hit is landed on the enemy all members of the team are granted a <color=#E78300>{5}</color> Fire DMG boost for <color=#E78300>{8}</color> seconds.

101058209.description:
Launches a fire wave around him using his nodachi, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Skill cast also increases the team's Fire DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds.

A <color=#E78300>15%</color> Ultimate Skill charge is granted when Dodge is triggered by Kagutsuchi or a Teammate. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>0.5</color> seconds.

101058305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect. When Extremity Dodge is triggered, <color=#E78300>25</color> Energy is granted.
Dodge: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>4</color> seconds. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101059101.description:
Fires off a stream of shots at the locked-on enemy, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

Passive:
For every <color=#E78300>20</color> hits landed on the enemy, <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrow</material> is granted. Up to <color=#E78300>3</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrows</material> may be held.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> <color=#E78300>3</color> Energy is granted every second.

101059201.description: Takes a leap to the back, jumps into the air, then fires three times at the target, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

101059202.description:
Dashes at the enemy and fires spinning shots, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
When Apollo has at least one <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrow</material>, in the <color=#E78300>4</color> seconds after Thorn of Light is cast <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrow</material> can be expended for a follow-up attack.
Following attack: Apollo leaps into the air and fires a light arrow at the target, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK. The follow-up attack may also be used when Apollo is in the air and has at least one <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrow</material>.

101059203.description:
Fires four light arrows, each arrow attacking enemies in its path and dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.
When Apollo has at least one <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrow</material>, in the <color=#E78300>4</color> seconds after Interweaving Light is cast <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrow</material> can be expended for a follow-up attack.
Following attack: Apollo leaps into the air and fires a light arrow at a nearby enemy, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK. When an enemy in the center zone is hit, they take <color=#E78300>{3}</color> more Non-DoT DMG. The follow-up attack may also be used when Apollo is in the air and has at least one <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrow</material>.

101059209.description:
Quickly dashes at the locked-on target, then leaps into the air and fires a single light arrow, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. <color=#E78300>3</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrows</material> are granted to Apollo, and all members of the team also have their Dodge CD reset.

A <color=#E78300>15%</color> Ultimate Skill charge is granted when Dodge is triggered by Apollo or a Teammate. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>0.5</color> seconds.

101059305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds, and also grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrow</material>. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101060101.description:
A martial arts skill acquired from past experiences of ridding the world of evil. Uses Darkpiercer to continuously attack enemies, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

Passive:
The initial phase of each strike of a Normal Attack has a brief window to launch Crashing Spear as a counterattack upon being attacked.
Crashing Spear: Deals Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total; becomes Invincible during use.
Flurry Speardance: Deals Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total. Gains Super Armor during use and takes <color=#E78300>{4}</color> less DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Gains Rage after Normal Attacks hit; Gains <color=#E78300>20</color> Rage upon triggering Crashing Spear.

101060111.description:
A martial arts skill acquired from past experiences of ridding the world of evil. Uses Darkpiercer to continuously attack enemies, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

Passive:
The initial phase of each strike of a Normal Attack has a brief window. If the Mod is attacked during this time, launch Crashing Spear as a counterattack if the Mod is not in range of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material>, or launch Crashing Mountain if the Mod is in range of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material>.
Crashing Spear: Deals Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total; becomes Invincible during use.
Crashing Mountain: Recovers <color=#E78300>3</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106002)>spears</material>, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total; becomes Invincible during use.
Flurry Speardance: Deals Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> of ATK in total. Gains Super Armor during use and takes <color=#E78300>{5}</color> less DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Gains Rage after Normal Attacks hit. Gains <color=#E78300>20</color> Rage upon triggering Crashing Spear and <color=#E78300>30</color> Rage upon triggering Crashing Mountain.

101060201.description:
The first attack derived from the Kunlun Move.
Dashes forward, then turns to launch a spear attack on enemies behind and gathers them, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

101060202.description:
The second attack derived from the Kunlun Move.
A rapid swing of Darkpiercer, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

101060203.description:
The third attack derived from the Kunlun Move.
Can only be cast when Rage is full. Expends all Rage and swings Darkpiercer at surrounding enemies, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total and activating <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material>. Briefly gains Invincible during cast. Only 1 <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material> can be active at a time and lasts up to <color=#E78300>27</color>s. Spear Array cannot be used while <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material> is active.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material>: Gathers enemies within <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky's</material> range every <color=#E78300>3</color>s. When Luwu is within the range of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material>, she gains Unyielding and takes <color=#E78300>{2}</color> less DMG. When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material> is active, <color=#E78300>9</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106002)>spears</material> will be summoned. When casting Counterspear or Roaring Tiger while Luwu is within the range of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material>, recalls <color=#E78300>3</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106002)>spears</material> back and shortens the skill's remaining CD by <color=#E78300>90%</color>. While recalling the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106002)>spears</material>, a skill attack: Spearfall will be triggered to attack locked-on enemies, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total.
<color=#E78300>Each</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106002)>spear</material> recalled and collected grants Luwu <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106003)>Spearsoul</material> Mark. When <color=#E78300>3, 6, or 9</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106003)>Spearsoul</material> Marks have been reached, the skill will be replaced by Spear Array: Three, Spear Array: Six, and Spear Array: Nine, respectively.
Spear Array: Three: Expends <color=#E78300>3</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106003)>Spearsoul</material> Marks to deal Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> of ATK in total. If it hits, increases the Non-DoT ATK of the next casting of Spear Array: Three by <color=#E78300>9%</color> for <color=#E78300>9</color>s. Stacks up to <color=#E78300>2</color> times.
Spear Array: Six: Expends <color=#E78300>6</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106003)>Spearsoul</material> Marks to deal Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> of ATK in total. Gains Super Armor during cast and takes <color=#E78300>{7}</color> less DMG. If hit while casting Spear Array: Six, the skill's Non-DoT ATK increases by <color=#E78300>{8}</color>.
Spear Array: Nine: Expends <color=#E78300>9</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106003)>Spearsoul</material> Marks to deal Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{6}</color> of ATK in total. There is a short dodge window at the beginning phase of Spear Array: Nine. The skill's Non-DoT Base DMG increases by <color=#E78300>{9}</color> when targeting enemies with less than <color=#E78300>50%</color> HP. The skill's Non-DoT ATK increases by <color=#E78300>{10}</color> when cast during Zero Time or Modified Mode.
If all <color=#E78300>9</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106002)>spears</material> are collected, deactivates<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material>, and the next Normal Attack is replaced by Flurry Speardance. If <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material> ends and there are still <color=#E78300>3, 6, or 9</color> uncollected <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106002)>spears</material>, Luwu recovers <color=#E78300>33, 66, or 100</color> Rage, respectively.

101060208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Winged Gardener - Yingzhao and Nine-Tailed Guardian - Luwu.
Deals Wind DMG equal to Winged Gardener - Yingzhao's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1}+{2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and when she lands a hit, the whole team deal <color=#E78300>{5}</color> more Skill DMG for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s.
Deals Light DMG equal to Nine-Tailed Guardian - Luwu's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3}+{4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and when she lands a hit, the whole team deal <color=#E78300>{7}</color> more Melee DMG for <color=#E78300>{8}</color>s.

101060209.description:
Fully unleashes the Divine Power, wielding her spear and darting across the battlefield, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

Gains a <color=#E78300>15%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate triggers Zero Time. Effect triggers only once every <color=#E78300>0.5</color>s.

101060305.description:
A skill derived from the Kunlun Move. Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge effect: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>3</color>s. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101061101.description:
Zhiming devised this secret technique after studying the northern constellations and ancient divination, and incorporating these into Ethereal Enigma.
Deals Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total and grants <color=#E78300>6</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106101)>Northstars</material> for each strike of Normal Attacks.

Passive:
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106101)>Northstar</material> is capped at <color=#E78300>120</color>points. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106102)>Southwave</material> is capped at <color=#E78300>120</color>points. Zhiming can have up to <color=#E78300>2</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106103)>Black Tortoise</material> and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106104)>Dark Serpent</material> Marks in total.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Gains Divine Grace when launching Normal Attacks.

101061201.description:
Magic derived from the Zhuanxu Mystique. Water flows on without flooding, and she ventures forth without fear.
Deals Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total, gaining <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106103)>Black Tortoise</material> Mark and <color=#E78300>30</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106101)>Northstar</material> points.

101061202.description:
Magic derived from the Zhuanxu Mystique. The north star governs the path of life and death.
Deals Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total, gaining <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106104)>Dark Serpent</material> Mark and <color=#E78300>30</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106101)>Northstar</material> points.

101061203.description:
Magic derived from the Zhuanxu Mystique that channels Divine Power through divination.
When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106101)>Northstar</material> is full and Zhiming has <color=#E78300>2</color> Marks, expends all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106101)>Northstar</material> points and Marks to activate Calculation.
Calculation: Gains Super Armor during cast. Takes <color=#E78300>{1}</color> less DMG. Dwindling Water and North Star's Mandate are replaced with Calculation: Data Input, and you can tap to cast Calculation: Data Input by expending <color=#E78300>10 or 20</color> Divine Grace respectively. After tapping a total of <color=#E78300>2</color> times to cast this skill, different attacks will be launched according to the type and number of Marks expended. For every <color=#E78300>1</color> point of Divine Grace expended, Calculation's Non-DoT ATK increases by <color=#E78300>0.6%</color>.
Calculation: Equation: <color=#E78300>2</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106103)>Black Tortoise</material> Marks. Uses fluctuation of Divine Grace to deal Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total. Launches <color=#E78300>16</color> data streams, each dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK. Gains <color=#E78300>50</color> Divine Grace.
Calculation: Induction: <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106103)>Black Tortoise</material> Mark and <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106104)>Dark Serpent</material> Mark. Deals Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> of ATK in total and inflicts Armor Break on hit enemies, lowering their DEF by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s.
Calculation: Overload: <color=#E78300>2</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106104)>Dark Serpent</material> Marks. Deals Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{7}</color> of ATK in total.
When Calculation is cast <color=#E78300>2</color> times in a row, this skill will be replaced with Calculation: Hyperorder.
Calculation: Hyperorder: During use, Zhuanxu Mystique, Dwindling Water, North Star's Mandate, and True Epiphany are replaced with Hyperorder Calculation: Data Input, and you can tap and expend <color=#E78300>0, 10, 20, or 40</color> Divine Grace respectively to cast this Hyperorder Calculation: Data Input. After tapping a total of <color=#E78300>3</color> times to cast this skill, attacks will be launched. The first two taps deal Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{8}</color> and <color=#E78300>{9}</color> of ATK respectively, while the last powered-up strike deals Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{10}</color> of ATK in total and gathers enemies over a large area. Also, for every <color=#E78300>1</color> point of Divine Grace expended by tapping the skill during this state, increases the Non-DoT ATK of the powered-up attack of Calculation: Hyperorder by <color=#E78300>0.4%</color>.

101061208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of TaiYi - Gengchen and Ethereal Enigma - Zhiming.
Deals Water DMG equal to TaiYi - Gengchen's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1}+{2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>).
Deals Water DMG equal to Ethereal Enigma - Zhiming's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3}+{4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). When casting, the Ranged DMG of the whole team increases by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s.

101061209.description:
Extreme magic that one can only cast after gaining a thorough understanding of the Zhuanxu Mystique, it turns Divine Power into an energy stream that bombards enemies.
Gathers enemies over a large area, dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

Grants <color=#E78300>3%</color> Ultimate Skill charge after Zhiming or a teammate crits. Effect triggers only once every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

101061305.description:
A technique derived from the Zhuanxu Mystique.
Hold down Dodge to deploy a defensive shield and gain <color=#E78300>6</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106102)>Southwave</material> every <color=#E78300>0.1</color>s.
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect. If attacked when the shield is active, blocks damage and triggers the Dodge effect.
If you hold down Dodge button then release it when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106102)>Southwave</material> is full, or if Zhiming is hit while the shield is active, all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106102)>Southwave</material> will be removed to cast a Skill attack, dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total, also gaining <color=#E78300>20</color> Divine Grace and <color=#E78300>30</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106101)>Northstar</material>.
Dodge effect: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>3</color>s. When the Dodge effect is triggered by blocking an attack, gains an additional <color=#E78300>20</color> Divine Grace and <color=#E78300>30</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106101)>Northstar</material>. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

101066101.description:
Ookuninushi summons BunBun Iron Fist to attack the enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Rage: </color>Grants Rage when a normal attack results in a hit.

101066201.description:
Draws one Tarot Card to gain a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106601)>Divination</material> effect that lasts <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds. When the card drawn is different from the previous one, the effect is increased by <color=#E78300>50%</color>.
<color=#ad25b5>The Death</color>: ATK is increased by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>.
<color=#d7ac00>The Chariot</color>: Grants <color=#E78300>{3}</color> Rage every <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds.
<color=#5cb82b>The Lovers</color>: Restores HP equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> of ATK every <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds.

101066202.description: Fires BunBun-2 at enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. After landing a hit, it continues to attack up to a max of <color=#E78300>5</color> enemies around, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK.

101066203.description: Ookuninushi leaps into the air to attack enemies in a circular area in front, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

101066209.description:
Ookuninushi summons BunBun-3 to descend from on high and attack the target area, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK. The cooldown time of Skill 3 is reset, and the remaining cooldown time of other allied Mods' Skill 3 is shortened by <color=#E78300>5</color> seconds.

Grants a <color=#E78300>20%</color> Ultimate Skill charge whenever the Mod or a Teammate uses an Ultimate Skill.

101066231.description: Ookuninushi summons BunBun-3 to descend from on high and attack the surrounding area, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK. The BunBun Mecha also exerts a drag effect on surrounding enemies during attacks.

101066305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101067101.description:
Brandishes sword to control the flow of water, dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK. Triggers a Riptide when the third strike of the normal attack hits.
Riptide: The <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghost</material> on the field dashes toward the locked-on enemy, dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK, and resets the duration of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghost</material>.

Passive:
Creates a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghost</material> by casting Rushing River or triggering Ocean Blur which lasts on the battlefield for <color=#E78300>6</color>s. Rushing River can generate up to <color=#E78300>2</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghosts</material> on the battlefield at one time, and Ocean Blur can generate up to <color=#E78300>1</color> at a time. No more <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghosts</material> will be generated after the limit is reached.

101067201.description:
Dashes at the target, dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK to the enemy. Creates <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghost</material> and triggers Tributary Flow upon landing a hit. At the end of skill casting, all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghosts</material> on the field deal Water DMG to their surroundings equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total. Refreshes the duration of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghost</material>, and triggers Tributary Flow again.
Tributary Flow: Deals Water DMG to surrounding enemies equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total when a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghost</material> is created.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace upon each skill hit.

101067202.description: Disappears into the air and deals Water DMG to enemies to the front equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Expends all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghosts</material> on the field when the Mod owns <color=#E78300>2</color> or more Traces, with <color=#E78300>each</color> Tributary Ghost expended increasing Melee DMG dealt by the Mod by <color=#E78300>6%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s. Then, recreates the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghosts</material> expended around the locked-on enemy while dealing Water DMG to surrounding enemies equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total.

101067203.description: Absorbs the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghosts</material> that are within certain range around the Mod. Every <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghost</material> absorbed increases Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>6%</color> for <color=#E78300>{1}</color>s. Also expends all Traces present, with every <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace expended increasing Ghost's Non-DoT DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>12%</color> for <color=#E78300>8</color>s. Then, the Mod deals Water DMG to the enemy equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total. A temporary Ghost is also generated for a short time for each <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghost</material> absorbed, which deals Water DMG to the enemy equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total. Up to 3 temporary Ghosts can be generated.

101067208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Backflowing - Oceanus and Cleansing Wind - Enlil.
Deals Water DMG equal to Backflowing - Oceanus' ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>his Ultimate Skill level</color>). Increases Skill DMG of all team members by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s upon landing a hit.
Deals Wind DMG equal to Cleansing Wind - Enlil's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>his Ultimate Skill level</color>). Pulls the enemies together and inflicts Shackle on them for <color=#E78300>3</color>s upon landing a hit.

101067209.description:
Generates a flowblade and slashes with it, dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total over a large area. Every <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghost</material> present on the battlefield increases all team members' Water DMG by <color=#E78300>6%</color> and Melee DMG by <color=#E78300>6%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

Gains an <color=#E78300>8%</color>Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate triggers Extremity Dodge. Effect can trigger only once every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

101067305.description:
Quickly dodges enemy attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect. Generates <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghost</material>, triggers Tributary Flow and grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace when Extremity Dodge is triggered. When Mod owns Traces, launching a normal attack within <color=#E78300>1</color>s of triggering Extremity Dodge expends <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace and deals Water DMG to the enemy equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK while resetting the duration of the bonus effects from Great Confluence.
Dodge effect: Increases the Mod's Armor Pierce by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds.

101068101.description:
Attacks with the power of the wind, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK. Grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106801)>Windchime</material> Mark with the last strike of a normal attack (no more than <color=#E78300>3</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106801)>Windchime</material> Marks can be owned at a time).

Passive:
When the Mod owns <color=#E78300>3</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106801)>Windchime</material> Marks, all Marks will be expended upon skill casting and the skill will be enhanced.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when a normal attack hits.

101068201.description:
Condenses wind energy into a wind arrow, dealing 2 strikes to the enemy. The first strike deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK while the second deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK. Skill casting also grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106801)>Windchime</material> Mark.
Enhanced Blast Squall: Generates <color=#E78300>3</color> wind arrows, each of which deals 2 strikes of DMG. The first strike deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK, and the second deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK. When a wind arrow generated by the Enhanced Blast Squall hits the eye of the storm created by Hurricane Spin, the wind arrow's second strike turns into an explosion, which deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> ATK in total.

101068202.description:
Attacks with the force of a hurricane, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Skill casting also grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106801)>Windchime</material> Mark. An eye of the storm forms when landing a hit.
Enhanced Hurricane Spin: Deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total and generates another <color=#E78300>3</color> hurricanes, with each dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK. When a wind arrow generated by Blast Squall hits the eye of the storm created by the Enhanced Hurricane Spin, the wind arrow's second strike turns into a cyclone instead, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total.

101068203.description:
This skill can be cast without expending Rage.
