Increases Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s after casting and subsequently reduces the skill's remaining CD by <color=#E78300>60%</color>. Casting Blast Squall, Hurricane Spin, or the enhanced version of Blast Squall or Hurricane Spin while skill effects are active grants the following effects.
Hits landed with the wind arrows from Blast Squall reduce the enemy's Wind RES by <color=#E78300>10%</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> s.
Hits landed with the wind arrows from the Enhanced Blast Squall reduce the enemy's Wind RES by <color=#E78300>20%</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s.
The eye of the storm generated by Hurricane Spin drags surrounding enemies.
The eye of the storm generated by the Enhanced Hurricane Spin drags surrounding enemies with a stronger force. Grants additional drag effect when a wind arrow hits an enemy already hit by the hurricane.
Enhanced Stir in the Wind: Turns into a hurricane and becomes Invincible. Skill casting is prohibited during this skill. Deals Wind DMG to the enemy equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> ATK in total.

101068208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Azure Lord - Mengzhang and Cleansing Wind - Enlil.
Deals Wind DMG equal to Azure Lord - Mengzhang's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>his Ultimate Skill level</color>). Reduces the Thunder RES of enemies hit by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> and their Wind RES by <color=#E78300>{6}</color> for <color=#E78300>{7}</color>s.
Deals Wind DMG equal to Cleansing Wind - Enlil's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>his Ultimate Skill level</color>). Increases all team members' Wind DMG by <color=#E78300>{8}</color> for <color=#E78300>{9}</color>s upon landing a hit.

101068209.description:
Deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Also increases all team members' Wind DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s once cast.

Gains an <color=#E78300>8%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate triggers Zero Time. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>0.5</color>s.

101068305.description:
Quickly dodges enemy attacks, and Dodge may be triggered 2 times consecutively. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge effect: Entering Zero Time slows all enemy movements significantly for <color=#E78300>2</color>s. Grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106801)>Windchime</material> Mark. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101070101.description: Swings the Tenblaze continuously, and attacks the enemy multiple times with the resulting blaze blades to deal Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Mark with every hit landed with the last strike of the attack (no more than <color=#E78300>9</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks can be owned at a time).

101070201.description:
Swings the Tenblaze and slashes continuously at the enemy, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. When the Mod has <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks, every hit landed with a slash attack expends <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Mark and grants <color=#E78300>1</color> stack of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107002)>Firefeather</material>, each of which increases the Mod's Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>2%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s; stacks up to <color=#E78300>12</color> times. When Mod has <color=#E78300>9</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks, skill cast will expend all these Marks and grant <color=#E78300>9</color> stacks of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107002)>Firefeather</material>, as well as deal additional Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color>ATK in total. 
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state, this skill is replaced by Crow's Scorch, which is then replaced by Demon Slayer when Mod exits <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state.
Crow's Scorch: Brandishes the Tenblaze in the air to attack the enemy, expending <color=#E78300>3</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks to deal Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK. Expends all Marks when Mod has <color=#E78300>9</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> When Mod has <color=#E78300>9</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks, casting Demon Slayer expends all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks and grants <color=#E78300>25</color> Divine Grace. Every hit landed with a Demon Slayer slash attack expends <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Mark and grants <color=#E78300>5</color> Divine Grace. Also grants <color=#E78300>1</color> additional Divine Grace for every <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Mark expended during the skill cast. When Mod has <color=#E78300>9</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks, casting Crow's Scorch expends all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks and grants <color=#E78300>80</color> Divine Grace. When Mod has less than <color=#E78300>9</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks, casting Crow's Scorch expends <color=#E78300>3</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks and grants <color=#E78300>20</color> Divine Grace.

101070202.description:
Unleashes blaze blades on the enemy multiple times to deal Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Every <color=#E78300>1</color> hit landed on the enemy grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Mark. When Evil Crusher is in CD, it is replaced by Evil Incineration, which has a <color=#E78300>3</color>s CD.
Evil Incineration: Expends <color=#E78300>3</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks to unleash blaze blades on the enemy, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Skill cast does not interrupt ongoing actions and every <color=#E78300>1</color> hit landed on the enemy grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Mark.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state, this skill is replaced by Crow's Fire, which has a <color=#E78300>6</color>s CD. This skill is then replaced by Evil Crusher when Mod exits <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state.
Crow's Fire: Expends all Divine Grace to generate an arcane circle at the target location, inflicting Shackle on all enemies within the circle for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s as well as reducing their Physical, Wind, and Fire RES in sequence for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s. Every <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace expended inflicts <color=#E78300>1</color> stack of reduced Physical, Wind, and Fire RES, <color=#E78300>each</color> stack reducing the corresponding stats by <color=#E78300>0.1%</color>, with Fire RES reduction stacks up to <color=#E78300>200</color> times, and Physical and Wind RES reduction stacks up to <color=#E78300>100</color> times. Then, deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total.

101070203.description:
Expends all Divine Grace and deals Fire DMG to surrounding enemies equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total, then jumps into the air to enter <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material>: Grants Unyielding and reduces Dodge Energy cost by <color=#E78300>100%</color>. When Mod is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state, every <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace expended grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Fire DMG boost, with each boost increasing their Fire DMG by <color=#E78300>0.1%</color>. Boosts last until Mod exits <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state. Casting of skills or Dodge during this time will extend the duration of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> until the end of casting, at which point the CD starts.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state, this skill is replaced by Crow's Burn, and the form of the Penglai Swordplay attack changes. This skill is replaced by Sun Chaser when Mod exits <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state.
Penglai Swordplay: A skill attack unleashes blaze blades on the enemy, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total. Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Mark for every <color=#E78300>4</color> hits landed on the enemy.
Crow's Burn: Swoops down on the locked-on enemy, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total. All <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks are expended upon hit. Every <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Mark expended increases the skill's Base DMG by <color=#E78300>3%</color>. Exits <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state after casting.

101070208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Tenblaze - Jinwu and Untainted Heart - Lingguang.
Deals Fire DMG equal to Tenblaze - Jinwu's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). Restores the Mod's Divine Grace to full.
Deals Fire DMG equal to Untainted Heart - Lingguang's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). All team members grant <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107508)>Blazing Sun</material> for <color=#E78300>7</color>s. Tenblaze - Jinwu deals <color=#E78300>{5}</color> more Fire DMG for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s.

101070209.description:
May be cast only when Mod is not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state. Unleashes the Mod's power, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK. The Mod grants <color=#E78300>11.1%</color> Divine Grace for every <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Mark.

Also grants a <color=#E78300>20%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when Mod or a teammate casts the Ultimate Skill.

101070305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge effect: Unleashes a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> blaze blade attack on the attacker. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state, tap Dodge to move quickly in the air and unleash blaze blades on the locked-on enemy, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Effect triggers only once every <color=#E78300>4</color>s.

101071101.description:
Mengzhang masters five sword moves following keen study of the stars.
Deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. When in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107101)>Still Stance</material>, every strike of a normal attack grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107103)>Nay</material> Mark (no more than <color=#E78300>4</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107103)>Nay</material> Marks can exist at a time).

Passive:
When Mod switches to the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107102)>Move Stance</material>, every <color=#E78300>1%</color> increase in their Wind DMG also increases their Thunder DMG by <color=#E78300>0.8%</color>. When Mod switches to the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107101)>Still Stance</material>, every <color=#E78300>1%</color> increase in their Thunder DMG also increases their Wind DMG by <color=#E78300>0.8%</color>. Attribute DMG boosts obtained through this passive do not count toward further boosts.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace when a hit is landed when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107101)>Still Stance</material> with a normal attack.

101071201.description:
One of the moves derived from Eastwind Slash. Use this to move quickly around the battlefield and defeat the enemy quickly.
When in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107101)>Still stance</material>: Unleashes Aero Ascent, then quickly retreats, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. When Aero Ascent is in CD, it is replaced by Aero Dash which has a <color=#E78300>3</color>s CD.
Aero Dash: Dashes at an extreme speed at the enemy, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total. Expends all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107103)>Nay</material> Marks when a hit is landed, and every <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107103)>Nay</material> Mark expended summons a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107104)>Jade Sword</material> which attacks the locked-on enemy.
When Mod switches to the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107102)>Move stance</material>: this skill is replaced by Aero Break. When Mod switches to the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107101)>Still stance</material>: this skill is replaced by Aero Ascent.
Aero Break: Expends up to <color=#E78300>3</color> Divine Grace to deal Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total. This skill has a <color=#E78300>2</color>s CD, and may be used alternately during the casting of Stillness in Motion: Thunder or Eternal Prosperity: Thunder. Doing so will change the attack mode and the following DMG of these two skills with more powerful moves. When used alternately with another skill, the remaining CD of Aero Break, Stillness in Motion: Thunder, and Eternal Prosperity: Thunder are shortened by <color=#E78300>99%</color>, <color=#E78300>40%</color>, and <color=#E78300>40%</color> respectively, and the next use of the skill comes with a new attack mode and will not trigger CD nor interrupt the combo of normal attacks.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> When in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107101)>Still stance</material>, every <color=#E78300>1</color> hit landed on the enemy grants <color=#E78300>10</color> Divine Grace.

101071202.description:
The first swordplay derived from Eastwind Slash. Combines attack and defense for the best outcome.
When in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107101)>Still stance</material>: This skill is replaced by Stillness in Motion: Wind. Skill cast blocks incoming DMG and summons <color=#E78300>8</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107104)>Jade Swords</material> that attack the locked-on enemy. When this skill is in CD, every hit landed with a normal attack summons <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107104)>Jade Swords</material> of varying numbers which attack the locked-on enemy. Effect triggers only once every <color=#E78300>0.3</color>s.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107104)>Jade Sword</material>: Deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK, and increases Mod's Wind DMG by <color=#E78300>0.4%</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s; stacks up to <color=#E78300>28</color> times.
When in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107102)>Move stance</material>: This skill is replaced by Stillness in Motion: Thunder. Expends up to <color=#E78300>5</color> Divine Grace, dealing DMG over two strikes. Depending on when Aero Break is cast alternately with this skill, two follow-on sword moves occur, and each dealing different damage.
Move 1: Casting Aero Break directly to deal a total of <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK as Thunder DMG;
Move 2: Casting Aero Break before the second strike for up to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK as Thunder DMG.

101071209.description:
A supreme swordplay derived from Eastwind Slash. Use this to harness the power of the wind and thunder.
Deals Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Depending on Mod's stance at the time of casting, increases their Wind or Thunder DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s.

Grants a <color=#E78300>10%</color> Ultimate Skill charge whenever Mod or a teammate casts their Ultimate Skill or switches to another stance.

101071305.description:
One of the moves derived from Eastwind Slash.
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers different Dodge effects depending on the stance. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.
Dodge effect in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107101)>Still stance</material>: triggers <color=#E78300>8</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107104)>Jade Swords</material> that attack the locked-on enemy.
Dodge effect in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107102)>Move stance</material>: the next casting of Stillness in Motion: Thunder or Eternal Prosperity: Thunder grants Unyielding and DMG blocking effects for <color=#E78300>{1}</color>s.

101072101.description: Harnesses the wind with Omnicalc and launches up to 5 strikes of attack, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

101072201.description: Swiftly glides forward with Omnicalc and delivers a fierce blow, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

101072202.description: Throws Omnicalc to launch a whirling attack at the enemy, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

101072203.description:
Shortly after the final strike of a normal attack, Breezy Blessings, or Actus Abacus, Raining Wealth will be replaced by Evil Expeller and can be cast immediately as a follow-up attack of the attacks mentioned above, which will result in different number of strikes, different amounts of damage, and different <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material> points obtained upon a hit. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material> is capped at <color=#E78300>50</color>.
Casting Evil Expeller immediately after the final strike of a normal attack: 1 strike of attack can be delivered, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> of ATK and granting <color=#E78300>6</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material> in total.
Casting Evil Expeller immediately after Breezy Blessings: 3 strikes of attack can be delivered consecutively, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> of ATK and granting <color=#E78300>10</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material> in total.
Casting Evil Expeller immediately after Actus Abacus: 5 strikes of attack can be delivered consecutively, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{6}</color> of ATK and granting <color=#E78300>14</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material> in total.

Raining Wealth: Consumes all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material>, then leaps into the air and attacks the enemy using Omnicalc. Damage dealt is determined by the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material> expended.
When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material> expended is below <color=#E78300>40</color>, deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
When <color=#E78300>40</color> or more <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material> is expended, deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.
Casting Raining Wealth increases the Wind DMG of the entire team by <color=#E78300>10%</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s. For every <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material> expended, this Wind DMG boost further increases by <color=#E78300>0.6%</color>.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> After the last strike of Evil Expeller hits, gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace.

101072208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of TaiYi - Gengchen and Omnisight - Luliang.
Deals Water DMG equal to TaiYi - Gengchen's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). This Ultimate Skillchain cast only has a <color=#E78300>1.60%</color> chance of critting, and this chance of critting can't be influenced by other effects. Upon a successful crit, Crit DMG further increases by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> and Independent DMG increases by <color=#E78300>{4}</color>.
Omnisight - Luliang creates a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107202)>Lucky Coin</material> that follows her for <color=#E78300>12</color>s.

101072209.description:
Unleashes Omnicalc's maximum Divine Power, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total and creates a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107202)>Lucky Coin</material> that follows the Mod for <color=#E78300>12</color>s. Up to 1 <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107202)>Lucky Coin</material> can follow each Mod.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107202)>Lucky Coin</material>: Increases Non-DoT Wind DMG of the Mod it follows by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>. When the Mod it follows lands a hit, the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107202)>Lucky Coin</material> will launch a joint attack and briefly gathers the enemies, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total. The joint attack can be triggered once every <color=#E78300>2</color>s, and it also reduces the Wind RES of the enemies it hits by <color=#E78300>{4}</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s.

Gains a <color=#E78300>15%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate triggers the Dodge effect. Effect triggers only once every <color=#E78300>0.5</color>s.

101072281.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Omnisight - Luliang and Winged Gardener - Yingzhao.
Deals Wind DMG equal to Omnisight - Luliang's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1}+{2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). Creates a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107202)>Lucky Coin</material> that follows her for <color=#E78300>12</color>s. Increases Winged Gardener - Yingzhao's Wind DMG by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s.
Deals Wind DMG equal to Winged Gardener - Yingzhao's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3}+{4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>).

101072305.description:
Quickly dodges enemy attacks. Dodge will not interrupt the strike count of normal attacks and can be triggered two consecutive times. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge effect: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>2</color>s and grants <color=#E78300>10</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material>. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101074101.description:
A martial arts move acquired while wandering the world. Uses Infinity to deliver consecutive attacks to the enemy, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

Passive:
When Divine Grace is at <color=#E78300>5</color> or above: After a Non-mobile Dodge, the next non-derivative skill cast will be enhanced. After a Mobile Dodge, the skill cast prior to that will be replaced by its derivative skill. Casting a derivative skill or enhanced skill expends up to <color=#E78300>5</color> Divine Grace. Up to <color=#E78300>1</color> derivative skill can exist at a time.
Enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107401)>Ascendancy</material> state when casting the skill with full Divine Grace.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107401)>Ascendancy</material>: Expends <color=#E78300>2</color> Divine Grace every <color=#E78300>0.2</color>s. Divine Grace expenditure can't be influenced by other attributes. When Divine Grace is at <color=#E78300>0</color>, exits <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107401)>Ascendancy</material> state. During an active <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107401)>Ascendancy</material> state, the following effects will be granted: Shortens the CDs of Cloud Break, Seething Sea, and Wings of Might by <color=#E78300>2</color>s. Grants Unyielding. Increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>. Reduces damage taken by <color=#E78300>{3}</color>. Reduces Divine Grace gain rate by <color=#E78300>{4}</color>. Casting derivative or enhanced skills no longer expends Divine Grace.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace when the normal attack hits.

101074201.description:
The first martial arts move derived from the Art of Staff.
Delivers a swift kick to the enemy, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Enhanced Skill: Gains Super Armor during skill cast, and gains <color=#E78300>10</color> Divine Grace upon each hit.
Derivative Skill "Cloudstep": Delivers a powerful kick, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.

101074202.description:
The second martial arts move derived from the Art of Staff.
Thrusts Infinity forward, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Tap and hold to charge the skill. While charging, gains Super Armor and takes <color=#E78300>60%</color> less damage. The skill unleashes automatically once fully charged and creates an explosive impact upon hitting the enemy, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.
Enhanced Skill: While casting, gains Super Armor and directly reaches full charge.
Derivative Skill "Flowfuse": Deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

101074203.description:
The third martial arts move derived from the Art of Staff.
Quickly flourishes Infinity and delivers fierce blows to the enemy, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Enhanced Skill: While casting, gains Super Armor, and gains <color=#E78300>10%</color> Dodge Energy upon each hit.
Derivative Skill "Wingslap": Crashes into the target with Infinity, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.

101074209.description:
Unleashes the power of a divine gale to deliver a fierce multiple-strike attack to the enemy, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

Gains a <color=#E78300>20%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate casts an Ultimate Skill.

101074305.description:
A move derived from the Art of Staff. Swiftly dodges the enemy's attack. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect. A mobile Dodge also attacks the enemy to the front, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total.
Dodge Effect: When a non-mobile Dodge triggers the Dodge effect, the next time you tap on Normal Attack, the Windrider skill attack will be launched. When a mobile Dodge triggers the Dodge effect, the next time you tap on Normal Attack, the Skypatrol skill attack will be launched. When Windrider or Skypatrol is launched, gains Super Armor and takes <color=#E78300>{4}</color> less damage for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{6}</color> seconds.
Windrider: Deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Skypatrol: Deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.

101075101.description:
An esoteric fire skill mastered by Lingguang by studying the stars and the Li Gua form I-Ching.
Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Follow up with a normal attack after using any skill in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107501)>Start</material> mode or <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107502)>Ignite</material> mode to start the normal attack from the fourth strike. When casting Undying Flames: Start or Rising Splendor: Start, tap Normal Attack to interrupt the skill and follow up with the fourth strike of a normal attack.

Passive:
When a hit is landed with the fourth or fifth strike of a normal attack, or when Hexagram Auspicious: Start or Hexagram Auspicious: Ignite lands a hit, Undying Flames and Rising Splendor will switch between <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107501)>Start</material> mode and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107502)>Ignite</material> mode.
Cast skill again within <color=#E78300>10</color>s of the previous skill cast for continuous casting. Mod enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107509)>Afire</material> state for <color=#E78300>10</color>s after continuously casting <color=#E78300>4</color> skills.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107509)>Afire</material>: During this state, all skills switch to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107503)>Aflame</material> mode, with only one of them available for casting. All skills switch to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107501)>Start</material> mode when Mod exits the state.
Mod can have up to <color=#E78300>2</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107503)>Aflame</material> mode buffs at any time.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace when an enemy hit is landed with the fifth strike of a normal attack.

101075201.description:
One of the fire skills derived from Southern Fire, which has three modes in battle.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107501)>Start</material> mode: Dashes at the enemy and attacks them with the folding fans, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107502)>Ignite</material> mode: Makes a sudden dash and attacks enemies along the way, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107503)>Aflame</material> mode: Expends <color=#E78300>4</color> Traces to deal to surrounding enemies Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total. Skill cast grants all team members <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107504)>Shining Armor</material>.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107504)>Shining Armor</material>: Grants a shield of value equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> of Untainted Heart - Lingguang's Max HP for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace when a hit is landed in either <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107501)>Start</material> mode or <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107502)>Ignite</material> mode.

101075202.description:
One of the fire skills derived from Southern Fire, which has three modes in battle.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107501)>Start</material> mode: Attacks the enemy ahead with the folding fans, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107502)>Ignite</material> mode: Takes a leap to the back, leaving behind spinning fans that attack the enemy for Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107503)>Aflame</material> mode: Expends <color=#E78300>4</color> Traces to deal to surrounding enemies Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total. Skill cast grants all team members <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107505)>Burning Ember</material>.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107505)>Burning Ember</material>: When Mod's HP is at <color=#E78300>70%</color> or below, increases their Non-DoT DMG by <color=#E78300>4%</color> and by another <color=#E78300>0.4%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> current HP is below <color=#E78300>70%</color>, up to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces</color>: Grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace when a hit is landed in either <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107501)>Start</material> mode or <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107502)>Ignite</material> mode.

101075203.description:
One of the fire skills derived from Southern Fire, which has three modes in battle.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107501)>Start</material> mode: Swings the folding fans while lunging to attacks enemies in a large area ahead, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Skill switches to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107502)>Ignite</material> mode upon enemy hit.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107502)>Ignite</material> mode: Cross-swings the folding fans to strike at enemies in a large area ahead, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total. Skill switches to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107501)>Start</material> mode upon enemy hit.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107503)>Aflame</material> mode: Expends <color=#E78300>4</color> Traces to deal to surrounding enemies Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total. Skill cast grants all team members <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107506)>Fire Brilliant</material>.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107506)>Fire Brilliant</material>: When Mod's HP is at <color=#E78300>50%</color> or above, increases their Non-DoT DMG by <color=#E78300>4%</color> and by another <color=#E78300>0.4%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> current HP is above <color=#E78300>50%</color>, up to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace when a hit is landed in either <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107501)>Start</material> mode or <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107502)>Ignite</material> mode.

101075208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Untainted Heart - Lingguang and TaiYi - Gengchen.
Deals Fire DMG equal to Untainted Heart - Lingguang ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). When being cast, grants all team members <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107508)>Blazing Sun</material> for <color=#E78300>7</color>s. Increases TaiYi - Gengchen's Water DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s.
Deals Water DMG equal to TaiYi - Gengchen's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>).

101075209.description:
An ultimate skill derived from Southern Fire. Use this to unleash the power of fire.
Grants all team members <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107507)>Burning Sun</material> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s when any skill is cast in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107503)>Aflame</material> mode. Also grants all team members <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107508)>Blazing Sun</material> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s when Mod's Ultimate Skill is cast. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107507)>Burning Sun</material> bonuses do not apply when the Mod also has <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107508)>Blazing Sun</material>.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107507)>Burning Sun</material>: <color=#E78300>50%</color> chance of dealing <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more Independent Non-DoT DMG.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107508)>Blazing Sun</material>: <color=#E78300>100%</color> chance of dealing <color=#E78300>{2}</color> more Independent Non-DoT DMG.

Grants a <color=#E78300>3%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when Mod or a teammate attack crits. Effect triggers only once every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

101075305.description:
A move derived from Southern Fire.
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge effect: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>3</color>s. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101076101.description:
Uses TaiYi's Divine Power to deliver consecutive attacks to the enemy, dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. The fourth strike of a normal attack gathers enemies and levitates enemies hit, while the sixth strike inflicts Knockup on enemies hit.

Passive:
Casting Celestial Starfall or Cloud Meld grants corresponding <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107601)>Yang</material> Marks or <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107602)>Yin</material> Marks. Up to <color=#E78300>4</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107601)>Yang</material> Marks and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107602)>Yin</material> Marks can be held at any time.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Gains Rage when a normal attack hits.

101076201.description:
Celestial Starfall - Yang: Deals Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total and levitates enemies hit. Skill cast grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107601)>Yang</material> Mark, and is then replaced by Celestial Starfall - Yin.
Celestial Starfall - Yin: Deals Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total and gathers enemies within a small range. Skill cast grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107602)>Yin</material> Mark, and is then replaced by Celestial Starfall - Yang.
Celestial Starfall - Yang and Celestial Starfall - Yin share a CD.

101076202.description:
Cloud Meld - Yang: Deals Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total and levitates the enemy hit by the last attack. Skill cast grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107601)>Yang</material> Mark, and is then replaced by Cloud Meld - Yin.
Cloud Meld - Yin: Deals Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total. Skill cast grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107602)>Yin</material> Mark, and is then replaced by Cloud Meld - Yang.
Cloud Meld - Yang and Cloud Meld - Yin share a CD.

101076203.description:
Casting Antarctic Echo inflicts Sluggish to all enemies on the field and slows all enemy movements to <color=#E78300>{8}</color> for <color=#E78300>{9}</color>s.
Antarctic Echo - Yang: Expends <color=#E78300>2</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107601)>Yang</material> Marks, dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total, then gathers enemies within a large range for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s. After this skill is cast, Celestial Starfall switches to Celestial Starfall - Yin, Cloud Meld switches to Cloud Meld - Yin, both CD reset, and this skill switches to Antarctic Echo - Yin. The Mod enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107603)>Apex: Xu</material> state.
Antarctic Echo - Yin: Expends <color=#E78300>2</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107602)>Yin</material> Marks, dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total. Then, for every <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s, launches <color=#E78300>{7}</color> attacks to random enemies, with each attack dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK. Effect lasts <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s. After this skill is cast, Celestial Starfall switches to Celestial Starfall - Yang, Cloud Meld switches to Cloud Meld - Yang, both CD reset, and this skill switches to Antarctic Echo - Yang. The Mod enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107604)>Apex: Heng</material> state.
Antarctic Echo - Yang and Antarctic Echo - Yin do not share a CD.

101076209.description:
Unleashes TaiYi's undulating Divine Power, dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

When a Tian Yuan Mod lands a hit, they gain <color=#E78300>2%, 3%, or 4%</color> Ultimate Skill charge depending on the number of Tian Yuan Mods deployed at the start of the battle. Effect triggers up to 1 time every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

101076305.description:
Quickly dodges enemy attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge Effect: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>2</color>s and gathers enemies within a small range. Grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107601)>Yang</material> Mark when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107604)>Apex: Heng</material> and <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107602)>Yin</material> Mark when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107603)>Apex: Xu</material>. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101080101.description:
Swings her axe continuously to attack the enemy, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when a normal attack results in a hit.

101080111.description:
Swings her axe continuously to attack the enemy, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Normal attacks have a certain chance of inflicting Freeze on enemies in front for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s when landing a hit. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>6</color>s. Whenever a normal attack hits an enemy in Freeze, an additional <color=#E78300>6</color> Rage is granted and an AoE skill attack is launched on other enemies not hit by the normal attack, which deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>125%</color> of ATK.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when a normal attack hits.

101080201.description: Swings her axe to attack the enemies around her, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK. The second strike also inflicts Freeze on enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

101080202.description: Spins with her axe to attack enemies continuously, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK.

101080203.description: Leaps up and unleashes a mighty cleave at the target, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK. When an enemy is defeated with Polar Strike, the cd of the skill is also reset.

101080208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Frost Fang - Vidar and Countertide - Leviathan.
Deals Ice DMG equal to Frost Fang - Vidar's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), as well as decreases the Ice RES of enemies hit by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color> seconds.
Also deals Water DMG equal to Countertide - Leviathan's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). The team also takes <color=#E78300>{7}</color> less DMG and restores HP equal to <color=#E78300>{9} of their ATK</color> every <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds for <color=#E78300>{8}</color> seconds when hitting an enemy.

101080209.description:
Skill cast deals to the enemy Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK, and enemies hit have their Ice RES lowered by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds.

An <color=#E78300>8%</color> Ultimate Skill charge is granted when an enemy is afflicted with Freeze. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds.

101080305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds, and Ice DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. Effect lasts <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds.

101081101.description:
Brandishes the Typhon Sword carried on the Waverender and attacks the enemy repeatedly, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Hold down the button to unleash the charged attack Frostbreak following any strike in a normal attack. The Waverender vessel prevents Mod from Knockup.
Frostbreak: Deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material>, launching a normal attack automatically locks on to the target and fires two Piercer tracking missiles, with each dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK. Fires two additional Piercer tracking missiles when the locked-on enemy is in Freeze.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace</color>: When not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material>, gains Divine Grace when a normal attack or Frostbreak hits an enemy. When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material>, both moving and drifting grant Divine Grace.

101081201.description:
Uses the Typhon Sword to slash the enemies in front at high speed, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108101)>Icebreaker</material> Mark with every enemy hit up to <color=#E78300>3</color> Marks in total. Every <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108101)>Icebreaker</material> Mark active increases the DMG of charged skills by <color=#E78300>20%</color> and her Ice DMG by <color=#E78300>10%</color>. When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material>, Cold Front is replaced by Polar Blizzard.
Polar Blizzard: Expends <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108101)>Icebreaker</material> Mark to launch Freezer tracking missiles at the enemy, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK to enemies within range of the explosion, and inflicting them with Freeze for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds. Polar Blizzard has a CD of <color=#E78300>4</color> seconds.

101081202.description:
Charges forward at high speed with assistance from the Waverender vessel while slashing furiously, forming ice spikes and dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Replaces Flash Freeze with Crystal Smash when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material>.
Crystal Smash: Casts only when Divine Grace is full. Expends all Divine Grace to unleash a dash attack at the locked-on enemy with a short window to trigger Dodge, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total. Increases the launch speed of Piercer tracking missiles by <color=#E78300>75%</color> for <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds upon skill cast. Crystal Smash has a CD of <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>15</color> Divine Grace when Flash Freeze hits.

101081203.description:
When Divine Grace is full, triggers <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material> for Waverender by expending all Divine Grace, lasting <color=#E78300>15</color> seconds.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material>: Grants Super Armor and disenables the use of Glacier Age. To change the direction of Waverender quickly, make a wide turn to "drift" on the water. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material> ends when using the skill again or when its duration runs out, clearing all Divine Grace. Then, Skadi disappears momentarily beneath the ice and emerges again at a point close to the target, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

101081209.description:
The Waverender's engines are at full power to supply the Typhon Sword. Unleashes a frost blast after charging briefly, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total to surrounding enemies. Increases the Charge Skill DMG of all teammates by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds upon skill cast.

Grants a <color=#E78300>25%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when an enemy goes into Control Resistance.

101081305.description:
When not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material>:
Holding down on the Dodge button when not moving: Expends all Dodge Energy to generate a barrier at Skadi's location which decreases her DMG taken by <color=#E78300>60%</color>. Expends Dodge Energy again when the barrier is active to block the damage of the first attack taken. If Skadi has an <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108101)>Icebreaker</material> Mark active, canceling the tap within a short time of a successful Block unleashes Frostbreak one time at the cost of <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108101)>Icebreaker</material> Mark, during which time Skadi is Invincible.
Tapping on Dodge while moving: Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks and deals to enemies along the way Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material>:
Waverender dives beneath the ice momentarily to dodge the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge effect: Grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108101)>Icebreaker</material> Mark. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

101084101.description:
Verthandi swings the Runic Blade continuously at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace: </color>A normal attack grants Divine Grace after landing.

101084201.description:
Stabs forward a certain distance, dealing to enemies in her path Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK. Rapid Stab is replaced by <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Daybreak</material> after it is cast two times.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Daybreak</material>: Verthandi deals to enemies in her path Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.
All <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108401)>Runic Marks</material> present are cleared if a skill hit was landed on an enemy with a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108401)>Runic Mark</material>.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>50</color> Divine Grace when an enemy with a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108401)>Runic Mark</material> is hit is landed using <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Daybreak</material>.

101084202.description:
Slashes at the enemies around her, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total and applying the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108401)>Runic Mark</material> to enemies hit for <color=#E78300>4</color> seconds. The cd of Skill 1 is also reset.
The Non-DoT Crit Rate of hits landed on enemies with a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108401)>Runic Mark</material> with other skills is increased by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>.

101084203.description:
Verthandi unleashes several light blades towards the enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. The cd of Skill 1 is reset with skill cast. All <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108401)>Runic Marks</material> present are cleared if a skill hit was landed on an enemy with a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108401)>Runic Mark</material>. When Divine Grace is at max, the skill is replaced by Raychaser Slash.
Raychaser Slash: Expends all Divine Grace to use all summoned swords in a wide-area attack, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total. Skill Crit Rate is increased by <color=#E78300>100%</color> and the cd of Skill 1 is reset.

101084209.description:
The Runic Blade is transformed into the Blade of Destiny, which is then used to attack the enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK. Attack raises the Mod Index Multiplier by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>.

Grants a <color=#E78300>15%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when Verthandi or a Teammate triggers Zero Time; triggers only once every <color=#E78300>0.5</color> seconds.

101084212.description:
Stabs forward a certain distance, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK to enemies in her path. After casting this skill, Verthandi's DMG is increased for <color=#E78300>5</color> seconds. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times, and the skill is replaced by Enlightening after being cast two times.
Enlightening: Attack enemies along the way, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.
All <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108401)>Runic Marks</material> present are cleared if a skill hit was landed on an enemy with a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108401)>Runic Mark</material>.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Skill casting grants <color=#E78300>10</color> Divine Grace, and every hit landed on an enemy with a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108401)>Runic Mark</material> using Enlightening grants <color=#E78300>50</color> Divine Grace.

101084305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks and can Dodge two consecutive times. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge effect: Entering Zero Time slows all enemy movements significantly for <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101089201.description: Deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK. Grants <color=#E78300>4</color> Divine Grace every time an enemy is hit if the skill is cast while the normal attack is generating Divine Grace, and doesn't interrupt normal attack strike counts. Additionally, this skill's remaining CD is reduced by <color=#E78300>25%</color> after it is cast.

101089202.description: Deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK. Grants <color=#E78300>2</color> Divine Grace every time an enemy is hit if the skill is cast while the normal attack is generating Divine Grace, and doesn't interrupt normal attack strike counts. Additionally, this skill's remaining CD is reduced by <color=#E78300>25%</color> after it is cast.

101093101.description:
Uses a shinobigatana to swiftly slash at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material>: A combination of two types of Hold, Heaven's Hold and Earth's Hold. Forming a new <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> when a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> already exists clears the existing <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material>. When Divine Grace is at max, casting Ninjutsu expends not <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> but all Divine Grace.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> A normal attack that results in a hit grants Divine Grace.

101093208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Sakubo - Tsukuyomi and Jin-ei - Kuninotokotachi.
Deals Shadow DMG equal to Sakubo - Tsukuyomi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and a hit landed on the enemy grants all members of the team <color=#E78300>30</color> Divine Grace and afflicts the enemy hit with Trauma for <color=#E78300>{5}</color> seconds.
Trauma: Deals Shadow DMG equal to Sakubo - Tsukuyomi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>78% + 2%</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>) every <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds for <color=#E78300>{5}</color> seconds.
Also deals Physical DMG equal to Jin-ei - Kuninotokotachi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her average skill level</color>), and lowers the Physical, Fire, Thunder, and Wind Resistance of enemies hit by <color=#E78300>{6}</color> for <color=#E78300>{7}</color> seconds upon hit.

101093231.description:
Ninjutsu: Kuninotokotachi unleashes a large amount of Kunai to attack surrounding enemies in a large area, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK.
Can be cast using the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> combination of Heaven and Heaven.

The Ultimate Skill Truth and Nothingness: Rain can be cast using the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> combination of Heaven and Heaven, dealing to surrounding enemies Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total, and enemies hit have their Physical Res lowered by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds.

101093232.description:
Ninjutsu: Kuninotokotachi transforms into thunder and deals to enemies in front of her Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Skill can be cast using the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> combination of Heaven and Earth.

The Ultimate Skill Truth and Nothingness: Thunder can be cast using the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> combination of Heaven and Earth. Skill cast deals to enemies within range Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total, and enemies hit have their Thunder Res lowered by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds.

101093233.description:
Ninjutsu: Kuninotokotachi makes a dash at the enemy to her front, generating whirlwinds along the way and dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Skill can be cast using the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> combination of Earth and Heaven.

The Ultimate Skill Truth and Nothingness: Wind can be cast using the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> combination of Earth and Heaven. Skill cast deals to enemies within range Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total, and enemies hit have their Wind Res lowered by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds.

101093236.description:
Ninjutsu: Kuninotokotachi detonates the target enemy, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total and also leaving a circle on the enemy that will intermittently blast for a total of <color=#E78300>9</color> times. Each blast deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK, and the blasts stop when the target enemy is defeated.
Skill can be cast using the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> combination of Earth and Earth.

The Ultimate Skill Truth and Nothingness: Fire can be cast using the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> combination of Earth and Earth. Skill cast deals to enemies within range Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK, and enemies hit have their Fire Res lowered by <color=#E78300>{4}</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color> seconds.

101093305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks, and Dodge can be used two consecutive times. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

A <color=#E78300>15%</color> Ultimate Skill charge is granted when Kuninotokotachi or a Teammate triggers Zero Time; triggers only once every <color=#E78300>0.5</color> seconds.

101094101.description:
Fires a series of shots at the locked-on enemy using her Magic Handgonne, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace when the normal attack hits.

101094201.description:
Sprays shots at enemies to her front using her Magic Handgonne, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Divine Grace when the skill hits.

101094202.description:
Ganglati takes on the Magic Cannon form and fires a shot in the locked-on direction, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Divine Grace when the skill hits.

101094203.description:
Ganglati takes on the Cannon Tower form and fires multiple cannon shots in the locked-on direction. Each shot deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total at the cost of <color=#E78300>20</color> Divine Grace. Other stats do not affect Divine Grace expenditure from cannon shots.
When in Cannon Tower form, the Mod is immune to control effects though she may not move, use skills or the Ultimate Skill, and she can only rotate horizontally to aim. Reduces the DMG taken by <color=#E78300>20%</color>, and every <color=#E78300>1%</color> of Max HP lost also expends <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace. Ganglati exits Cannon Tower form when Divine Grace runs out or with a manual exit.

101094209.description:
Summons multiple Magic Cannons that fire in the locked-on direction, dealing to enemies within range four scattered strikes, with each strike dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK. All teammates get a <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Shadow DMG boost for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s upon skill cast.

Grants a <color=#E78300>15%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when Mod or a teammate triggers Zero Time. Effect triggers only once every <color=#E78300>0.5</color>s.

101094305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds, and grants <color=#E78300>{1}</color> Divine Grace. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

101095101.description:
Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.
Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state.

Passive:
May have up to a total of <color=#E78300>2</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109502)>Featherblade</material> and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109503)>Silverthread</material> marks at any one time.
Skill use does not interrupt normal attacks.
Unleashing the final strike of a normal attack when not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state replaces Dance On Edge and Silverdrop with Spin On Edge and Shadowcut respectively, and resets the CD of Spin On Edge and Shadowcut. Use of any skill after reverts Spin On Edgel and Shadowcut to Dance On Edge and Silverdrop respectively.
Unleashing the final strike of a normal attack when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state replaces Spin On Edge and Shadowcut with The Stitch: Edge and The Stitch: Thread respectively, and use of any skill after reverts The Stitch: Edge and The Stitch: Thread to Spin On Edge and Shadowcut respectively.

<color=#297DE0>Energy: Restores <color=#E78300>5</color> Energy every second </color>when not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state.

101095201.description:
Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.
Spin On Edge: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total. This skill has a CD of <color=#E78300>7</color>s.
Skill use grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109502)>Featherblade</material> mark.
Use of Dance On Edge or Spin On Edge grants a short period of Dodge which does not trigger the Dodge effect. Use of Extremity Dodge to dodge the enemy's attack grants <color=#E78300>15</color> Energy.

101095202.description:
Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.
Shadowcut: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total. This skill has a CD of <color=#E78300>7</color>s.
Skill use grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109503)>Silverthread</material> mark.
Use of Silverdrop or Shadowcut slows the movements of enemies hit to <color=#E78300>75%</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s.

101095203.description:
Skill may only be cast when there are <color=#E78300>2</color> marks to be expended. Attack form varies depending on the type and number of various marks expended.
The Stitch: Edge: Expending <color=#E78300>2</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109502)>Featherblade</material> marks deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total;
The Stitch: Cut: Expending <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109502)>Featherblade</material> and <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109503)>Silverthread</material> mark deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total, as well as slows the movements of enemies hit to <color=#E78300>75%</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s;
The Stitch: Thread: Expending <color=#E78300>2</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109503)>Silverthread</material> marks deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total, as well as slows the movements of enemies hit to <color=#E78300>25%</color> for <color=#E78300>{7}</color>s.
When Energy is full, hold down on the normal attack button to unleash Featherfall.
Featherfall: Expends all marks and deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK in total to all surrounding enemies, then goes into <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state, and resets the CD of Spin On Edge and Shadowcut. During skill action, ATK increases by <color=#E78300>5%</color>. At the same time, ATK increases by another <color=#E78300>0.5%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1</color> point of Energy over <color=#E78300>100</color>. This effect lasts until the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state ends. The ATK boost from this effect is capped at <color=#E78300>20%</color> in total. When marks are expended due to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material>, restores expended marks when the state ends.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material>: Depletes <color=#E78300>1</color> Energy every <color=#E78300>0.1</color>s. Ends <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state when Energy falls to <color=#E78300>0</color>. When in said state, Dance On Edge, Silverdrop, and The Stitch are replaced by Spin On Edge, Shadowcut, and The Snare respectively. Use of Spin On Edge and Shadowcut does not grant the corresponding marks.
The Snare: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> ATK in total, and slows the movements of all enemies within range to <color=#E78300>0%</color> for <color=#E78300>3.5</color>s. CD: <color=#E78300>12</color>s.

101095208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Lioness - Sekhmet and Gray Ibis - Thoth.
Deals Physical DMG equal to ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>Sekhmet's Ultimate Skill level</color>), and Skillchain use grants all team members <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101502)>Potential Unleashed</material> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s, as well as restores to all team members HP equal to ATK × (<color=#E78300>62% + 2%</color> × <color=#297DE0>their Ultimate Skill level</color>). Hits landed on the enemy increase the Skill DMG of all team members by <color=#E78300>{6}</color> for <color=#E78300>{7}</color>s.
Also deals Physical DMG equal to ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>Thoth's Ultimate Skill level</color>), and Skillchain use increases all Attribute DMG dealt by all team members by <color=#E78300>{8}</color> for <color=#E78300>{9}</color>s.

101095209.description:
Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK. Skill use increases Independent DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s and all Attribute DMG dealt by all team members by <color=#E78300>{4}</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s.

Grants a <color=#E78300>3%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when any member of the team lands a critical hit. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

101095281.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Gray Ibis - Thoth and Living Soul - Osiris.
Deals Physical DMG equal to Gray Ibis - Thoth's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), while also increasing teammates' Attribute DMG by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s.
Deals Wind DMG equal to Living Soul - Osiris' ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). Osiris enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld mode</material>, increasing teammates' DMG by <color=#E78300>20% + 0.2%</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color> and her Independent DMG by <color=#E78300>{7}</color> until <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld mode</material> concludes. Osiris' HP Removal state will not take her HP lower than <color=#E78300>1</color>.

101095305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Dodging does not interrupt normal attacks, while Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge effect: Tapping the normal attack button within <color=#E78300>3</color>s of an Extremity Dodge unleashes an Invisible String skill attack. When not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state, Dance On Edge and Silverdrop are replaced by Spin On Edge and Shadowcut respectively and the CD of Spin On Edge and Shadowcut resets. When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state, Spin On Edge and Shadowcut are replaced by The Stitch: Edge and The Stitch: Thread respectively. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds.
Invisible String: Teleports right behind the locked-on enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total and slowing the movements of the locked-on target to <color=#E78300>50%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

101096101.description:
Launches a series of attacks at the locked-on enemy, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

Passive:
Moves at an increasing speed until <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109601)>Vector Acceleration</material> is triggered.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Gains a certain amount of Rage when the normal attack hits.

101096201.description:
Launches two kicks at the locked-on enemy, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Also applies the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109602)>Windchaser Mark</material> to the locked-on enemy upon the last hit.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109602)>Windchaser Mark:</material> Lasts <color=#E78300>10</color>s. Increases the Non-DoT DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> when attacking an enemy with the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109602)>Windchaser Mark</material> from downwind.

101096202.description:
Quickly moves some distance.
Hold down on Ride with the Wind while moving to enter <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109601)>Vector Acceleration</material> state at an additional cost of <color=#E78300>5</color> Rage.
Expend another <color=#E78300>5</color> Rage in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109601)>Vector Acceleration</material> state to mount a follow-up attack.
Follow-up attack: Delivers a powerful flying kick to the locked-on target while in Vector Acceleration state, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. This skill has a CD of <color=#E78300>5</color>s.

101096203.description: Moves swiftly to launch a series of attacks, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

101096208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Phantasmal Dawn - Hera and Windwalker - Hermes.
Deals Light DMG equal to Phantasmal Dawn - Hera's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and grants all teammates an ATK boost equal to <color=#E78300>14% + 0.4%</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s. Returns all Combat Resources expended by all teammates in their next attack within the next <color=#E78300>12</color>s.
Also deals Wind DMG equal to Windwalker - Hermes' ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). Reduces the Wind RES of enemy hit by <color=#E78300>{6}</color> for <color=#E78300>{7}</color>s and applies the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109602)>Windchaser Mark</material>.

101096209.description:
Initiates a dash using the power of the Access Key, generating a storm at the target location which deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Reduces the Wind RES of enemies hit by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s, and applies the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109602)>Windchaser Mark</material> on them when the last strike lands.

Grants a <color=#E78300>2%</color> of Ultimate Skill charge whenever Mod or a teammate crits with a normal attack. Triggers only once every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

101096305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101097101.description:
Fires a flash of rainbow light at the locked-on enemy, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>4</color> Energy every second.

101097201.description: Flings the little sheep forward. The sheep bounces and deals to the enemy Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Also inflicts Shackle on any enemies hit in Dreamscape for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

101097202.description: Creates a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109701)>Dreamscape</material> that lasts <color=#E78300>15</color>s, inside which all allies take <color=#E78300>{1}</color> less DMG.

101097203.description: Enters sleepwalking state and creates a Dream Bubble. In sleepwalking state, Mod can only move slowly, restoring HP to all allies within the Dreamscape generated by Skill 2 equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK <color=#E78300>every</color> second. The Dream Bubble shatters when Mod stops charging, takes a hit, or when charging is at max, dealing to surrounding enemies Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total. Hold down on the skill to charge it up to <color=#E78300>2</color> times, with each time increasing Non-DoT Charge Skill DMG of the Dream Bubble by <color=#E78300>50%</color>.

101097209.description:
Throws the little sheep high up into the air, where it grows bigger, crashes into the targets below and explodes, dealing to enemies within range Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Also inflicts Shackle on all enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

Grants a <color=#E78300>20%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when Mod or a teammate casts the Ultimate Skill.

101097221.description:
Casts a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109702)>Phantascape</material> that lasts <color=#E78300>15</color> seconds, during which all allies take <color=#E78300>{1}</color> less DMG. Also inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109703)>Dreamland</material> on enemies hit.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109703)>Dreamland</material>: Deals Shadow DMG <color=#E78300>every</color> second.

101097305.description:
