Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge effect: Entering Zero Time slows all enemy movements significantly for <color=#E78300>3</color>s, and also deals to the attacker and other enemies around them Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

101099101.description:
Continuously slashes at the enemy using Saku, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> A normal attack that results in a hit grants Divine Grace.

101099201.description:
Slashes continuously and throws Saku at the enemy, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Each hit grants <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Divine Grace.

101099202.description:
When Divine Grace is at max, Saku: Lunar Eclipse is replaced by Bo: Lunar Eclipse, which expends all Divine Grace when cast.
Saku: Lunar Eclipse: Tsukuyomi dashes forward, dealing to the enemy Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK.
Bo: Lunar Eclipse: Tsukuyomi unleashes <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109901)>Bo</material>, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total, and enemies hit are also afflicted with Trauma for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds.
Trauma: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK every <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds.

101099203.description:
When Divine Grace is at max, Saku: Moonlit Night is replaced by Bo: Moonlit Night, which expends all Divine Grace when cast.
Saku: Moonlit Night: Tap continuously to use Iaido to deal Shadow DMG to the enemy and enemies with Trauma around them, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK each time except on the final instance, when Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK is dealt.
Bo: Moonlit Night: Charge to cast a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109901)>Bo</material> light blade which deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK. Hold down the skill button to charge the skill up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times, with Non-DoT skill DMG increased by <color=#E78300>30%</color> when the skill is charged.

101099209.description:
Slashes at the target in front of her, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Enemies hit are afflicted with Trauma for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds, and <color=#E78300>each</color> time an enemy hit is landed all members of the team are granted <color=#E78300>30</color> Divine Grace.
Trauma: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK every <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

Skill grants an <color=#E78300>8%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when Trauma is inflicted on an enemy. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds.

101099231.description:
When Divine Grace is at max, the remaining cd of Sakubo: Final Moon is reset and Saku: Final Moon is replaced by Bo: Final Moon, which expends all Divine Grace when cast.
Saku: Final Moon: Tap continuously to use Iaido to deal Shadow DMG to the enemy and enemies with Trauma around them, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK each time except on the final instance, when Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK is dealt.
Bo: Final Moon: Charge to cast three <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109901)>Bo</material> light blades at the enemy, with the primary blade dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK and the each secondary blade, Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> of ATK. Hold down the skill button to charge the skill up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times, with Non-DoT skill hit DMG increased by <color=#E78300>30%</color> when the skill is charged.

101099305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101111101.description:
Summons a scythe and continuously slashes at the target, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode: Osiris unleashes sword wings to mow down the locked-on target, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> The third and fifth moves of her normal attack grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace each. When a hit is landed with the fourth strike of a normal attack while Osiris is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode, <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace is also granted.

101111201.description:
Throws her scythe at the target, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode: Osiris fires sword wings at the target, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.
After Darkwing Scythe is cast, <color=#E78300>2</color> Traces can be expended to unleash another attack, which will however not grant any more Traces.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Each time skill cast results in a hit, <color=#E78300>2</color> Traces are granted (regardless of the mode Osiris is in).

101111202.description:
Sends the scythe into a deadly spin dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode: Osiris summons sword wings that surround her and attack enemies in their way a total of <color=#E78300>26</color> times, with each attack dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK. Lasts <color=#E78300>6</color> seconds.

101111203.description:
Slashes her scythe upwards at the target, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode: Osiris gathers the enemy in front of her, and deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.

101111209.description:
Escapes her ghostly shackles momentarily and enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode with her HP restored to full.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode: Changes the way the attack takes place with Scythe Slash, Darkwing Scythe, Spin of Death, and Soul Death. All members of the team get a <color=#E78300>{1}</color> DMG boost until the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode ends, and Osiris is granted Super Armor but loses <color=#E78300>7%</color> HP every second. Osiris exits <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode when her HP falls to <color=#E78300>0</color> and returns to her original state.
After Osiris exits <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode, restores an Ultimate Skill charge to Osiris equal to that of the Mod with whom she has a preset Ultimate Skillchain. Where no such Mod exists, also restores to Osiris an Ultimate Skill charge even when still in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode.
A <color=#E78300>35%</color> Ultimate Skill charge is granted to Osiris and the Mod with whom she has a preset Ultimate Skillchain when she enters the battlefield.

An <color=#E78300>8%</color> Ultimate Skill charge is also granted when an enemy is inflicted with Weak (Osiris must not be in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode). Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds.

101111305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect. When Osiris is not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode, triggering Dodge also unleashes an attack on the enemies around her which deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total.
Dodge: Entering Zero Time slows all enemy movements significantly for <color=#E78300>2</color>s and inflicts Weak on attackers, lowering their ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds.

101119101.description:
Brandishes the two spears and attacks the enemy, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

Passive:
Increases Thunder DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>0.7%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> Wind DMG boost owned by Mod.
Mod may own up to <color=#E78300>6</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111903)>Lightning Rod</material> and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111904)>Hillshook</material> Marks in total.

<color=#297DE0>Rage</color>: Grants Rage when a normal attack hits.

101119201.description:
Brandishes her spears, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total while switching between the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111901)>attack stance</material> and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111902)>defensive stance</material>. Grants Unyielding while in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111902)>defensive stance</material>.
Regardless of whether Shifting Winds is in CD or if it is replaced with Shifting Squall, tap on this skill button when casting Storm Howl, Whirlwind Whisk, or Shifting Squall, or when launching follow-up attacks/counterattacks will immediately switch the Mod's stance without interrupting the current move or dealing any damage. And then expends <color=#E78300>7</color> Rage.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111902)>defensive stance</material> and hit by the enemy while casting Storm Howl or Whirlwind Whisk, blocks the damage and triggers a counterattack, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK and grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111904)>Hillshook</material> Mark and Invincible upon hit and then expends <color=#E78300>15</color> Rage.
When the Mark count is at max, replaces Shifting Winds with Shifting Squall. Shifting Squall has a CD of <color=#E78300>15</color>s, regardless of the stance being used.
Shifting Squall: expends all Marks to deal Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total.

101119202.description: Dashes forward while brandishing the twin spears, then launches a series of ferocious stabs at the enemy, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Hitting an enemy while in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111901)>attack stance</material> triggers a follow-up attack, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total, and grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111903)>Lightning Rod</material> Mark upon each hit. The follow-up attack will stop if Mod switches to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111902)>defensive stance</material>.

101119203.description: Imbues the twin spears with the divine power of lightning and brandishes them in a wide area. The spears then turn into dozens of phantoms that attack the enemy from above, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Hitting an enemy while in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111901)>attack stance</material> triggers a follow-up attack, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total, and grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111903)>Lightning Rod</material> Mark upon each hit. The follow-up attack will stop if Mod switches to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111902)>defensive stance</material>.

101119208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Flowfly Mist - Shu and Archaic Oath - Verthandi.
Deals Thunder DMG equal to Flowfly Mist - Shu's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and increases Combat Resources charge speed of all members of the team by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s upon hit. Also increases Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>25%</color> upon <color=#E78300>each</color> normal attack hit; stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times. The Crit DMG boost also expires when the Combat Resources charge speed boost expires.
Also deals Thunder DMG equal to Archaic Oath - Verthandi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and grants all members of the team a <color=#E78300>15%</color> Ultimate Skill charge upon hit.

101119209.description:
Deals Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Increases the Combat Resources charge speed of all members of the team by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>16</color>s upon hit. Increases Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>20%</color> for <color=#E78300>every</color> normal attack hit; stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times. Removes the Crit DMG boost when the Combat Resources charge speed boost expires.

Grants an <color=#E78300>8%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate expends Combat Resources successfully. Triggers only once every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

101119305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge effect: Grants <color=#E78300>25</color> Rage. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101127101.description:
Brandishes Countertide Whalesong and calls upon a group of sea creatures to help with the attack, dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace for every <color=#E78300>15</color> normal attack hits.

101127201.description:
Summons an ocean wave that surges forward, out of which jump various sea creatures that attack the enemy, dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(112701)>Countertide</material> Mark upon skill cast (no more than <color=#E78300>1</color> can exist at a time). Increases healing effect by <color=#E78300>5%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1</color> hit with Leapin' Krakens; stacks up to <color=#E78300>4</color> times. Increases the Non-DoT DMG of Leapin' Krakens by <color=#E78300>1.25%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> healing boost, up to a maximum of <color=#E78300>100%</color>.
After the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(112701)>Countertide</material> Mark is expended, this effect will last <color=#E78300>1</color> more second before being removed. Boosts activated during this extra period will not be added to the existing stacks.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace upon each skill hit.

101127202.description:
Opens up the Access Key to summon two sea creatures on the spot, dealing AoE Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total while they are on the battlefield. Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(112702)>Whalesong</material> Mark upon skill cast (no more than <color=#E78300>1</color> can exist at a time). Increases Mod's Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>10%</color> upon each <color=#E78300>1</color> hit with Tide Summon; stacks up to <color=#E78300>6</color> times. Also increases the Non-DoT DMG of Tide Summon by <color=#E78300>0.8%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> Crit DMG boost, up to a maximum of <color=#E78300>100%</color>.
After the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(112702)>Whalesong</material> Mark is expended, this effect will be removed after <color=#E78300>1</color>s. Boosts activated during this extra period will not be added to the existing stacks.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace upon each skill hit.

101127203.description:
Immediately gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace if Mod has fewer than <color=#E78300>4</color> Traces. Replaces Undercurrent with Azure Aid when Mod has <color=#E78300>4</color> Traces.
Azure Aid: Unlocks the power of Mod's Access Key and expends <color=#E78300>4</color> Traces to create a ring of healing, which restores to all allies within range HP equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK. Azure Aid has a CD of <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds. Skill cast expends all available Traces and grants additional skill effects.
Expending the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(112701)>Countertide</material> Mark deals to the locked-on enemy Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total. Also increases the Non-DoT DMG by <color=#E78300>1.25%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> healing boost, up to a maximum of <color=#E78300>100%</color>.
All nearby allies take less DMG when expending the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(112702)>Whalesong</material> Mark. And also further reduces DMG taken by the Mod by <color=#E78300>0.12%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> Crit DMG boost, up to a maximum of <color=#E78300>15%</color>, lasting <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds.

101127209.description:
Of one mind and will with the sea creatures, summons the power of the sea to protect those around them. All teammates take <color=#E78300>{1}</color> less DMG for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds upon skill cast. Grants the following effects during the next <color=#E78300>8</color> seconds: The next cast of Azure Aid grants <color=#E78300>4</color> Traces, and shortens the remaining CD of Azure Aid by <color=#E78300>100%</color> when casting.

Gains a <color=#E78300>4%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate is healed. Triggers only once every <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds.

101127305.description:
Casts a mirage using particle imaging that confuses the enemy and dodges two consecutive times. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge effect: Entering Zero Time slows all enemy movements significantly for <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101132101.description:
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113201)>Burning Sword</material> stance: Slashes powerfully at the enemy using the longsword, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113202)>Blazing Armor</material> stance: Launches a series of strikes at the enemy using the gauntlet, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Gains Rage when a normal attack hits.

101132201.description:
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113201)>Burning Sword</material> stance: Slashes at the enemy ahead using the longsword, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total and inflicting Stun on enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113202)>Blazing Armor</material> stance: Expends <color=#E78300>20</color> Rage to charge ahead and attack the enemies using the gauntlet, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total. Also, lowers the Fire RES of enemies hit by <color=#E78300>{4}</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s. Skill has a <color=#E78300>6</color>s CD.

101132202.description:
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113201)>Burning Sword</material> stance: Sweeps the longsword to attack the enemies in a large area, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113202)>Blazing Armor</material> stance: Expends <color=#E78300>20</color> Rage to move the spinning sword to the locked-on enemy's position and reset the spinning sword's duration. This also increases the sword's Non-DoT DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>5</color>s. Skill has a <color=#E78300>6</color>s CD.

101132203.description:
Tosses the longsword to the target position. The sword spins continually while the Mod switches to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113202)>Blazing Armor</material> stance, and when a hit is landed on the first enemy, the spinning sword stops traveling, hovers, and deals AoE Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK every <color=#E78300>0.5</color>s for up to <color=#E78300>10</color>s. When this time is up, the sword vanishes, the Mod switches to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113201)>Burning Sword</material> stance, and this skill goes into CD.
Tap the skill again while the sword is spinning at the target location to summon it back. Once the returning sword is catched, the Mod switches to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113201)>Burning Sword</material> stance, and the longsword and gauntlet come together for a powerful attack that deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK. Mod has Control Immunity and DMG Immunity during this attack, and the skill goes into CD thereafter.

101132208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Madoibi Scorched - Kagutsuchi and Firebrand - Tyr.
Deals Fire DMG equal to Madoibi Scorched - Kagutsuchi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1}+{2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>his Ultimate Skillchain level</color>). Enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115803)>Heartsear: Scourge</material> state upon cast. Increases the Non-DoT Skill DMG of all Rage Mod teammates' Fire attacks by <color=#E78300>{8}</color> for <color=#E78300>12</color>s upon landing a hit.
Deals Fire DMG equal to Firebrand - Tyr's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3}+{4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>his Ultimate Skill level</color>). The whole team deal <color=#E78300>{5}</color> more Skill DMG and <color=#E78300>{6}</color> more Ultimate Skill DMG for <color=#E78300>{7}</color>s upon landing a hit.

101132209.description:
Recalls the longsword and switches to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113201)>Burning Sword</material> stance. Then, coalesces the flames using Divine Power and unleashes a mighty slash attack within a large area, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. When a hit is landed, all teammates gain <color=#E78300>{2}</color> more Skill DMG and <color=#E78300>{3}</color> more Ultimate Skill DMG for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s.

Gains a <color=#E78300>20%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate casts the Ultimate Skill.

101132305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge effect: Grants <color=#E78300>15</color> Rage and increases Fire DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds.

101138101.description:
Fires a beam of light at the locked-on enemy, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>3</color> Energy every second.

101138201.description: Summons <color=#E78300>7</color> meteors above the locked-on enemy, with each meteor dealing to enemies within range Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK.

101138202.description: Launches an attack on surrounding enemies, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. And increases the ATK of the team member with the highest ATK by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s.

101138203.description: Summons the Big Dipper above the target to attack all enemies within range, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

101138209.description:
Increases the DMG dealt by all teammates by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s, and restores all Combat Resources expended by them in the next move within <color=#E78300>10</color>s.

Grants an <color=#E78300>8%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when Mod or a teammate triggers Zero Time.

101138305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge effect: Entering Zero Time slows all enemy movements significantly for <color=#E78300>2</color>s, as well as triggers a solar arrow attack on the attacker which deals Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

101138351.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Hold down on Dodge to trigger the Dodge effect at the cost of <color=#E78300>30</color> Energy. Triggers only once every <color=#E78300>24</color>s.
Dodge effect: Entering Zero Time slows all enemy movements significantly for <color=#E78300>2</color>s, as well as triggers a solar arrow attack on the locked-on enemy which deals Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

101139101.description:
Summons ice crystals to attack the enemies to her front, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

Passive:
Poseidon can have up to <color=#E78300>2</color> of the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113901)>Snowy</material> and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113902)>Icy</material> Marks.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Poseidon is granted <color=#E78300>3</color> Energy per second.

101139201.description:
Summons an ice spike to attack her target, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Tap on the skill again a short time into the skill action to also cast Additional Chant.
Additional Chant: The ice spike breaks into pieces and attacks again, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total. <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113901)>Snowy</material> Mark is also granted.
Poseidon is granted certain effects depending on the number of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113901)>Snowy</material> Marks expended to enter <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material> state:
<color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113901)>Snowy</material> Mark: Poseidon's Ice DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>10%</color>, and casting Zero Mansard shortens the remaining cd of Zero Mansard by <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds.
<color=#E78300>2</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113901)>Snowy</material> Marks: Poseidon's Ice DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>30%</color>, and casting Zero Mansard shortens the remaining cd of Zero Mansard by <color=#E78300>7</color> seconds.

101139202.description:
Summons an icicle to pierce the locked-on enemy, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total and inflicting Freeze on enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds. Tap on the skill again a short time into the skill action to also cast Additional Chant.
Additional Chant: Generates a continuous ice blast around the enemies hit, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK. <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113902)>Icy</material> Mark is also granted.
Poseidon is granted certain effects depending on the number of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113902)>Icy</material> Marks expended to enter <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material> state:
<color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113902)>Icy</material> Mark: Hits landed on the enemy lower their Ice Res by <color=#E78300>1%</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds, up to <color=#E78300>20%</color> in total. Casting Matter Frozen shortens the remaining cd of Matter Frozen by <color=#E78300>4</color> seconds.
<color=#E78300>2</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113902)>Icy</material> Marks: Hits landed on the enemy lower their Ice Res by <color=#E78300>2%</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds, up to <color=#E78300>20%</color> in total. Casting Matter Frozen shortens the remaining cd of Matter Frozen by <color=#E78300>9</color> seconds.

101139203.description:
Casting Snow Echo after a Zero Mansard or Matter Frozen attack will repeat the previous skill attack and grant the corresponding <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113901)>Snowy</material> or <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113902)>Icy</material> Mark. Said casting will also come with the corresponding Additional Chant follow-up attack. When Poseidon has <color=#E78300>2</color> of either Mark, Snow Echo is replaced by Silver Frost.
Silver Frost: Expends all Marks for the corresponding effects when cast. Poseidon fires three silver frosts in the direction of the locked-on target, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK to enemies along the way. The cd of Zero Mansard and Matter Frozen is reset, and Poseidon enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material> state for <color=#E78300>8</color> seconds.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material>: When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material> state, Poseidon may not use Skill 3 and will not be granted any <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113901)>Snowy</material> or <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113902)>Icy</material> Marks, though a Zero Mansard or Matter Frozen attack will be followed up with the corresponding Additional Chant attack.

101139209.description:
Summons multiple icicles to attack the locked-on enemy, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Casting Frosty Starfall also shortens the remaining cd of either Skill 1 or Skill 2 for all members of the team if either <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113902)>Icy</material> or <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113901)>Snowy</material> Marks are active, and depending on the number of Marks active.
<color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113901)>Snowy</material> Mark: The remaining cd of Skill 1 is shortened by <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds for all members of the team.
<color=#E78300>2</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113901)>Snowy</material> Marks: The remaining cd of Skill 1 is shortened by <color=#E78300>7</color> seconds for all members of the team.
<color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113902)>Icy</material> Mark: The remaining cd of Skill 2 is shortened by <color=#E78300>4</color> seconds for all members of the team.
<color=#E78300>2</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113902)>Icy</material> Marks: The remaining cd of Skill 2 is shortened by <color=#E78300>9</color> seconds for all members of the team.

An <color=#E78300>8%</color> Ultimate Skill charge is also granted when Freeze is inflicted on the enemy. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds.

101139305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101148101.description: Zenkibo continuously fires at the enemies around her, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

101148201.description:
Zenkibo throws a Grenade that explodes after <color=#E78300>5</color> seconds or when it makes contact with the enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces: </color>Grants <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Traces with each skill hit.

101148202.description:
The Mod automatically locks on to the enemy and fires, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total at first. Then, the Mod fires at the enemy for two more rounds of five shots each, each round dealing in total Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK.

<color=#297DE0>Traces: </color>Grants <color=#E78300>{3}</color> Traces on every skill hit.

101148203.description:
Zenkibo's weapon changes into a sniper rifle, and Sniper Mode is turned on for up to <color=#E78300>10</color> seconds. Using a Dodge immediately ends the mode and send it into CD.
Sniper Mode: Mod cannot move or use other skills. Tap on the Skill to aim at the target, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK.

101148209.description:
Zenkibo's weapon changes into a sniper rifle, and a shot that penetrates enemies to the front in a straight line is fired, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Grants Zenkibo <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Traces and her Teammates <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace if the skill lands.

A <color=#E78300>15%</color> Ultimate Skill charge is granted when Zenkibo or her Teammates trigger Zero Time. Effect triggers once every <color=#E78300>0.5</color> seconds.

101148305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>4</color> seconds. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101150101.description:
Unleashes the ancient sword energy slumbering within Sakurakiri to deal Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
When in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115001)>Sakuya</material> state, deals Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> When not in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115001)>Sakuya</material> state, gains Divine Grace when Normal Attacks hit.

101150201.description:
The first move of the ancient technique inherited from Sakurakiri. Deals Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Kata 1: Halt: Can be used as a follow-up attack up to <color=#E78300>3</color> strikes, successively dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}, {3}, and {4}</color> of ATK in total. If only <color=#E78300>1</color> strike is launched, this skill's remaining CD is then shortened by <color=#E78300>6</color>s. If only <color=#E78300>2</color> strikes are launched, this skill's remaining CD is then shortened by <color=#E78300>3</color>s. When in possession of Divine Grace, gains <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115003)>Blossom</material> Mark each time a strike hits. This skill has a CD of <color=#E78300>10</color>s.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> When not in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115001)>Sakuya</material> state, gains <color=#E78300>5</color> Divine Grace upon each hit.

101150202.description:
The third move of the ancient technique inherited from Sakurakiri. The first phase deals Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total, and the second phase deals Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK.
Kata 3: Dance: Can be used as a follow-up attack up to <color=#E78300>3</color> strikes, successively dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}, {4}, and {5}</color> of ATK in total. If only <color=#E78300>1</color> strike is launched, this skill's remaining CD is shortened by <color=#E78300>6</color>s. If only <color=#E78300>2</color> strikes are launched, this skill's remaining CD is then shortened by <color=#E78300>3</color>s. When in possession of Divine Grace, gains <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115003)>Blossom</material> Mark each time a strike hits. This skill has a CD of <color=#E78300>10</color>s.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> When not in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115001)>Sakuya</material> state, gains <color=#E78300>5</color>Divine Grace upon each hit.

101150203.description:
Unleashes the full power of Sakurakiri. Only available when Divine Grace is full. Inflicts Sluggish on locked-on enemies, slowing their movement speed to <color=#E78300>50%</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total, and enters the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115001)>Sakuya</material> state.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115001)>Sakuya</material>: Replaces Kata 1: Crack, Kata 3: Lightning, and Kata 9: Somezakura with Kata 1: Halt, Kata 3: Dance, and Kata 9: Fallen Sakura, and resets the skill CD. During this state, expends <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace every <color=#E78300>0.15</color>s. This Divine Grace expenditure is not affected by any other attributes, and the Divine Grace gain rate is reduced by <color=#E78300>{5}</color>. Each time a Normal Attack, Kata 1: Halt, Kata 2: Disillusion, Kata 3: Dance, or Kata 9: Crimson Shadow hits, gains <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115002)>Ominous Blossom</material>, up to a maximum of <color=#E78300>100</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115002)>Ominous Blossoms</material>.
Kata 9: Crimson Shadow: When the Mod has <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115003)>Blossom</material> Marks, tapping on Normal Attack button will expend <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115003)>Blossom</material> Mark to launch a skill attack, rushing forward and dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.
Kata 9: Fallen Sakura: Delivers a slashing attack with unparalleled speed, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total. For every <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115002)>Ominous Blossom</material> owned, increases the Non-DoT Independent DMG by <color=#E78300>0.7%</color>. When owning less than <color=#E78300>100</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115002)>Ominous Blossoms</material>, inflicts Sluggish on locked-on enemies, slowing their movement speed to <color=#E78300>50%</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s. When the Mod owns <color=#E78300>100</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115002)>Ominous Blossoms</material>, enters Zero Time upon skill cast for <color=#E78300>3</color>s. The Non-DoT Crit Rate of the final strike of this skill attack increases by <color=#E78300>{7}</color>. When the Mod exits the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115001)>Sakuya</material> state, all Divine Grace, <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115003)>Blossom</material> Marks, and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115002)>Ominous Blossoms</material> are expended, then Kata 9: Somezakura enters CD.
Kata 2: Disillusion: Sheathes the sword and cuts through space with a slashing attack at ultimate speed, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{8}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> When not in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115001)>Sakuya</material> state, gains <color=#E78300>3</color> Divine Grace each time Kata 2: Disillusion lands a hit.

101150208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Somezakura - Buzenbo Tengu and Shinri - Tsukuyomi.
Deals Thunder DMG equal to Somezakura - Buzenbo Tengu's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). Increases the whole team's Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> and Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>{6}</color> for <color=#E78300>{7}</color>s when this skill is being cast. Also, increases the Non-DoT Armor Pierce of the next final-strike attack of Kata 9: Fallen Sakura by <color=#E78300>{8}</color>.
Deals Thunder DMG equal to Shinri - Tsukuyomi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). Increases the whole team's ATK by <color=#E78300>{9}</color> and Thunder DMG by <color=#E78300>{10}</color> for<color=#E78300>{11}</color>s when this skill is being cast. Resets the CD of Thunder: Out of the Blue and restores <color=#E78300>20</color> Rage. Within <color=#E78300>4</color>s after hitting, Thunder: Out of the Blue does not remove <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material> and triggers the next move. The remaining CD of the next Thunder: Out of the Blue is shortened by <color=#E78300>10</color>s.

101150209.description:
Unleashes countless slashing attacks in an instant, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Upon hitting, increases the Crit Rate of the whole team by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s.

Gains <color=#E78300>15%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate triggers Zero Time. Effect can only trigger once every <color=#E78300>0.5</color>s.

101150281.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Shinri - Tsukuyomi, Somezakura - Buzenbo Tengu, and Jin-ei - Kuninotokotachi.
Deals Thunder DMG equal to Shinri - Tsukuyomi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). Upon hitting, increases the whole team's ATK by <color=#E78300>{7}</color> and Thunder DMG by <color=#E78300>{8}</color> for <color=#E78300>{9}</color>s.
Deals Thunder DMG equal to Somezakura - Buzenbo Tengu's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). Upon hitting, increases the whole team's Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{10}</color> and Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{11}</color> for <color=#E78300>{12}</color>s.
Deals Thunder DMG equal to Jin-ei - Kuninotokotachi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{5} + {6}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her average Skill level</color>). Upon hitting, lowers the enemy's Physical, Fire, Thunder, and Wind RES by <color=#E78300>{13}</color> for <color=#E78300>{14}</color>s. Increases the whole team's Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>{15}</color> and Ultimate Skill charge speed by <color=#E78300>{16}</color> for <color=#E78300>{17}</color>s.

101150282.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Flower of Yomi - Izanami and Somezakura - Buzenbo Tengu.
Deals Ice DMG equal to Flower of Yomi - Izanami's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), while also increasing teammates' Ice DMG by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> and DMG dealt by Shinou Mods by <color=#E78300>{6}</color> for <color=#E78300>{7}</color>s.
Deals Thunder DMG equal to Somezakura - Buzenbo Tengu's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), while also increasing teammates' Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{8}</color> and Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{9}</color> for <color=#E78300>{10}</color>s.

101150305.description:
Swiftly dodges the enemy's attack. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect. Tapping on Normal Attack button within <color=#E78300>2</color>s of an Extremity Dodge unleashes Kata 2: Disillusion.
Dodge effect: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>2</color>s. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101158101.description:
Swings the katana to launch a 5-strike attack, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

Passive:
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115802)>Heartsear</material>: Increases the Mod's DMG dealt to Visbanes by <color=#E78300>5%, 15%, or 30%</color> according to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115802)>Heartsear's</material> level. Increases the Non-DoT Crit DMG of a follow-up Madoibi Flicker or Flashfire Execution attack by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>. Also, increases the skills' Base DMG by <color=#E78300>20%</color> respectively, and a further <color=#E78300>10%, 15%, or 20%</color> according to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115802)>Heartsear's</material> level for each <color=#E78300>1</color> hit landed on an enemy (Effect grants up to a <color=#E78300>50%</color> Skill Base DMG boost).

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when a normal attack hits.

101158201.description:
Sprints forward and slashes, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
In the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115801)>Smelt</material> state, this skill can be used as a follow-up attack to leap into the air and dashes forward with the katana, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total. (Up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times in a row according to the current <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115802)>Heartsear</material> level.) After the skill is cast, the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115802)>Heartsear</material> level will decrease as the extra follow-up attacks are launched.

101158202.description:
Enters the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115801)>Smelt</material> state.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115801)>Smelt</material>: Sheathes the katana and continuously deals DMG to self to charge up Madoibi. Once fully charged, clears the charge bar and levels up <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115802)>Heartsear</material>. While in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115801)>Smelt</material> state, deals DMG to self equal to <color=#E78300>2%</color> of Max HP every <color=#E78300>0.2</color>s. Gains <color=#E78300>3%, 4%, 5%, 5%</color> charge every <color=#E78300>0.1</color>s according to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115802)>Heartsear's</material> level. When in possession of Rage, spends <color=#E78300>9</color> Rage every <color=#E78300>0.1</color>s and gains an additional <color=#E78300>2%</color> charge.
As <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115802)>Heartsear's</material> level goes up, deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}, {2}, or {3}</color> of ATK respectively to nearby enemies.
After <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115802)>Heartsear's</material> level goes down, gains Rage <color=#E78300>{4}</color> faster for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s.

101158203.description: Can only use as a follow-up attack when in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115801)>Smelt</material> state. Instantly slashes multiples times in all directions, then finishes off with a fierce downward strike, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Once the skill ends, restores HP equal to <color=#E78300>100%, 140%, or 180%</color> of ATK to the Mod according to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115802)>Heartsear's</material> level. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115802)>Heartsear's</material> level then resets.

101158209.description:
Whirls the katana to create a sea of fire and enters the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115803)>Heartsear: Scourge</material> state, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115803)>Heartsear: Scourge</material>: Automatically charges up Madoibi, restoring <color=#E78300>2%</color> of the charge bar every <color=#E78300>0.1</color>s. When in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115801)>Smelt</material> state, this rate changes to <color=#E78300>3%</color> for <color=#E78300>8</color>s.

Grants <color=#E78300>4.5%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate loses HP. This effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

101158305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect. During Extremity Dodge, inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115804)>Kindle</material> on both the Mod himself and the attacker for <color=#E78300>5</color>s. Only 1 enemy on the field can be inflicted with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115804)>Kindle</material> at a time. Tapping Dodge during a Normal Attack or Madoibi Flicker will unleash Smoldering Heart instead. Casting Smoldering Heart in this way will not interrupt the Normal Attack strike count and has a short window to trigger Dodge.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115804)>Kindle</material>: Mod can block DMG from an enemy inflicted with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115804)>Kindle</material>. Defeating an enemy in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115804)>Kindle</material> state removes the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115804)>Kindle</material> state from the Mod.
Dodge effect: Charge rate increases by <color=#E78300>15%</color> for <color=#E78300>5</color>s. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101184101.description:
Uses her sword and shield to attack the target continuously, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> When the third shield strike of a normal attack results in a hit, <color=#E78300>5</color> Divine Grace is granted.

101184201.description:
Brandishes her shield and hurls it to her front, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Enemies hit by the flying shield take Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> <color=#E78300>Each</color> hit landed on the enemy with the flying shield grants <color=#E78300>10</color> Divine Grace.

101184202.description:
Hold down the button to raise the shield and deal Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total over <color=#E78300>3</color>s. A strike is unleashed when the hold is released or when the time is up, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK. Should Mod take a hit while the shield is raised, blocks any incoming DMG and also triggers a powerful counterattack which deals Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total. Also triggers Zero Time for <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace: </color> Grants <color=#E78300>15</color> Divine Grace upon a successful block.

101184203.description: Gathers all her power and leaps into the air, then smashes downwards, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total with all Divine Grace expended. Doing so grants her a Shield of value equal to <color=#E78300>5%</color> HP which lasts <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds. Every <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace expended also adds <color=#E78300>0.1%</color> HP to the shield..

101184208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Shinri - Tsukuyomi and Archaic Oath - Verthandi.
Deals Thunder DMG equal to Shinri - Tsukuyomi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and when a hit is landed on the enemy all members of the team are granted a <color=#E78300>{5}</color> Thunder DMG boost for <color=#E78300>{6}</color> seconds.
Also deals Thunder DMG equal to Archaic Oath - Verthandi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and a <color=#E78300>15%</color> Ultimate Skill charge is granted to all members of the team when she lands a hit.

101184209.description:
Slams into the locked-on enemy while holding her shield, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK. Along the way, she also deals to enemies in her path Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total. Skill cast grants all members of the team a <color=#E78300>15%</color> Ultimate Skill charge, and hitting the enemy grants Verthandi <color=#E78300>30</color> Divine Grace.

A <color=#E78300>15%</color> Ultimate Skill charge is granted when Verthandi or a Teammate triggers Zero Time; triggers only once every <color=#E78300>0.5</color> seconds.

101184305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks and can Dodge two consecutive times. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge effect: Entering Zero Time slows all enemy movements significantly for <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101197101.description:
Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Energy: </color>Grants <color=#E78300>2</color> Energy every second.

101197201.description:
Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Skill is also replaced by its derivative skill Deep Dream for <color=#E78300>3</color>s after use.
Deep Dream: Expends <color=#E78300>50</color> Energy and deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total, as well as additional Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>1%</color> ATK for every point in current Energy level.
Each use of this skill or its derivative skill grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119701)>Nightmare</material>. Up to <color=#E78300>2</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119701)>Nightmares</material> may be held at any one time.

101197202.description:
Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Skill is also replaced by its derivative skill Day Dream for <color=#E78300>3</color>s after use.
Day Dream: Expends <color=#E78300>50</color> Energy and deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total, as well as additional damage equal to <color=#E78300>1%</color> of ATK for every <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119702)>Sweet Dream</material> active.
Each use of this skill or its derivative skill grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119702)>Sweet Dream</material>. Up to <color=#E78300>2</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119702)>Sweet Dreams</material> may be held at any one time.

101197203.description:
Tap to trigger this skill, which deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Also expends all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119701)>Nightmares</material> available, then <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119702)>Sweet Dreams</material>. Effects vary depending on the number of Nightmares and Sweet Dreams expended.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119701)>Nightmare</material>: Expending Nightmares grants either <color=#E78300>6 or 12</color> Energy depending on the number of Nightmares expended.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119702)>Sweet Dream</material>: Expending Sweet Dreams grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119701)>Nightmares</material> which in turn provide <color=#E78300>1 or 3</color> ATK boosts. Every <color=#E78300>1</color> ATK boost increases ATK by <color=#E78300>1%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s. Boosts stack up to <color=#E78300>20</color> times.

101197208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Puppet Master - Hades and Dreamshade - Oneiroi.
Deals Shadow DMG equal to Puppet Master - Hades' ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>). During Skillchain action, Hades' Divine Grace level also returns to <color=#E78300>50</color> for <color=#E78300>12</color>s (effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>3</color>s). Skillchain use also increases the Crit Rate of all members of the team by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> and their Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{6}</color> for <color=#E78300>{7}</color>s.
Also deals Shadow DMG equal to Dreamshade - Oneiroi's ATK × (<color=#E78300>{3} + {4}</color> × <color=#297DE0>her Ultimate Skill level</color>), and Oneiroi also goes into <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material> state, or if she is in already in Ethereal Dream state, the state is refreshed.

101197209.description:
Triggers or refreshes the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material> state.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material>: Increases the Shadow DMG dealt by all members of the team by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. Expending Energy equal to max Energy when the Energy bar is full grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119704)>Dreamful Slumber</material> for <color=#E78300>7</color>s. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119704)>Dreamful Slumber</material> ends when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material> state is triggered or refreshed.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119704)>Dreamful Slumber</material>: Hits landed with a Shadow attack by any member of the team reduce the Shadow RES of the enemy hit by <color=#E78300>1%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>25</color> times. Hit also deals additional Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material> state, Lucid Dream from Gates of Horn is replaced by Moment of Waking, and Lucid Dream from Gates of Horn is automatically triggered every <color=#E78300>4</color>s instead.
Moment of Waking: Triggers <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119705)>Roused</material> and ends <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material> state. Also deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK in total.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119705)>Roused</material>: Deals to the locked-on target additional Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>20%</color> ATK for every Shadow attack hit landed by any member of the team during the current instance of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material>. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>150</color> times.

Grants a <color=#E78300>20%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when any member of the team uses their Ultimate Skill.

101197305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
Dodge: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds. Also grants <color=#E78300>2</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119701)>Nightmares</material> and <color=#E78300>2</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119702)>Sweet Dreams</material>. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

101199101.description:
Swings her katana at the enemy, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when a normal attack results in a hit.

101199201.description: Dashes forward and slashes at the enemy along the way, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Enemies hit get <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material>.

101199202.description: Uses double katanas to slash at the enemy to her front, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Enemies hit get <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material>.

101199203.description:
Uses Battoujutsu to slash at the enemies to her front, clearing the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material> from enemies that have the seal and enabling the next move of Thunder: Out of the Blue. There are a total of three moves in Thunder: Out of the Blue, and when the third move is used Rage is not expended, and neither is the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material> cleared from the enemy.
Thunder: Out of the Blue Move I: Deals Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Thunder: Out of the Blue Move II: Deals Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.
Thunder: Out of the Blue Move III: Tsukuyomi unleashes four lightning strikes, each of which deals Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK. The second and subsequent strikes that hit the same enemy deal progressively less DMG, and each enemy is dealt Thunder DMG up to <color=#E78300>2.8×{3}</color> ATK in total.

101199209.description:
Makes a dash for the locked-on enemy while slashing at them, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. All members of the team deal <color=#E78300>{2}</color> more Thunder DMG for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds after skill cast.

A <color=#E78300>15%</color> Ultimate Skill charge is granted when Tsukuyomi or a Teammate triggers Zero Time; triggers only once every <color=#E78300>0.5</color> seconds.

101199305.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge can be used two consecutive times, and triggers the Dodge effect. Tap on the Normal Attack button after Extremity Dodge to unleash a skill attack that deals Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Dodge: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds. The skill attack launched by tapping on the Normal Attack button inflicts the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material> on enemies hit. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

101284101.description:
Deals Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Normal attacks launched when not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128402)>Decision</material> state grant <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Dawn</material> upon each hit.

Passive:
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Dawn</material> may stack up to <color=#E78300>100</color> times.
The first, third, and fifth strikes of a normal attack launched when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128402)>Decision</material> state launches a Hand of Judgment attack that deals Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color>, <color=#E78300>{3}</color>, and <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK in turn.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace: </color>Grants Divine Grace each time a hit is landed with a normal attack.

101284201.description:
Deals Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. During skill action, this skill is replaced by Flash, and if Flash is not unleashed within a certain time it will then be replaced by Brilliance.
Flash: Deals Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.
Brilliance: Deals Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total and expends all available Divine Grace, which increases non-DoT Skill DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>0.3%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1</color> point of Divine Grace expended.
When not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128402)>Decision</material> state, hits landed with Flash of Brilliance grant <color=#E78300>9</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Dawn</material>, hits landed with Flash grant <color=#E78300>16</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Dawn</material>, and hits landed with Brilliance grant <color=#E78300>9</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Dawn</material>.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace: </color>Grants Divine Grace upon every hit landed with Flash of Brilliance or Flash.

101284202.description:
Deals Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. During skill action, this skill is replaced by Destiny, and if Destiny is not unleashed within a certain time it will be replaced by Choice instead.
Destiny: Deals Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.
Choice: Deals Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total and expends all available Divine Grace, which increases non-DoT Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>0.3%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1</color> point of Divine Grace expended.
When not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128402)>Decision</material> state, hits landed with Ripple of Fate grant <color=#E78300>10</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Dawn</material>, hits landed with Destiny grant <color=#E78300>16</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Dawn</material>, and hits landed with Choice grant <color=#E78300>10</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Dawn</material>.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace: </color>Grants Divine Grace upon every hit landed with Ripple of Fate or Destiny.

101284203.description:
May only be used when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Dawn</material> is at max. Deals Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total and enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128402)>Decision</material> state, and also resets the CD of Flash of Brilliance and Ripple of Fate.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128402)>Decision</material>: Automatically expends <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Dawn</material> every <color=#E78300>0.15</color>s and exits <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128402)>Decision</material> state when the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Dawn</material> count falls to <color=#E78300>0</color>. Use of Flash, Brilliance, Destiny or Choice when in Decision state triggers a new Hand of Judgment attack which deals Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color>, <color=#E78300>{3}</color>, <color=#E78300>{4}</color>, and <color=#E78300>{5}</color> ATK respectively.
When using Brilliance or Choice, Slash of Conviction is replaced by Slash of Glare, which may be followed up with Slash of Glare to deal Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{6}</color> ATK in total.

101284208.description:
The Ultimate Skillchain of Dimglare - Verthandi and Phantasmal Dawn - Hera.
Deals Light DMG equal to ATK × (<color=#E78300>{1} + {2}</color> × <color=#297DE0>Verthandi's Ultimate Skill level</color>), and hits landed increase the Light DMG dealt by all members of the team by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s as well as increase the Mod Index Multiplier for the current Ultimate Skill attack by <color=#E78300>{5}</color>.
Also increases the DMG dealt by all members of the team by (<color=#E78300>14% + 0.4%</color>) × <color=#297DE0>Hera's Ultimate Skill level </color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s, restores all combat resources all members of the team next expend within <color=#E78300>12</color>s, and increases Dimglare - Verthandi's Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{7}</color> for <color=#E78300>{8}</color>s.

101284209.description:
Deals Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Hits landed on the enemy increase the Light DMG dealt by all members of the team by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s as well as increase the Mod Index Multiplier for the current Ultimate Skill attack by <color=#E78300>{4}</color>.

Grants a <color=#E78300>15%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when any member of the team triggers Zero Time. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>0.5</color>s.

101284305.description:
Mobile dodge from the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect. Raises sword to block during a non-mobile dodge. Tap the normal attack button after a successful block to counterattack for Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Every time hits are landed with a counterattack, shortens the CD of Flash of Brilliance and Ripple of Fate by <color=#E78300>1</color>s, and every hit landed with a counterattack grants <color=#E78300>5</color> Divine Grace. Hits landed with a counterattack when the Dodge effect is not in CD also triggers said effect, following which the effect will go into CD.
Dodge effect: Enters Zero Time, dramatically slowing the movements of all enemies present for <color=#E78300>2</color>s. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

106087101.description: Stands firm and launches a large, slow-speed water grenade that generates AoE damage upon hitting an enemy. Consumes water.

106087201.description: Stands firm and fires a barrage of homing projectiles. Consumes water.

106087202.description: Launches a water bullet upon a successful Counter, targeting the source of the attack. Explodes upon hit and generates small water bullets. Recovers a large amount of water and Ultimate Skill Energy upon a successful Counter. Consumes water.

106087209.description: Charges up and fires a large, slow-speed water grenade that explodes upon hit and generates multiple small water grenades.

106088101.description: Uses a submachine gun to fire a barrage of water projectiles. Consumes water.

106088201.description: Summons a small recovery arcane circle a certain distance ahead that grants teammates within the circle a Recovery effect at regular intervals. Consumes water.

106088202.description: A Counter automatically generates a bullet attack. Recovers a large amount of water and Ultimate Skill Energy upon a successful Counter. Consumes water.

106088209.description: Adds a Recovery effect to the entire team after use and increases ATK for a certain duration. Jinwu enters an Enhanced state, launching additional small water grenades when attacking.

106089101.description: Uses a shotgun to deal AoE damage to enemies a short distance away. Also briefly grants the Mod a Shield. Consumes water.

106089201.description: Unleashes a whirlpool that continuously sucks in enemies. Consumes water.

106089202.description: Triggers Counters more easily than for other Mods. Generates AoE damage around the Mod after a successful Counter, and the Mod gains a Shield. Recovers a large amount of water and Ultimate Skill Energy upon a successful Counter. Consumes water.

106089209.description: Creates an iceberg in front of the Mod that deals AoE damage. Increases the DEF of the entire team for a limited time after use, during which water recovery is doubled for anyone on the team that pulls off a successful Counter or Dodge. Gives a Shield to all the allies.

106090101.description: Stands firm and fires penetrating rays from a mounted gun. Consumes water.

106090201.description: A puppet appears near Hades and deals AoE damage while Hades fires her mounted gun 1 time. Consumes water.

106090202.description: Launches penetrating rays upon a successful Counter, targeting the source of the attack and dealing a great amount of damage. Recovers a large amount of water and Ultimate Skill Energy upon a successful Counter. Consumes water.

106090209.description: Leaps up and snipes, dealing additional AoE damage.

106110101.description: Play on the fourth beat to complete the measure.

106110201.description: Play Note: White Flash at the right time to defeat the gold note monster, damaging it on the corresponding beat. Perfect timing will deal critical DMG. When a measure contains two or more Notes: White Flash, the next Note: White Flash will be Perfectly Harmonious, chasing on the fourth beat.

106110202.description: Play Note: Snowflake at the right time to defeat the red note monster, damaging it on the corresponding beat. Perfect timing will deal critical DMG. When a measure contains two or more Notes: Snowflake, the next Note: Snowflake will be Perfectly Harmonious, chasing on the fourth beat.

106110203.description: Play Note: Bonechill at the right time to defeat the blue note monster, damaging it on the corresponding beat. Perfect timing will deal critical DMG. When a measure contains two or more Notes: Bonechill, the next Note: Bonechill will be Perfectly Harmonious, chasing on the fourth beat.

106110209.description: After playing the note, Izanami will gain energy. She loses energy if you play a wrong note. When her energy is full, she enters Relationship Echo mode. With each followup strike, <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> attacks along with Izanami.

109049201.description: Begins to roll a big snowball. If you're already rolling a snowball when using this skill, the snowball will be released immediately.

109049202.description: Begins to roll a snowball. When you release this snowball, you'll also release an extra two snowballs of the same size. If you're already rolling a snowball when using this skill, three snowballs will be released immediately.

109049203.description: Enters a big snowball and crushes your way around. When this skill ends, the big snowball is split into four big snowballs.

109049204.description: Big Snowman Skill 1: Summons a blizzard at a random location on the battlefield, dealing continuous DMG to all enemies within range.

109049205.description: Big Snowman Skill 2: Creates an ice shield, reducing DMG taken by 50%.

109049206.description: Big Snowman Skill 3: Creates snowballs that gradually collide and explode, dealing DMG and inflicting Knockback effect to enemies.

109055201.description: Begins to roll a big snowball. If you're already rolling a snowball when using this skill, the snowball will be released immediately.

109055202.description: Begins to roll a snowball. When you release this snowball, you'll also release an extra two snowballs of the same size. If you're already rolling a snowball when using this skill, three snowballs will be released immediately.

109055203.description: Enters a big snowball and crushes your way around. When this skill ends, the big snowball is split into four big snowballs.

109055204.description: Big Snowman Skill 1: Summons a blizzard at a random location on the battlefield, dealing continuous DMG to all enemies within range.

109055205.description: Big Snowman Skill 2: Creates an ice shield, reducing DMG taken by 50%.

109055206.description: Big Snowman Skill 3: Creates snowballs that gradually collide and explode, dealing DMG and inflicting Knockback effect to enemies.

109060201.description: Begins to roll a big snowball. If you're already rolling a snowball when using this skill, the snowball will be released immediately.

109060202.description: Begins to roll a snowball. When you release this snowball, you'll also release an extra two snowballs of the same size. If you're already rolling a snowball when using this skill, three snowballs will be released immediately.

109060203.description: Enters a big snowball and crushes your way around. When this skill ends, the big snowball is split into four big snowballs.

109060204.description: Big Snowman Skill 1: Summons a blizzard at a random location on the battlefield, dealing continuous DMG to all enemies within range.

109060205.description: Big Snowman Skill 2: Creates an ice shield, reducing DMG taken by 50%.

109060206.description: Big Snowman Skill 3: Creates snowballs that gradually collide and explode, dealing DMG and inflicting Knockback effect to enemies.

109061201.description: Begins to roll a big snowball. If you're already rolling a snowball when using this skill, the snowball will be released immediately.

109061202.description: Begins to roll a snowball. When you release this snowball, you'll also release an extra two snowballs of the same size. If you're already rolling a snowball when using this skill, three snowballs will be released immediately.

109061203.description: Enters a big snowball and crushes your way around. When this skill ends, the big snowball is split into four big snowballs.

109061204.description: Big Snowman Skill 1: Summons a blizzard at a random location on the battlefield, dealing continuous DMG to all enemies within range.

109061205.description: Big Snowman Skill 2: Creates an ice shield, reducing DMG taken by 50%.

109061206.description: Big Snowman Skill 3: Creates snowballs that gradually collide and explode, dealing DMG and inflicting Knockback effect to enemies.

110110011.description: Styx Ripples can be charged <color=#E78300>2</color> times.

110110012.description:
Existing HP level reduces to <color=#E78300>50%</color> When entering the battle.
When her HP falls below <color=#E78300>50%</color>, she recovers HP once every <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds at the rate of <color=#E78300>0.4%</color> HP for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> below <color=#E78300>50%</color>.

110110013.description:
Following up with Forbidden Blade after the first or second strike of a normal attack changes the way an attack takes place with Forbidden Blade.
Forbidden Blade: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK (<color=#E78300>+{2}</color> for every level Skill 1 is upgraded) in total. The lower Osiris' HP is, the higher the Non-DoT DMG for Forbidden Blade, capped at <color=#E78300>150%</color>.

110110021.description: The CD of Judgment Scythe shortens by <color=#E78300>11</color> seconds.

110110022.description: When a hit is landed with Judgment Scythe, Osiris recovers <color=#E78300>{1}</color> HP. Effect may trigger once per skill cast.

110110023.description:
Following up with Forbidden Blade after the third or four strike of a normal attack changes the way the attack takes place for Forbidden Blade.
Forbidden Blade: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK (<color=#E78300>+{2}</color> for every level Skill 1 is upgraded) in total. Forbidden Blade gathers enemies within a small range and also grants <color=#E78300>{3}</color> additional Traces.

110110031.description: The Mod Index Multiplier of Forbidden Blade is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.
