110110032.description: When Osiris is in Modified Mode, the higher the enemy's HP, the higher the Physical DMG bonus granted until Osiris exits Modified Mode. The effect DMG bonus is capped at <color=#E78300>80%</color>.

110110033.description:
Following up Scythe-erang with Forbidden Blade changes the way the attack takes place with Forbidden Blade.
Forbidden Blade: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK (<color=#E78300>+{2}</color> for every level Skill 1 is upgraded) in total and enemy hits lowers their Physical Res by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds.

110130011.description: Grants <color=#E78300>{1}</color> Energy each time Asura enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state.

110130012.description: When Asura is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state, <color=#E78300>{1}</color> Energy is granted for every <color=#E78300>3</color> enemy hits landed with a normal attack.

110130013.description: When casting Fire Warp, based on <color=#E78300>50%</color> of Asura's current Energy, for every <color=#E78300>1</color> Energy owned, gains <color=#E78300>1</color> stack of Skill DMG boost by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>100</color> times and expends <color=#E78300>50%</color> of Asura's current Energy.

110130021.description: After Asura lands a crit with Fury of Asura, her Crit Rate is increased: for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> Fire DMG she has, her Crit Rate is increased by <color=#E78300>0.6%</color> for <color=#E78300>5</color> seconds.

110130022.description: Imprisoned lowers the Crit RES of enemies hit by <color=#E78300>0.3%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> Crit Rate the Mod has. Effect lasts <color=#E78300>4</color> seconds.

110130023.description: After Asura lands a crit, her Crit DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>5</color> times. The Crit DMG boost from the Battlefield of Asura: Deva Learning is increased by <color=#E78300>100%</color> when unleashing Non-DoT Earth Shatter effects.

110130031.description: The Fire DMG boost from <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state is increased to <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110130032.description: When Asura is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state, then enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state a second time, the duration of the second instance of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> is extended by <color=#E78300>4</color> seconds.

110130033.description: When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state is extended, the Mod's Fire DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>45%</color>. Stacks up to <color=#E78300>2</color> times.

110150011.description: Lioness Sawblade and Sawblade Dance inflict Armor Break on enemies hit, lowering their DEF by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

110150013.description:
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101502)>Potential Unleashed</material> is no longer granted to the whole team. Instead, the target changes to the Physical Mod on the team with the highest ATK, and the effect also changes:
Physical DMG increases by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.
Crit DMG increases by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s.

110150021.description: Increases the Mod's ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s when Lioness Pursuit hits.

110150022.description: Each time a Tear & Devour strike hits, increases the Mod's Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>6</color> times.

110150023.description:
Shortens the CD of Sawblade Rumble by <color=#E78300>3</color>s.
After Lioness Pursuit hits, Lioness Pursuit and Sawblade Rumble will no longer be replaced with Lioness Sawblade and Sawblade Dance.
When enemies are at close range to the Mod's front, the attack mode of Lioness Pursuit will change when in use, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK (<color=#E78300>+{2}</color> for every level Skill 1 is upgraded) in total. Also, briefly gains Super Armor and the ability to block incoming damage during cast, and restores Divine Grace to full when damage is blocked successfully. When Lioness Pursuit successfully blocks damage, this skill's remaining CD is shortened by <color=#E78300>50%</color> and the CD of Tear & Devour is reset.
When casting Sawblade Rumble or Tear & Devour, you can tap again to unleash the last strike of Sawblade Rumble and interrupt the attack movements, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK (<color=#E78300>+{4}</color> for every level Skill 2 is upgraded) in total. Also, briefly gains Super Armor and the ability to block incoming damage during the last strike. Resets the CD of Lioness Pursuit upon successfully blocking DMG.
Tear & Devour can interrupt the continuous attack movements of Sawblade Rumble.
Increases the Non-DoT Crit DMG of Foe Shredder by <color=#E78300>{5}</color>. Instead of 3 sawtooth waves, a spinning sawblade will be lauched when casting Foe Shredder, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{6}</color> of ATK (<color=#E78300>+{7}</color> for every level Skill 3 is upgraded) in total.

110150031.description: Increases the Non-DoT Skill DMG of Lioness Sawblade and Sawblade Dance by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110150032.description: Shortens the CD of Lioness Pursuit by <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

110150033.description:
Lioness Pursuit inflicts Armor Break on enemies hit, lowering their DEF by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.
Sawblade Rumble gathers nearby enemies when being cast.

110160011.description: Increases the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101601)>Pressure Tank</material> Mark limit by <color=#E78300>2</color>.

110160012.description: Explosive Slash can be cast as a follow-on attack to any strike of the normal attack.

110160013.description: The first strike of Explosive Slash grants Super Armor for a short period of time and can block damage from the enemy. A successful block will increase Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> and Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s.

110160021.description: Enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101603)>Chainsaw Overdrive Mode</material> when Spinning Slash is cast. A <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101603)>Chainsaw Overdrive Mode</material> triggered in this way lasts up to <color=#E78300>7</color>s.

110160022.description: Attacks dealt when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101603)>Chainsaw Overdrive Mode</material> also grant Divine Grace.

110160023.description: Reduces the Physical RES of enemies hit by a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101603)>Chainsaw Overdrive Mode</material> attack by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

110160031.description: When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101601)>Pressure Tank</material> Marks are expended by casting Spinning Slash, every <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101601)>Pressure Tank</material> Mark expended grants <color=#E78300>25</color> Divine Grace.

110160032.description: When landing a hit with Assault Tactic in Chainsaw Mode, Siege Tactic in Chainsaw Mode, or a hold attack of Elimination Tactic, enemies will be inflicted with Armor Break and their DEF will be reduced by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. The Armor Break state will reduce their DEF by another <color=#E78300>2.5%</color> for every <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101601)>Pressure Tank</material> Mark owned. Effect lasts <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

110160033.description: When Divine Grace is expended for either Assault Tactic or Siege Tactic's Chainsaw Mode, increases the Non-DoT Skill DMG of the last strike of this attack. Every <color=#E78300>25</color> Divine Grace expended increases Non-DoT Skill DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>, up to <color=#E78300>120%</color> in total.

110170011.description: Increases Goddess's Execution's Base DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>. Casting Bastet's Caprice also inflicts the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101702)>Moontrail Mark</material> on the locked-on enemy for <color=#E78300>9</color>s (no more than 1 enemy on the field can have the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101702)>Moontrail Mark</material> at a time). Increases the Mod's Non-DoT DMG dealt to an enemy with the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101702)>Moontrail Mark</material> by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110170012.description: Teleports the Mod to launch an attack from behind when casting Night Hunter on a locked-on enemy with a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101702)>Moontrail Mark</material>. When either Crescent Rush or Night Hunter hits an enemy with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101702)>Moontrail Mark</material>, Bastet's Caprice will be temporarily replaced with Goddess's Execution for a short period of time until Goddess's Execution is cast or until the Mod exits the next <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101701)>Divine Gaze</material> state.

110170013.description: Restores Traces to full when an enemy is defeated with Goddess's Execution. Also resets its skill CD.

110170021.description: Shortens the Dodge effect CD by <color=#E78300>5</color>s.

110170022.description: Grants <color=#E78300>1</color> stack of Crit DMG boost for <color=#E78300>each</color> skill hit or normal attack hit, with each stack increasing the Mod's Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>9</color> times. Loses all stacks and Traces when attacked by the enemy.

110170023.description: Casting Bastet's Caprice no longer expends <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace but restores <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace instead. When a skill hits after Extremity Dodge is triggered, if there are Traces active, <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace will be expended to reset the Dodge effect CD.

110170031.description: Shortens the CD of Bastet's Caprice by <color=#E78300>1</color>s.

110170032.description: Increases the Trace limit by <color=#E78300>1</color>. The Mod no longer enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101701)>Divine Gaze</material> state when the last strike of the normal attack hits. Instead, gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace.

110170033.description:
Casting Bastet's Caprice will expend all Traces and reset the CD of other skills of the Mod. Also triggers <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101701)>Divine Gaze</material> state where skill damage and skill effects are enhanced depending on the number of Traces expended: For every <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace expended, increases the Non-DoT skill damage of Crescent Rush, Night Hunter, and Goddess's Execution by <color=#E78300>5%</color>.
Crescent Rush: For every <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace expended, reduces the Shadow RES of the locked-on enemy hit by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.
Night Hunter: Inflicts Stun on the enemy for <color=#E78300>2, 3, or 4</color>s, depending on the number of Traces expended.

110190011.description: The Base DMG of Breach is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110190012.description: Trace limit is increased by <color=#E78300>3</color>. When a hit is landed using Breach, all Traces active at the time of casting are expended, and for <color=#E78300>every</color> Trace expended the Base DMG of the skill is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110190013.description: Triggering Dodge grants the Mod <color=#E78300>{1}</color> Traces.

110190021.description: The hurricane summoned with Surging Wind also drags at enemies along the way.

110190022.description: The Base DMG of Surging Wind is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>, and the attack radius of the hurricane summoned is increased by <color=#E78300>60%</color>. The hurricane also travels <color=#E78300>12%</color> further.

110190023.description: Hits landed with Breach reset the cd of Surging Wind. When Shu casts Surging Wind with Traces active, the Wind Resistance of any enemies hit is also lowered by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

110190031.description: When a Crit is landed using <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101901)>Sacred Gale Crystals</material>, the cd of Dodge is reset and <color=#E78300>{1}</color> Dodge Energy is granted. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>3.5</color> seconds.

110190032.description: A <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101901)>Sacred Gale Crystal</material> is summoned to the locked-on enemy when dodging, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK. When Dodge is triggered by Shu, another <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101901)>Sacred Gale Crystal</material> is also summoned.

110190033.description: <color=#E78300>Every</color> time a hit is landed on the enemy with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101901)>Sacred Gale Crystals</material>, the Non-DoT DMG of the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101901)>Sacred Gale Crystals</material> is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>5</color> seconds. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>5</color> times.

110200011.description: Increases the DMG dealt to normal enemies by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110210011.description:
Grants teammates <color=#E78300>1</color> stack of Skill DMG buff, plus <color=#E78300>1</color> stack for every <color=#E78300>25%</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102101)>Luminous Echo</material> the Mod has, up to <color=#E78300>5</color> stacks. <color=#E78300>Every</color> stack increases Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.
When the Mod clears <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102103)>Harmonizing Chord</material> stacks, <color=#E78300>every</color> stack cleared reduces enemy Physical RES by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>, up to <color=#E78300>4</color> stacks.

110210012.description: This Mod attacks when the Team Leader's attack hits, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> (<color=#E78300>+{2}</color> for every level the normal attack is upgraded) of ATK. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>2</color>s. After the <color=#E78300>fourth</color> time this effect is triggered, the next attack changes to deal Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> (<color=#E78300>+{4}</color> for every level the normal attack is upgraded) of ATK.

110210013.description:
While in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102102)>Dawnlight</material> state:
Maintains <color=#E78300>5</color> stacks of the Skill DMG buff from the Aether Code Wilderness Hunter - Hunter's Woods.
Maintains <color=#E78300>4</color>stacks of the Physical RES debuff from the Aether Code Wilderness Hunter - Hunter's Woods and inflicts the effect on all enemies on the battlefield.
Only the altered form of the triggered attack from Wilderness Hunter - Nighthunt will be used.

110210021.description:
Prevents skill casting and changes the Ultimate Skill to enter the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102104)>Sonata</material> state after the Ultimate Skill or an Ultimate Skillchain is cast.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102104)>Sonata</material>: Grants Super Armor, decreasing DMG taken by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> and preventing the enemy from selecting the Mod as a target. Restores <color=#E78300>3%</color> of teammates' Ultimate Skill charge every <color=#E78300>3</color>s.

110210022.description:
Restores 100% <color=#E78300>Ultimate Skill charge</color> when the Mod enters the battlefield. Restores <color=#E78300>5%</color> extra Ultimate Skill charge for <color=#E78300>every</color> level the Ultimate Skill is upgraded.
Restores <color=#E78300>100%</color> Ultimate Skill charge upon exiting the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102104)>Sonata</material> state. Restores <color=#E78300>5%</color> extra Ultimate Skill charge for <color=#E78300>every</color> Ultimate Skill level.

110210023.description:
Grants the following effects in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102104)>Sonata</material> state:
Increases teammates' ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. For every <color=#E78300>50</color> the Mod's ATK is over <color=#E78300>6,000</color>, grants teammates an extra <color=#E78300>1%</color> ATK, up to a max of <color=#E78300>30%</color>.
Increases teammates' Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>.
Increases teammates' Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>{3}</color>.

110210031.description:
When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102103)>Harmonizing Chord</material> is cleared, reduces Daybreak Quartet's CD by <color=#E78300>1</color>s for <color=#E78300>every</color> stack cleared.
When the Mod clears stacks of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102103)>Harmonizing Chord</material> by casting Dawn Finale, deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> (<color=#E78300>+{2}</color> for every level Skill 2 is upgraded), <color=#E78300>{3}</color> (<color=#E78300>+{4}</color> for every level Skill 2 is upgraded), <color=#E78300>{5}</color> (<color=#E78300>+{6}</color> for every level Skill 2 is upgraded), or <color=#E78300>{7}</color> (<color=#E78300>+{8}</color> for every level Skill 2 is upgraded) of ATK respectively, depending on how many stacks are cleared from the locked-on enemy.
When the Mod clears stacks of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102103)>Harmonizing Chord</material> by casting Sunrise Rhapsody, deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{9}</color> (<color=#E78300>+{10}</color> for every level Skill 3 is upgraded), <color=#E78300>{11}</color> (<color=#E78300>+{12}</color> for every level Skill 3 is upgraded), <color=#E78300>{13}</color> (<color=#E78300>+{14}</color> for every level Skill 3 is upgraded), or <color=#E78300>{15}</color> (<color=#E78300>+{16}</color> for every level Skill 3 is upgraded) of ATK respectively, depending on how many stacks are cleared from the locked-on enemy.

110210032.description:
Daybreak Quartet no longer expends Rage, rather granting <color=#E78300>3, 5, 7, and 10</color> Rage in order.
Dawn Finale and Sunrise Rhapsody now expend <color=#E78300>40</color> Rage and increase Non-DoT Base DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110210033.description:
When in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102102)>Dawnlight</material> state, increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> and Melee DMG by <color=#E78300>{10}</color> if the Mod has <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102101)>Luminous Echo</material>.
When in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102102)>Dawnlight</material> state, the first four strikes of the special normal attack also inflict <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102103)>Harmonizing Chord</material> on the locked-on enemy. When the final attack of the normal attack's final strike hits an enemy with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102102)>Harmonizing Chord</material> while the Mod is in this state, clears all stacks of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102103)>Harmonizing Chord</material> and deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> (<color=#E78300>+{3}</color> for every level the normal attack is upgraded), <color=#E78300>{4}</color> (<color=#E78300>+{5}</color> for every level the normal attack is upgraded), <color=#E78300>{6}</color> (<color=#E78300>+{7}</color> for every level the normal attack is upgraded), or <color=#E78300>{8}</color> (<color=#E78300>+{9}</color> for every level the normal attack is upgraded) of ATK respectively, depending on how many stacks are cleared from the locked-on enemy.

110220011.description:
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102202)>Full Moon</material>, expends <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material> every <color=#E78300>0.09</color>s instead.
After <color=#E78300>5</color>s in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102207)>Veil Over The Full Moon</material> state, grants <color=#E78300>1</color> ATK buff every <color=#E78300>1</color>s. Every stack of this buff increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>, up to <color=#E78300>5</color> stacks. Buff is cleared immediately once <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102207)>Veil Over The Full Moon</material> ends.

110220012.description: Grants <color=#E78300>20</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material> when entering <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102202)>Full Moon</material> and the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102207)>Veil Over The Full Moon</material> state or switching from the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102207)>Veil Over The Full Moon</material> state to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102201)>New Moon</material>.

110220013.description:
Lunar Cycle no longer requires <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material> to cast, but its CD is changed to <color=#E78300>20</color>s.
In the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102207)>Veil Over The Full Moon</material> state, hitting an enemy with Full Moon's Shadow or Full Moon Aglow grants <color=#E78300>20</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material>. Grants <color=#E78300>20</color> extra <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material> if more than <color=#E78300>50</color> Divine Grace is expended when casting Full Moon's Shadow: Elegy and Full Moon Aglow: Elegy.

110220021.description: <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102208)>New Moon Splendor</material> also inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102210)>Lunar Eclipse</material> on up to <color=#E78300>3</color> enemies in range. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102209)>Full Moon Brilliant</material> will also continuously taunt normal and elite enemies in range.

110220022.description: Reduces the Shadow RES of enemies inflicted with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102210)>Lunar Eclipse</material> by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110220023.description:
The <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102207)>Veil Over The Full Moon</material> state also affects the teammate with the highest ATK.
Grants <color=#E78300>20</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102207)>Moonphase</material> if less than <color=#E78300>50</color> Divine Grace is expended when casting Full Moon's Shadow: Elegy and Full Moon Aglow: Elegy in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Veil Over The Full Moon</material> state.
Grants <color=#E78300>40</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102201)>Moonphase</material> when switching to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>New Moon</material>.

110220031.description: Grants the following bonus effect when casting Full Moon's Shadow and Full Moon Aglow in turn: Increases Independent DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> when in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102207)>Veil Over The Full Moon</material> state. This bonus is cleared if Full Moon's Shadow or Full Moon Aglow is cast successively.

110220032.description: When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102210)>Lunar Eclipse</material> is only inflicted on <color=#E78300>1</color> enemy, also inflicts Armor Break on that enemy, reducing their DEF by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110220033.description:
Grants the following effects in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102202)>Full Moon</material>:
Expends <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material> every <color=#E78300>0.29</color>s instead.
Reduces skill CD by <color=#E78300>3</color>s on the normal attack's fifth strike.
Full Moon's Shadow: Elegy and Full Moon Aglow: Elegy instead deal extra Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> (<color=#E78300>+{2}</color> for every level the corresponding is upgraded) of ATK.
When casting Full Moon's Shadow: Elegy expends over <color=#E78300>50</color> Divine Grace, resets Full Moon Aglow: Harmony's CD.
When casting Full Moon Aglow: Elegy expends over <color=#E78300>50</color> Divine Grace, resets Full Moon's Shadow: Harmony's CD.
When the Dodge effect is off cooldown, expending over <color=#E78300>50</color> Divine Grace when casting Full Moon's Shadow: Elegy or Full Moon Aglow: Elegy triggers the Dodge effect, after which the Dodge effect will go into cooldown.

110240011.description: Gains a <color=#E78300>2.5%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when Jackal's Gaze hits.

110240012.description: Shortens Jackal Charge's remaining CD by <color=#E78300>3</color>s when Jackal Charge's joint attack hits. Also shortens Jackal Whirl's remaining CD by <color=#E78300>3</color>s when Jackal Whirl's joint attack hits.

110240013.description: When there is a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> on the field and Jackal Charge/Jackal Whirl is in CD, tap the skill directly to launch a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit's</material> joint attack on the enemy locked on by it. Effect can trigger once during each CD of Jackal Charge/Jackal Whirl.

110240021.description: When the last strike of the normal attack hits, the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> will launch a joint attack of Jackal Charge.

110240022.description: Inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102402)>Guilty</material> on the enemy hit by Jackal Charge, which causes an explosion every <color=#E78300>2</color>s, dealing to surrounding enemies Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK each time. Effect lasts <color=#E78300>10</color>s (up to 1 <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102402)>Guilty</material> enemy may be present on the field at a time).

110240023.description: Increases the Non-DoT DMG dealt by both the Mod and the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102402)>Guilty</material> enemies. Causes 1 more explosion each time a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102402)>Guilty</material> enemy is hit. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>1</color>s.

110240031.description: Gains <color=#E78300>5</color> Rage every time a hit is landed with each strike of the joint attack of Jackal Rush, Jackal Charge, and Jackal Whirl.

110240032.description: The <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> will automatically seek its next target when the locked-on enemy is defeated, and will only vanish when there are no more targets to be found during its presence. The <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit's</material> presence on the field is extended by <color=#E78300>30</color>s.

110240033.description: Slows Ultimate Skill charge speed by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. Increases Non-DoT Shadow DMG dealt by the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit's</material> joint attacks by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>.

110260011.description: Max Divine Grace is raised to <color=#E78300>40</color>.

110260013.description: Power Flame can be cast continuously with the expenditure of Divine Grace by holding down on the button. Each time Divine Grace is expended, non-DoT DMG from subsequent strikes is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110260021.description: When either Bullet Hail or Ground Blast are cast at full charge, the remaining cd of the corresponding skill is shortened by <color=#E78300>20%</color>.

110260022.description: When Bullet Hail or Ground Blast is in cooldown, <color=#E78300>30</color> Divine Grace can be expended to force-cast either Bullet Hail or Ground Blast at full charge. Nuadha's weapon overheats after such casting, and can be reloaded by tapping on the Normal Attack button.

110260023.description: When either Bullet Hail or Ground Blast is force-cast, the enemies surrounding Nuadha take Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK. Also restores to Nuadha HP equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of his ATK.

110260031.description: Scorch deals <color=#E78300>80%</color> more DMG to AGI Mechas.

110260032.description: When enemies with Scorch are hit with Bullet Hail, they instantly take the remainder of the full DMG from the Scorch effect.

110260033.description: The CD of Ground Blast is reset when an AGI Mecha is defeated.

110270011.description: When an enemy is afflicted with Freeze, Leviathan deals to them an additional Ice DMG equal to<color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK.

110270012.description: When the last strike of the normal attack results in a hit, <color=#E78300>{1}</color> Traces are granted.

110270013.description: When the second move of Careless Barge results in a hit, the enemy's Control Resistance is completely removed.

110270021.description: Shortens the Dodge effect CD by <color=#E78300>5</color>s.

110270022.description: When Leviathan is not in Stagger, her ATK is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. Stagger removes said effect, and Leviathan enters Stagger state after an Extremity Dodge.

110270023.description: When Dodge effect is triggered by Leviathan, the CD of Ice Arc is reset.

110270031.description: When either a skill or the Ultimate Skill crits, her ATK is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

110270032.description: The non-DoT Crit Rate of a fully charged Ice Arc attack is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110270033.description: When Leviathan successfully inflicts Freeze on an enemy, her Crit DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

110280011.description: Shortens the remaining CD of Trembles Deep Within by <color=#E78300>1</color>s when a hit is landed with the fourth strike of a normal attack. A hit landed with the fourth strike of a normal attack also triggers a thunderbolt that deals Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK.

110280012.description: Enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102802)>Thunder Frenzy</material> state for <color=#E78300>1.5</color>s when a hit is landed with the fourth strike of a normal attack. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102802)>Thunder Frenzy</material> state triggered with this Aether Code cannot be extended through any other effect.

110280013.description: Increases the Non-DoT DMG of normal attacks by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. A hit landed with the fifth strike of a normal attack triggers five thunderbolts, with each dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK.

110280021.description: Reduces DMG taken by <color=#E78300>0.3%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> point owned. Effect maxes out when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> is at <color=#E78300>80</color>. Damage reduction effect will be boosted by <color=#E78300>200%</color> if Mod is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102802)>Thunder Frenzy</material> state.

110280022.description: Reduces the Thunder RES of surrounding enemies by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s each time when the Mod enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102802)>Thunder Frenzy</material> state.

110280023.description: Extends the duration of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102802)>Thunder Frenzy</material> by <color=#E78300>0.5</color>s. Also increases Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102802)>Thunder Frenzy</material> state.

110280031.description: Increases the Non-DoT Skill DMG of Quivers Underground, Rumbles Faraway, and Trembles Deep Within (derivative skills not included) by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110280032.description: When a skill is replaced by its derivative skill that has not been cast, the remaining CD of the corresponding skill will be shortened by <color=#E78300>2</color>s afterwards.

110280033.description: Following up Quivers Underground, Rumbles Faraway, or Trembles Deep Within with a normal attack also starts the normal attack from the fourth strike. When a hit is landed with the fifth strike of it, the Mod's ATK will be increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

110320011.description: When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103201)>King</material> that corresponds to the Sword of Rook is on the field, casting Gambit also inflicts Stun on enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

110320012.description: When <color=#E78300>3</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103202)>King Marks</material> are expended in the casting of Pincer Attack, Tyr's Non-DoT Crit Rate for the attack is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110320013.description: When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103201)>King</material> that corresponds to the Sword of Knight or the Sword of Queen is on the field, casting Promotion also triggers the last strike of Gambit, though Traces are not expended for said strike. However, the Base DMG of this strike is lowered by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110320022.description: Unleashing the final strike of Gambit shortens the remaining cd of the Dodge effect by <color=#E78300>7</color> seconds.

110320023.description: If the King remains on the field after casting the following attacks of Gambit, its duration is refreshed and the following attacks of Gambit can be cast again.

110320031.description: When the first strike of Gambit results in a hit, the Light Resistance of the enemy hit is lowered by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

110320032.description: When there is a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103201)>King</material> on the field, all members of the team are granted a <color=#E78300>{1}</color> DEF boost.

110320033.description: When Dodge is triggered by Tyr, the enemies around him are gathered around the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103201)>King</material> and then dealt Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

110330011.description: Increases additional ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s when the last strike of Within Reason hits. This effect is shared with teammates who were within the most recently generated <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Realm of Truth</material>.

110330012.description: Increases the Apocalypse: Skywatcher's bonus effect by <color=#E78300>50%</color> and extends effect duration by <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

110330013.description: Increases the Crit Rate of teammates within the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Realm of Truth</material> by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s when Lightrealm Ultimate's sharing effect is triggered. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times.

110330021.description: Extends the duration of Leapfrog Advance by <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

110330022.description: Generates an additional strike from the center zone of Within Reason, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Reduces the Light RES of enemies hit by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s; stacks up to <color=#E78300>2</color> times. Also increases the Non-DoT DMG dealt by the additional strike by <color=#E78300>30%</color> if the effects of Leapfrog Advance are also active at the time.

110330023.description: Summons 2 additional Circles of Reason against the enemy when casting Within Reason while the effects of Leapfrog Advance are active. Shortens Leapfrog Advance's remaining CD by <color=#E78300>2</color>s when the additional strike granted by the Aether Code: Above All - Last Domino hits.

110330031.description: Shortens Final Warning's CD by <color=#E78300>3</color>s. Grants <color=#E78300>{1}</color> Energy every <color=#E78300>2</color>s when Final Warning is in CD. This effect is shared with teammates who were within the most recently generated <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Realm of Truth</material>.

110330032.description: After casting Lightrealm Ultimate, summons an extra Wheel of Admonishment of Final Warning on a random enemy within the most recently generated <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Realm of Truth</material> every <color=#E78300>5</color>s.

110330033.description: Reduces Final Warning's DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> and launches 2 more attacks instead. Final Warning's DMG boost can now stack up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times. Gains a <color=#E78300>7%</color> Ultimate Skill charge each time the sharing effect is triggered by the Mod. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

110350012.description: When a normal attack results in a hit on a normal enemy with less than <color=#E78300>25%</color> HP, there is a <color=#E78300>25%</color> chance of said enemy being defeated instantly.

110350013.description: When Sobek defeats a normal enemy, his DMG dealt to elite enemies and bosses is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>10</color> times and lasts till the end of the match.

110350021.description: The CD of Wavebreaker shortens by <color=#E78300>5</color> seconds.

110350022.description: When an enemy is defeated with Wavebreaker, Sobek's DMG dealt is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

110350023.description: When an enemy is captured with Wavebreaker, the DMG radius of the last throw is increased by <color=#E78300>50%</color>, and the lower the HP of the captured enemy, the higher non-DoT DMG. This effect DMG bonus is capped at <color=#E78300>300%</color>.

110350031.description: When a normal attack results in a hit on a humanoid enemy, Sobek obtains Rage <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more quickly.

110350032.description: The duration of the sprint in Hunt Down is extended, and Rage continues to be expended during this time. <color=#E78300>5</color> Rage is expended for every <color=#E78300>2</color> strikes unleashed, and the non-DoT DMG caused with the finishing blow upon hit is also increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for every <color=#E78300>2</color> strikes dealt.

110350033.description: When Sobek's Rage is at max, <color=#E78300>15</color> Rage is expended every <color=#E78300>1</color> second until it falls to <color=#E78300>0</color>. Skill casting during this time does not expend any more Rage.

110370011.description: The travel distance of the dim light balls in Instant Shadow is increased by <color=#E78300>30%</color>, while the DMG range is increased by <color=#E78300>20%</color>.

110370012.description: Use of Double Scattershot inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103701)>Dark Tainted</material> on enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds, and enemies afflicted with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103701)>Dark Tainted</material> take <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more DMG.

110370013.description: The two Glimmers in Instant Shadow drag in enemies within range, with the drag power increasing as the number of enemies in range with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103701)>Dark Tainted</material> goes up.

110370021.description: After Double Scattershot is cast, <color=#E78300>each</color> hit landed on the enemy increases the max passive DMG bonus by <color=#E78300>2%</color> for <color=#E78300>7</color> seconds. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>7</color> seconds.

110370022.description: When an attack results in a hit and the passive effect is at its highest, the remaining cd of Double Scattershot is shortened by <color=#E78300>0.3</color> seconds.

110370023.description: When the first and second strike of Double Scattershot are landed on the same enemy, Hodur is granted the max passive bonus possible at the time for <color=#E78300>5</color> seconds.

110370031.description: <color=#E78300>Each</color> time an enemy hit is landed with Striking Arrow, subsequent hits deal <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more non-DoT DMG.

110370032.description:
Use of Striking Arrow inflicts Trauma on enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.
Trauma: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK every <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds. This effect can stack.

110370033.description: The cd of Striking Arrow is shortened by <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds. When Dodge is triggered by Hodur, the remaining cd of Striking Arrow is shortened by <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds.

110380011.description: Solar Blaze deals <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more non-DoT DMG to enemies inflicted with Scorch.

110380012.description: Grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace for every <color=#E78300>15</color> hits landed on the enemy.

110380013.description: The CD of Solar Blaze shortens by <color=#E78300>8</color> seconds.

110380021.description: Shortens the Dodge effect CD by <color=#E78300>5</color>s.

110380022.description:
The Base DMG of Blazing Embrace is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>, and <color=#E78300>each</color> hit has a <color=#E78300>10%</color> chance of granting <color=#E78300>1</color> additional Trace.
<color=#E78300>Each</color> time Blazing Embrace lands a hit on the enemy, the remaining CD of Dodge effect is shortened by <color=#E78300>0.2</color>s.

110380023.description: When Dodge effect is triggered by the Mod, grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace and triggers Blazing Embrace upon the locked-on enemy. This particular trigger does not send the skill into cooldown.

110380031.description:
Sacred Flame Dive inflicts Scorch on the enemy for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.
Scorch: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK every <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

110380032.description: For <color=#E78300>each</color> hit landed on the enemy, increases Fire DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> and then by an additional <color=#E78300>{1}</color> whenever an enemy inflicted with Scorch is hit. Effect lasts <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds, and the Fire DMG bonus from this effect is capped at <color=#E78300>15%</color>.

110380033.description: Solar Blaze lowers the Fire Resistance of enemies hit by <color=#E78300>10%</color> for <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds; the effect is changed to <color=#E78300>15%</color> for enemies afflicted with Scorch.

110390011.description: The CD of Starry Drizzle shortens by <color=#E78300>4</color> seconds.

110390012.description: Casting Torrential Surge inflicts Weak on enemies hit, lowering their ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

110390013.description: Casting Starry Drizzle grants Super Armor to the entire team for <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

110390021.description: The additional ATK of Starry Drizzle is increased by <color=#E78300>40%</color>.

110390022.description: Grace of the Sea deals to enemies within range Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK.

110390023.description: Torrential Surge now comes with a second strike on the enemy with a greater range and deals Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK.

110390031.description: Increases the HP recovery effect of Grace of the Sea by <color=#E78300>20%</color>.

110390032.description: When Poseidon or a Teammate takes damage, a <color=#E78300>1.2%</color> Ultimate Skill charge is granted.

110390033.description: Grace of the Sea restores HP to the entire team and does not require selection of a target area.

110410011.description: Enhances the recovery effect of Adagio Vibrato. Every stack of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> increases the recovery effect by <color=#E78300>1%</color>.

110410012.description: Enhances Moderato Legato's Armor Break effect. Each stack of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> reduces enemy's DEF by an additional <color=#E78300>0.5%</color> from the Armor Break effect.

110410013.description: Changes the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> stack count to <color=#E78300>35</color> upon entering <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material> state.

110410021.description: Reduces the DMG taken by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> when any Melee Mod on the team is in Unyielding.

110410022.description: Increases Non-DoT DMG dealt with the Dodge effect by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. Grants Ultimate Skill charge even when Stun is not inflicted successfully by the Mod's Dodge effect.

110410023.description: Enemies take <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more DMG from Sonic Boom for <color=#E78300>5</color>s when they are hit by it. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>9</color> times.

110410031.description: Adds Perfectly Harmonious state to the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104102)>Harmony Judgement</material>. When a skill strike is judged as Perfectly Harmonious, increases the Non-DoT Skill DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110410032.description: Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace with each strike judged as Perfectly Harmonious.

110410033.description: Increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> when the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> stack count is at <color=#E78300>7</color> or more. Increases Physical DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> when the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> stack count is at <color=#E78300>14</color> or more. Increases Melee DMG by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> when the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> stack count is at <color=#E78300>21</color> or more.

110420011.description: Increases the Crit Rate and Crit DMG effects granted when entering <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104203)>Dance Duo</material> mode by expending <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic Marks</material> by <color=#E78300>24%</color>.

110420012.description: Mod can no longer cast Shadow Dance Twirl; instead, it is automatically cast every <color=#E78300>6</color>s. When Mod has <color=#E78300>4</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic Marks</material>, Leuce and Mintha also automatically go into <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104203)>Dance Duo</material> mode the next time Shadow Dance Twirl is cast.

110420013.description:
Reduces Shadow RES of the enemy hit by Leuce in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104202)>Dance Partner</material> mode by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s if the enemy hit does not have a Shadow RES debuff. If the enemy's Shadow RES is already debuffed, increases the Non-DoT DMG dealt by Leuce by <color=#E78300>{3}</color>.
Inflicts Armor Break on the enemy hit by Mintha in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104202)>Dance Partner</material> mode and reduces their DEF by <color=#E78300>{4}</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s if the enemy hit is not in Armor Break. If the enemy is already in Armor Break, increases the Non-DoT DMG dealt by Mintha by <color=#E78300>{3}</color>.

110420021.description: Increases DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> when Mod has at least <color=#E78300>25</color> but no more than <color=#E78300>75</color> Divine Grace.

110420022.description: Grants the next <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic</material> Mark <color=#E78300>1.5</color>s more quickly if Mod has at least <color=#E78300>30</color> but no more than <color=#E78300>70</color> Divine Grace.

110420023.description: Increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>, Shadow DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>, and skill DMG by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> when Mod has at least <color=#E78300>40</color> but no more than <color=#E78300>60</color> Divine Grace.

110420031.description: Expends <color=#E78300>4</color> Divine Grace upon a hit landed by Leuce. Expends <color=#E78300>12</color> Divine Grace granted upon a hit landed by Mintha.

110420032.description: Expends <color=#E78300>15</color> Divine Grace when switching to Leuce, and grants <color=#E78300>15</color> Divine Grace when switching to Mintha.

110420033.description:
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic</material> Marks are no longer granted in the original way.
When Divine Grace is at <color=#E78300>0</color>, increases Shadow DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s and grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic</material> Mark. This way of gaining <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic</material> Marks has a CD of <color=#E78300>9</color>s.
When Divine Grace is at max, increases Shadow DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s and grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic</material> Mark. This way of gaining <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic</material> Marks has a CD of <color=#E78300>9</color>s.

110480011.description: Shortens the CD of Precision Bombing by <color=#E78300>3</color>s.

110480012.description: Expands the AoE of Precision Bombing by <color=#E78300>60%</color> and its Non-DoT Base DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110480013.description: Increases the Non-Dot Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> upon hits on enemies with Shackle.

110480021.description: Increases the Base DMG of Guided Strike by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110480022.description: Gains <color=#E78300>{1}</color> Energy with every hit of Guided Strike.

110480023.description: Guided Strike can be charged <color=#E78300>2</color> times. Increases the Non-Dot Crit Rate of Guided Strike by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110480032.description: Expends all available Energy when casting Pulsation, and increases Non-DoT DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>2%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1</color> point of Energy expended.

110480033.description: Gains <color=#E78300>{1}</color> Energy whenever an enemy is defeated with Pulsation.

110490011.description: After an <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104901)>Ice Mirror</material> is formed, grants Unyielding as well as reduces DMG taken by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> before it shatters.

110490012.description:
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> deals <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more Non-DoT DMG to enemies with Freeze.
When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104902)>Mirrorwalk</material> is active, increases Independent DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>4</color> times.

110490013.description:
Broken Mirror: Dark inflicts Freeze on enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{1}</color>s. This Freeze state also grants the following effects: The duration of this Freeze effect is not affected (halved) by Super Armor. When an enemy already in other Freeze states is inflicted with this Freeze state, no Control RES points will be stacked.
When the last attack of Mirrorbloom: Frostdance or Mirrorbloom: Bonechill hits an enemy with Freeze, the Freeze state will be removed. At the same time, the Mod's Non-DoT ATK is increased by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> and their Crit Rate, by <color=#E78300>{3}</color>.

110490021.description:
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> deals <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more DMG to normal enemies.
Normal enemies with less than <color=#E78300>25%</color> HP are defeated instantly when hit by <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material>.

110490022.description: Every time a hit is landed by <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> (summoned by Normal Attack's <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104902)>Mirrorwalk</material> expenditure), inflicts the enemy hit with Armor Break and reduces its DEF by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>4</color> times.

110490023.description:
When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104902)>Mirrorwalk</material> is active, tapping on Normal Attack starts the attack from the fifth strike even when not in the fourth strike, and changes the attack mode.
An ice flower forms when an enemy is defeated, and shatters after some time, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Up to <color=#E78300>4</color> ice flowers may be on the field at any time.

110490031.description: Broken Mirror: Secret is also triggered when the Mod avoids an enemy attack with Extremity Dodge.

110490032.description:
When the Mod summons <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> to attack the enemy by triggering Extremity Dodge to avoid <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104901)>Ice Mirror</material> shards, expends <color=#E78300>25</color> Rage to change <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame's</material> attack mode:
Extremity Dodge against an <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104901)>Ice Mirror</material> generated by Normal Attack: <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK (<color=#E78300>+{2}</color> for every level normal attack is upgraded) in total.
Extremity Dodge against an <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104901)>Ice Mirror</material> generated by Higan: Frostdance: <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK (<color=#E78300>+{4}</color> for every level Skill 1 is upgraded) in total.
Extremity Dodge against an <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104901)>Ice Mirror</material> generated by Higan: Bonechill: <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> ATK (<color=#E78300>+{6}</color> for every level Skill 2 is upgraded) in total.

110490033.description:
Extremity Dodge can no longer trigger Dodge effect. Instead, when damage is blocked with Higan: Chibiki, the Dodge effect will be triggered. When Higan: Chibiki blocks a hit from <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104901)>Ice Mirror</material>, expends <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104902)>Mirrorwalk</material> effect and gains an extra <color=#E78300>15</color> Rage.
Broken Mirror: Secret also inflicts Freeze on enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{1}</color>s. This Freeze state also grants the following effects: The duration of this Freeze effect is not affected (halved) by Super Armor. When an enemy already in other Freeze states is inflicted with this Freeze state, no Control RES points will be stacked.
When a follow-up attack launched by tapping on Normal Attack after Extremity Dodge results in a hit on an enemy in Freeze, the enemy's Freeze state is removed. Also, increases the Mod's Non-DoT ATK by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> and Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{3}</color>.

110500011.description: When Traces are at max, non-DoT Crit Rate and Crit DMG of skills and Ultimate Skills are increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>5</color> seconds.

110500012.description: Skill crits have a <color=#E78300>25%</color> chance of granting <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace each time. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>1</color> second.

110500013.description: When the effect of Amenooshihomimi: Utsusemi is triggered, increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

110500021.description:
Hits landed with Scarlet: Tassel White also inflict Trauma on the enemy for <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.
Trauma: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK every <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds for <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

110500022.description: When an enemy with Trauma is hit with the second move of Scarlet: Scattered Flowers, Trauma will also be inflicted on other enemies within a certain range.

110500023.description: Hits landed with the third move of Scarlet: Scattered Flowers on enemies with Trauma deal <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more non-DoT DMG. Whenever an enemy with Trauma is defeated using the third move of Scarlet: Scattered Flowers, the remaining cd of skills and Ultimate Skills is shortened by <color=#E78300>1</color> second.

110500031.description: When an enemy hit is landed using Scarlet: Scattered Flowers within <color=#E78300>5</color> seconds of triggering Dodge, Buzenbo deals <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more DMG for the next <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

110500032.description: Using Dodge will not interrupt the normal attack, and Increases the Dodge Energy recovery rate by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110500033.description: When the third move of Scarlet: Scattered Flowers is being cast continuously, increases the non-DoT DMG of this move by <color=#E78300>100%</color> for each cast.

110520011.description: Casting Firepower Assist expends <color=#E78300>10</color> less Energy. Gains <color=#E78300>{1}</color> extra Energy every <color=#E78300>1</color>s when casting Hissing in Rage.

110520012.description: Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> stack of DMG boost each time Hissing in Rage expends <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105201)>Firepower</material>, with each stack increasing the Mod's DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>; stacks up to <color=#E78300>25</color> times. Effect will be removed <color=#E78300>3</color>s after casting Quick Response or Surround & Eliminate.

110520013.description: Applies the CD reduction buff of Total Firepower also to the next Quick Response or Surround & Eliminate cast. Effect can trigger once every time Total Firepower is cast.

110520021.description: Triggers Dodge effect if the Mod is attacked while rolling during Total Firepower or a normal attack. Reduces Total Firepower's remaining CD by <color=#E78300>20%</color> each time the skill lands a cannon hit while the Dodge effect is active.

110520022.description:
When the Mod casts Surround & Eliminate, a guiding beacon will be created to cause enemies within range to take <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more DMG from all drones except those of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105207)>Torrent Mode</material>s. Also, the guiding beacon deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK (<color=#E78300>+{3}</color> for every level Skill 3 is upgraded).
This Aether Code effect will be removed when the Aether Code Supreme God's Design - Bitter Fight is activated.

110520023.description: All drones except those in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105207)>Torrent Mode</material> deal more Non-DoT DMG depending on the current <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105201)>Firepower</material> owned. Increases Non-DoT DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for every <color=#E78300>1</color> point of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105201)>Firepower</material> owned.

110520031.description: When War of the Gods: End is cast, all members of the team gain a <color=#E78300>{1}</color> Ranged DMG boost for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

110520032.description: Once activated, the drone called in by Quick Response comes in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105205)>Whirlwind Mode</material> instead of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105203)>Rafale Mode</material>.

110520033.description: Once activated, the drone called in by Surround & Eliminate comes in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105206)>Hurricane Mode</material> instead of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105204)>Bourasque Mode</material>.

110550011.description: After a So-ei Strike crits, increases Mod's ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

110550012.description: After a follow-up Frostbreaker crits, increases the Non-DoT Crit Rate of the next So-ei Strike by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>2.5</color>s. After a So-ei Strike crits, increases the Crit DMG of the next follow-up Frostbreaker by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>.

110550013.description:
The effects of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105502)>Congeal</material> now apply to the Mod only, and the state now lasts <color=#E78300>20</color>s.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105502)>Congeal</material> state increases Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110550021.description: <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105501)>Frost</material> can now stack up to <color=#E78300>15</color> times.

110550022.description:
A follow-up Frostbreaker attack no longer lowers the Ice RES of enemies hit.
Instead, every time a So-ei Strike crits, lowers the Ice RES of enemies hit by <color=#E78300>15%</color> for <color=#E78300>{1}</color>s.
So-ei Strike deals <color=#E78300>{2}</color> more Non-DoT DMG, and the follow-up Frostbreaker deals<color=#E78300>{3}</color> less DMG.

110550023.description: Holding down the Dodge button unleashes So-ei Strike: Special at the cost of <color=#E78300>45</color> Rage, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. When the last strike hits, increases the Ice DMG dealt by all members of the team by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s.

110550031.description:
Every time a follow-up Frostbreaker hits, a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105503)>Paper Figure</material> will be created and will last <color=#E78300>10</color>s. Up to <color=#E78300>3</color> Paper Figures may exist on the field at any time.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105503)>Paper Figure</material>: Deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK to surrounding enemies every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

110550032.description: When a So-ei Strike hits, all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105503)>Paper Figures</material> on the field immediately deal one round of Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK to surrounding enemies. Effect can trigger only once every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

110550033.description: Casting a So-ei Strike will drag all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105503)>Paper Figures</material> within a certain range closer to the Mod and refresh their duration, and when a regular Frostbreaker is cast, all nearby <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105503)>Paper Figures</material> will move towards the direction of the attack. As they move, the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105503)>Paper Figures</material> deal Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK, as well as inflicts Freeze on enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s that are not yet in Freeze.

110560012.description: Increases DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> when Mod's Energy level is at <color=#E78300>40</color> or above. Removes this effect after <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds when Energy falls below <color=#E78300>40</color>.

110560013.description:
Increases the Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds whenever a hit is landed on the enemy with the additional kick from Shinra: Ragestomp or the enhanced version of Shinra: Thunderweave; stacks up to <color=#E78300>5</color> times.
Gains a shield of value equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of Max HP which lasts <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds when hitting with the last strike of the enhanced version of Thunder Fist or the enhanced version of Shinra: Thousandbolt with at least <color=#E78300>1</color> stack of charge.

110560021.description: Increases the Non-DoT DMG dealt to the same enemy by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> upon each additional kick hit with the enhanced version of Shinra: Thunderweave using repeated taps, up to a maximum of <color=#E78300>135%</color>.

110560022.description: Grants <color=#E78300>2</color> additional kicks with repeated taps on the enhanced version of Shinra: Thunderweave.

110560023.description: Continues to cast the enhanced version of Shinra: Thunderweave when Extremity Dodge is triggered during an additional kick launched by quick taps of the skill.

110560031.description: Skips directly to the last strike when casting a normal attack within <color=#E78300>5</color> seconds of triggering Extremity Dodge.

110560032.description: Increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds when Extremity Dodge is triggered while the enhanced version of Shinra: Thousandbolt is charging.

110560033.description: Shortens all remaining CD of skills and Ultimate Skill by <color=#E78300>1</color> second whenever casting an enhanced skill.

110580011.description:
Use of Fiery Dance: Burst also inflicts Scorch on enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.
Scorch: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK every <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

110580012.description: When Kagutsuchi is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105801)>Wildfire</material> state, and when Fiery Dance: Burst is triggered after the casting of Fiery Dance: Alt, Fiery Dance: Burst will be triggered subsequently every time Fiery Dance: Alt is cast.

110580013.description: Kagutsuchi deals <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more Non-DoT DMG to enemies with Scorch on hit.

110580021.description: When Kagutsuchi is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105801)>Wildfire</material> state, his DMG taken is lowered by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110580022.description: <color=#E78300>Each</color> time a hit on the enemy is landed with Fiery Dance: Alt, <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105801)>Wildfire</material> state is extended by another <color=#E78300>1</color> second.

110580023.description:
When Kagutsuchi is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105801)>Wildfire</material> state, the state lasts until the cooldown of Ashen: Smelt ends, at which point Ashen: Smelt is also enhanced.
Ashen: Smelt (enhanced): Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK (<color=#E78300>+{2}</color> for every level Skill 3 is upgraded) in total.

110580031.description:
For every <color=#E78300>5</color> hits landed with a normal attack, Kagutsuchi is granted <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105802)>Burning Wheel</material> Mark. (Up to <color=#E78300>2</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105802)>Burning Wheel</material> Marks can be held.) Casting of Secret Sword: Blacken or Secret Sword: Charge expends <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105802)>Burning Wheel</material> Mark for an enhanced effect.
Ashen: Blacken (enhanced): Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK (<color=#E78300>+{2}</color> for every level Skill 1 is upgraded) in total.
Ashen: Charge (enhanced): Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK (<color=#E78300>+{4}</color> for every level Skill 2 is upgraded) in total.

110580032.description: Fiery Dance: Alt is now cast by holding down on the Normal Attack button, and can be used as a follow-up to any normal attack move. Fiery Dance: Alt also now grants Invincible instead of Unyielding.

110580033.description: <color=#E78300>Each</color> time Kagutsuchi lands a hit on the enemy with a normal attack or with Fiery Dance: Alt while in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105801)>Wildfire</material> state, his Crit Rate is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> and his Crit DMG, by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>10</color> times.

110590011.description: When Dodge is triggered by Apollo, <color=#E78300>1</color> additional <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrow</material> is granted.

110590012.description: Each time a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrow</material> is expended, the remaining cd of Thorn of Light is shortened by <color=#E78300>1</color> second.

110590013.description: When a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrow</material> is expended, Crit DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times.

110590021.description: When a hit is landed with Thorn of Light, increases the Hit Count by <color=#E78300>1</color>.

110590022.description: The Base DMG of Thorn of Light is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110590023.description: <color=#E78300>Each</color> time a hit is landed on the enemy with Ray of Luminosity, <color=#E78300>{1}</color> Energy is granted, and the remaining cd of Apollo's skills (including Ultimate Skill) is shortened by <color=#E78300>0.5</color> seconds.

110590031.description: Increases the radius of the center zone for the following attacks in Interweaving Light by <color=#E78300>50%</color>.

110590032.description: The cd of Interweaving Light is shortened by <color=#E78300>3</color>, and casting the skill no longer expends Energy.

110590033.description: Changes Non-DoT DMG dealt with the following attack in Interweaving Light to enemies in the center zone to <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. When the follow-up attack in Interweaving Light lands, for every <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrow</material> active, non-DoT Crit DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>.

110600011.description:
Drags enemies together when Spear Array: Six is cast.
When Spear Array: Three, Spear Array: Six, or Spear Array: Nine hits, also lowers the enemy's Light RES by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

110600012.description: When a counterattack is triggered, also reduces the attacker's Melee DMG RES by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

110600013.description:
Taunts all enemies for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s when Spear Array is cast. When taunting, if the Mod is hit at any moment during a normal attack, a counterattack will be triggered. Also, increases the Rage gained from the counterattack by <color=#E78300>50%</color>.
Increases the Light DMG of the entire team by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material> is active.
Drags enemies together when Spearfall is triggered.

110600021.description: <color=#E78300>Every time</color> an enemy is hit with a normal attack, the skill's remaining CD is shortened by <color=#E78300>0.15</color>s. <color=#E78300>Every time</color> an enemy is hit with a counterattack, the skill's remaining CD is shortened by <color=#E78300>1</color>s.

110600022.description: Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> stack of ATK bonus when casting a skill, and <color=#E78300>3</color> stacks of ATK bonus when casting a counterattack skill. Each stack boosts ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s (up to <color=#E78300>9</color> stacks). This duration is continuously refreshed whenever the Mod is within range of a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material>.

110600023.description:
Increases Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s for <color=#E78300>each</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106002)>spear</material> recovered. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>9</color> times.
After casting Spear Array: Three, Spear Array: Six or Spear Array: Nine, the next counterattack, Counterspear, Roaring Tiger, or Flurry Speardance will deal Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}, {4} or {5}</color> ATK depending on the type of Spear Array used, and will also grant <color=#E78300>12, 16 or 20</color> Rage respectively.

110600031.description: Increases the Non-DoT Skill DMG of Flurry Speardance by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>, and grants <color=#E78300>3</color> Rage <color=#E78300>each</color> time an enemy is hit.

110600032.description: After a Spear Array: Six ends, increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s (an extra <color=#E78300>9%</color> if this Spear Array: Six defeated an enemy).

110600033.description: When Spear Array: Nine hits an enemy with HP below <color=#E78300>75%, 50%, or 25%</color>, the Mod's Non-DoT ATK against that enemy increases by <color=#E78300>18%, 36%, or 54%</color> respectively, and Non-DoT Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>18%, 36%, or 54%</color> respectively, for <color=#E78300>6</color>s. This effect can be triggered once every <color=#E78300>27</color>s per enemy.

110610011.description: When tapping to cast Calculation: Data Input, expends <color=#E78300>15 or 30</color> Divine Grace instead. For each <color=#E78300>1</color> point of Divine Grace expended, the Calculation's Non-DoT ATK boost now increases to <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110610012.description: Grants <color=#E78300>60</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106101)>Northstar</material> at the start of battle and the first time Calculation is cast.

110610013.description: Grants <color=#E78300>2</color> stacks of ATK boost at the start of battle, with each stack increasing the Mod's ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. Removes <color=#E78300>1</color> stack each time Calculation: Hyperorder is cast.

110610021.description:
Each strike of normal attack now grants <color=#E78300>8</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106101)>Northstar</material>.
Casting Dwindling Water or North Star's Mandate now grants <color=#E78300>40</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106101)>Northstar</material>.

110610022.description: When Calculation: Hyperorder has expended <color=#E78300>80 or 120</color> Divine Grace, increases the Non-DoT Base DMG of Calculation: Hyperorder's powered-up attack by <color=#E78300>{1} and {2}</color>, respectively.

110610023.description: Increases Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> and Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> when casting Calculation or Calculation: Hyperorder. Stacks up to <color=#E78300>4</color> times.

110610031.description:
When Calculation hits, it lowers the Water RES of the hit enemies by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.
When casting Calculation, the whole team's Combat Resources charging speed is increased by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s.

110610032.description: Activating Calculation: Hyperorder triggers Zero Time for <color=#E78300>3</color>s, and increases the whole team's Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

110610033.description: When casting the Ultimate Skill or an Ultimate Skillchain, resets the CD of Skill 3 for all Water Mods on the team.

110660011.description: When in any <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106601)>Divination</material> state, launching a normal attack inflicts Armor Break on enemies hit, lowering their DEF by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

110660012.description: Ookuninushi's BunBun Cannon spreads the enemy's Armor Break and extends the remaining duration of Armor Break to <color=#E78300>10</color> seconds if it is under <color=#E78300>10</color> seconds.

110660013.description: Ookuninushi's BunBun Gunner deals <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more Non-DoT DMG to enemies inflicted with Armor Break.

110660021.description: <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106601)>Divination</material> effect is extended by <color=#E78300>5</color> seconds.

110660022.description: When in any <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106601)>Divination</material> state, Ookuninushi's Crit Rate is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>.

110660023.description:
The <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106601)>Divination</material> effect applies to the entire team, though it is reduced by 50% for Teammates.
When a Teammate is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106601)>Divination</material> state, their Crit Rate is increased by <color=#E78300>11%</color>.

110660031.description: The cd of Divination is shortened by <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds.
