110660032.description: The tarot cards obtained from Divination become random. However, Divination effects are increased by <color=#E78300>60%</color>.

110660033.description: After casting Divination, Non-DoT Crit Rate of skills and Ultimate Skills is increased by <color=#E78300>50%</color> for <color=#E78300>5</color>s when they land.

110670011.description: Reduces the effective <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghost</material> absorption range from Great Confluence by <color=#E78300>33.33%</color>, but increases the Skill DMG buff from absorption. Increases Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>6%, 18%, or 36%</color>, depending on the number of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghosts</material> absorbed.

110670012.description: Triggers Riptide each time a normal attack crits. The effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>3</color>s.

110670013.description: Increases Water DMG dealt by the Mod by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s when the Mod and a Tributary Ghost hit the same enemy within <color=#E78300>0.3</color>s. When Ghosts hit the same enemy within <color=#E78300>0.3</color>s, reduces the Water RES of the enemy hit by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s.

110670021.description: Every <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghost</material> on the field increases Mod's ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110670022.description: Casting Tide Surge no longer requires a minimum of <color=#E78300>2</color> Traces owned.

110670023.description: Extends the duration of the buff from Great Confluence by <color=#E78300>4</color>s.

110670031.description: Increases Water DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s when Extremity Dodge is triggered.

110670032.description: Increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s when the Mod triggers Dodge effect.

110670033.description: Shortens the Dodge effect CD by <color=#E78300>5</color>s. Grants the following effects when triggering Dodge effect: When there are <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghosts</material> on the field, tapping Dodge swaps the Mod's position with that of the farthest <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Ghost</material> and triggers the Dodge effect. A new <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghost</material> appears at the Mod's original position and triggers Tributary Flow.

110680011.description: Shortens Blast Squall's remaining CD by <color=#E78300>1</color>s when the third or fourth strike of a normal attack hits.

110680012.description: When the wind arrow from the non-enhanced version of Blast Squall hits the book pages created by the last strike of the normal attack, an explosion occurs, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK. Also grants <color=#E78300>10</color> Rage.

110680013.description: A small cyclone forms when the wind arrow from the non-enhanced version of Blast Squall hits a non-enhanced eye of the storm, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Then, shortens Hurricane Spin's remaining CD by <color=#E78300>2</color>s and Stir in the Wind's remaining CD by <color=#E78300>4</color>s. Effect can trigger once every time a non-enhanced eye of the storm is generated.

110680021.description: The eye of the storm generated by the non-enhanced version of Hurricane Spin can also drag the enemy.

110680022.description: Drags the enemy when the wind arrow from the non-enhanced version of Blast Squall hits the book pages created by the last strike of the normal attack.

110680023.description: When a wind arrow hits the eye of the storm generated by the Enhanced Hurricane Spin and creates cyclons from the last strike, the cyclons will inflict Armor Break on enemies hit and reduce their DEF by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

110680031.description: A storm occurs on the spot when the enhanced version of Stir in the Wind ends, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK.

110680032.description: Resets the CD of Stir in the Wind when Mod triggers the Dodge effect.

110680033.description: Gains <color=#E78300>3</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106801)>Windchime</material> Marks after the enhanced version of Stir in the Wind ends.

110700011.description: Every <color=#E78300>3</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks expended when casting Crow's Burn increases the skill's Base DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110700012.description: Every <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace expended while triggering <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state in the air increases DMG taken by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> and Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>. Effect lasts until Mod exits <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state.

110700013.description: Reduces Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> and increases Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> every <color=#E78300>0.5</color>s when Mod is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state. The effect reduces Crit Rate by up to <color=#E78300>63%</color> and increases Crit DMG by up to <color=#E78300>280%</color> in total. The above effects will be removed <color=#E78300>3</color>s after Mod exits <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state.

110700021.description: Every <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace gained grants <color=#E78300>1</color> ATK boost for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s, with each boost increasing Mod's ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. Max stack count is the same as the Divine Grace maximum.

110700022.description: Grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace every <color=#E78300>1</color>s when Mod is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state. The Fire RES reduction applied by Crow's Fire now stacks up to <color=#E78300>250</color> times, and its Physical and Wind RES reductions stack up to <color=#E78300>150</color> times. Also shortens the CD of Crow's Fire by <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

110700023.description: Other teammates get <color=#E78300>1</color> Skill DMG debuff for every <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace expended, with every debuff reducing their Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s. This effect neither stacks nor refreshes its duration. When the Mod expends Divine Grace, every <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace expended grants the Mod <color=#E78300>1</color> stack of Skill DMG boost of <color=#E78300>{3}</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s, and this DMG boost is multiplied by the number of teammates present. Max stack count is <color=#E78300>200%</color> of the Divine Grace maximum.

110700031.description: Each time a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire Mark</material> is expended or gained, every <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Mark owned increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110700032.description:
Grants the following effect each time Mod collects <color=#E78300>9</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks when not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state: The next time all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks are expended with the casting of Crow's Scorch, every <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Mark owned increases Non-DoT DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>9</color>s.
Grants the following effect each time Mod collects <color=#E78300>9</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state: The next time all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks are expended with the casting of Demon Slayer, casting sword blast attacks with Demon Slayer, Evil Crusher, or Evil Incineration will deal <color=#E78300>{2}</color> more Non-DoT DMG for <color=#E78300>9</color>s.

110700033.description: Every <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace expended while triggering <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state in the air now grants <color=#E78300>2</color> Fire DMG boosts instead. However, also removes<color=#E78300>99</color> boosts from the stack every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

110710011.description: When a hit is landed with the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107104)>Jade Sword</material>, summons a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107105)>Thundercloud Strike</material> to where the hit was landed.

110710012.description: Triggers a windfield launching a skill attack every <color=#E78300>2</color> times Aero Break is used alternately with another skill when Mod is in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107102)>Move stance</material>, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

110710013.description: Depending on Mod's current stance, increases Wind or Thunder DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> when a hit is landed with the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107104)>Jade Sword</material> or <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107105)>Thundercloud Strike</material>; stacks up to <color=#E78300>20</color> times, and switching to another stance removes the effect. Attribute DMG boosts obtained with this Aether Code do not count toward further passive boosts.

110710021.description: Grants Mod <color=#E78300>3</color> Divine Grace and their teammates <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace each time a hit is landed with Eternal Prosperity: Thunder when Mod is in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107102)>Move stance</material> and does not cast Aero Break alternately during the casting of Eternal Prosperity: Thunder.

110710022.description: When Mod is in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107102)>Move stance</material>, increases the Skill DMG of all Divine Grace Mods on the team by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> and reduces the Divine Grace consumption of teammates by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>.

110710023.description:
Grants the following effects when Mod is in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107102)>Move stance</material>:
Changes the Divine Grace consumption of Aero Break, Stillness in Motion: Thunder, and Eternal Prosperity: Thunder to <color=#E78300>3, 1, and 1</color> respectively.
Continuous casting of skills within <color=#E78300>4</color>s also expends Divine Grace equal to the base total of the Divine Grace previously expended through skills.
Each time Divine Grace is expended, every <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace expended shortens the remaining CD of Aero Break and Eternal Prosperity: Thunder by <color=#E78300>0.1</color>s.

110710031.description: Every <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107101)>Jade Sword</material> that lands on the enemy within <color=#E78300>10</color>s of the Mod switching to the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107104)>Still stance</material> grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace.

110710032.description: Increases Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> when Mod is in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107102)>Move stance</material>. However, automatically expends <color=#E78300>2</color> Divine Grace every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

110710033.description: Expends an additional <color=#E78300>4</color> Divine Grace when Aero Break is used alternately with another skill, increasing ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s; stacks up to <color=#E78300>4</color> times.

110720011.description: Increases Evil Expeller's Base DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>, and Evil Expeller grants <color=#E78300>50%</color> more <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material>.

110720012.description: Changes Raining Wealth's bonus effect duration to <color=#E78300>{1}</color>s. The Wind DMG boost granted for every <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material> expended is now changed to <color=#E78300>0.7%</color>.

110720013.description:
Raises <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material> cap by <color=#E78300>20</color>.
When <color=#E78300>60</color> or more <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material> is expended to cast Raining Wealth, Wind DMG dealt changes to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK (<color=#E78300>+{3}</color> for every level Skill 3 is upgraded) in total. When <color=#E78300>70</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material> is expended to cast Raining Wealth and its bonus effect is granted to the entire team, also increases the team's Non-DoT Crit Rate of Wind attacks by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110720021.description: Shortens the trigger CD of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107202)>Lucky Coin's</material> joint attack to <color=#E78300>1</color>s.

110720022.description: Whenever a Mod followed by a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107202)>Lucky Coin</material> casts a skill, the Non-DoT Crit DMG of Wind attacks increases by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>4</color>s. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>5</color> times.

110720023.description: Increases the Non-DoT DMG of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107202)>Lucky Coin's</material> joint attack by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107202)>Lucky Coin</material> can now follow all teammates.

110720031.description: When the last strike of Evil Expeller hits, the Mod's ATK increases by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

110720032.description: Aether Code Prodigy of Math - Magic's ATK boost effect can stack up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times. When <color=#E78300>3</color> stacks are reached, no further stacks can be added for <color=#E78300>8</color>s.

110720033.description:
Increases Raining Wealth's Base DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>, but no more <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material> will be expended and no further bonus effects will be granted to the team.
When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material> is full, expends <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material> every <color=#E78300>0.3</color>s until <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material> reaches <color=#E78300>0</color>. During this time, no more <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material> can be obtained and the Mod's Skill DMG increases by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110740011.description: When not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107401)>Ascendancy</material> state, gains <color=#E78300>10</color> Divine Grace each time Windrider or Skypatrol hits.

110740012.description: After casting Cloudstep, Flowfuse, or Wingslap at least 1 time each, the next time you tap on Normal Attack, a Windrider attack will be launched, and the derivative skills' cast count will reset.

110740013.description: The Divine Grace cost during <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107401)>Ascendancy</material> state changes to <color=#E78300>1</color>. When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107401)>Ascendancy</material> state, Crit Rate increases by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> <color=#E78300>each time</color> an enemy is hit. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>10</color> times. Removes <color=#E78300>1</color> stack every <color=#E78300>0.8</color>s.

110740021.description: After casting Cloud Break, the next Cloudstep will deal Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK (<color=#E78300>+{2}</color> for every level Skill 1 is upgraded) in total.

110740022.description:
After casting Cloud Break, the next Cloudstep will gain the following effects:
When not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107401)>Ascendancy</material> state, gains <color=#E78300>15</color> Divine Grace after each hit.
Increases Knockback distance. Knocked back enemies will stop and deal AoE damage upon colliding with other enemies or reaching a far enough distance, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total, and inflicting Stun on enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{1}</color>s. Defeating an enemy will trigger a blast, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total.
Increases damage dealt to enemies not affected by this Knockback by <color=#E78300>{4}</color>.

110740023.description:
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107401)>Ascendancy</material> state, gains the following effects:
Further shortens Cloud Break's CD by <color=#E78300>2</color>s.
After casting Cloud Break, collisions caused by enemies knocked back by the next Cloudstep will also trigger a blast, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Effect triggers up to once per cast.

110740031.description: After a non-mobile Dodge, you can cast a follow-up enhanced Cloud Break, Seething Sea, or Wings of Might with a perfect timing to gain <color=#E78300>5</color> Divine Grace upon each hit.

110740032.description: After a non-mobile Dodge, you can cast a follow-up enhanced Cloud Break, Seething Sea, or Wings of Might with a perfect timing, and the next time you tap on Normal Attack, a Skypatrol attack will be launched.

110740033.description: When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107401)>Ascendancy</material> state, Seething Sea will no longer be replaced by Flowfuse. Instead, grants the corresponding Enhanced Skill Effects of launching an attack after a Non-mobile Dodge.

110750011.description:
The effects of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107504)>Shining Armor</material>, <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107505)>Burning Ember</material>, <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107506)>Fire Brilliant</material>, <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107507)>Burning Sun</material>, and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107508)>Blazing Sun</material> apply to the Mod only.
When entering the battle, increase the Mod's Base ATK by <color=#E78300>1</color> for every existing <color=#E78300>25</color> points of their Max HP, up to <color=#E78300>3,000</color> of Base ATK boost.

110750012.description:
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107509)>Afire</material> state is no longer triggered, and the default skill mode is <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107503)>Aflame</material> mode.
Dodge does not interrupt normal attack strike counts.
When skill casting is followed up with a normal attack, the normal attack may not start from the fourth strike but depends on which skill precedes instead. Casting conditions for <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107501)>Start</material> mode and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107502)>Ignite</material> mode are also changed: hold down on Normal Attack at any strike of a normal attack to follow up with a skill cast, with the specific follow-up skill determined by when the follow-up is triggered:
Hold down on Normal Attack during the first strike of the normal attack to follow up with Undying Flames: Start. Following up Undying Flames: Start with a normal attack will start the normal attack at the second strike.
Hold down on Normal Attack during the second strike of the normal attack to follow up with Rising Splendor: Start. Following up Rising Splendor: Start with a normal attack will start the normal attack at the third strike.
Hold down on Normal Attack during the third strike of the normal attack to follow up with Undying Flames: Ignite. Following up Undying Flames: Ignite with a normal attack will start the normal attack at the fourth strike.
Hold down on Normal Attack during the fourth strike of the normal attack to follow up with Rising Splendor: Ignite. Following up Rising Splendor: Ignite with a normal attack will start the normal attack at the fifth strike.
Hold down on Normal Attack during the fifth strike of the normal attack to follow up with Hexagram Auspicious: Start. Following up Hexagram Auspicious: Start with a normal attack will start the normal attack at the fourth strike.
Tap on Normal Attack when casting Hexagram Auspicious: Start to follow up with Hexagram Auspicious: Ignite; following up Hexagram Auspicious: Ignite with a normal attack will start the normal attack at the fourth strike.

110750013.description:
Landing a hit with Hexagram Auspicious: Ignite triggers <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107510)>Alight</material> state for <color=#E78300>{1}</color>s when Mod has cast <color=#E78300>4</color> unique <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107501)>Start</material> mode and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107502)>Ignite</material> mode skills while not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107510)>Alight</material> state.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107510)>Alight</material>: Increases Independent DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>.

110750021.description: Increases the value of the shield from <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107504)>Shining Armor</material> by <color=#E78300>20%</color>.

110750022.description:
Increases the DEF of all team members with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107505)>Burning Ember</material>. The lower their HP, the higher the increase, up to <color=#E78300>150%</color> in total.
All team members who have <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107506)>Fire Brilliant</material> recover <color=#E78300>3%</color> HP every <color=#E78300>3</color>s. The HP recovery is changed to a <color=#E78300>3%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when HP is at max.

110750023.description:
Maxes out boosts from <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107505)>Burning Ember</material> or <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107506)>Fire Brilliant</material> for any team member with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107504)>Shining Armor</material>.
Increases the ATK of all team members by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s when Mod casts an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain.

110750031.description: Reduces the hit enemy's Fire RES by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s when a skill attack lands.

110750032.description: Increases the Non-DoT ATK of any member of the team that lands a hit on an enemy with lowered Fire RES with a Fire attack by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110750033.description:
Increases the Fire DMG of any team member with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107504)>Shining Armor</material> by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.
Increases the Fire DMG of all team members by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s when Mod casts an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain.

110760011.description: Antarctic Echo - Yang no longer gathers enemies, but deals Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK and levitates all enemies on the field.

110760012.description: Inflicts Sluggish and slows the movement of all enemies levitated to <color=#E78300>0%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s, and then inflicts Sluggish and slows the movement of all enemies levitated to <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110760013.description: When the Mod is launching normal attacks, also randomly selects an enemy levitated within a certain range of the locked-on target every <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s, and then hurls them at the target. When the target is hit, inflicts Stasis on them for <color=#E78300>{1}</color>s. If the target in Stasis is hit again by a hurled enemy, the Stasis duration extends by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s, up to a maximum of <color=#E78300>{3}</color> times of extension. Each levitated enemy can be selected up to 1 time every <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s. When an enemy exits Stasis state, they can't be inflicted with Stasis again within <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s.

110760021.description: Inflicts Sluggish and slows the movement of all levitated enemies to <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. Extends maximum levitation duration by <color=#E78300>100%</color>.

110760022.description: Resets the maximum levitation duration on enemies when the last attack of Celestial Starfall - Yang or Cloud Meld - Yang hits. Levitation duration can be reset up to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> times per enemy.

110760023.description:
Inflicts Armor Break on all enemies on the field after casting Antarctic Echo - Yang, reducing their DEF by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s.
When Antarctic Echo - Yang gathers enemies, inflicts Stasis on all unaffected enemies within gathering range for <color=#E78300>{1}</color>s.
Each time a random attack of Antarctic Echo - Yin hits, also reduces enemy's all Attribute RES by <color=#E78300>{4}</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>{6}</color> times per enemy.

110760031.description: Deals AoE Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK to levitated enemies when they fall to the ground. Effect triggers up to 1 time every <color=#E78300>{1}</color>s.

110760032.description: When the last strike of a normal attack hits an levitated enemy, the enemy will be forced back down to the ground. Cloud Meld - Yin also levitates the enemy upon hitting them.

110760033.description:
After casting Antarctic Echo - Yang, increases the Mod's ATK by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s.
When Antarctic Echo - Yang gathers enemies, inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107605)>Abysmal</material> on elite enemies, bosses, and unaffected normal enemies within gathering range for <color=#E78300>{1}</color>s.
Whenever a team member hits an enemy with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107605)>Abysmal</material>, the Mod will launch an attack dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK (<color=#E78300>+{4}</color> for every level Skill 3 is upgraded) in total. Effect triggers up to 1 time every <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

110800011.description: Normal attack hits landed on enemies in Freeze deal <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more non-DoT DMG.

110800012.description: The duration of Freeze inflicted with Frozen Land is extended by <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds.

110800013.description: <color=#E78300>Every</color> time an enemy is hit with Frozen Land, the remaining cd is shortened by <color=#E78300>1</color> second. Effect is capped at <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds in total.

110800021.description: <color=#E78300>Each</color> time an enemy is hit with Cold Vortex <color=#E78300>1</color> Rage is granted.

110800022.description: Hold down on the skill button to increase the number of spins with Cold Vortex. Each 2 additional spins expend <color=#E78300>10</color> Rage.

110800023.description: Use of Polar Strike no longer expends Rage but gains <color=#E78300>35</color> Rage instead. However, DMG dealt is reduced by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110800031.description: The Base DMG of Polar Strike is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110800032.description: The Crit Rate of non-DoT attacks on enemies in Freeze using Polar Strike is increased by <color=#E78300>100%</color>.

110800033.description: For <color=#E78300>each</color> non-leathal hit landed with Polar Strike, the remaining cd is shortened by <color=#E78300>50%</color> and the non-DoT Crit DMG of the hit is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. The Crit DMG boost from this effect is capped at <color=#E78300>150%</color>.

110810011.description: There will be a <color=#E78300>10%</color> chance of getting <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108101)>Icebreaker Mark</material> whenever a Piercer tracking missile hits. Triggers only once every <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds.

110810012.description: Expends all available <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108101)>Icebreaker</material> Marks when Mod enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material>, and extends the duration of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material> by <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds for every <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108101)>Icebreaker</material> Mark expended.

110810013.description: Increases the DMG dealt when the Waverender emerges from beneath the ice at the end of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material>, and increases the Non-DoT DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for every <color=#E78300>1</color> Piercer tracking missile launched with normal attacks while in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material>, up to a maximum of <color=#E78300>300%</color>.

110810021.description: Increases <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108101)>Icebreaker</material> Mark limit by <color=#E78300>1</color>.

110810022.description: When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material>, increases the effect of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108101)>Icebreaker</material> Marks by <color=#E78300>100%</color>.

110810023.description: Applies the effect of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108101)>Icebreaker</material> Mark to the entire team (reduced by 50% for teammates).

110810031.description: When Divine Grace is full, expends <color=#E78300>25</color> Divine Grace instead when Flash Freeze hits, inflicting Freeze on the enemy hit for <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

110810032.description: When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108101)>Icebreaker</material> Mark count is at max and a hit is landed with Cold Front, expends <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108101)>Icebreaker</material> Mark instead, and increases Non-DoT DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110810033.description: Shortens the charge of Frostbreak by <color=#E78300>1</color> second. Each time a hit is landed with Frostbreak, the remaining CD of either Cold Front or Flash Freeze is shortened by <color=#E78300>1</color> second. Extends the remaining CD of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material> by <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds when the remaining CD of either skill is shortened successfully. The <color=#E78300>3</color>-second extension will apply as well if <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material> is not in CD at the time.

110840011.description: The non-DoT DMG of Raychaser Slash is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110840012.description: When an enemy is defeated using Sword Shade or Raychaser Slash, <color=#E78300>10</color> Divine Grace and a <color=#E78300>3.75%</color> Ultimate Skill charge are granted.

110840013.description: Casting Ultimate Skills increases DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

110840021.description: When in Zero Time, increases DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110840022.description: Whenever a Dodge effect is triggered by Verthandi, the cd of Rapid Stab is reset. <color=#E78300>{1}</color> Divine Grace is also granted.

110840023.description: When a hit is landed on the enemy using Raychaser Slash, the cooldown time of Insight is reset.

110840031.description: The Mod Index Multipliers for Sword Shade and Raychaser Slash are increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110840032.description: Increases DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> when in Modified Mode.

110840033.description: When Verthandi enters Modified Mode, the cd of Swift Slash and Sword Shade is reset. <color=#E78300>100</color> Divine Grace is also granted.

110930011.description: For <color=#E78300>each</color> Heaven's Hold Kuninotokotachi has, her Crit DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. The effect is removed immediately when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> is lost.

110930012.description: For <color=#E78300>each</color> Earth's Hold Kuninotokotachi has, her ATK is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. The effect is removed immediately when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> is lost.

110930013.description: When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> is lost, for each <color=#E78300>1</color> Heaven's Hold expended, increases Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>, and for each <color=#E78300>1</color> Earth's Hold expended, increases ATK for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>. Effect lasts <color=#E78300>3</color>s.

110930021.description: Grants <color=#E78300>20</color> Divine Grace when the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> is formed.

110930022.description: When a Ninjutsu skill different from the last casting is used, the remaining cd of Heaven's Hold and Earth's Hold is shortened by <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds.

110930023.description: When the first Hold of the Ninjutsu cast is different from the second Hold of the last Ninjutsu cast, non-DoT DMG of the current Ninjutsu skill cast is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110930031.description: Depending on the DMG attribute of herself and of her teammates, Kuninotokotachi's corresponding attribute DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> when she enters the field. Effects of the same attribute do not stack.

110930032.description:
Ninjutsu skills inflict various ailments on enemies hit.
Rain of Kunai: inflicts enemies hit with Armor Break and lowers their DEF by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.
Wondrous Thunder: When the final strike results in a hit, the enemy hit is inflicted with Stun for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds.
Razer Whirlwind: Enemies hit are inflicted with Weak and their ATK is lowered by <color=#E78300>{4}</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color> seconds.
Tectonic Blast: Enemies hit are inflicted with Scorch for <color=#E78300>{7}</color> seconds.
Scorch: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{6}</color> of ATK every <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds for <color=#E78300>{7}</color> seconds.

110930033.description: The Crit Rate of non-DoT attacks on enemies with Control Resistance active is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110940011.description: Takes <color=#E78300>{1}</color> less DMG during Execution when in Cannon Tower form.

110940012.description: Restores <color=#E78300>{1}</color> Divine Grace <color=#E78300>every</color> second. Normal attacks no longer grant Divine Grace.

110940021.description: Increases the Base DMG of Specter Blast by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110940022.description: When Specter Blast hits, a magic fog lasting <color=#E78300>6</color>s appears, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK, and inflicts Confuse on enemies hit. The Confuse lasts for another <color=#E78300>{1}</color>s when they get out of the fog.

110940023.description: When Nightmare Harvest hits the magic fog, an additional explosion occurs and inflicts an AoE Knockup, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK.

110940031.description: Increases the DMG dealt to normal enemies by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110940032.description: Inflicts Drag on enemies with the cannon shots from Execution at the cost of <color=#E78300>30</color> Divine Grace per shot.

110940033.description: Expands the area of effect of the explosion and drag of Execution by <color=#E78300>60%</color>.

110950012.description:
Restores <color=#E78300>1</color> Energy with every hit landed with a normal attack or skill attack when not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state.
Depletes <color=#E78300>1</color> Energy every <color=#E78300>0.15</color>s instead when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state.

110950013.description: Increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state. Grants <color=#E78300>20</color> Energy every time an enemy is defeated.

110950021.description:
Tap the Normal Attack button within <color=#E78300>3</color>s of triggering Extremity Dodge with Dance On Edge or Spin On Edge to also unleash Invisible String.
Increases the non-DoT Skill DMG of hits landed with Invisible String by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110950022.description:
Each use of Invisible String grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109504)>Threadedge</material>. Each stack of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109504)>Threadedge</material> increases Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> and Armor Pierce by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>, and effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>7</color> times. Every hit from the enemy removes <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109504)>Threadedge</material>.
Grants a full stack of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109504)>Threadedge</material> when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state, and hits from the enemy do not affect this stack count.

110950023.description:
Tap the Normal Attack button within <color=#E78300>3</color>s of expending <color=#E78300>2</color> marks to unleash The Stitch to also unleash Invisible String.
Also increases Independent DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> when the stack count of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109504)>Threadedge</material> is at <color=#E78300>7</color>.

110950031.description:
Increases the non-DoT Skill DMG of hits landed with Dance On Edge, Spin On Edge, Silverdrop, and Shadowcut by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> when not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state.
Increases the non-DoT Skill DMG of hits landed with Spin On Edge, Shadowcut, The Stitch: Edge, and The Stitch: Thread by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state.

110950032.description:
Hits landed with Dance On Edge, Spin On Edge, and The Stitch: Edge also inflict the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109502)>Featherblade</material> mark on the enemy, while hits landed with Silverdrop, Shadowcut, and The Stitch: Thread also apply the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109503)>Silverthread</material> mark on them. Only <color=#E78300>1</color> instance of each mark type may be present at any one time.
<color=#E78300>2</color>s after the enemy is afflicted with <color=#E78300>2</color> mark types, clears all marks and applies Armor Break on the enemy, reducing their DEF by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s and slowing their movements to <color=#E78300>75%</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s.

110950033.description:
Increases the ATK of all team members by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> if everyone's Crit DMG on the team has been boosted by more than <color=#E78300>70%</color> at the start of battle.
Also increases the Independent DMG of all team members by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state.

110960011.description: Restores <color=#E78300>{1}</color> Rage and HP equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK <color=#E78300>every</color> second when Mod is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109601)>Vector Acceleration</material> state.

110960012.description: The higher the Rage, the more Non-DoT DMG is dealt to the enemy by the follow-up attack with Ride with the Wind, up to a maximum of <color=#E78300>100%</color>.

110960013.description: Increases Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> when Rage is at <color=#E78300>80</color> or above.

110960021.description: Increases Ultimate Skill charge speed by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110960022.description: Extends the duration of the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109602)>Windchaser Mark</material> by <color=#E78300>5</color>s.

110960023.description: Increases the Non-DoT DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> when a teammate attacks a target with the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109602)>Windchaser Mark</material> from downwind.

110960031.description: Grants <color=#E78300>2</color> Rage upon each enemy hit with the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109602)>Windchaser Mark</material> from downwind.

110960032.description: Automatically moves downwind of the enemy when casting Ride with the Wind upon an enemy with the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109602)>Windchaser Mark</material>. Casting this skill from downwind of a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109602)>Windchaser Mark</material> immediately triggers the follow-up attack of Ride with the Wind, then goes into CD.

110960033.description: Blue Streak will now also pull in surrounding enemies.

110970011.description: Increases the Non-DoT DMG dealt by subsequent hits by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> each time Counting Sheep hits.

110970012.description: Reduces the Light RES and Shadow RES of any enemies hit by Counting Sheep within Dreamscape generated by Skill 2 by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

110970013.description: Resets the CD of Counting Sheep when the Mod triggers the Dodge effect.

110970021.description: Extends the charge time of Hollow Dream, and grants <color=#E78300>2</color> additional charges. Also increases Charge Skill DMG of each charge to <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110970022.description: When Dodge effect is not in CD, triggers Dodge effect and blocks damage if Mod is hit while Hollow Dream is charging. Mod does not go into Stagger and the charging can not be interrupted, either. Also inflicts Shackle on surrounding enemies for <color=#E78300>5</color>s.

110970023.description: Deals to surrounding enemies Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK every <color=#E78300>0.5</color> to <color=#E78300>1</color> second while Hollow Dream is charging.

110970031.description: Grants <color=#E78300>{1}</color> Energy when Shackle is inflicted on the enemy. Triggers only once every <color=#E78300>3</color>s.

110970032.description: Increases the effect of Fairytale Illustrated by <color=#E78300>30%</color>.

110970033.description: The effect of Fairytale Illustrated now lasts up to <color=#E78300>60</color>s until it is stopped or until Energy runs out. During this time, no longer grants Energy and also expends <color=#E78300>3</color> Energy <color=#E78300>every</color> second. Skill enters CD when this effect ends. Casting Counting Sheep while Fairytale Illustrated is active no longer expends Energy. Shortens the CD of Fairytale Illustrated by <color=#E78300>16</color>s.

110990011.description: The Divine Grace granted by Lunar Arc Slash is increased by another <color=#E78300>3</color>.

110990012.description: The Base DMG of Lunar Arc Slash is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110990013.description: Every hit landed using Lunar Arc Slash has a <color=#E78300>25%</color> chance of resetting the CD of a random skill or Ultimate Skill. Effect can trigger once each time Lunar Arc Slash is cast.

110990021.description: Non-DoT DMG of hits landed with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109901)>Bo</material> is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110990022.description: Each time the enemy is defeated using <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109901)>Bo</material>, the remaining cd of the skill is shortened by <color=#E78300>30%</color>, and the Mod enters Zero Time for <color=#E78300>4</color> seconds.

110990023.description: When in Zero Time, increases Divine Grace charge speed by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

110990031.description: The cd of Sakubo: Moonlit Night is shortened by <color=#E78300>8</color> seconds.

110990032.description: For every hit landed with Saku: Moonlit Night, increases subsequent non-DoT DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>, up to <color=#E78300>180%</color>.

110990033.description: When Saku: Moonlit Night is cast, additional strikes may be unleashed with the expenditure of <color=#E78300>20</color> Divine Grace.

111110011.description:
When not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode and a hit is landed with Soul Death, the Wind Res of the enemy hit is lowered by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode, landing a hit with Soul Death inflicts the enemy hit with Wind RES of <color=#E78300>{3}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

111110012.description:
When not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode and a hit is landed with Darkwing Scythe, the enemy is also inflicted with Weak, with ATK lowered by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode, landing a hit with Darkwing Scythe inflicts the enemy hit with Weak and lowers their ATK by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

111110013.description:
When not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode and each time a hit is landed on the enemy with Spin of Death, increases subsequent Base DMG have a <color=#E78300>{1}</color> boost. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>0.3</color> seconds.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode, landing a hit with Spin of Death increases the subsequent Base DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>. Effect triggers only once every <color=#E78300>0.3</color>s.

111110021.description: When Hell to Pay is cast, Osiris' Max HP increases by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>5</color> times.

111110022.description: The lower Osiris' HP, the higher non-DoT DMG dealt with Darkwing Scythe upon hit. This effect DMG bonus is capped at <color=#E78300>150%</color>.

111110023.description: <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode is changed to: <color=#E78300>10%</color> HP loss per second. When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode, Osiris will absorb non-fatal DMG, with <color=#E78300>100%</color> of this DMG then converted into HP. This conversion occurs until Max HP has been reached.

111110031.description: Osiris recovers HP equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK when an enemy with Weak is defeated. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>1</color> seconds.

111110032.description: When Osiris enters the battlefield, <color=#E78300>3</color>× DMG Reduction is granted immediately, and then another <color=#E78300>1</color>× is granted every <color=#E78300>20</color> seconds subsequently. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times, with each addition to the stack reducing the DMG taken by Osiris by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. Each time Osiris takes DMG, she loses <color=#E78300>1</color>× Damage Reduction.

111110033.description: When Osiris is not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode, she automatically avoids damage that would be otherwise fatal and is granted Invincible for <color=#E78300>5</color> seconds. This also resets the Ultimate Skill cd for Osiris and any Mod with whom she has a preset Ultimate Skillchain, and restores <color=#E78300>100%</color> Ultimate Skill charge. Effect can trigger once every battle.

111190011.description:
Within <color=#E78300>5</color>s after hitting the enemy with a follow-up attack/counterattack or Shifting Squall, switching to the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111901)>attack stance</material> by tapping Shifting Winds while casting Storm Howl, Whirlwind Whisk, Shifting Squall or while launching a follow-up attack/counterattack will unleash a special attack, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK (<color=#E78300>+{2}</color> for every level Skill 1 is upgraded) in total.
Tapping Shifting Winds during unleashing of the special attack will also switch stance.

111190012.description:
Enters Block state for a short while when launching the special attack. Grants the following effects upon successfully blocking damage:
Extends the Block state by <color=#E78300>1</color>s. Increases Thunder DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s. These effects can be triggered only once every special attack launched.

111190013.description:
When Shifting Winds is in CD, you can still tap on Shifting Winds during normal attacks to switch between stances.
After successfully blocking damage with the special attack, a second special attack can be triggered by switching to the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111901)>attack stance</material> during normal attacks when Shifting Winds is in CD.
The Thunder DMG boost from the Aether Code Thundercall Sandstorm - Gale can stack up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times.

111190021.description: Increases the Base DMG of a counterattack triggered after a skill hit and before the end of the skill action by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

111190022.description: Grants <color=#E78300>1</color> stack of ATK bonus upon <color=#E78300>each</color> hit with a follow-up attack or counterattack. Each stack increases Mod's ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>; stacks up to <color=#E78300>6</color> times,. Taking damage and losing HP deducts <color=#E78300>2</color> stacks of ATK bonus. Increases Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> when there are <color=#E78300>6</color> stacks of ATK Bonus.

111190023.description:
Also blocks DMG from the enemy and triggers a counterattack when Mod is hit while casting Shifting Squall in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111902)>defensive stance</material> or while switching to the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111902)>defensive stance</material> when casting Shifting Squall.
When this counterattack hits, reduces the enemy's Thunder RES by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> and their Wind RES by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s.

111190031.description: Increases the Non-DoT DMG of Shifting Squall by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> in either stance for every <color=#E78300>1</color> Mark of the corresponding stance owned.

111190032.description:
Grants an additional attack to the Shifting Squall cast in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111901)>attack stance</material> when Mod has least <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111903)>Lightning Rod</material> Mark, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK (<color=#E78300>+{2}</color> for every level Skill 1 is upgraded) in total. For every <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111903)>Lightning Rod</material> Mark owned, increases the Non-DoT DMG of the additional attack by <color=#E78300>20%</color>.
Mod enters Zero Time for <color=#E78300>0.8</color>s when landing a hit with Shifting Squall cast in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111902)>defensive stance</material> with at least <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111904)>Hillshook</material> Mark. Extends the duration of this Zero Time by <color=#E78300>0.2</color>s for every <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111904)>Hillshook</material> Mark owned.

111190033.description:
Casting Shifting Squall expends only the Mark corresponding to the stance.
Switches to the other stance when Shifting Squall is cast without Marks expended, and expends all Marks upon the next Shifting Squall cast.

111270011.description: Shortens the remaining CD of various skills depending on which Mark is expended when Azure Aid is cast. Expending the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(112701)>Countertide</material> Mark shortens the remaining CD of Leapin' Krakens by <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds, while expending the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(112702)>Whalesong</material> Mark shortens the remaining CD of Tide Summon by <color=#E78300>4</color> seconds.

111270012.description:
When Mod has fewer than <color=#E78300>4</color> Traces while Undercurrent is in CD, tapping on Undercurrent activates <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(112703)>Sensor</material> state for <color=#E78300>0.5</color> seconds. Triggers only once during every Undercurrent CD.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(112703)>Sensor</material>: Mod is Invincible for <color=#E78300>1</color> second when in Stagger.

111270013.description: Shortens the remaining CD of Undercurrent by <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds if Mod goes into Stagger while in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(112703)>Sensor</material> state, and also deals to nearby enemies Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Triggers only once during every Undercurrent CD.

111270021.description: Increases the DMG dealt with normal attack by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> when a skill or Ultimate Skill is cast, and further increases the DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds for every <color=#E78300>1</color> Mark active.

111270022.description:
Grants a <color=#E78300>30%</color> chance of triggering the following effects when landing a Crit with normal attack:
Grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Mark not obtained yet when the count of Marks is not at max.
Increases Mod's Melee DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds when the count of Marks is at max.

111270023.description:
Normal attacks inflict enemies hit with the following effects:
Inflicts Armor Break on the enemy hit and decreases their DEF by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds when Mod has active Marks.
Decreases the enemy's Water RES by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds when the count of Marks is at max.

111270031.description: Increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds when a skill or Ultimate Skill is cast; stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times.

111270032.description: Restores to all nearby allies <color=#E78300>15%</color> of the HP they have lost when Azure Aid is cast. Effect is not impacted by boosts or reduction of healing bonuses.

111270033.description: Increases healing effect when Azure Aid is cast. Increases healing effect by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds for every <color=#E78300>1</color> Mark owned.

111320011.description: When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113201)>Burning Sword</material> stance, increases the Non-DoT DMG of normal attacks and skill attacks by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. When the longsword tossed hits an enemy, it will continue following them.

111320012.description: Tapping Trial of Heat again after casting it no longer summons back the spinning sword. Instead, it teleports the Mod to the sword's location to retrieve it. The earlier the sword is retrieved, the more the remaining CD of Trial of Heat will be shortened (up to <color=#E78300>12</color>s of time cut).

111320013.description: When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113201)>Burning Sword</material> stance, grants <color=#E78300>1</color> stack of ATK boost every <color=#E78300>2</color>s. When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113202)>Blazing Armor</material> stance, removes <color=#E78300>1</color> stack of ATK boost every <color=#E78300>2</color>s. Effect can stack up to <color=#E78300>10</color>times, and each stack increases the Mod's ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

111320021.description: When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113202)>Blazing Armor</material> stance, increases Non-DoT DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> and grants <color=#E78300>3</color> Rage every <color=#E78300>0.5</color>s.

111320022.description:
Grants the following effects when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113202)>Blazing Armor</material> stance:
When Pyro Predator hits the returning spinning sword, the Mod can toss the spinning sword again for another attack and the sword's duration will be rest. Then, resets the CD of Pyro Predator as well.
When the spinning sword is tossed again, its Non-DoT DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>; stacks up to <color=#E78300>2</color> times.
After the spinning sword has been tossed again, the next tap of Normal Attack will teleport the Mod to the locked-on enemy's side and immediately launch the last strike of a normal attack.
Casting Trial of Heat resets the CD of Pyro Predator.
This Aether Code effect will be removed when Burning Sanction - Ignition is activated.

111320023.description:
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113201)>Burning Sword</material> stance, every hit landed with a normal attack shortens the remaining CD of Trial of Heat by <color=#E78300>0.5</color>s.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113202)>Blazing Armor</material> stance, casting Flaring Assault expends all Rage, and every <color=#E78300>1</color> Rage expended increases Base DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. After the Ultimate Skill is cast, resets the CD of Trial of Heat.

111320031.description:
The lower the Mod's HP, the more DMG they deal (up to <color=#E78300>30%</color>).
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113201)>Burning Sword</material> stance, every time a normal attack is launched, a DMG equal to <color=#E78300>2%</color> of Max HP will be dealt to the Mod. And every time a strike of Flaring Assault or Pyro Predator is lauched, a DMG equal to <color=#E78300>10%</color> of Max HP will be dealt to the Mod.

111320032.description:
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113201)>Burning Sword</material> stance, a hit landed with either Flaring Assault or Pyro Predator will inflict <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113203)>Burning Sinner</material> state on the enemy hit for <color=#E78300>20</color>s.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113202)>Blazing Armor</material> stance, Mod deals to enemies in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113203)>Burning Sinner</material> state <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more Non-DoT Fire DMG, and each normal attack hit restores <color=#E78300>{2}</color> HP (<color=#E78300>{3}</color> when Mod's HP is at <color=#E78300>50%</color> or lower). When the longsword is summoned back, shortens the remaining CD of Trial of Heat by <color=#E78300>9</color>s.

111320033.description: Creates an explosion when a hit is landed on an enemy in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113203)>Burning Sinner</material> state, dealing to surrounding enemies Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Effect triggers only once every <color=#E78300>10</color>s. Resets the effect's CD when the Mod defeats an enemy in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113203)>Burning Sinner</material> state.

111380011.description: Falling Stars can be charged <color=#E78300>2</color> times and can summon <color=#E78300>2</color> more meteors.

111380012.description: Increases the amount of skill DMG dealt to the enemy by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> upon <color=#E78300>each</color> hit with a skill or Ultimate Skill for <color=#E78300>3</color>s; stacks up to <color=#E78300>12</color> times.

111380013.description: Increases Mod's skill and Ultimate Skill Non-DoT Crit Rate and Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> when the DMG boost granted by Aether Code: Ocean of Stars - Power of the Heavens reaches <color=#E78300>8%</color>.

111380021.description: Increases the Non-DoT DMG of Phantasmal Lightdance by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

111380022.description: Increases DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>12%</color> when the Mod enters Zero Time. Effect increases by <color=#E78300>12%</color> <color=#E78300>every</color> second, up to a maximum of <color=#E78300>60%</color>.

111380023.description: Extends the duration of Zero Time triggered by the Mod by <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

111380031.description: Shortens the CD of Dawn Wish by <color=#E78300>5</color>s.

111380032.description: Dawn Wish no longer count the Mod as a target. Increases Mod's ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s upon cast.

111380033.description: Increases the additional ATK of the selected target of Dawn Wish by an amount equal to <color=#E78300>25%</color> of Mod's ATK for <color=#E78300>{1}</color>s.

111390011.description: When a repeat skill cast with Snow Echo results in a hit on the enemy, <color=#E78300>each</color> time the enemy is hit Poseidon obtains Energy <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more quickly for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times.

111390012.description: During a repeat skill cast with Snow Echo, for every <color=#E78300>1</color> Energy expended, Poseidon's ATK is increased by <color=#E78300>2%</color> for <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

111390013.description: When Poseidon is <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material> state, the effect bonuses from the Aether Codes: Sparkling Winter - Frost Crystal and Sparkling Winter - Sealed are increased by <color=#E78300>50%</color> when activated, and also last until <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material> ends.

111390021.description: Grants <color=#E78300>{1}</color> Energy when Freeze is inflicted on the enemy.

111390022.description: After every <color=#E78300>5</color>hits landed with the Additional Chant attack in Matter Frozen, the skill's follow-up attack will also inflict Freeze on enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

111390023.description: Enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material> state with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113902)>Icy</material> Marks expended. After <color=#E78300>15</color> enemy hits have been landed, each time an attack results in a hit her Teammates receive an Ice DMG boost for <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds, and for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> of the enemy's Ice Res lowered, Ice DMG is also increased by <color=#E78300>1%</color>. The effect Ice DMG boost is capped at <color=#E78300>20%</color>.

111390031.description: When Poseidon is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material> state, casting of either Zero Mansard or Matter Frozen shortens the other skill's remaining cd by <color=#E78300>50%</color>.

111390032.description: When Poseidon is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material> state, casting of Zero Mansard or Matter Frozen increases her Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>5</color> times.

111390033.description: The duration of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material> is extended by <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds.

111480011.description: Grenade inflicts Armor Break on enemies hit, lowering their DEF by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

111480012.description: The explosion radius of the Grenade is increased by <color=#E78300>16.67%</color>.

111480013.description: The Grenade travels <color=#E78300>150%</color> further, and briefly tracks the enemy when in the air.

111480021.description: When a hit is landed on an enemy with Armor Break using Chained Crosshair, the non-DoT Crit Rate of that hit is increased by <color=#E78300>100%</color>.

111480022.description: With every <color=#E78300>5</color> hits landed with Chained Crosshair, an explosion occurs at the target location, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK.

111480023.description: Casting Chained Crosshair now unleashes fires two additional rounds at the enemy.

111480031.description: Every <color=#E78300>1</color> hit landed with a normal attack has a <color=#E78300>10%</color> chance of granting <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace.

111480032.description: Mod deals <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more Physical DMG for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds when obtaining or restoring a Trace.

111480033.description: Whenever the Mod obtains <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace, shortens the remaining cd of a random skill by <color=#E78300>0.5</color> seconds.

111500011.description: Restores HP equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK when this Mod defeats an enemy.

111500012.description: Takes <color=#E78300>{1}</color> less DMG when in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115001)>Sakuya</material> state, and gains Unyielding when casting Kata 1: Halt or Kata 3: Dance.

111500013.description:
When Divine Grace is <color=#E78300>0</color> while in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115001)>Sakuya</material> state, enters HP Removal state. Removes HP equal to <color=#E78300>1%</color> of Max HP every <color=#E78300>0.1</color>s.
When in the HP Removal state, gains <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115003)>Blossom</material> Mark each time a strike from Kata 1: Halt or Kata 3: Dance hits.
Exits the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115001)>Sakuya</material> state when HP reaches <color=#E78300>1</color>. Casting Kata 9: Fallen Sakura removes the HP Removal state of the Mod.

111500021.description:
When in possession of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115003)>Blossom</material> Marks, tapping on Normal Attack no longer triggers Kata 9: Crimson Shadow.
When launching a Normal Attack in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115001)>Sakuya</material> state, hold the Normal Attack button again and release at the right moment to expend <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115003)>Blossom</material> Mark and trigger Kata 2: Disillusion.

111500022.description: When casting Kata 2: Disillusion, quickly hold Normal Attack and release at the right moment to follow up with a Kata 2: Disillusion.

111500023.description:
When casting or following up with a Kata 2: Disillusion which expends <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115003)>Blossom</material> Marks, the next cast of Kata 2: Disillusion as a follow-up attack will not expend <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115003)>Blossom</material> Marks.
Each time this skill is cast as a follow-up attack, its Non-DoT Independent DMG for this attack increases by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times. All stacks are removed if the follow-up is unsuccessful.

111500031.description: Restores Divine Grace to full when entering the battle.

111500032.description:
When Kata 9: Crimson Shadow is successively cast as a follow-up attack, the second cast of it will unleash a Kata 9: Crimson Bloom instead, and the third cast of it will unleash a Kata 9: Scattered Sakura instead.
Kata 9: Crimson Bloom: Deals Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK (<color=#E78300>+{2}</color> for every level Skill 3 is upgraded) in total.
Kata 9: Scattered Sakura: Deals Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK (<color=#E78300>+{4}</color> for every level Skill 3 is upgraded) in total.

111500033.description:
When in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115001)>Sakuya</material> state and in possession of Divine Grace, increases the Non-DoT ATK of Normal Attacks, Kata 1: Halt, Kata 3: Dance, Kata 9: Crimson Shadow, Kata 9: Crimson Bloom, and Kata 9: Scattered Sakura by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.
Increase the Non-DoT Independent DMG of Kata 9: Fallen Sakura by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for every <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115002)>Ominous Blossom</material> expended.

111580011.description: Duration of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115804)>Kindle</material> is extended until the enemy is defeated. Attacks from enemies in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115804)>Kindle</material> state will not interrupt the Mod's actions, but the Mod will stop blocking DMG from said enemies. When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115802)>Heartsear</material> levels up, <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115804)>Kindle</material> is inflicted on locked enemies.

111580012.description:
Deals <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more DMG to Visbane enemies for every <color=#E78300>9%</color> HP the Mod has already lost (up to <color=#E78300>55%</color> DMG boost against Visbane enemies).
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115804)>Kindle</material> state, the Mod takes <color=#E78300>{2}</color> less DMG.

111580013.description:
When the Mod is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115801)>Smelt</material> state, for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> HP already lost, deals additional Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK to enemies inflicted with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115804)>Kindle</material> every <color=#E78300>0.2</color>s (up to <color=#E78300>240%</color> DMG boost each time).
When following up with Madoibi Flicker or Flashfire Execution in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115801)>Smelt</material> state, gains Unyielding and takes <color=#E78300>{2}</color> less DMG.

111580022.description: When the Mod is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115804)>Kindle</material> state, restores HP equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK after hitting an enemy. Effect can trigger only once every <color=#E78300>4</color>s.

111580023.description: With every <color=#E78300>1</color> level of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115802)>Heartsear</material>, ATK increases by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>, Skill DMG increases by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>, and Armor Pierce increases by <color=#E78300>{3}</color>.

111580031.description: When attacked while following up with Madoibi Flicker or Flashfire Execution, the respective Skill Base DMG increases by <color=#E78300>10%, 15%, or 20%</color> according to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115802)>Heartsear's</material> level (up to <color=#E78300>120%</color> Skill Base DMG boost can be granted by <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115802)>Heartsear</material>).

111580032.description: When HP is at <color=#E78300>1</color>, Fire DMG increases by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> with every <color=#E78300>1,000</color> Max HP (up to <color=#E78300>24%</color> Fire DMG boost can be granted by this effect). Effect is removed once HP is over <color=#E78300>50%</color>.

111580033.description:
When HP is at <color=#E78300>1</color>, automatically charges Madoibi, restoring <color=#E78300>4%</color> charge every <color=#E78300>0.1</color>s.
The HP recovery effect of Flashfire Execution turns into <color=#E78300>80%, 100%, or 120%</color>.
When entering the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115801)>Smelt</material> state, inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115805)>Flare: Kindle</material> on the Mod and the locked enemy for up to <color=#E78300>4</color>s. Only 1 enemy on the field can be inflicted with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115805)>Flare: Kindle</material> at a time.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115805)>Flare: Kindle</material>: The Mod can block DMG from enemies inflicted with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115805)>Flare: Kindle</material> <color=#E78300>2</color> times. When the enemy with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115805)>Flare: Kindle</material> is defeated, also removes <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115805)>Flare: Kindle</material> from the Mod.

111840011.description: Use of Shield Throw inflicts Stun on enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{1}</color> seconds.

111840012.description: Use of Shield Throw also leads to a shield ricochet, dealing Thunder DMG equal to<color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK each time. The shield can ricochet up to <color=#E78300>5</color> times, and each time a hit is landed <color=#E78300>18</color> Divine Grace is granted.

111840013.description: Each time a ricochet occurs with Shield Throw, <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more non-DoT DMG is dealt on subsequent hits.

111840021.description: The shield in Counter Strike is raised for only <color=#E78300>50%</color> of the original duration. When a hit is landed with a post-block counterattack, <color=#E78300>15</color> additional Divine Grace is granted, and counterattacks deal <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more Non-DoT DMG on hit.

111840022.description: The more Divine Grace Verthandi has, the more her ATK is increased; the effect caps at <color=#E78300>100%</color>. When Divine Grace is expended with the casting of Protection of Faith, the ATK boost will remain unchanged for the next <color=#E78300>1</color> second.

111840023.description: A successful Block performed with Counter Strike resets the cooldown time of Protection of Faith, and <color=#E78300>each</color> time a normal attack results in a hit on the enemy <color=#E78300>{1}</color> Divine Grace is granted. Effect lasts <color=#E78300>9</color> seconds.

111840031.description: The Mod gains <color=#E78300>{1}</color> Divine Grace when a teammate takes damage.

111840032.description: The Shield from Protection of Faith has <color=#E78300>20%</color> more shield value.

111840033.description: Verthandi's Teammates are now also granted a Shield when Protection of Faith is cast. (The value of the Shields granted is determined by the respective Teammate's Max HP.)

111970011.description: Increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119705)>Roused</material> is triggered. Stacks up to <color=#E78300>6</color> times.

111970012.description: Triggers <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119705)>Roused</material> <color=#E78300>1</color> time in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material> state whenever anyone on the team triggers the Dodge effect.

111970013.description: Upon entering <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material> state, reduces Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>, and increases ATK of all team members by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>. <color=#E78300>15</color>s later, reduces Energy charge speed by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> until <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material> state ends.

111970021.description:
Increases the Crit Rate of all team members by <color=#E78300>{1} or {2}</color> depending on the number of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119701)>Nightmares</material>.
Also increases the Crit DMG of all team members by <color=#E78300>{3} or {4}</color> depending on the number of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119702)>Sweet Dreams</material>.

111970022.description: Deals <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more Shadow DMG until <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material> state ends whenever a member of the team triggers the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119704)>Dreamful Slumber</material> effect. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>25</color> times.

111970023.description: Grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Energy whenever any team member crits. Reduces max Energy by <color=#E78300>1</color> when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material> state. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>0.2</color>s, and max Energy may be lowered by up to <color=#E78300>30</color> points. The max Energy debuff is removed when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material> ends or is refreshed.

111970031.description: Triggers Lucid Dream from Gates of Horn once every <color=#E78300>3</color>s instead during <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material> state.

111970032.description:
