No longer grants Energy based on <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119701)>Nightmares</material> expended. Instead, expending <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119701)>Nightmare</material> grants <color=#E78300>15</color> Energy.
No longer grants Attack boosts based on expended <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119702)>Sweet Dreams</material>. Instead, expending <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119702)>Sweet Dream</material> grants <color=#E78300>5</color> ATK boosts.

111970033.description:
Lucid Dream from Gates of Horn comes with various effects depending on the skill used lately:
Eternal Slumber or Deep Dream used: Lucid Dream from Gates of Horn deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK (<color=#E78300>+{2}</color> ATK for every level Skill 3 is upgraded) in total. Then, grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Energy each time there is a change in a teammate's combat resources within the next <color=#E78300>5</color>s. Grants <color=#E78300>2</color> Energy instead if in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material> state.
Distant Day Dream or Day Dream used: Lucid Dream from Gates of Horn deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK (<color=#E78300>+{4}</color> ATK for every level Skill 3 is upgraded) in total. Then, grants all team members <color=#E78300>1</color> ATK boost for every <color=#E78300>15</color> hits landed by a teammate within the next <color=#E78300>10</color>s. Every <color=#E78300>1</color> boost increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{5}</color> for <color=#E78300>{6}</color>s, and stacks up to <color=#E78300>30</color> times. Grants all team members <color=#E78300>2</color> ATK boosts instead when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material> state.

111990011.description: The Rage expenditure of Thunder: Ardent Light is reduced by <color=#E78300>10</color>.

111990012.description: When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material> is inflicted on the enemy through ways apart from Thunder: Ardent Light, the cd of Thunder: Ardent Light is reset.

111990013.description: Each time a Thunder: Ardent Light attack results in a hit, non-DoT DMG of the third move of Thunder: Out of the Blue is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times.

111990021.description: Each time the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material> is cleared from the enemy, or an enemy with the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material> is defeated, <color=#E78300>{1}</color> Rage is granted.

111990022.description: Each time the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material> is cleared or when an enemy with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material> is defeated, the remaining cd of skills (including Ultimate Skill) is shortened by <color=#E78300>1.5</color> seconds.

111990023.description: Use of the third move of Thunder: Out of the Blue also clears the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material>, and when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material> is cleared, Thunder DMG dealt is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

111990031.description: When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material> is inflicted on an enemy, Tsukuyomi's Crit Rate is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

111990032.description: When the last strike of a normal attack results in a hit or when a skill cast by tapping on Normal Attack after Extremity Dodge results in a hit, there is a <color=#E78300>50%</color> chance of inflicting <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material> on enemies hit.

111990033.description: Hits landed on enemies with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material> deal <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more Non-DoT DMG.

112840011.description:
Grants <color=#E78300>5</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Dawn</material> for every hit landed with a counterattack when not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128402)>Decision</material> state.
Slash of Glare may be used to connect right after by tapping the normal attack button after the counterattack.

112840012.description:
When not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128402)>Decision</material> state: Every hit landed with Brilliance triggers an additional attack, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Hits with Choice trigger an additional attack, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128402)>Decision</material> state: Every hit landed with Brilliance triggers an additional attack, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total. Hits landed with Choice trigger an additional attack, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK in total.

112840013.description: Each normal attack or Flash of Brilliance, Flash, Brilliance, Ripple of Fate, Destiny, or Choice attack comes with a brief block, and a successful block triggers one additional attack which deals Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. This additional attack can trigger once every <color=#E78300>1</color>s.

112840021.description: Increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128402)>Decision</material> state.

112840022.description: Increases the non-DoT DMG of the triggered Hand of Judgment attack by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> and the Mod Index Multiplier by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>.

112840023.description: Grants <color=#E78300>3</color> Divine Grace every <color=#E78300>0.2</color>s when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128402)>Decision</material> state. When Flash of Brilliance or Ripple of Fate are used, these skills will only be replaced by Brilliance and Choice respectively.

112840031.description: Grants <color=#E78300>50</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Dawn</material> when entering the battle.

112840032.description:
Shortens the remaining CD of Flash of Brilliance by <color=#E78300>4</color>s when neither Flash nor Brilliance is used as a follow-up to Flash of Brilliance. Shortens the remaining CD of Ripple of Fate by <color=#E78300>4</color>s when neither Destiny nor Choice is used in a follow-up to Ripple of Fate.
Use of Slash of Glare when the Dodge effect is not in CD also triggers the Dodge effect, which then goes into CD after.

112840033.description: Tap the normal attack button repeatedly after the third strike of a normal attack (without connecting with a fourth) within a certain time to unleash the attack. This deals Light DMG equal to ATK × <color=#E78300>{1}</color> (<color=#E78300>+{2}</color> for every level the normal attack is upgraded), <color=#E78300>{3}</color> (<color=#E78300>+{4}</color> for every level the normal attack is upgraded), and <color=#E78300>{5}</color> (<color=#E78300>+{6}</color> for every level the normal attack is upgraded) in order. Every hit landed with this attack also grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Dawn</material>. The last strike of the attack will expend all available Divine Grace, and deals more <color=#E78300>{7}</color> Non-DoT Normal Attack DMG on hit for every <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace expended. During the last strike of the attack, Slash of Conviction is replaced by Slash of Glare, which may be followed up with Slash of Glare.

200000001.description: Blue Whalesong deals to enemies within range Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

200000002.description: Increases the HP recovery effect from Blue Whalesong by <color=#E78300>20%</color>.

200000003.description: Blue Whalesong restores HP to the entire team and does not require selection of a target area.

200000004.description: Shortens the CD of Repeat Bombardment by <color=#E78300>3</color>s.

200000005.description: Increases the range of Repeat Bombardment by <color=#E78300>60%</color> and its Non-DoT Base DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

200000006.description: BunBun Strike deals <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more Non-DoT DMG to enemies afflicted with Armor Break on hit.

200000007.description:
The Base DMG of Burning Dance is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>, and <color=#E78300>each</color> hit has a <color=#E78300>10%</color> chance of granting <color=#E78300>1</color> additional Trace.
<color=#E78300>Each</color> time Burning Dance lands a hit on the enemy, the remaining CD of Dodge effect is shortened by <color=#E78300>0.2</color>s.

200000008.description: When Dodge effect is triggered by the Mod, grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace and triggers Burning Dance upon the locked-on enemy. This particular trigger does not send the skill into cooldown.

200000010.description: Increases subsequent non-DoT DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>each time a hit is landed with Saku: Final Moon, up to <color=#E78300>180%</color>.

200000011.description: Grants an set of optional additional attacks with the expenditure of <color=#E78300>20</color> Divine Grace after casting Saku: Final Moon.

200000013.description: Increases the Base DMG of Breakthrough by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

200000014.description: Increases Trace limit by <color=#E78300>3</color>. Expands all Traces active at the time of casting Breakthrough when landing a hit with it, and for <color=#E78300>each</color> Trace expended increases the Base DMG of the skill by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

200000015.description: Resets the cd of Surging Wind whenever landing a hit with Breakthrough. Lower the Wind Resistance of enemies hit by Surging Wind by<color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds when this Mod has any active Trace.

The AoE attack of the Normal Attack deals Ice DMG to enemies in Freeze equal to <color=#E78300>375%</color> ATK.

Phantom Blast inflicts Trauma on enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.
Trauma: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK every <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds; effect can be stacked.

200000019.description: Shortens the cd of Phantom Blast by <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds. When this Mod triggers the Dodge effect, shortens the remaining cd of Phantom Blast by <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds.

200000020.description: Increases the effect of Garden of Dreams by <color=#E78300>30%</color>.

Casting of Counting Sheep while Garden of Dreams is ongoing no longer expends Energy and shortens the CD of Garden of Dreams by <color=#E78300>16</color>s.

200000023.description: Shining Blast will inflict Trauma to enemies hit, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK every <color=#E78300>3</color>s for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s. This effect can be stacked.

200000024.description: Shortens the CD of Shining Blast by <color=#E78300>2</color>s. When Mod triggers the Dodge effect, shortens the CD of Shining Blast by <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

200000025.description: Increases the Non-DoT DMG dealt by Feathers Fantastical by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

200000026.description: When the share effect of Gensrealm Ultimate is triggered, increases the Crit Rate of teammates within the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Realm of Truth</material> by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s; stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times.

200000027.description: After casting Gensrealm Ultimate, summons an extra Wheel of Admonishment of Final Warning on a random enemy within the most recently generated <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Realm of Truth</material> every <color=#E78300>5</color>s.

The earlier the sword is recovered, the more the remaining CD of Trial of Heat is shortened, up to <color=#E78300>12</color>s each time.

Expending <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113204)>Scorch Brand</material> also increases Base DMG. Casting of Ultimate Skill resets the CD of Trial of Heat.

200001001.description: Increases the Base DMG of Raychaser Slash by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

200001004.description: Deals <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more Non-DoT DMG to enemies with Scorch on hit.

Following up with Forbidden Blade after the first or second strike of a normal attack changes the way an attack takes place with Forbidden Blade.

Following up with Forbidden Blade after the third or four strike of a normal attack changes the way the attack takes place for Forbidden Blade.
Forbidden Blade: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK (<color=#E78300>+{2}</color> for every level Skill 1 is upgraded) in total. Forbidden Blade gathers enemies within a small range and also grants <color=#E78300>{3}</color> additional Traces.

Following up Scythe-erang with Forbidden Blade changes the way the attack takes place with Forbidden Blade.
Forbidden Blade: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK (<color=#E78300>+{2}</color> for every level Skill 1 is upgraded) in total and enemy hits lowers their Physical Res by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds.

200001011.description:
When not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld</material> mode and each time a hit is landed on the enemy with Spin of Death, increases subsequent Base DMG have a <color=#E78300>{1}</color> boost. Each time Osiris takes DMG, she loses <color=#E78300>1</color>× Damage Reduction.

Every time when Rage is expended, the Base DMG of Cold Vortex increases by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s; stacks up to <color=#E78300>10</color> times.

200001022.description: The Base DMG of Polar Strike is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

Triggers only once every <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds.

200001029.description:
Normal attack hits landed on enemies in Freeze deal <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more Independent DMG.
The AoE attack of the Normal Attack deals Ice DMG to enemies in Freeze equal to <color=#E78300>750%</color> ATK.

200001030.description: When the skills of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109901)>Bo</material> defeat an enemy, the remaining CD of the skill is shortened by <color=#E78300>50%</color> and enters Zero Time for <color=#E78300>4</color> seconds. 200001039.description: The Non-DoT Crit Rate against enemies with Control RES is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> and the Crit DMG dealt to them is increased by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>.

200001044.description: Ookuninushi's BunBun Gunner deals <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more Non-DoT Base DMG to enemies inflicted with Armor Break.

Shortens the CD of Solar Blaze by <color=#E78300>8</color>s, and the skill inflicts Scorch on the enemy for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

Changes the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> stack count to <color=#E78300>35</color> upon entering <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material> state.
The whole team deals <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more Non-DoT Normal Attack DMG to enemies in Armor Break.

200001057.description: Enemies take <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more DMG from Sonic Boom for <color=#E78300>12</color>s when they are hit by it. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>12</color> times.

200001058.description: Gains <color=#E78300>2</color> Divine Grace with each strike judged as Perfectly Harmonious.

200001059.description: Increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> when the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> stack count is at <color=#E78300>7</color> or more. Gains Super Armor when the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> stack count is at <color=#E78300>35</color> or more.

200001060.description: When casting Fire Warp, Skill DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>200%</color> for <color=#E78300>{1}</color>s, expending <color=#E78300>50%</color> of current Energy.

200001061.description: When Fury of Asura lands a hit, for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> Fire DMG the Mod has, increases her Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>0.8%</color> for <color=#E78300>5</color>s.

200001062.description: Increases Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. Also increases the Non-DoT Crit DMG of Earth Shatter by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>.

200001063.description:
When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state is extended, the Mod's Fire DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>45%</color>. Stacks up to <color=#E78300>2</color> times.

200001064.description: When a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrow</material> is expended, increases Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> and Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

200001066.description: The higher the Rage, the more Non-DoT Base DMG is dealt to the enemy by the follow-up attack with Ride with the Wind, up to a maximum of <color=#E78300>100%</color> of Base DMG boost.

When the whole team attacks a target with the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109602)>Windchaser Mark</material> from downwind, increases the Non-DoT Crit DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>.

Enters Block state for a short while when launching the special attack. Grants the following effects upon successfully blocking damage:

Unleashing a special attack also triggers a Thunder DMG buff.

200001069.description: Increases the non-DoT Base DMG of counterattacks by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

200001071.description: Increases the Non-DoT Base DMG of Shifting Squall by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> in either stance for every <color=#E78300>1</color> mark of the corresponding stance owned.

200001072.description: Hits landed with Breach reset the cd of Surging Wind. When Shu casts Surging Wind with Traces active, the Wind Resistance of any enemies hit is also lowered by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

200001073.description: Resets the cd of Surging Wind whenever landing a hit with Breakthrough. Lower the Wind Resistance of enemies hit by Surging Wind by<color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds when this Mod has any active Trace.

200001074.description: A <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101901)>Sacred Gale Crystal</material> is summoned to the locked-on enemy when dodging, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK.
