200001075.description: Increases the Non-DoT DMG of normal attacks by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. A hit landed with the fifth strike of a normal attack triggers five thunderbolts, with each dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK.

200001076.description: Reduces the Thunder RES of surrounding enemies by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s each time when the Mod enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102802)>Thunder Frenzy</material> state.

200001077.description: Following up Quivers Underground, Rumbles Faraway, or Trembles Deep Within with a normal attack also starts the normal attack from the fourth strike. When a hit is landed with the fifth strike of it, the Mod's ATK will be increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

200001078.description: When a repeat skill cast with Snow Echo results in a hit on the enemy, each time the enemy is hit Poseidon obtains Energy <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more quickly for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

200001079.description: During a repeat skill cast with Snow Echo, Poseidon's ATK is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

200001080.description: Entering <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material> state by expending the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113902)>Icy Mark</material> increases the Ice DMG of all members of the team by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

200001081.description: <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material> state increases Mod's Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> and lowers their Energy expenditure by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>.

200001082.description:
Extends the duration of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material> state by <color=#E78300>3</color>s.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material> state also lowers Mod's Dodge Energy expenditure by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

200001083.description: Use of Shield Throw also leads to a shield ricochet, dealing Thunder DMG equal to<color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK each time. The shield can ricochet up to <color=#E78300>5</color> times, and each time a hit is landed <color=#E78300>18</color> Divine Grace is granted.

200001084.description: The shield in Counter Strike is raised for only <color=#E78300>50%</color> of the original duration. When a hit is landed with a post-block counterattack, <color=#E78300>15</color> additional Divine Grace is granted, and counterattacks deal <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more Non-DoT Base DMG on hit.

200001085.description:
Protection of Faith also grants shield protection to teammates, the value of which is determined by Archaic Oath - Verthandi's max HP.
Shield protection for the team also increases the Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> and Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s for all protected members.

200001086.description: Lightrealm Ultimate increases the Crit Rate of all members of the team inside the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Realm of Truth</material> by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> as well as their Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s each time it is triggered. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times.

200001087.description: Gensrealm Ultimate increases the Crit Rate of all members of the team inside the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Realm of Truth</material> by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> as well as their Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s each time it is triggered. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times.

200001088.description: Reduces Final Warning's DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> and launches 2 more attacks instead. Final Warning's DMG boost can now stack up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times. Gains a <color=#E78300>7%</color> Ultimate Skill charge each time the sharing effect is triggered by the Mod. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

200001089.description:
Reduces Shadow RES of the enemy hit by Leuce in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104202)>Dance Partner</material> mode by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s if the enemy hit does not have a Shadow RES debuff. If the enemy's Shadow RES is already debuffed, increases the Non-DoT DMG dealt by Leuce by <color=#E78300>{3}</color>.
Inflicts Armor Break on the enemy hit by Mintha in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104202)>Dance Partner</material> mode and reduces their DEF by <color=#E78300>{4}</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s if the enemy hit is not in Armor Break. If the enemy is already in Armor Break, increases the Non-DoT DMG dealt by Mintha by <color=#E78300>{3}</color>.
Normal enemies with less than <color=#E78300>25%</color> HP are defeated instantly after being hit.

200001090.description:
When Mod's Divine Grace is at least <color=#E78300>40</color> and no higher than <color=#E78300>60</color>: increases their ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>, Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>, and Independent DMG by <color=#E78300>{3}</color>.
Grants <color=#E78300>40</color> Divine Grace on battlefield entrance.

200001091.description: Expends <color=#E78300>48</color> Divine Grace when switching to Leuce, and grants <color=#E78300>48</color> Divine Grace when switching to Mintha.

200001092.description: Inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102402)>Guilty</material> on the enemy hit by Jackal Charge, which causes an explosion every <color=#E78300>2</color>s, dealing to surrounding enemies Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK each time. Effect lasts <color=#E78300>10</color>s (up to 1 <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102402)>Guilty</material> enemy may be present on the field at a time).

200001093.description:
Gains <color=#E78300>5</color> Rage every time a hit is landed with each strike of the joint attack of Jackal Rush, Jackal Charge, and Jackal Whirl.
At full Rage, increases the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit's</material> Non-DoT Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.

200001094.description: The <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> will automatically seek its next target when the locked-on enemy is defeated, and will only vanish when there are no more targets to be found.

200001095.description:
Slows Ultimate Skill charge speed by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. Increases Non-DoT Shadow DMG dealt by the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit's</material> joint attacks by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>.
If none of the Mod's attacks hit for <color=#E78300>6</color>s, the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> gains the following effects: Increases Non-DoT ATK by <color=#E78300>{3}</color>, Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{4}</color>, Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{5}</color>, and Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>{6}</color>. Effects are cleared if one of the Mod's attacks hits.

200001096.description:
Slows Ultimate Skill charge speed by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>. Increases Non-DoT Shadow DMG dealt by the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit's</material> joint attacks and special attack by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>.
If none of the Mod's attacks hit for <color=#E78300>6</color>s, the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> gains the following effects: Increases Non-DoT ATK by <color=#E78300>{3}</color>, Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{4}</color>, Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{5}</color>, and Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>{6}</color>. Effects are cleared if one of the Mod's attacks hits.

200001097.description:
Increases Divine Grace limit by <color=#E78300>20</color>.
Outside of Cannon Tower form, grants <color=#E78300>{1}</color> Divine Grace every <color=#E78300>0.15</color>s.

200001098.description: When Specter Blast hits, a magic fog lasting <color=#E78300>6</color>s appears, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK, and inflicts Confuse on enemies hit. The Confuse lasts for another <color=#E78300>{1}</color>s when they get out of the fog.

200001099.description: When Nightmare Harvest hits the magic fog, an additional explosion occurs and inflicts an AoE Knockup, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK.

200001100.description:
Increases Skill 3's Base DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.
Expands the explosion and drag area of Execution by <color=#E78300>60%</color>.
Normal enemies with less than <color=#E78300>25%</color> HP are instantly killed when hit by Execution's cannon shot.

200001101.description: Increases DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> when the Mod kills an enemy.

200001102.description: When an enemy is captured with Wavebreaker, the DMG radius of the last throw is increased by <color=#E78300>50%</color>, and the lower the HP of the captured enemy, the higher Non-DoT Base DMG. This effect DMG bonus is capped at <color=#E78300>300%</color>.

200001103.description:
When Sobek's Rage is at max, <color=#E78300>15</color> Rage is expended every <color=#E78300>1</color> second until it falls to <color=#E78300>0</color>. Skill casting during this time does not expend any more Rage.
Gains <color=#E78300>2</color> Rage every <color=#E78300>2</color> times he casts Hunt Down.

200001104.description:
The first strike of Explosive Slash grants Super Armor for a short period of time and can block damage from the enemy. A successful block will increase Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> and Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s.
<color=#297DE0>Siege Tactic's</color> Greatsword Mode grants <color=#E78300>12</color> Divine Grace every time it hits.

200001105.description:
When Divine Grace is expended for either Assault Tactic or Siege Tactic's Chainsaw Mode, increases the Non-DoT Skill DMG of the last strike of this attack. Every <color=#E78300>25</color> Divine Grace expended increases Non-DoT Skill DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>, up to <color=#E78300>120%</color> in total.
Spinning Slash increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s when it hits.

200001106.description: When a wind arrow hits the eye of the storm generated by the Enhanced Hurricane Spin and creates cyclons from the last strike, the cyclons will inflict Armor Break on enemies hit and reduce their DEF by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s. Cyclones increase teammates' Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s when they hit.

200001107.description: Increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> when the enhanced version of Stir in the Wind is active. Grants <color=#E78300>3</color> <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106801)>Windchime</material> Marks when the skill ends.

200001108.description:
When the Mod casts Surround & Eliminate, a guiding beacon will be created to cause enemies within range to take <color=#E78300>{1}</color> more DMG from all drones except those of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105207)>Torrent Mode</material>s. Also, the guiding beacon deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK (<color=#E78300>+{3}</color> for every level Skill 3 is upgraded).
This Aether Code effect will be removed when the Aether Code Supreme God's Design - Bitter Fight is activated.

200001109.description:
Increases the Non-DoT DMG of drones other than those from <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105207)>Torrent Mode</material> by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.
Increases teammates ATK by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s when the Mod casts their Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain.

200001110.description:
Increases teammates' Melee and Ranged DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s and decreases the DMG teammates take by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s when the Mod casts their Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain.
Grants <color=#E78300>15%</color> Ultimate Skill charge to teammates when the Mod uses their Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain.

200001111.description:
Once activated, the drone called in by Surround & Eliminate comes in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105204)>Hurricane Mode</material> instead of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105206)>Bourasque Mode</material>.
Increases teammates' ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>, Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>, Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{3}</color>, and Base Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>{4}</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s when the Mod is affected by a teammate's Ultimate Skill DMG buff.

200001112.description:
Increases the Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds whenever a hit is landed on the enemy with the additional kick from Shinra: Ragestomp or the enhanced version of Shinra: Thunderweave.
Gains a shield of value equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of Max HP which lasts <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds and takes <color=#E78300>{5}</color> less DMG for <color=#E78300>{6}</color> when hitting with the last strike of the enhanced version of Thunder Fist or the enhanced version of Shinra: Thousandbolt with at least <color=#E78300>1</color> stack of charge.

200001113.description: Increases the Non-DoT Base DMG dealt to the same enemy by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> upon each additional kick hit with the enhanced version of Shinra: Thunderweave using repeated taps, up to a maximum of <color=#E78300>135%</color>.

220101101.description:
Equipping by The Innocence - Osiris grants the following effects:
Mod may access the L3 effect of all Aether Codes obtained.
The Base DMG of Forbidden Blade is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>.
The Base DMG of Judgment Scythe is increased by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color>.

220101301.description:
Equipping by Rāhu - Asura grants the following effects:
When <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material></color> state expires, <color=#297DE0>Fire Warp</color> is not longer enhanced. Instead, gains <color=#E78300>1</color> enhanced <color=#297DE0>Fire Warp</color> when the Mod enters <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material></color> or when the duration status is extended. Hold down on the Normal Attack button to cast this enhanced skill. This skill can be enhanced multiple times, stacking up the effect, which results in Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}%</color> of ATK in total being dealt to enemies within a small AoE. <color=#E78300>12</color> Energy is also granted, and enemies hit have their Fire Res lowered by <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds.
When Mod is in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material></color> state, <color=#E78300>each time</color> a hit is landed during a normal attack the Non-DoT DMG dealt with the <color=#297DE0>Fire Warp</color> attack is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>. DMG bonus is removed each time <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material></color> ends.
Shortens the CD of <color=#297DE0>Earth Shatter</color> by <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s.

220101601.description:
Equipping by Wasteland Fiend - Kingu grants the following effects:
<color=#297DE0>Assault Tactic's</color> Chainsaw Mode can skip the sword-wielding action of <color=#297DE0>Spinning Slash</color> and directly cut the enemy with Wasteland Fiend.
Grants Super Armor when casting <color=#297DE0>Assault Tactic</color> in Chainsaw Mode and increases Physical DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s upon landing a hit.
When in Modified Mode, casting the <color=#297DE0>Assault Tactic</color> or <color=#297DE0>Siege Tactic</color> in Chainsaw Mode will increase the Skill DMG of the skill cast by <color=#E78300>10%</color> for every <color=#E78300>25</color> Divine Grace expended.
<color=#297DE0>Siege Tactic's</color> Greatsword Mode reduces the enemy's Physical RES by <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s.

220101901.description:
Equipping by Gusty Lance - Shu grants the following effects:
Skill 3: <color=#297DE0>Breach</color> is replaced by <color=#297DE0>Breakthrough</color>.
Rush an enemy to the front and stab furiously, dealing DMG over a large area. <color=#297DE0>Breakthrough's</color> Non-DoT Crit Rate is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>%, and Crit DMG increased by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>%.
Hits landed with <color=#297DE0>Breakthrough</color> also increase the Wind DMG of all members of the team by <color=#E78300>{3}</color>% for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s.

220102401.description:
Equipping by Jackal - Anubis grants the following effects:
When the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material></color> automatically attacks, there is a <color=#E78300>50%</color> chance of the attack being a special attack with three strikes, each dealing a total Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}%, {6}%</color> (<color=#E78300>+{7}%</color> for every level of your Ultimate), and <color=#E78300>{8}%</color> (<color=#E78300>+{9}%</color> for every level of your Skill 2) ATK respectively and inflicting Stun on the enemy hit for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.
When casting <color=#297DE0>Jackal Charge</color>, the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit's</material></color> joint attack comes with an additional explosion that deals AoE Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> ATK in total (<color=#E78300>+{4}%</color> for every level Skill 1 is upgraded) to enemies in a small area.
When casting <color=#297DE0>Jackal Whirl</color>, the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit's</material></color> joint attack becomes a special attack instead.
When casting <color=#297DE0>Jackal's Gaze</color> or <color=#297DE0>Jackal's Wild Slash</color>, the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material></color> will either launch a joint or special attack, depending on how far away the locked-on enemy is.
Increases <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit's</material></color> Non-DoT DMG dealt with attacks by <color=#E78300>{5}%</color>.
Crit Rate is increased by <color=#E78300>{10}%</color>.

220102701.description:
Equipping by Drifting Flurry - Leviathan grants the following effects:
The Dodge <color=#297DE0>Refraction</color> is replaced by <color=#297DE0>Stormy Counter</color>.
Tap on the Normal Attack button within <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds after a successful Break-fall while the Dodge effect is not on cooldown or after a Dodge effect is triggered to launch an anchor skill attack, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> of ATK and inflicting Freeze on enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.
When in Break-fall, the Dodge effect can also be triggered without sending it into cooldown.
The Non-DoT DMG of <color=#297DE0>Stormy Counter</color> is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>.
Dodge triggers the Dodge effect, and the Dodge effect lasts <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s instead.

220102801.description:
Equipping by Roaring Thunder - Thor grants the following effects:
When the Mod is in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102802)>Thunder Frenzy</material></color> state, each skill hit triggers a thunderbolt, which deals to the enemy Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> ATK. Each time <color=#297DE0>Mjölnir</color> is used to cast a non-derivative skill and a hit is landed, or when <color=#297DE0>Járngreipr</color> is used to cast a skill attack apart from the final fist strike and a hit is landed, increases Mod's DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times.
When the final fist strike is dealt when in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102803)>Thunder Rage</material></color> state, increases the skill's Non-DoT ATK by <color=#E78300>{5}%</color>.
When a hit is landed with <color=#297DE0>Tremblestrike</color>, every <color=#E78300>1</color> stack owned by the Mod increases the Independent DMG of <color=#297DE0>Tremblestrike</color> by <color=#E78300>{4}%</color>. When there are <color=#E78300>3</color> stacks owned, they will be taken as <color=#E78300>4</color> instead. All stacks will be removed when <color=#297DE0>Tremblestrike</color> ends.

220103201.description:
Equipping by AblaZe - Tyr grants the following effects:
Replaces the normal attack <color=#297DE0>Royal Raid</color> with <color=#297DE0>Royal Blitz</color>.
Increases Trace limit by <color=#E78300>1</color>. Grants extra <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace when <color=#297DE0>Promotion</color> is cast directly.
Increases Independent DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> and changes the normal attack mode when the greatsword type in play is <color=#297DE0>Sword of Queen</color>.

220103301.description:
Equipping by Enlightening - Heimdall grants the following effects:
Increases the Base DMG of Skill 3 by <color=#E78300>{3}%</color>.
Skill 3, <color=#297DE0>Lightrealm Ultimate</color>, is replaced by <color=#297DE0>Gensrealm Ultimate</color>.
The <color=#297DE0>Realm of Truth</color> generated by <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Gensrealm Ultimate</material></color> lasts <color=#E78300>2</color>s longer and its radius is increased by <color=#E78300>25%</color>.
Casting <color=#297DE0>Gensrealm Ultimate</color> increases all Attribute DMG of all members of the team by <color=#E78300>{4}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s.
Casting <color=#297DE0>Gensrealm Ultimate</color> also grants all members of the team a <color=#E78300>10%</color> Ultimate Skill charge upon completion.
Increases the Skill DMG of all teammates inside the last <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Realm of Truth</material></color> generated by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> every <color=#E78300>2</color>s for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>5</color> times.

220103501.description:
Equipping by Croc Rage - Sobek grants the following effects:
The Base DMG of Skill 2 is increased by <color=#E78300>{3}%</color>.
Increases the attack frequency of <color=#297DE0>Roar of the Nile</color> on nearby enemies.
The Water RES of the enemy hit is reduced by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.
When enemies hit by <color=#297DE0>Wavebreaker</color> hit the ground, DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>{4}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s. When an enemy who cannot be picked up is hit by the last strike of <color=#297DE0>Wavebreaker</color>, recovers <color=#E78300>15%</color> Ultimate Skill charge.

220103801.description:
Equipping by Radiant Feather - Hera grants the following effects:
Increases the Base DMG of Skill 3 by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color>.
Skill 2: <color=#297DE0>Blazing Embrace</color> is replaced by <color=#297DE0>Burning Dance</color>.
Hits landed on enemies with Scorch using <color=#297DE0>Burning Dance</color> deal <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> more Non-DoT Base DMG.

220103901.description:
Equipping by Tidal Song - Poseidon grants the following effects:
Skill 1: <color=#297DE0>Grace of the Sea</color> is replaced by <color=#297DE0>Blue Whalesong</color>.
Increases the healing effect by <color=#E78300>{3}%</color>.
When entering the battle, increases Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>1%</color> (up to <color=#E78300>30%</color>) for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> healing effect boost owned by the Mod.
When healing with <color=#297DE0>Blue Whalesong</color>, the Mod or Teammate obtains the corresponding Combat Resources <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> more quickly for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds, and also gets a certain amount of the corresponding combat resource (<color=#E78300>30</color> Rage, <color=#E78300>30</color> Energy, <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace, or <color=#E78300>30</color> Divine Grace).

220104101.description:
Equipping by Chord of Convallaria - Athena grants the following effects:
Increases Non-DoT Independent DMG dealt with <color=#297DE0>Sonic Boom</color> by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color>.
Expends <color=#E78300>3</color> Divine Grace every <color=#E78300>0.{3}</color>s instead when in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material></color> state. Triggers <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104104)>Perfect Harmony</material></color> state lasing <color=#E78300>{1}</color>s after <color=#E78300>5</color> Harmonious normal attack hits are landed when in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material></color> state.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104104)>Perfect Harmony</material></color>: Gains Unyielding when in this state. No <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104102)>Harmony Judgement</material></color> will be triggered but every strike of normal attack and skill casting during this time will be directly judged as either Harmonious or Perfectly Harmonious, and the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material></color> stack count will always be deemed as a multiple of <color=#E78300>3, 5, or 7</color>. When getting a Harmonious or Perfectly Harmonious judgment, <color=#E78300>1</color> extra stack of <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material></color> will be granted.
When casting the Ultimate Skill or an Ultimate Skillchain in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material></color> state, <color=#E78300>{4}%</color> of<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material></color> stacks will be kept.
Expands the range of Perfectly Harmonious judgment.

220104201.description:
Grants the following effects when equipped by Puppet Master - Hades:
Changes Fixed DMG to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> when in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104203)>Dance Duo</material></color> mode.
When in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104203)>Dance Duo</material></color> mode, Leuce and Mintha form three blade-sharp rings made of a multitude of puppet strings at the enemy's position, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> ATK in total when they launch a joint attack.
Grants Super Armor and reduces DMG taken by <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> when in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104203)>Dance Duo</material></color> state.
Grants the next <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic</material></color> Mark <color=#E78300>1</color>s more quickly.
Where there are active <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic</material></color> Marks, increases Mod's Crit Rate and Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>4</color> marks.

220104802.description:
Equipping by Comet R4Y - Zenkibo Tengu grants the following effects:
Increases the Base DMG of Skill 2 and 3 by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color>.
Replaces Skill 1: <color=#297DE0>Precision Bombing</color> with <color=#297DE0>Repeat Bombardment</color>.
Increases the number of strikes with <color=#297DE0>Repeat Bombardment</color>, with subsequent strikes dealing <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> less DMG to the same enemy.

220105001.description:
Equipping by Shinku - Buzenbo Tengu grants the following effects:
Skill 2: <color=#297DE0>Scarlet: Cloud Water</color> is replaced by <color=#297DE0>Scarlet: Ashen Star</color>.
The cross light blade travels a certain distance and grants<color=#E78300>1</color> additional Trace as well as inflicts Armor Break on the enemy upon hit, lowering their DEF by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>6</color> seconds.

220105201.description:
Equipping by Rage Serpent - Marduk grants the following effects:
When a teammate casts a skill or Ultimate Skill, a drone that corresponds to either <color=#297DE0>Quick Response</color> or <color=#297DE0>Surround & Eliminate</color> is summoned, and deals the corresponding amount of Physical DMG. Also increases the additional ATK of all members of the team by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> (up to <color=#E78300>{2}</color>) for <color=#E78300>18</color>s. The two types of drones summoned by each teammate have a CD of <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105203)>Rafale Mode</material></color>: Reduces the Energy cost by <color=#E78300>{5}%</color> when a teammate summons a drone in this mode. Effect lasts <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s. Also increases Base DMG of all team members' Skill 2 by <color=#E78300>{6}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105204)>Bourasque Mode</material></color>: Gains Energy <color=#E78300>{7}%</color> more quickly when a teammate summons a drone in this mode. Effect lasts <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s. Also increases Base DMG of all team members' Skill 3 by <color=#E78300>{8}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105205)>Whirlwind Mode</material></color>: When a teammate summons a drone in this mode, reduces a certain type of RES from the enemy based on said teammate's element type by <color=#E78300>{9}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s. This effect can also stack with the attribute RES debuff from drones summoned in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105205)>Whirlwind Mode</material></color> by the Mod.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105206)>Hurricane Mode</material></color>: When a teammate summons a drone in this mode, the whole team's Crit Rate increases by <color=#E78300>{10}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s. Effect can stack up to <color=#E78300>2</color> times.

220105601.description:
Equipping by Thundertusk - Kali grants the following effects:
Increases the Base DMG of Skill 1, 2 and 3 by <color=#E78300>{3}%</color>.
Grants an enhancement effect when Kali enters battle, triggers the Dodge effect, or enters Modified Mode for the first time.
Each time Kali uses an enhanced skill, increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds; stacks up to <color=#E78300>4</color> times.
When tapping repeatedly to unleash an additional kick with the enhanced version of <color=#297DE0>Shinra: Thunderweave</color> or charging the enhanced version of <color=#297DE0>Shinra: Thousandbolt</color>, Dodge will not interrupt either the kick or the charge. Simply tap on the skill again to continue.

220105801.description:
Equipping by Ryugiri - Kagutsuchi grants the following effects:
When the Mod is hit by the enemy, increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds; effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times.
Casting <color=#297DE0>Fiery Dance: Alt</color> generates waves of flame that deal Fire DMG to enemies in their path equal to <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> of ATK. Energy is granted when more than one enemy is hit by <color=#297DE0>Fiery Dance: Alt</color>.
Flame waves deal more <color=#E78300>{4}%</color> Non-DoT DMG on hit.

220105901.description:
Equipping by The Glare - Apollo grants the following effects:
The number of hits needed to trigger the passive effect is reduced by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.
When a Crit is landed, <color=#E78300>1</color> Energy is granted, along with a <color=#E78300>{2}%</color> chance of resetting the cd of <color=#297DE0>Interweaving Light</color>.
Increases the Non-DoT Base DMG of the follow-up attack by <color=#E78300>{3}%</color>.
Successful follow-up attacks also reduce the enemy's Light RES by <color=#E78300>{4}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s.

220106601.description:
Equipping by Early Sakura - Ookuninushi grants the following effects:
Skill 3: <color=#297DE0>BunBun Gunner</color> is replaced by <color=#297DE0>BunBun Strike</color>.
Summons the BunBun Mecha, which attacks and drags surrounding enemies. Increases the Non-DoT Independent DMG of <color=#297DE0>BunBun Strike</color> by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color> and the drag radius by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>.
Increases Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> when the Mod or a Teammate is in any <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106601)>Divination</material> state.

220106801.description:
Equipping by Cleansing Wind - Enlil grants the following effects:
Increases DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s each time a <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106801)>Windchime</material></color> Mark is obtained. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times.
Also grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106801)>Windchime</material></color> Mark when the non-enhanced version of <color=#297DE0>Stir in the Wind</color> is cast.
Grants the skill enhancement effects of the non-enhanced version of <color=#297DE0>Stir in the Wind</color> when the enhanced version of <color=#297DE0>Stir in the Wind</color> is cast and ends.
When casting an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain, the Ultimate Skill DMG of the entire team is increased by <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s.

220108001.description:
Equipping by Frost Fang - Vidar grants the following effects:
The normal attack <color=#297DE0>Icefield Hunter</color> is replaced by <color=#297DE0>Frostbite</color>.
Has a<color=#E78300>{1}%</color> chance of inflicting Freeze on enemies in front for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds when landing a hit with a normal attack; triggers once every <color=#E78300>6</color> seconds. When a hit is landed with a normal attack on an enemy inflicted with Freeze, an additional <color=#E78300>6</color> Rage is granted. When a hit is landed with a normal attack, deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>250%</color> of ATK to other enemies in front.
Normal attack hits also lower the Ice RES of enemies hit by <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s.

220108101.description:
Equipping by Waverender - Skadi grants the following effects:
Decreases the Ice RES of enemies hit with <color=#297DE0>Frostbreak</color> or <color=#297DE0>Crystal Smash</color> by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.
Increases Independent Non-DoT DMG dealt to enemies with lowered Ice RES by <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> of the Ice RES reduced.
When in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material></color>, automatically casts normal attacks to launch Piercer tracking missiles.
<color=#297DE0>Frostbreak</color> cast by blocking damage with the barrier formed will no longer expend <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108101)>Icebreaker</material></color> Mark.

220108401.description:
Equipping by New Pact - Verthandi grants the following effects:
Skill 1: <color=#297DE0>Rapid Stab</color> is replaced by <color=#297DE0>Quick Stab</color>.
Use of <color=#297DE0>Quick Stab</color> or <color=#297DE0>Enlightening</color> grants <color=#E78300>10</color> Divine Grace and increases Independent DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds; effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times.

220109301.description:
Equipping by Jin-ei - Kuninotokotachi grants the following effects:
Shortens the CD of <color=#297DE0>Heaven's Hold</color> and <color=#297DE0>Earth's Hold</color> by <color=#E78300>1.5</color>s.
After Jin-ei - Kuninotokotachi casts <color=#297DE0>Heaven's Hold</color>, a Shuriken attack is unleashed at the locked-on enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> of ATK. Use of <color=#297DE0>Earth's Hold</color> leads to one round of area DMG to surrounding enemies which causes Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}%</color> of ATK in total.
Hits landed with <color=#297DE0>Ninjutsu</color> deal <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> more Independent DMG.
Casting the Ultimate Skill no longer expends <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material>.

220109401.description:
Equipping by Darkstar - Hel grants the following effects:
Reduces Divine Grace cost by <color=#E78300>5</color> when firing with Cannon Tower and increases the Independent DMG of cannon shots by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>.

220109601.description:
Equipping by Windwalker - Hermes grants the following effects:
Increases the Base DMG of Skill 3 by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color>.
Tap on the Normal Attack button again after the final strike of a normal attack for a follow-up attack with <color=#297DE0>Ride with the Wind</color> at the cost of Rage. Launching <color=#297DE0>Ride with the Wind</color> attacks in this manner does not trigger CD.
The <color=#297DE0>Ride with the Wind</color> follow-up attack also reduces the enemy's Wind RES by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> upon hit, up to a maximum of <color=#E78300>120%.

220109701.description:
Equipping by Drowsie - Oneiroi grants the following effects:
Replaces Skill 2: <color=#297DE0>Fairytale Illustrated</color> with <color=#297DE0>Garden of Dreams</color>.
When <color=#297DE0>Garden of Dreams</color> is active, the Base DMG of Skill 1 and 3 is increased by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color>.
All allies take less damage and Oneiroi inflicts <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109703)>Dreamland</material></color> on enemies hit while <color=#297DE0>Garden of Dreams</color> is active.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109703)>Dreamland</material></color>: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> ATK <color=#E78300>every</color> second.

220109901.description:
Equipping by Sakubo - Tsukuyomi grants the following effects:
Skill 3: <color=#297DE0>Sakubo: Moonlit Night</color> is replaced by <color=#297DE0>Sakubo: Final Moon</color>.
Every normal attack hit grants <color=#E78300>2</color> Divine Grace. Gains Unyielding when charging.
When Divine Grace is at max, the cd of <color=#297DE0>Sakubo: Final Moon</color> is reset.
Shortens the charge time of <color=#297DE0>Bo: Final Moon</color> by <color=#E78300>60%</color>. Increases Base DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>.

220111101.description:
Equipping by Living Soul - Osiris grants the following effects:
Trace limit is increased by <color=#E78300>2</color>. When the Mod enters the battlefield, both the Mod and other Mods with whom this Mod have a preset Ultimate Skillchain get a <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> Ultimate Skill charge.
When <color=#297DE0>Darkwing Scythe</color> is cast twice, the second cast does not expend any Traces. <color=#297DE0>Spin of Death</color> no longer expends Traces, either.
When a hit is landed with <color=#297DE0>Soul Death</color>, all remaining Traces are expended, with <color=#E78300>each</color> Trace increasing the Independent DMG of the <color=#297DE0>Soul Death</color> by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color> and restoring to the Mod <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> HP every second for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld Mode</material></color>: The DMG boost and HP recovery of <color=#297DE0>Soul Death</color> cast under this mode are increased by <color=#E78300>100%</color>.

220111901.description:
Equipping by Flowfly Mist - Shu grants the following effects:
Increases the Base DMG of counterattacks and follow-up attacks by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>.
Grants another extra follow-up attack or counterattack depending on the last stance selected if stance is switched while casting the follow-up attack or triggering the counterattack. The extra follow-up attacks or counterattacks launched in this way do not lead to another triggering of this effect.

220112701.description:
Equipping by Countertide - Leviathan grants the following effects:
Increases the Base DMG of Skill 3 by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color>.
Shortens the remaining CD of <color=#297DE0>Undercurrent</color> by <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds each time a Mark is obtained or <color=#297DE0>Azure Aid</color> is cast.
Casting <color=#297DE0>Azure Aid</color> also creates an area that follows the Mod for <color=#E78300>8</color> seconds, which decreases the Melee RES of enemies within by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>3</color>s when they are hit.

220113901.description:
Equipping by Arctic Abyss - Poseidon grants the following effects:
Every <color=#E78300>{1}</color> hit landed on the enemy grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Energy.
When in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material></color> state, the Ice DMG boost from <color=#297DE0>Zero Mansard</color> is increased by <color=#E78300>20%</color>, and the Ice RES lowering effect of <color=#297DE0>Matter Frozen</color> on enemies hit is also increased by <color=#E78300>20%</color>.
When in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material></color> state, each time <color=#297DE0>Zero Mansard</color> or <color=#297DE0>Matter Frozen</color> is cast the Base DMG of the corresponding skill is increased by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color> for <color=#E78300>5</color> seconds. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>5</color> times.
When in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material></color> state, grants an extra <color=#E78300>1</color> Energy every second.
Shortens the remaining CD of <color=#297DE0>Snow Echo</color> by <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s when Mod exits <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material></color> state for the <color=#E78300>third</color> or more time.

220114801.description:
Equipping by Surefire - Zenkibo Tengu grants the following effects:
Increases the Base DMG of Skill 3 by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color>.
Increases Trace limit by <color=#E78300>2</color>.
For <color=#E78300>each</color> Trace expended, DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>; effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>10</color> times.Increases the Base DMG of Sniper Mode by %.

220118401.description:
Equipping by Archaic Oath - Verthandi grants the following effects:
Increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{4}%</color> and Thunder DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s whenever a member of the team gets a shield from <color=#297DE0>Protection of Faith</color>. When the shield is removed, the ATK and Thunder DMG buffs are also removed.
Triggers an explosion around Mod when the shield from <color=#297DE0>Protection of Faith</color> is removed or refreshed, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> ATK in total.
Casting of <color=#297DE0>Counter Strike</color> taunts all enemies for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s.
Hits landed by Mod with their Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain increases their Non-DoT Mod Index Multiplier by <color=#E78300>{6}%</color>.
Shortens the CD of <color=#297DE0>Protection of Faith</color> by <color=#E78300>{7}</color>s.

220119901.description:
Equipping by Shinri - Tsukuyomi grants the following effects:
Each time <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material></color> is cleared or an enemy with <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material></color> is defeated, ATK is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds; effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times.
The first move of <color=#297DE0>Thunder: Out of the Blue</color> and the second move of <color=#297DE0>Thunder: Out of the Blue</color> no longer expend Rage. The third move of <color=#297DE0>Thunder: Out of the Blue</color> now expends all existing Rage when it hits, and for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> Rage expended the third move of <color=#297DE0>Thunder: Out of the Blue</color> deals <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> more Independent Non-DoT DMG.

500000406.description: Increases skill DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>7</color> seconds whenever a Dodge effect is triggered.

500000407.description: Increase Non-DoT Crit Rate of skills and Ultimate Skills by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>.

500000408.description: Increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> and DEF by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds whenever the Mod is hit.

500000409.description: Increases Combat Resource charge speed by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds whenever a Dodge effect is triggered.

500000410.description: Increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds whenever an attack crits; stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times.

500000411.description: Increases Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds whenever a Dodge effect is triggered.

500000412.description: Increases skill DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>5</color> seconds for <color=#E78300>every</color> hit landed on the enemy with a normal attack. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>5</color> times, and when the stack count is at <color=#E78300>5</color> no further stacking can occur in the next <color=#E78300>9</color> seconds.

500000413.description: Increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds when Dodge is triggered.

500000414.description: The higher the enemy's HP when they are hit, the higher the Mod Index Multiplier increases. Effect bonus is capped at <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>.

500000415.description: Gets a Shield equal to <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> HP for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds When Dodge is triggered.

500000416.description:
Extends Zero Time triggered by the Mod by <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds.
Increases skill DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> when in Zero Time.

500000417.description: Increases skill DMG for <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds when Combat Resources are expended. Increases skill DMG by <color=#E78300>0.{1}%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> of the highest Combat Resource expended. Max effect skill DMG boost is <color=#E78300>{2}%</color>.

500000418.description: The moment a skill or Ultimate Skill is used, increases Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> and increases Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color>.

500000419.description:
The attacker takes <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> more DMG for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds when Dodge is triggered. Effect does not stack.
Every time Extremity Dodge is triggered, the remaining CD of Dodge shortens by <color=#E78300>1</color> second.

500000420.description:
Hits on enemies in Abnormal States deal <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> more Non-DoT DMG.
Abnormal states include: Trauma, Scorch, Stun, Freeze, Shackle, and Confuse.

500000421.description: Generates a shield equal to <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> HP at the start of battle and when HP falls below <color=#E78300>50%</color> for the first time. When the shield shatters, it unleashes a wave outwards, knocking back the enemy and dealing to them Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}%</color> ATK in total.

500000423.description: Increases the Ultimate Skill charge speed by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>7</color>s whenever a Dodge effect is triggered.

500000424.description: Inflicts Armor Break on enemies hit, reducing their DEF by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>7</color>s. Effect applies a maximum of one time with each enemy every <color=#E78300>12</color>s and does not stack.

500000425.description:
Increases the DMG dealt with a normal attack by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> when Modifying Level is at <color=#E78300>B</color> or above.
Increases Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color> when Modifying Level is at <color=#E78300>A</color> or above.
Increases Ultimate Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> when Modifying Level is at <color=#E78300>S</color> or above.
Increases all of the above effects by <color=#E78300>100%</color> when Modifying Level is at <color=#E78300>Ω</color>.

500101101.description:
Equipping by The Innocence - Osiris grants the following effects:
Mod may access the L3 effect of all Aether Codes obtained.
The Base DMG of Forbidden Blade is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>.

500101301.description:
Equipping by Rāhu - Asura grants the following effects:
When <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material></color> state expires, <color=#297DE0>Fire Warp</color> is not longer enhanced. Instead, the next use of <color=#297DE0>Fire Warp</color> is enhanced when the Mod enters <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material></color> or when the duration status is extended. In addition, the skill can only be enhanced when in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material></color> state by holding on the Normal Attack button, which results in Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}%</color> of ATK in total being dealt to enemies within a small AoE. <color=#E78300>12</color> Energy is also granted, and enemies hit have their Fire Res lowered by <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>5</color> times.
When Mod is in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material></color> state, <color=#E78300>each time</color> a hit is landed during a normal attack the Non-DoT DMG dealt with the <color=#297DE0>Fire Warp</color> attack is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>. DMG bonus is removed each time <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material></color> ends.

500101501.description:
Equipping by The Lioness - Sekhmet grants the following effects:
Resets the CD for <color=#297DE0>Tear & Devour</color> and restores Divine Grace to full when entering Modified Mode.
<color=#297DE0>Tear & Devour</color> now lowers the Physical RES of enemies by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> with each stack.
Inreases the Non-DoT Base DMG of <color=#297DE0>Foe Shredder</color> by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color>.
When casting an Ultimate Skill or an Ultimate Skillchain, increases the Non-DoT Crit Rate of the whole team's Physical attacks by <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> for <color=#E78300>12</color>s.

500101601.description:
Equipping by Wasteland Fiend - Kingu grants the following effects:
<color=#297DE0>Assault Tactic's</color> Chainsaw Mode can skip the sword-wielding action of <color=#297DE0>Spinning Slash</color> and directly cut the enemy with the Wasteland Fiend.
Grants Super Armor when casting <color=#297DE0>Assault Tactic</color> in Chainsaw Mode and increases Physical DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s upon landing a hit.
When in Modified Mode, casting the <color=#297DE0>Assault Tactic</color> or <color=#297DE0>Siege Tactic</color> in Chainsaw Mode will increase the Skill DMG of the skill cast by <color=#E78300>10%</color> for every <color=#E78300>25</color> Divine Grace expended.

500101701.description:
Equipping by Ailuros - Bastet grants the following effects:
Increases the Mod's Armor Pierce by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> and Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{3}%</color>. Increases the Non-DoT Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>100%</color> when attacking the enemy from behind.
Enters <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(101703)>Nightshadow</material></color> state when casting <color=#297DE0>Bastet's Caprice</color> and becomes invisible for <color=#E78300>9</color>s.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(101703)>Nightshadow</material></color>: Increases movement SPD by <color=#E78300>20%</color> and increases Non-DoT Independent DMG dealt on <color=#E78300>1</color> hit by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color>. Exits <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(101703)>Nightshadow</material></color> state when the skill hits or after taking damage.

500101901.description:
Equipping by Gusty Lance - Shu grants the following effects:
Skill 3: <color=#297DE0>Breach</color> is replaced by <color=#297DE0>Breakthrough</color>.
Rush an enemy to the front and stab furiously, dealing DMG over a large area. When the number of enemies hit by <color=#297DE0>Breakthrough</color> is <color=#E78300>1</color>, Crit Rate is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>, and Crit DMG, by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color> for the hit.

500102101.description:
Equipping by Dawnray - Artemis grants the following effects:
Independent DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>.
The chance of obtaining <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(102101)>Luminous Echo</material></color> is increased by <color=#E78300>100%</color>.
While in the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(102102)>Dawnlight</material></color> state, DMG taken is reduced by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color>. Every special normal attack strike which hits restores HP by an amount equal to <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> ATK.
When in the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(102104)>Sonata</material></color> state, all Attribute DMG from teammates is increased by <color=#E78300>{4}%</color>, while Independent DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>{5}%</color>.

500102201.description:
Equipping by Serene Moon - Selene grants the following effects:
If not in the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(102207)>Veil Over The Full Moon</material></color> state, Independent DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for every <color=#E78300>20</color> <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material></color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s, up to <color=#E78300>5</color> stacks. If in the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(102207)>Veil Over The Full Moon</material></color> state, each increase in Independent DMG is changed to <color=#E78300>{3}%</color>, with the effect duration lasting until the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(102207)>Veil Over The Full Moon</material></color> state is cleared.
The range of <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(102208)>New Moon Splendor</material></color> and <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(102209)>Full Moon Brilliant</material></color> is increased to cover the whole map.
If the Dodge effect is triggered while in the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(102201)>New Moon</material></color> state, recovers <color=#E78300>{4}%</color> HP.
Grants <color=#E78300>35%</color> Ultimate Skill charge when a Shadow Mod or teammate casts an Ultimate Skill charge or Ultimate Skillchain.

500102401.description:
Equipping by Jackal - Anubis grants the following effects:
When the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material></color> automatically attacks, there is a <color=#E78300>50%</color> chance of the attack being a special attack with three strikes, each dealing a total Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}%, {6}%</color> (<color=#E78300>+{7}%</color> for every level of your Ultimate), and <color=#E78300>{8}%</color> (<color=#E78300>+{9}%</color> for every level of your Skill 2) ATK respectively and inflicting Stun on the enemy hit for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.
When casting <color=#297DE0>Jackal Charge</color>, the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit's</material></color> joint attack comes with an additional explosion that deals AoE Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> ATK in total (<color=#E78300>+{4}%</color> for every level Skill 1 is upgraded) to enemies in a small area.
When casting <color=#297DE0>Jackal Whirl</color>, the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit's</material></color> joint attack becomes a special attack instead.
When casting <color=#297DE0>Jackal's Gaze</color> or <color=#297DE0>Jackal's Wild Slash</color>, the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material></color> will either launch a joint or special attack, depending on how far away the locked-on enemy is.
Increases Non-DoT DMG dealt with special attacks by <color=#E78300>{5}%</color>.

500102601.description:
Equipping by Airgetlam - Nuadha grants the following effects:
<color=#297DE0>Bullet Hail</color> and <color=#297DE0>Ground Blast</color> are charged to full. skill DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>{3}%</color>.
When <color=#297DE0>Bullet Hail</color> or <color=#297DE0>Ground Blast</color> are cast at full charge, enemies hit are also afflicted with <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(102602)>Blaze</material></color>, and hits on enemies already afflicted with <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(102602)>Blaze</material></color> deal <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> more Non-DoT DMG.
Unleashing a fully charged skill on an enemy afflicted with <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(102602)>Blaze</material></color> triggers a Detonation, dealing area DMG that causes AoE Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}%</color> ATK.

500102701.description:
Equipping by Drifting Flurry - Leviathan grants the following effects:
The Dodge <color=#297DE0>Refraction</color> is replaced by <color=#297DE0>Stormy Counter</color>.
Tap on the Normal Attack button within <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds after a successful Break-fall while the Dodge effect is not in CD or after a Dodge effect is triggered to launch an anchor skill attack, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> of ATK and inflicting Freeze on enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.
When in Break-fall, the Dodge effect can also be triggered without sending it into cooldown.
<color=#297DE0>Stormy Counter</color> Increases <color=#E78300> non-DoT DMG by {1}%</color>.

500102801.description:
Equipping by Roaring Thunder - Thor grants the following effects:
When the Mod is in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(102802)>Thunder Frenzy</material></color> state, each skill hit triggers a thunderbolt, which deals to the enemy Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> ATK. Each time <color=#297DE0>Mjölnir</color> is used to cast a non-derivative skill and a hit is landed, or when <color=#297DE0>Járngreipr</color> is used to cast a skill attack apart from the final fist strike and a hit is landed, increases Mod's DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times.
When the final fist strike is dealt when in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(102803)>Thunder Rage</material></color> state, every <color=#E78300>1</color>stack owned by the Mod increases the skill's Non-DoT ATK by <color=#E78300>{5}%</color>. When there are <color=#E78300>3</color> stacks owned, they will be taken as <color=#E78300>4</color> instead.
When a hit is landed with <color=#297DE0>Tremblestrike</color>, every <color=#E78300>1</color> stack owned by the Mod increases the Base DMG of <color=#297DE0>Tremblestrike</color> by <color=#E78300>{4}%</color>. When there are <color=#E78300>3</color> stacks owned, they will be taken as <color=#E78300>4</color> instead. All stacks will be removed when <color=#297DE0>Tremblestrike</color> ends.

500103201.description:
Equipping by AblaZe - Tyr grants the following effects:
The normal attack <color=#297DE0>Royal Raid</color> is replaced by <color=#297DE0>Royal Blitz</color>.
When the greatsword type in play is <color=#297DE0>Sword of Queen</color>, DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>, and the form of normal attack employed is changed.

500103301.description:
Equipping by Enlightening - Heimdall grants the following effects:
Replaces Skill 3, <color=#297DE0>Lightrealm Ultimate</color>, with <color=#297DE0>Gensrealm Ultimate</color>.
The <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Realm of Truth</material></color> generated by <color=#297DE0>Gensrealm Ultimate</color> lasts <color=#E78300>2</color>s longer and increases the radius of its coverage by <color=#E78300>25%</color>.
Increases the skill damage of all teammates within the most recently generated <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Realm of Truth</material></color> by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> every <color=#E78300>2</color>s for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> s; stacks up to <color=#E78300>5</color> times.

500103501.description:
Equipping by Croc Rage - Sobek grants the following effects:
Increases the attack frequency of <color=#297DE0>Roar of the Nile</color>.
The Water RES of the enemy hit is reduced by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

500103601.description:
Equipping by Baldr grants the following effects:
Skill 3: <color=#297DE0>Striking Arrow</color> is replaced by <color=#297DE0>Shining Blast</color>.
Max DMG boost from passive effects increases <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>.

500103701.description:
Equipping by Dark Mistletoe - Hodur grants the following effects:
Skill 3: <color=#297DE0>Striking Arrow</color> is replaced by <color=#297DE0>Phantom Blast</color>.
Max DMG boost from passive effects increases <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>.

500103801.description:
Equipping by Radiant Feather - Hera grants the following effects:
Skill 2: <color=#297DE0>Blazing Embrace</color> is replaced by <color=#297DE0>Burning Dance</color>.
Hits landed on enemies with Scorch using <color=#297DE0>Burning Dance</color> deal <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> more Non-DoT DMG.

500103901.description:
Equipping by Tidal Song - Poseidon grants the following effects:
Skill 1: <color=#297DE0>Grace of the Sea</color> is replaced by <color=#297DE0>Blue Whalesong</color>.
When healing with <color=#297DE0>Blue Whalesong</color>, the Mod or Teammate obtains the corresponding Combat Resources <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> more quickly for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds, and also gets a certain amount of the corresponding Combat Resource (<color=#E78300>30</color> Rage, <color=#E78300>30</color> Energy, <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace, or <color=#E78300>30</color> Divine Grace).

500104101.description:
Equipping by Chord of Convallaria - Athena grants the following effects:
Increases Non-DoT DMG dealt with <color=#297DE0>Sonic Boom</color> by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color>.
Expends <color=#E78300>3</color> Divine Grace every <color=#E78300>0.{3}</color>s instead when in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material></color> state. Triggers <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(104104)>Perfect Harmony</material></color> state lasting <color=#E78300>{1}</color>s after <color=#E78300>5</color> Harmonious normal attack hits are landed when in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material></color> state.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(104104)>Perfect Harmony</material></color>: Gains Unyielding when in this state. No <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(104102)>Harmony Judgement</material></color> will be triggered but every strike of normal attack and skill casting during this time will be directly judged as either Harmonious or Perfectly Harmonious, and the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material></color> stack count will always be deemed as a multiple of <color=#E78300>3, 5, or 7</color>.

500104201.description:
Equipping by Puppet Master - Hades grants the following effects:
Changes Fixed DMG while in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(104203)>Dance Duo</material></color> mode to <color=#E78300>{2}</color>.
Leuce and Mintha form three blade-sharp rings made of a multitude of puppet strings at the enemy's position, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> ATK in total when they launch a joint attack in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(104203)>Dance Duo</material></color> mode.

500104802.description:
Equipping by Comet R4Y - Zenkibo Tengu grants the following effects:
Replaces Skill 1: <color=#297DE0>Precision Bombing</color> with <color=#297DE0>Repeat Bombardment</color>.
Increases the number of strikes with <color=#297DE0>Repeat Bombardment</color>, with subsequent strikes dealing <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> less DMG to the same enemy.

500104901.description:
Equipping Flower of Yomi - Izanami grants the following effects:
Increases Base DMG of Skill 1 and 2 by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>.
When <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(104902)>Mirrorwalk</material></color> is gained, restores <color=#E78300>{2}%</color> HP.
When Aether Code <color=#297DE0>Ice Mirror From Afterlife - Glaciated</color> is active, Code will not be triggered while in Modified Mode, and attacks landed on enemies not afflicted with Freeze while in Modified Mode inflicts Freeze until Modified Mode ends. After hitting an enemy afflicted with Freeze <color=#E78300>5</color> times, removes the enemy's Freeze effect and triggers an additional skill attack, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> of ATK in total.
For <color=#E78300>19</color>s after triggering the Dodge effect by dodging the broken <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(104901)>Ice Mirror</material></color>, increases the Non-DoT ATK of <color=#297DE0>Broken Mirror: Dark</color> by <color=#E78300>{4}%</color> the next <color=#E78300>4</color> times. For <color=#E78300>19</color>s after triggering the Dodge effect by blocking the broken <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(104901)>Ice Mirror</material></color> with <color=#297DE0>Higan: Chibiki</color>, increases the Non-DoT ATK of <color=#297DE0>Broken Mirror: Secret</color> by <color=#E78300>{4}%</color> the next <color=#E78300>4</color> times.

500105001.description:
Equipping by Shinku - Buzenbo Tengu grants the following effects:
Skill 2: <color=#297DE0>Scarlet: Cloud Water</color> is replaced by <color=#297DE0>Scarlet: Ashen Star</color>.
The cross light blade travels a certain distance and grants<color=#E78300>1</color> additional Trace as well as inflicts Armor Break on the enemy upon hit, lowering their DEF by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>6</color> seconds.

500105201.description:
Equipping by Rage Serpent - Marduk grants the following effects:
When a teammate casts a skill or Ultimate Skill, a drone that corresponds to either <color=#297DE0>Quick Response</color> or <color=#297DE0>Surround & Eliminate</color> is summoned, and deals the corresponding amount of Physical. Also increases the additional ATK of all members of the team by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> (up to <color=#E78300>{2}</color>) for <color=#E78300>18</color>s. The two types of drones summoned by each teammate has a CD of <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s respectively.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(105203)>Rafale Mode</material></color>: Reduces the Energy cost by <color=#E78300>{8}%</color> when a teammate summons a drone in this mode. Effect lasts <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s. Also increases Base DMG of all team members' Skill 2 by <color=#E78300>{9}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s. Effect can stack up to <color=#E78300>2</color> times.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(105204)>Bourasque Mode</material></color>: Gains Energy <color=#E78300>{6}%</color> more quickly when a teammate summons a drone in this mode. Effect lasts <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s. Also increases Base DMG of all team members' Skill 3 by <color=#E78300>{7}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s. Effect can stack up to <color=#E78300>2</color> times.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(105205)>Whirlwind Mode</material></color>: When a teammate summons a drone in this mode, reduces the enemy's certain type of RES based on said teammates' DMG type and DMG amount by <color=#E78300>{4}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s. Same effects can stack up to <color=#E78300>2</color> times and this effect can also stack with the attribute RES debuff from drones summoned in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(105205)>Whirlwind Mode</material></color> by the Mod.
<color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(105206)>Hurricane Mode</material></color>: When a teammate summons a drone in this mode, their Crit Rate increases by <color=#E78300>{10}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s. Entering Zero Time while this effect is active will refresh the effect duration and shares the Crit Rate boost with other teammates. Effect can stack up to <color=#E78300>2</color> times.

500105501.description:
Equipping by So-ei - Kuramitsuha grants the following effects:
Increases the Base DMG of Skill 3 by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>.
 When an enemy in <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(105501)>Frost</material></color> is hit with an Ice attack by any member of the team, for every <color=#E78300>1</color> stack of Frost the enemy has, increases Non-DoT Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color>.
Further lowers the Ice RES of enemies hit by a follow-up <color=#297DE0>Frostbreaker</color> attack by another <color=#E78300>{3}%</color>, and further lowers Ice RES of enemies hit by a <color=#297DE0>So-ei Strike</color> crit attack from the Aether Code: <color=#297DE0>Frosted Godblood: Shadow</color> by another <color=#E78300>{4}%</color>.
Removes all enemy Control RES buffs and points when Mod enters Modified Mode. When in Modified Mode, each time a Control state is inflicted on the enemy, their Control RES points are reset and an ice blast occurs, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{5}%</color> ATK in total. Effect can trigger up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times during each Modified Mode.
Every <color=#E78300>1</color> hit landed on the enemy with a follow-up <color=#297DE0>Frostbreaker</color> or a follow-up <color=#297DE0>So-ei Strike</color> increases Kuramitsuha's DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{6}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{7}</color>s. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times.

500105601.description:
Equipping by Thundertusk - Kali grants the following effects:
Grants an enhancement effect when Kali enters battle, triggers the Dodge effect, or enters Modified Mode for the first time.
Each time Kali uses an enhanced skill, increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds; stacks up to <color=#E78300>4</color> times.
When tapping repeatedly to unleash an additional kick with the enhanced version of <color=#297DE0>Shinra: Thunderweave</color> or charging the enhanced version of <color=#297DE0>Shinra: Thousandbolt</color>, Dodge will not interrupt either the kick or the charge. Simply tap on the skill again to continue.

500105801.description:
Equipping by Ryugiri - Kagutsuchi grants the following effects:
Increases ATK by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds when the Mod is hit by the enemy. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times.
Casting <color=#297DE0>Fiery Dance: Alt</color> generates waves of flame that deal Fire DMG to enemies in their path equal to <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> of ATK. Grants Energy when more than one enemy are hit by <color=#297DE0>Fiery Dance: Alt</color>.
Flame waves deal more <color=#E78300>{4}%</color> Non-DoT DMG on hit.

500105901.description:
Equipping by The Glare - Apollo grants the following effects:
The number of hits needed to trigger the passive effect is reduced by <color=#E78300>{1}</color>.
When a Crit is landed, <color=#E78300>1</color> Energy is granted, along with a <color=#E78300>{2}%</color> chance of resetting the CD of <color=#297DE0>Interweaving Light</color>.

500106001.description:
Equipping by Nine-Tailed Guardian - Luwu grants the following effects:
Increases the Base DMG of Skill 3 by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>.
<color=#297DE0>Crashing Spear</color> is replaced by <color=#297DE0>Crashing Mountain</color> when in range of <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material></color>.
When the Mod is not within range of <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material></color>, the <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material></color> will move to you if you cast <color=#297DE0>Counterspear</color> or <color=#297DE0>Roaring Tiger</color>.
Recovers <color=#E78300>{5}</color> Rage the first time <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material></color> ends.
<color=#297DE0>Spear Array: Nine</color> deals more Non-DoT Crit DMG to Elite and Boss enemies.<color=#E78300>Increases the Base DMG of {2}Spear Array</color> and its derivative skills.
Increases Independent DMG by <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s when <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material></color> is active.

500106101.description:
Equipping by Ethereal Enigma - Zhiming grants the following effects.
Increases Independent DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>.
Increases the Base DMG of Skill 3 by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color>.
The first time an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain is cast, <color=#297DE0>True Epiphany</color> is swapped for <color=#297DE0>Calculation: Hyperorder</color>. After that, <color=#297DE0>True Epiphany</color> is swapped for <color=#297DE0>Calculation: Hyperorder</color> every <color=#E78300>2</color> times an Ultimate Skill or Ultimate Skillchain is cast.
Increases the maximum Divine Grace by <color=#E78300>20</color>, and restores <color=#E78300>{3}</color> points of Divine Grace every <color=#E78300>4</color>s. Also restores <color=#E78300>{4}</color> points of Divine Grace every time <color=#297DE0>Calculation</color> is activated, and <color=#E78300>{5}</color> points every time <color=#297DE0>Calculation: Hyperorder</color> is activated.

500106601.description:
Equipping by Early Sakura - Ookuninushi grants the following effects:
Skill 3: <color=#297DE0>BunBun Gunner</color> is replaced by <color=#297DE0>BunBun Strike</color>.
Summons the BunBun Mecha, which attacks and drags surrounding enemies. Increases the Non-DoT Base DMG of <color=#297DE0>BunBun Strike</color> by <color=#E78300>{2}%</color> and the drag radius by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color>.

500106701.description:
Equipping by Backflowing - Oceanus grants the following effects:
Increases Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>10%</color>.
There will be a combo count which accumulates with every normal attack hit and skill casting. When the combo count stack is at max or the combo is interrupted or ends, a temporary Ghost appears on the battlefield for a short time, dealing a series of strikes to the locked-on enemy that is equal to the combo count stack. Combo count stops stacking while this Ghost attacks. When the remaining number of stacks are insufficient for the cost of the Ghost's attack, the remaining combos will be directly expended instead. Every hit landed with a normal attack strike increases the combo count stack by <color=#E78300>1</color> while each skill casting or post-Extremity Dodge skill increases the stack by <color=#E78300>5</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#E78300>20</color> stacks, with the attacks dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>100%</color> ATK. Increases Non-DoT DMG dealt from this effect by <color=#E78300>{1}%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1</color> stack expended.

Also grants <color=#E78300>1</color> <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(106801)>Windchime</material></color> Mark when the non-enhanced version of <color=#297DE0>Stir in the Wind</color> is cast.
Grants the skill enhancement effects of the non-enhanced version of <color=#297DE0>Stir in the Wind</color> when the enhanced version of <color=#297DE0>Stir in the Wind</color> is cast and ends.

Landing a hit on an enemy with lowered Wind RES increases the Non-DoT Crit DMG by a value equal to <color=#E78300>160%</color> of the reduced Wind RES; up to a maximum boost of <color=#E78300>32%</color>.

Enemies hit by the explosion will also be inflicted with Armor Break, reducing their DEF by <color=#E78300>{4}%</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s.
When the final strike of <color=#297DE0>Evil Expeller</color> hits, the remaining CD of the Mod's Ultimate Skill will be reduced by <color=#E78300>{7}</color>s.
Gains <color=#E78300>10</color> <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material></color> when casting an Ultimate Skill or an Ultimate Skillchain.

When <color=#297DE0>Flaring Assault</color> is cast, each attack deals additional Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}%</color> ATK, then expends <color=#E78300>8</color> <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(113204)>Scorch Brands</material></color>.
When <color=#297DE0>Pyro Predator</color> is cast, each attack deals additional Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}%</color> ATK, then expends <color=#E78300>12</color> <color=#297DE0><material=underline c=#2380BF h=2 event=terminology args=(113204)>Scorch Brands</material></color>.
