Increases Physical DMG by {1}.
For every 1 hit landed on the enemy with a Physical Skill or Ultimate Skill attack, increases Physical DMG by {2} for {4} seconds; stacks up to 5 times, at which point no further stacking occurs for the next {4} seconds. Increases Crit DMG by {3} when the stack count reaches 5.

600000009.description:
Increases Thunder DMG by {1}.
When a skill or an Ultimate Skill hits, triggers an additional thunderbolt attack to a random enemy nearby, dealing Thunder DMG equal to 90% of ATK in total. Effect triggers only once every {2} seconds.

600000010.description:
Increases Light DMG by {1}.
When a skill hits, lowers the Light RES of surrounding enemies by {2} and their ATK by {3}, as well as inflicts Weak on them; effect lasts 10 seconds; effects from multiple Sigils do not stack.

600000011.description:
Increases Wind DMG by {1}.
Increases Wind DMG by an additional {2} for every skill or Ultimate Skill in cooldown as shown on screen.

600000012.description:
Increases Ice DMG by {1}.
Increases Crit DMG of Ice Skills and Ultimate Skills by {2}; increases Crit DMG by an additional 40% when landing a hit on an Enemy in Freeze.

600000013.description:
Increases Shadow DMG by {1}.
Deals an additional (3% of ATK + fixed amount) DMG that ignores DEF when dealing Shadow DMG to enemies.

600000014.description:
Increases Water DMG by {1}.
Lowers the Water RES of the affected enemy by {2} for {3} seconds whenever an attack hits; effects from multiple Sigils do not stack. Increases Crit Rate by {4} when landing a hit on an enemy with lowered Water RES.

600000015.description:
Increases Fire DMG by {1}.
Increases Fire DMG by an additional {2} for {3} seconds when defeating an enemy; stacks up to 3 times.

600000016.description: Increases DMG by {1} when in Modified Mode.

600000017.description: Increases Crit DMG by {1} when at Modifying Level Ω.

600000018.description: Increases Crit Rate by {1} for {2} seconds whenever a Dodge effect is triggered by the Mod.

600000019.description: Increases Crit Rate by {1} for each Modifying Level attained; up to a maximum of 15%.

600000020.description: Increases Ultimate Skill charge speed by {1} and Ultimate Skill DMG by {2}.

600000021.description: Increases Max HP by {1}. Restores {2} HP every 10 seconds.

600000022.description:
Increases Rage Mods' Skill DMG by {2}.
Increases Rage charge speed by {1} for each Modifying Level attained, up to a maximum of 35%.

600000023.description: Has a chance to gain 35% of Max Energy each time Energy is expended; this chance is increased by 1% for every 1 Energy expended.

600000024.description: Has a chance to regain Traces whenever Traces are expended, while also increases ATK by {1} for {2} seconds; effect triggers only once every 12 seconds. Said chance is increased by {3} for every 1 skill or Ultimate Skill cast, and will be reset after the effect is triggered.

600000025.description: Increases Crit Rate by {1} for {2} seconds whenever Divine Grace is expended. Regains 10% of the Divine Grace expended for the trigger after the Crit Rate boost ends.

600000026.description:
Increases Rage Mods' Skill DMG by {1}.
Lowers Rage cost by 20%.

600000027.description:
Increases Max Energy by 30.
Gains {1} Energy whenever an attack hits; triggers only once every {2} seconds.

600000028.description:
Increases Trace Mods' Skill DMG by {1}.
Has a {2} chance to gain 1 Trace whenever a skill or Ultimate Skill hits an enemy; triggers only once every {3} seconds.

600000029.description:
Increases Divine Grace Mods' Skill DMG by {1}.
Gains {2} Divine Grace every second.

600000030.description:
In battle, gain 1 stack of Shadow for 8 seconds each time a skill or Ultimate Skill is cast (stacks up to 5 times). Shadow's duration is increased by 1.5 seconds each time a new stack is added until the 5th stack. For each 1 stack of Shadow owned, increases Non-DoT Shadow DMG by {1}.
If hit by an enemy, Shadow's effect will increase by 100% for each stack owned for 8 seconds. This effect is removed once Shadow runs out.

600000031.description: Shortens the remaining skill and Ultimate Skill CD by 1.5s whenever the Mod triggers Zero Time.

600000032.description: Reduces the Ice RES of enemies hit by a skill or Ultimate Skill cast by {1} for {2}s. Effect is increased by 18% for enemies with Control RES. Effects from multiple Sigils do not stack.

600000033.description:
Increases healing by {1}.
Increases DMG of the Mod or teammates being healed by {2} for {3} seconds when healing is cast. Effects from multiple Sigils do not stack. Increases DMG of the Mod or teammate being healed by 0.2% for every 1% healing boost on the healer, up to a maximum of 15%.

600000034.description: Increases ATK by {1} for {3}s each time Divine Grace is granted, and also increases Crit DMG by {2} for {4}s each time Divine Grace is expended or restored. Both effects stack up to 3 times each.

600000035.description: Increases ATK by {1} each time Rage is expended, and also gains Rage {2} more quickly for {3}s. Effect triggers only once every {4}s and stacks up to 5 times.

600000036.description:

When hitting an enemy with a normal attack, increases skill DMG by {2} for {3}s (triggers only once every 10s).
When landing a skill hit or an Ultimate Skill hit on the enemy, increases Normal Attack DMG by {4} for {5}s (triggers only once every 10s).

600000037.description:

When hitting an enemy with a normal attack, increases ATK by {1} for {2}s (triggers only once every 10s).
When a skill hits an enemy within 3 seconds of expending Traces, increases Crit DMG by {3} for {4} seconds (triggers only once every 1 second and stacks up to 2 times).

For every skill or Ultimate Skill in CD as shown on screen, increases Crit DMG by {2}.
For every 50 Energy expended, increases all team members' DMG by {5} for {6}s (triggers only once every {7}s; stacks up to 2 times for whole team; Energy expended during the interval between triggers will also be counted).

600000039.description:
Increases Ultimate Skill DMG by {1}.
Gets 1 stack of Measured each time a skill hits. Each stack of Measured also increases the ATK by {2} for {3}s; stacks up to 3 times. No new stacks of Measured may be obtained within {5}s when reaching a stack of 3; when the stack count of Measured is at 3, DMG dealt is increased by {4}.

600000040.description:
Increases Thunder DMG by {1}.
Increases the Skill DMG of Thunder Mods for {2}s when their Combat Resources fall to 0: Skill DMG goes up by {3} for every 1% of the Max Combat Resources expended in the final expenditure, up to 40% in total.

The Mod enters Blessing state for 1s when the Mod grants an Ultimate Skill DMG boost to a teammate, and when the Mod exits Blessing state, the following effect is granted:
Increases Skill DMG by {3} and Melee DMG by {4} for {5}s.

600000042.description:

When the Mod has a Shield active, increases Crit Rate by {2}.
When the Mod grants a Shield to a teammate or to themself, increases the ATK of the Mod granted with the Shield by {3}, as well as their Normal Attack DMG by {4}, for {5}s. Effects from multiple Sigils do not stack.

600000043.description:
Increases Fire DMG by {1}.
Also increases Non-DoT Crit DMG by {2} when a Fire attack hits.

600000044.description:

600000045.description:

When hitting an enemy with a normal attack, increases skill DMG by {2} for {3}s (triggers only once every {6}s).
When landing a skill hit or an Ultimate Skill hit on the enemy, increases Normal Attack DMG by {4} for {5}s (triggers only once every {6}s).

600000046.description:
When a Wind attack hits, lowers the Wind RES of the enemy hit by {1} for {2}s; effects from multiple Sigils do not stack.

600000047.description:
Increases Wind DMG DMG by {1}.
Also increases Non-DoT Skill DMG by {2} when a hit is landed with a Wind skill attack.

600000048.description:
When an Ice attack hits, lowers the Ice RES of the enemy hit by {1} for {2}s; effects from multiple Sigils do not stack.
When an Ice skill hits, increases the Crit Rate of all team members by {3} for {4}s; effect triggers only once every {5}s; effects from multiple Sigils do not stack.

600000049.description:
Increases Ice DMG by {1}.
Increases the Non-DoT Crit DMG of Ice attacks by {2}.
When healing the self or triggering a Dodge effect, increases Non-DoT Skill DMG of Ice attacks by {3} for {4}s.

600000050.description:
Increases Fire DMG by {1}, and further increases Non-DoT Fire DMG by {1} when HP is less than 50%.
Grants 1 stack of Embers upon losing HP. When HP is 1, grants 1 stack of Embers every 0.2s. Effect lasts {2}s and stacks up to 10 times. At 10 stacks, all stacks are removed and the following effects are granted:
Increases ATK by {3} and Crit Rate by {4} for {5}s.

600000051.description:
Increases Light DMG by {1}.
Increases Skill DMG by {2} for {3}s each time a Light skill hits. Effect stacks up to 9 times.

600000052.description:
Increases Water DMG by {1}.
Also increases Non-DoT Crit DMG by {2} when a Water attack hits.

600000053.description:

Increases Skill DMG by {2} for {3}s each time a Thunder skill hits. Effect stacks up to 3 times.

When a Physical attack hits, lowers the Physical RES of the enemy hit by {1} for {2}s; effects from multiple Sigils do not stack.

600000055.description:

600000056.description:

700000297.description: The enemy unit takes {1} less DMG, and when its attack is met with Extremity Dodge, it takes one additional round of damage equal to {2} Max HP. (Damage reduction effects of Sharp End do not apply with additional damage.)

700000298.description: The enemy unit takes 80% less DMG, though this number is reduced by 2% each time it is hit. This value is then restored to the full 80% again should the unit not take any damage over a 10-second period.

700000501.description: Mods gain Combat Resources based on the resources they use: {1} Divine Grace/Energy/Rage, or {2} Trace(s) when they enter the battle.

700000502.description: Increases Mods' Ultimate Skill charge speed by {2} for the first 10 seconds of the battle.

700000503.description: Modifying Level reaches S-Grade instantly after Mods gain Modifying Rating for the first time.

700000504.description: Mods gain Super Armor for the first {1} seconds of the battle.

700000505.description: Restores {1} of Mods max HP at the start of battle.

700000506.description: Increases a Rage Mod's Rage charge speed by {2} for {1}s after they trigger Dodge effects.

700000507.description: A Energy Mod gain {1} Energy after they trigger Dodge effects.

700000508.description: A Trace Mod will regain all spent Traces next time after they trigger Dodge effects.

700000509.description: A Divine Grace Mod gain {1} Divine Grace after they trigger Dodge effects.

700000510.description: Resets a Mod's Skill 3 cooldown after they trigger Dodge effects.

700000511.description: The Mod gains 50% Ultimate Skill charge and shortens the remaining cooldown of their Ultimate Skill by 5 seconds after they trigger Dodge effects.

700000512.description: Restores all Mods {1} of their Max HP after a Mod triggers Dodge effects.

700000513.description: Increases the Mod's Crit Rate by {1} for {2} seconds if they cast any skill or Ultimate Skill within 5 seconds after triggering Dodge effects.

700000514.description: Increases the Mod's Mod Index Multiplier by 15% for the next attack within 5 seconds after triggering Dodge effects.

700000515.description: Modifying Level reaches Ω-Grade instantly after a Mod triggers Dodge effects.

700000516.description: Increases the charge speed and cast speed of a Mod's Charge skills by 40% till the end of battle after they trigger Dodge effects; stacks up to 3 times.

700000517.description: Restores Mods' Combat Resources (Rage, Energy, Traces, Divine Grace) to the maximum when they enter Modified Mode.

700000518.description: After exiting Modified Mode, restores Mods' Combat Resources (Rage, Energy, Traces, Divine Grace) to the maximum.

700000519.description: Restores Mods' Ultimate Skill charge to the maximum when they enter Modified Mode.

700000520.description: Resets Mods' all skill and Ultimate Skill cooldowns when they enter Modified Mode.

700000521.description: After exiting Modified Mode, resets all skill and Ultimate Skill CD of Mods.

700000522.description: Restores {1} of Mods max HP when they enter Modified Mode.

700000523.description: After exiting Modified Mode, restores Mods' HP by the percentage of the total DMG taken by the enemy in Modified Mode.

700000524.description: Extends the duration of Modified Mode by 4 seconds.

700000525.description: After exiting Modified Mode, deals an additional DMG to the enemy equal to 20% of the total DMG they take in Modified Mode.

700000526.description: Increases Mods' Crit Rate by {1} in Modified Mode. This effect is doubled when Unnamed Holy Sword is also equipped.

700000527.description: Increases Mods' Crit DMG by {1} in Modified Mode. This effect is doubled when Unnamed Scabbard is also equipped.

700000528.description: Increases the Mod Index by 5% when a Mod hits the enemy with Ultimate Skill. One Ultimate Skill can trigger the effect 3 times.

700000529.description: Restores {1} of the Mod's max HP when they cast an Ultimate Skill.

700000530.description: Randomly resets one of the Mod's skill in cooldown after they cast an Ultimate Skill.

700000531.description: The Mod gains 50% Combat Resources (Rage, Energy, Traces, Divine Grace) whenever they cast a Ultimate Skill.

700000532.description: Casting an Ultimate Skill in Modified Mode will increase the duration of Modified Mode by 0.5 seconds.

700000533.description: When Mods hit the enemy with Ultimate Skill, Modifying Level instantly reaches the next level (up to Ω).

700000534.description: When a Mod casts Ultimate Skill, this Mod gains 50% Ultimate Skill Charge and the remaining cooldown of this Mod's Ultimate Skill is shortened by 50%.

700000535.description: The Rage cost of Rage Mods is reduced by {1}.

700000536.description: Rage Mods gain {1} Rage per second.

700000537.description: Energy Mods gain Energy {1} more quickly.

700000538.description: The Energy cost of Energy Mods is reduced by {1}.

700000539.description: Trace Mods gain 1 extra Trace when they trigger Interruption Refund. This effect can be triggered only once every 7 seconds.

700000540.description: Trace Mods restore {1} Trace when they cast a skill that costs Traces. This effect can only be triggered once every 7 seconds.

700000541.description: Divine Grace Mods gain Divine Grace {1} more quickly.

700000542.description: When a Mod's Divine Grace is full, restore HP equal to {1} of this Mod's ATK. This effect can be triggered only once every 6 seconds.

700000543.description: The cooldowns of Mods' skills and Ultimate Skills are shortened by 7.5%. This effect is doubled when White Bear Plush is also equipped and can be stacked with the effect of White Bear Plush.

700000544.description: The cooldowns of Mods' skills and Ultimate Skills are shortened by 7.5%. This effect is doubled when Plush Nightcap is also equipped and can be stacked with the effect of Plush Nightcap.

700000545.description: When a Mod hits an enemy, the remaining cooldown of a random skill on cooldown for this Mod is shortened by 1 second. This effect can only be triggered once every 2 seconds, and cannot be used to shorten the remaining cooldown of Ultimate Skills.

700000546.description: The duration of Zero Time triggered by the Mod's Dodge effect is extended by {1} second.

700000548.description: Mod's Crit Rate is increased by {1} for every equipped Sigil.

700000549.description: Mod's Crit Rate is increased by {1} for every equipped Aether Code.

700000550.description: When Mods hit an enemy with any skill other than an Ultimate Skill, the skill's remaining cooldown is shortened by 30% once per skill. If the skill defeats the enemy, this effect will be triggered again.

700000551.description: When a Mod defeats an enemy with any skill other than an Ultimate Skill, this Mod gains 30% Combat Resources (Rage, Energy, Traces, Divine Grace).

700000552.description: For each enemy the Mod defeats, restore {1} of this Mod's max HP.

700000553.description: At the start of battle, Mods' max HP is reduced by {1}% and their Crit Rate is increased by {2}. They also gain Super Armor permanently.

700000554.description: When a Mod's HP is less than 60%, this Mod's ATK is increased by {1}; When a Mod's HP is less than 30%, this Mod's ATK is increased by {2}.

700000555.description: At the start of battle, the Crit DMG of Mods is increased by {1}. This effect is increased by 10% with every victory. Stacks up to 100%.

700000556.description: At the start of battle, Mods' max HP is increased by {1}. This effect is increased by 5% with every victory. Stacks up to 50%.

700000557.description: Mods take {1} less DMG each time they cast a skill or Ultimate Skill. This effect is increased by 3% with every victory. Stacks up to 18%. When a Mod's HP is less than 30%, this effect is doubled for this Mod.

700000558.description: The cooldown of Mods' Dodge effect is shortened by {1} second. This effect is increased by 1 second with every victory. Stacks up to {2} seconds.

700000559.description: At the start of battle, the ATK of Mods is increased by {1} for {2} seconds.

700000560.description: When a Mod triggers the Dodge effect, the movement speed of this Mod is increased by {1} for {2} seconds.

700000561.description: When a Mod triggers the Dodge effect, the remaining cooldown of this Mod's Dodge effect is shortened by 2 seconds.

700000562.description: For each normal enemy the Mod defeats, this Mod's DMG to elite enemies is increased by {1}. This effect stacks.

700000563.description: At the start of battle, Mods' max HP is reduced by {1} and the damage taken is also reduced by {2}.

700000564.description: At the start of battle, Mods' max Dodge Energy is increased by {1}. This effect is decreased by 4% with every victory, up to a maximum of 80%

700000565.description: At the start of battle, Mods gain a random {1} Attribute DMG bonus. The attribute randomly switches every 20 seconds.

700000566.description: Restores {1} HP when a Mod is attacked. Effect can trigger once every 7s.

700000567.description: Elite enemies deal {1} more DMG to Mods, and normal enemies deal {2} less DMG to Mods.

700000568.description: Elite enemies deal {1} more DMG to Mods, and normal enemies deal {2} less DMG to Mods.

700000569.description: Extends the CD of Mods' Ultimate Skills by 20s. While their Ultimate Skill charge speed is reduced by {1}, they also deal {2} more Ultimate Skill DMG.

700000570.description: When a Mod does not take damege, this Mod's ATK is increased by {1} and the effect is removed when taken damage. If the Mod is not taking damage for 15 seconds, this effect is regained.

700000571.description: When a Mod gains an Attribute DMG bonus, this Mod's DMG is increased equal to 100% of this Attribute DMG for {1} seconds. This effect does not stack.

700000572.description: When a Mod defeats an AGI Mecha, this Mod has a 10% chance of restoring Combat Resources (Rage, Energy, Traces, Divine Grace) to full.

700000573.description: When a Mod cast a skill or Ultimate Skill, this Mod gains Super Armor.

700000574.description: Mods take {1} less DMG when their Combat Resources (Rage, Energy, Traces, Divine Grace) are full.

700000575.description: When a Mod hits an enemy 5 consecutive times without triggering a Crit, the Crit Rate of this Mod's next attack is increased by {1}.

700000576.description: DMG dealt by Mods' skills and Ultimate Skills that gain Traces is increased by {1}.

700000577.description: Mods' max HP is increased by {2} and their Movement speed is reduced by {1}.

700000578.description: Melee Mods take {1} less DMG from enemies within a 5 meter radius.

700000579.description: Ranged Mods take {1} less damage from enemies more than 10 meters away.

700000580.description: If a Mod does not move for a certain length of time, this Mod restores {1} HP. The countdown to this skill triggering resets as soon as the Mod moves.

700000581.description: If Mods take damage from a single attack greater than 30% of their max HP, they gain a shield equal to {1} of their HP. This effect can only be triggered once every 20 seconds.

700000582.description: When Mods do not have enough Dodge Energy, they can take a damage equals to 5% of their Max HP to trigger a Dodge.

700000583.description: All damage taken by the Mod is distributed evenly between other Mods

700000584.description: When the Mod is attacked, there is a 5% chance of taking double damage, and a 50% chance of taking {1} less damage.

700000585.description: When a Mod attacks an enemy with full HP, the Crit Rate of this Mod is increased by {1}.

700000586.description: When a Mod's normal attack hits 5 times, the next attack of this Mod will inflict random Attribute DMG equal to {1} of their ATK.

700000587.description: When a Mod hits an enemy with a normal attack, the Crit Rate of this Mod is increased by {1}. Stacks up to 5 times, and this effect is removed as soon as there is a skill or Ultimate Skill crit.

700000588.description: When a Mod triggers Break-fall successfully, the remaining cooldown of this Mod's Dodge effect is shortened by 1 second.

700000589.description: At the start of battle, 100% of the Mod Index Multiplier bonus effect will be converted to a normal attack damage bonus.

700000590.description: When a Mod hits an enemy with a normal attack, the Skill DMG of this Mod is increased by {1} for {2} seconds.

700000591.description: When a Mod hits an enemy with a skill or Ultimate Skill, the Normal Attack DMG of this Mod is increased by {1} for {2} seconds.

700000592.description: The duration of Modifying Level Ω is extended by 2 seconds.

700000593.description: At the start of battle, Mods' Crit Rate changes to 40% and their Crit DMG increases by the amount that was deducted from the Crit Rate.

700000594.description: When a Mod's HP is full, the first DMG taken by this Mod is fixed at 1. This effect does not apply to Mods with Shield. Can only be triggered once every 10s.

700000595.description: At the start of battle, the DEF of Mods is increased by the percentage of HP they have already lost.

700000596.description: Mods' Crit Rate in Zero Time is increased by 100% if they have won 10 victories with the item equipped.

700000597.description: At the start of battle, the Normal Attack DMG of Mods is increased by {1}. This effect is increased by {1} with every victory. Stacks up to {2} times.

700000598.description: At the start of battle, the DMG of Mods is increased by {1} for {2} seconds. When this effect ends, their DMG is then reduced by {3}.

700000599.description: When a Mod gains shield, this Mod restores HP equal to 10% of the shield.

700000600.description: When a Mod triggers 5 consecutive Crits, gains a shield equal to {1} of this Mod's max HP for {2} seconds. This effect can only be triggered once every 10 seconds.

700000601.description: When a Mod hits an enemy, the cooldown of a random skill on cooldown for this Mod is shortened by 2 seconds. This effect can only be triggered once every 3 seconds, and cannot be used to shorten the cooldown of Ultimate Skills.

700000602.description: When skills or Ultimate Skills hit, Crit Rate of the Mod's next normal attack is increased by {1}, and the Mod also restores {2} HP. This effect can be triggered only once every 5 seconds.

700000603.description: When normal attack hits, the Mod's ATK is increased by {1}. Stacks up to 20 times, but this effect is removed with a 5-second CD if the Mod takes damage.

700000604.description: At the start of battle, Mod's DMG is increased by {1} for {2} seconds. When the effect runs out, the Mod deals {3} less DMG than normal instead.

700000605.description: Mod immediately gets a shield against all attributes equal to {1} of their Max HP for {2} seconds when they take damage. Cooldown: 30 seconds.

700000606.description: Mod's HP is immediately restored to full when they take damage and their HP is below 30%. Effect may trigger only once during a single battle and does not trigger when Mod takes fatal damage.

700000607.description: The Mod's Crit DMG is increased by {1} one minute after battle start and their Crit Rate then by {2} every 12 seconds after, up to 100% in total.

700000608.description: Mod deals {1} more DMG on the first skill hit (except Ultimate Skill hits) after receiving healing or taking damage. Effect has a 3-second CD and does not stack.

700000609.description: In battle, the cooldown of Dodge skill is shortened by 3 seconds. Skill and Ultimate Skill Crit Rate is increased by {1} in the 2.5 seconds after Dodge is triggered.

700000801.description: When the Team Leader takes a hit that will defeat the leader, the leader immediately restores 20% of max HP. This effect can only be triggered once per battle.

700000802.description: When an allied Mod is defeated, the Team Leader's DMG is increased by 50%. Stacks up to 2 times.

700000803.description: Reduces the Mods' DEF by 10% and increases the Healing effects on Mods by 20%.

700000804.description: Increases the ATK of both Mods and enemy units by 20%.

700000805.description: When only the Team Leader is on the field in this battle, the leader's both ATK and max HP are increased by 100%.

700000806.description: Triggering the maximum effect of the Gen-zone Bonus only requires 2 Mods of the same Gen-zone.

700009001.description: Shortens the remaining CD of Great Confluence by 1s for every enemy hit with a normal attack within 1s of triggering Extremity Dodge.

700009002.description: Gains 1 additional Trace after casting Rushing River.

700009003.description: Randomly resets one skill in CD when an enemy is defeated by Tide Surge.

700009004.description: The last strike of Great Confluence pulls in and gathers the enemy.

700009005.description: The Tributary Ghosts on the field dash and deal DMG to the attacker when the Mod is hit. Effect can trigger once every 5s.

700009006.description: When the Mod is hit by the enemy, swaps the Mod's position with that of the closest Tributary Ghost, dealing Water DMG equal to 100% ATK to the surroundings of both positions. Effect can trigger once every 10s, and DMG dealt in this way is regarded as Skill DMG.

700009007.description: Automatically avoids a fatal DMG and restores 20% of Max HP. Resets the CD of all skills and Ultimate Skill.

700009008.description: Increases the maximum amount of Tributary Ghosts generated by Rushing River by one. Grants the following new effect to Aether Code: Endless Waves - Deep Pressure: Increases Skill DMG by 60% when 4 Tributary Ghosts are absorbed.

700009009.description: Tributary Ghosts will launch an attack on one surrounding enemy when an enemy is hit by normal attack.

700009010.description: Tributary Ghosts will slow the surrounding enemies when they're generated, reducing enemy's movement speed by {1} for {2}s.

700009011.description: Mods restore 5% of their max HP when defeating an enemy unit

700009012.description: Enter the next 5 battles with all Mods having the "Slow" Indicia.

700009013.description: Enter the next 5 battles with all enemies having the "Tinder" Indicia.

700009014.description: Enter the next 5 battles with all enemies having the "Canopy" Indicia.

700009015.description: Enter the next 5 battles with all enemies having the "Maim" Indicia.

700009016.description: Enter the next 5 battles with all Mods having the "Fuel Burn" Indicia.

700009017.description: The Extremity Dodge effect of Ocean Blur cannot be triggered by the Mod during the next 5 battles.

700009018.description: Enter the next 5 battles with all Mods having 100% Ultimate Skill charge.

700009019.description: Enter the next 5 battles with Mods having 4 Traces.

700009020.description: Enter the next 5 battles with all Mods having 100% additional movement speed.

700009021.description: All Mods restore Dodge Energy 100% more quickly during the next 5 battles.

700009031.description: Mods gain Combat Resources {1} more quickly.

700009036.description: All skill and Ultimate Skill CD - {1}s

700009047.description: When a skill hits, DMG dealt is increased by {1} and movement speed by {2}. Stacks up to 20 times and lasts until the end of the current battle. This effect can be triggered only once every 2 seconds.

700009048.description: When HP falls below 50%, ATK is increased by {1} and Crit DMG by {2} for {3} seconds. This effect can be triggered only once in the current battle.

700009049.description: 60 seconds after battle start, skill cooldowns are shortened by {1} and Combat Resources gain rate is increased by {2}. This effect lasts until the end of the current battle.

700009050.description: 1 second after not performing a normal attack or casting a skill, ATK is increased by {1} and Crit Rate by {2}. At the same time, Crit DMG is increased by {3} every second, stacks up to 2 times. This effect is removed 1 second after a normal attack or skill hits.

700009051.description: The cooldown of Dodge effect is shortened by 3 seconds. When Extremity Dodge is triggered, DMG dealt is increased by {1} for {2} seconds.

700009052.description: Increases Ultimate Skill charge speed by {1}. Also get Ultimate Skill another 10% more quickly each time an Ultimate Skill is cast. Stacks up to 3 times and lasts until the end of the current battle.

700009053.description: Effect triggers when taking damage from an enemy and HP falls below 15%. Ignores incoming enemy DMG and also restores {1} HP to the Mod whenever landing a hit on the enemy. Effect lasts 15 seconds or ends when HP reaches 90%, and can be triggered up to 3 times in the current battle.

700009054.description: Within 5 seconds after taking damage from the enemy, Crit Rate is increased by {1}, and also restores {2} HP to the Mod if the first hit on the enemy is landed during this time as well. Effect triggers only once every 5 seconds.

700009055.description: At the start of battle, gains a shield equal to {1} of Max HP for 10 seconds. This effect can be triggered only once every 15 seconds. When the shield is removed, takes {2} less DMG for 5 seconds and restores {3} HP.

700009056.description: Shinou Mods deal an additional {1} DMG during attacks. This additional DMG is increased by 5,000 for every 9 waves of enemies cleared. This effect can be triggered only once every 0.5 seconds.

700009057.description: Olympus Mods' Skill DMG is increased by {1}. Skill DMG is also increased by 10% for every 5 waves of enemies cleared.

700009058.description: Nile Mods get an additional 30% Ultimate Skill Charge for each wave of enemies cleared, and their Ultimate Skill DMG is increased by 75% for every 5 waves of enemies cleared.

700009059.description: Yggdrasill Mods' Crit Rate is increased by {1} and Crit DMG by {2}. Crit Rate is also increased by 12% and Crit DMG by 24% for every 9 waves of enemies cleared.

700009060.description: All skill cooldowns are reset for Asterism Mods whenever they clear a wave of enemies.

700009061.description: Rage Mods gain Rage 30% more quickly and their Crit DMG is increased by 40%. They also gain Rage another 15% more quickly for every 9 waves of enemies cleared.

700009062.description: Divine Grace Mods gain Divine Grace 20% more quickly and their Skill DMG is increased by 20%. They also gain Divine Grace another 10% more quickly for every 9 waves of enemies cleared.

700009063.description: Energy Mods gain Energy 50% more quickly and their skill cooldowns are shortened by 15%. They also gain Energy another 25% more quickly for every 9 waves of enemies cleared.

700009064.description: Trace Mods have a 50% chance of acquiring one additional Trace when obtaining Traces and their Crit Rate is increased by 20% when they expend Traces. Their chance of acquiring additional Traces is also increased by 25% for every 9 waves of enemies cleared.

700009065.description: Olympus Mods gain Ultimate Skill Charge {1} more quickly and their Ultimate Skill DMG is increased by {2}.

700009066.description: Nile Mods gain Combat Resources {1} more quickly.

700009067.description: Shinou Mods' cooldowns of skills and Ultimate Skill are shortened by {1}.

700009068.description: DMG dealt by Asterism Mods at Modifying Level Ω is increased by {1}.

700009069.description: Yggdrasill Mods' Crit Rate is increased by {1} and Crit DMG by {2}.

700009070.description: DMG dealt is increased by {1} for {2} seconds after Mod performs a Dodge.

700009071.description: DMG dealt is increased by {2} for {1} seconds after Mod's Combat Resources come to full. This effect can trigger only once every 10 seconds.

700009072.description: Each time a normal attack hits, the DMG of the next Ultimate Skill cast is increased by {1}. Stacks up to 20 times, and use of Ultimate Skill resets the stack to zero.

700009073.description: Mod's Crit Rate is increased by {1}. When the Mod crits, all their skills' remaining cooldowns are shortened by 20%. This effect can trigger only once every 2 seconds.

700009074.description: DMG dealt with a normal attack is increased by {1} for {2} seconds after skill use by Mod.

700009075.description: Divine Grace Mods gain Divine Grace {1} more quickly, and when the Modifying Level reaches Ω, they gain Divine Grace {2} more quickly.

700009076.description: Rage Mods gain Rage {2} more quickly in the {1} seconds following an Extremity Dodge.

700009077.description: Trace Mods have a {1} chance of getting 1 additional Trace when obtaining Traces.

700009078.description: Energy Mods gain Energy {1} more quickly.

700009079.description: Ultimate Skill DMG dealt by Mods to Bosses is increased by 100%.

700009080.description: Mod gets full Combat Resources every 24 seconds.

700009081.description: DMG dealt to Bosses by Mods is increased by {1} for {2} seconds when they triggers Extremity Dodge.

700009082.description: Mod deals {1} more DMG to enemies in Control effects.

700009083.description: After exiting Modified Mode, all team members restore a percentage of HP equal to the percentage of the enemy's Max HP the team lowered in Modified Mode.

700009084.description: DMG dealt by Mod is increased by {1} for every 1 enemy in their surroundings, with total boost capped at {2}.

700009085.description: After the Mod casts an Ultimate Skill, all allies take only up to 1 DMG on the next damage taken.

700009086.description: Mod's Thunder DMG is increased by {1} for {2} seconds when they cast 3 skills in a row within 6 seconds.

700009087.description: Trace Mods' skill and Ultimate Skill CDs are {1} shorter.

700009088.description: Mod deals {1} more DMG for every 1% HP lost, up to 60% more in total.

700009089.description: Mod deals 30% more DMG, though this boost is reduced by {1} each time they take damage. Boost is fully restored when Mod has not taken damage in 10s.

700009102.description: Mod gains Divine Grace 100% more quickly.

700009104.description: Trace Mods have a chance of getting 1 additional Trace when gaining Traces.

700009105.description: 100% increase in the Dodge charge rate. Mod also deals {1} more DMG when attacking enemies from behind.

700009106.description: Mod deals 50% more DMG, though this boost is reduced by {1} each time they take damage. Boost is fully restored when Mod has not taken damage in 10s.

700009107.description: Increases Ultimate Skill charge speed by {1}. Casting an Ultimate Skill resets all Skill CDs.

700009108.description: Shortens Dodge effect CD by 8s. When Extremity Dodge is triggered, increases DMG by {1} and also grants Super Armor for 3s.

700009109.description: Increases DMG by {1} and reduces DMG taken by {2} every 5s. Effect stacks up to 10 times.

700009110.description: Increases DMG dealt at Modifying Level Ω by {1}, and Mods' HP will not fall below 1.

700009111.description: Grants Invincible for 1s when Mod's HP falls below 15%, and subsequently restores {1} Max HP every second for 10s. Effect can trigger once every 20s.

700009112.description: Restores {1} Max HP when Mod's Combat Resources come to full. Effect can trigger once every 15s.

700009113.description: Grants a shield equal to {1} of Mod's Max HP for 6s when Extremity Dodge is triggered.

700009114.description: Delivers a thunderbolt at a random enemy within a 10-meter radius every 3s, dealing Thunder DMG equal to {1} ATK.

700009115.description: Grants 50 Thundercloud when Thunder Frenzy is triggered.

700009116.description: After landing a hit with a derivative skill, Mod exits Thunder Frenzy state and delivers a thunderbolt on the enemy, dealing Thunder DMG equal to {1} ATK.

700009117.description: Gathers enemies on the field to where the Mod is when Thunder Frenzy is triggered. Effect can trigger once every 10s.

700009118.description: Grants 1 Trace when a hit is landed on the enemy with the fourth strike of a normal attack.

700009119.description: Grants 20 Thundercloud when Mod takes a hit from the enemy, and sends down a thunder strike on the attacker to deal Thunder DMG equal to {1} ATK. Enemies hit by this thunder strike are inflicted by Stun for 4s. If an enemy is inflicted by Stun, they will be dragged to the front of the Mod.

700009120.description: Resets the CD of a random skill when defeating an enemy when in Thunder Frenzy state. Effect can trigger once every 5s.

700009121.description: After triggering the Dodge effect, Mod gathers the enemy and delivers a thunderbolt on them, dealing Thunder DMG equal to {1} ATK.

700009122.description: Triggering Thunder Frenzy shortens all skill CDs by 20%.

700009123.description: Dodge sends down a thunderbolt at a random spot within a 5-meter radius, dealing Thunder DMG equal to {1} ATK. Triggering Extremity Dodge calls down another thunderbolt on the attacker.

700009124.description: Every enemy defeated grants a small amount of Ultimate Skill charge.

700009127.description:
Mod has "Slow" Indicia for the next 5 battles.
Slow: Reduces movement speed by 30%.

700009128.description:
Enemy has "Tinder" Indicia for the next 5 battles.
Tinder: When the enemy is defeated, all other enemies in a large surrounding area take {1} more DMG. Effect stacks up to 3 times.

700009129.description:
Enemy has "Canopy" Indicia for the next 5 battles.
Canopy: When the enemy is defeated, all other enemies in a large surrounding area take {1} less DMG. Effect stacks up to 3 times.

700009130.description:
Enemy has "Maim" Indicia for the next 5 battles.
Maim: A hit landed by the enemy reduces the target's Dodge Energy by {1}. Effect can trigger once every {2}s.

700009131.description:
Mod has "Fuel Burn" Indicia for the next 5 battles.
Fuel Burn: Mod loses 5 Divine Grace/Rage/Energy or has a 15% chance of losing 1 Trace.

700009132.description: Mod cannot trigger the Extremity Dodge effect of Elusive Bolt for the next 5 battles.

700009133.description: Mod has 100% Ultimate Skill charge at the start of the next 5 battles.

700009134.description: Mod has 3 Traces at the start of the next 5 battles.

700009135.description: Mod's movement speed +100% at the start of the next 5 battles.

700009136.description: Mod's Dodge Energy charge speed +100% at the start of the next 5 battles.

700009138.description: Generates a rocket at the team leader's feet every 5s, and summons 1 friendly drone for every 2 successful dodges of the rocket. Up to 2 drones can be on the field at any time, for up to 25s each.

700009139.description: Applies the Serpent's Eye Mark to the Mod for 20s when they take a hit from the Snake God. Mods with the Serpent's Eye Mark take 160% more DMG.

700009140.description: Bifrons' Eye forms a light circle that moves from the outside in. Mods hit by this light circle are knocked back and lose Combat Resources (30 Rage/Energy/Divine Grace, 1 Trace). When the Eye is successfully charged, Bifrons takes 42% less DMG, and when the Eye fails to charge, Bifrons' ATK increases by 30%, though it will also take 10% more DMG.

700009141.description: Each time Ladon casts Calamity Descends, a Dragon's Fruit appears where the meteor lands and detonates 20s later. After a Dragon's Fruit is created, Ladon restores 25% HP. When the Dragon's Fruit is shattered by the Mod, it increases Ladon's ATK by 15% as well as all Mods' ATK by 10% for 25s, restoring 30% HP. Detonation of the Dragon's Fruit increases Ladon's ATK by 30% and restores to him 20% HP.

700009142.description: Halphas gains a Shield equal to 30% Max HP when his HP falls below 50%, as well as restores 3% HP every 2s. When the Shield breaks, Halphas' DEF goes down by 12% for 15s but his ATK increases by 12%.

700009143.description: Leuce and Mintha gain Symbiosis effect and equally share all DMG taken by either one of them. This effect is removed each time they enter Modified Mode. Within 24s after exiting Modified Mode, Leuce and Mintha deal 24% more DMG, though their Mod Index will stay at 0. After this time, Leuce and Mintha gain Symbiosis effect again.

700009144.description: Grants either Olheim or Zero One a 50% DMG boost, and the other, a 20% DMG boost, every 25s. Effect switches when Modified Mode ends. Time is also reset.

700009145.description: When the HP of either Visbane falls below 30%, it enters Offering state for 24s. During this time, it will not enter Modified Mode. When the Offering state ends, the other Visbane recovers 60% HP, deals 50% more DMG and will not enter Modified Mode. When an enemy in Offering state is defeated, the attacker recovers 30% HP and deals 15% more DMG.

700009146.description: Increases teammates' DMG by 10%, though the team leader takes 30% more DMG.

700009147.description: Increases Mod's DMG by 15%. When they take damage, the corresponding Combat Resources (30 Rage/Energy/Divine Grace, or 1 Trace) will be expended.

700009148.description: Mod's Ultimate Skill charges 10% faster, though their Rating charges 30% more slowly.

700009149.description: Mod takes 20% more DMG, but when their HP is higher than 50%, they deal 10% more DMG.

700009150.description: Mod loses 3% Max HP every 3s, but their ATK increases by 25%.

700009151.description: Mod's Dodge expenditure is reduced by 80%, but they can not trigger Extremity Dodge effect.

700009152.description: Recovery effect on the Mod is increased by 50%, but they also take 15% more DMG.

700009153.description: Enemies take 15% more DMG when in Modified Mode, but their ATK increases by 30% for 15s after they exit Modified Mode.

700009154.description: Mod's Crit DMG is increased by 20%, but their Ultimate Skill CD is extended by 10s.

700009155.description: Freeze, Stun, and Shackle inflicted by the Mod is extended by 30%, but enemies deal 30% more DMG.

700009156.description: When the enemy's HP is higher than 50%, they take 15% more DMG. When lower than 50%, they deal 15% more DMG and take 20% less DMG.

700009157.description: Mod enters the battle with 2 Invincible states. But once this effect expires, they take 20% more DMG for 40s.

700009158.description: Mod recovers Dodge Energy 20% more quickly, but after Dodging, takes 8% more DMG for 5s.

700009160.description: Indicia exclusive to Firebrand - Tyr: Increases DMG by 40% whenever Tyr is attacking with the gauntlet.

700009161.description: Also casts Celestial Starfall - Yang and Celestial Starfall - Yin while casting Celestial Starfall.

700009162.description: Triggers the maximum Tian Yuan Gen-zone Bonus effect.

700009163.description: When casting Antarctic Echo, inflicts Freeze on enemies hit for {1}s. Effect triggers up to 1 time every {2}s.

700009164.description: When Extremity Dodge is triggered, triggers 1 follow-up attack.

700009165.description: When Extremity Dodge is triggered, if the attacker has a Mod Index, the Mod Index increases by {1}.

700009166.description: When Celestial Starfall hits, Antarctic Echo's remaining CD shortens by {1}s. Effect triggers up to 1 time every {2}s.

700009167.description: When Cloud Meld hits, Antarctic Echo's remaining CD shortens by {1}s. Effect triggers up to 1 time every {2}s.

700009168.description: When Extremity Dodge is triggered, shortens Antarctic Echo's remaining CD by {1}s.

700009169.description: When casting Antarctic Echo, gains Immunity for {1}s. Also, a follow-up attack will be triggered and dealt to the attacker if the Mod is attacked during this time.

700009170.description: Automatically avoids an incoming damage that would otherwise be fatal, and restores {1} HP. Resets all skill and Ultimate Skill CD. Effect triggers up to 1 time per battle.

700009171.description: Gremory recovers 1% HP for every 3 attacks that hit a Modifier, and Modifiers' DEF decreases by 16% each time they are hit by one of Gremory's attacks. Stacks up to 5 times. When a Mod parries Gremory's attack successfully, the DEF debuff will be removed.

700009179.description: When successfully parrying with Skill 3: Higan: Chibiki, inflicts Freeze on nearby enemies and lowers their Ice RES by {1} for {2}s.

700009180.description: The fifth strike of a Normal Attack will gather nearby enemies.

700009181.description: After an Extremity Dodge, when a follow-up attack hits, the remaining CD of a random skill of the Mod is shortened by 3s. Effect can trigger only once every 4s.

700009182.description: The second strike of a Normal Attack, Skill 1 or Skill 2 will unleash an additional blade energy at the enemy, dealing Ice DMG equal to {1} of ATK.

700009183.description: Mirrorbloom: Frostdance and Mirrorbloom: Bonechill will cost an additional 10 Rage and deal {1} more DMG.

700009184.description: Hisame's DMG increases by {1} each time an enemy is defeated. Effect stacks up to 5 times. When fully stacked, Hisame will have a chance to defeat a normal enemy immediately upon hitting.

700009185.description: When Hisame hits an enemy with Control RES, she removes the Control RES state from the enemy. Effect can trigger only once every 25s.

700009186.description: Hisame inflicts Shackle on a random normal enemy from the realm of the afterlife for 2s, dealing DMG equal to 10% of Max HP. Effect can trigger only once every 5s.

700009187.description: Attacks from the Mod have a 25% chance to remove the enemy's Control RES points and deal Ice DMG equal to {1} of ATK. Effect can trigger only once every 3s.

700009188.description: Hisame's hits lower the DEF of enemies by {1}. Effect stacks up to 3 times.

700009194.description: When in the Smelt state, increases charge bar's charge rate by 100%.

700009195.description: The lower the Mod' HP, the higher DMG boost (capped at 60%).

700009196.description: Increases DMG dealt at Modifying Level Ω by {1}, and Mods' HP will not fall below 1.

700009198.description: Special device "Mininja's Paw" used in Fun in the Snow

700009199.description: Special device "Me-Yow's Paw" used in Fun in the Snow

700009200.description: Special device "Mitir's Paw" used in Fun in the Snow

700009215.description: Every time the Mod hits a Fist of Revenge, DMG dealt is increased by 5% and their DEF is reduced by 3%. Stacks up to 10 times. When the Mod successfully repels a Fist of Revenge attack, Vengeance and Rage effects are reduced. When Fist of Revenge successfully hits a Mod, Vengeance and Rage effects are cleared.

700009329.description: The last shot of Skill 1 ignites.

700009330.description: Normal attacks scorch the ground as well as dealing DMG.

700009331.description: Range and DMG of Skill 2 is increased.

700009332.description: Upon dodging, a vortex is created at the Mod's feet that draws monsters toward them.

700009333.description: After a perfect block, the next normal attack becomes a spinning blade.

700009334.description: Skill 3 allows the Mod to fly and grants a new skill combo.

700009335.description: Skill 1 now stuns, and its range is increased.

700009336.description: Skill 2 allows the Mod to jump and move in midair, and the DMG radius is larger when they land.

700009337.description: Normal attacks have sword blasts that deal extra DMG.

700009338.description: Gathers Rage when using Skill 3. When Rage is full, the Mod will enter rampage mode.

700009339.description: At the start of battle, reduces HP by 2% per second, increases ATK by 10%, and fully restores HP after dealing DMG to Akika. The 10% boost effect to ATK will also change to a 20% boost to Crit Rate. The effect then returns after 30 seconds.

700009340.description: After hitting the target with Skill 2: Dawn Finale or Skill 3: Sunrise Rhapsody, grants 10 Rage. Non-DoT DMG from skills is increased by 60%.

700009341.description: Performs a joint attack when the Mod's attack lands. Effect triggers only once per second.

700009342.description: Grants 100% Luminous Echo upon entering battle. While in the Dawnlight state, Crit DMG is increased by 50% upon hitting a target with a special normal attack.

700009343.description: Nearby enemies will cluster together when using Skill 2: Dawn Finale or Skill 3: Sunrise Rhapsody.

700009344.description: Increases Rage charge speed by 25%, and grants 10 Rage whenever the Mod defeats an enemy.

700009345.description: Every time Skill 1: Daybreak Quartet lands on a target, inflicts the enemy hit with Armor Break and reduces its DEF by 10% for 20s. Effect stacks up to 4 times.

700009346.description:
Changes the CD of Skill 3: Sunrise Symphony to 3s.
Using Skill 3: Sunrise Symphony expends all Rage, and triggers a rain of arrows for every 8 Rage the Mod expends.

700009347.description: While in the Dawnlight state, Luminous Echo points are restored each time a target is hit with a special normal attack.

700009348.description: While in the Dawnlight state, the Mod's first special normal attack will take them into Zero Time for 4s.

700009349.description: Significantly increases attack speed when in Dawnlight state.

700009491.description: Increases the Ultimate Skill DMG of all members of the team by {1} and shortens their skill CD by {2}.

700009492.description: Increases the buff range for all members of the team as well as the duration of buff effects by {1}s.

700009493.description: Grants an additional {1} boost points the first time entering the readying phase.

700009501.description:
Increases the Aphixbane's DEF by 100%.
<color=#E9E346><Light></color> Reduces the hit enemy's DEF by 2% when a hit is landed with a normal Light attack; stacks up to 60 times.

700009502.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color> Team leader loses 2% HP every second for 10s when they are hit by the enemy. During this time, the enemy deals 25% more DMG.

700009503.description:
Takes 25% more DMG from elite enemies.
<color=#A835D4><Thunder></color> When a Mod hits the enemy with a Thunder skill, restores 2% HP to the Mod.

700009504.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color> Restores 5% HP to the team leader when the enemy lands a hit on them.

700009505.description:
Takes 25% more DMG from normal enemies.
<color=#4EE4CE><Ice></color> A hit landed on an enemy in Freeze using an Ice skill extends the Freeze effect by 0.5s. Each instance of Freeze can be extended by up to 2s.

700009506.description: Equipment of the first wave of normal enemies is enhanced.

700009507.description: Equipment of the second wave of normal enemies is enhanced.

700009508.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color> Assembled AGI Mechas produce compact AGI Mechas at double speed.

700009509.description:
Reduces the DMG dealt by normal enemies by 25%.
<color=#8E6DE7><Shadow></color> Enemies take 15% more Shadow DMG.

700009510.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color> Increases the DMG dealt by enemies by 25% for 20s when a hit is landed on the team leader; stacks up to 4 times.

700009511.description:
Reduces the DMG dealt by elite enemies by 25%.
<color=#88E682><Wind></color> Enemies take 15% more Wind DMG.

700009512.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color> Elite enemies unleash their full potential, causing 25% more DMG and increasing their ATK SPD.

700009513.description:
Increases the Max HP of elite enemies by 25%.
<color=#F3751A><Fire></color> Enemies take 15% more Fire DMG.

700009514.description:
<color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color> Elite enemies gain Super Armor when their HP is below 25%, increasing their Movement SPD and DMG dealt by 100%.
However, their DEF drops by 100% and they lose 0.5% HP every second.

700009515.description:
Increases the Max HP of elite enemies by 25%.
<color=#8E6DE7><Shadow></color> Enemies take 15% more Shadow DMG.

700009516.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color> Elite enemies gain a Shield equal to 25% of their HP when their HP falls below 25%.

700009517.description:
Increases normal enemies' Max HP by 25%.
<color=#F3751A><Fire></color> Enemies take 15% more Fire DMG.

700009518.description:
Increases normal enemies' Max HP by 25%.
<color=#A835D4><Thunder></color> Mods recover 2% HP when one of their Thunder skills hits.

700009519.description:
Increases normal enemies' DEF by 75%.
<color=#A835D4><Thunder></color> Enemies take 15% more Thunder DMG.

700009520.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color> Stuns the target for 2s when an elite enemy hits a team leader.

700009521.description:
Increases normal enemies' DEF by 150%.
<color=#EC5858><Physical></color> Enemies take 15% more Physical DMG.

700009540.description:
Increases Olheim's DEF by 225%
Cancels all DEF bonuses and increases the team's Crit Rate by 20% when in Zero Time.

700009541.description:
Increases Zero One's DEF by 225%
Cancels all DEF bonuses and increases the team's Crit Rate by 20% when in Zero Time.

700009542.description: <color=#ff7300><Complex Simulation></color> Increases Zero One's Max HP by 50%.

700009543.description: <color=#ff7300><Complex Simulation></color> Increases Olheim's Max HP by 50%.

700009544.description:
<color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color> Slows the target when Olheim hits the team leader, reducing movement SPD by 20% for 5s.
Olheim's next strike chains quicker when attacking.

700009545.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color> Zero One gains Super Armor, increasing DMG dealt by 50%.

700009546.description:
Increases the Purifier's DEF by 225%.
<color=#8E6DE7><Shadow></color> Enemies affected by Dark Erosion take 15% more Shadow DMG.

700009547.description:
Increases Pilgrim's DEF by 225%.
<color=#8E6DE7><Shadow></color> Increases Mods' movement SPD by 50% for 3s when hit by an enemy affected by Dark Erosion.

700009548.description: <color=#ff7300><Complex Simulation></color> Increases the Purifier's Max HP by 50%.

700009549.description: <color=#ff7300><Complex Simulation></color> Increases Pilgrim's Max HP by 50%.

700009550.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color> Increases the DMG dealt by the Purifier by 50%, and increases the strength of their attacks.

700009551.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color> Pilgrim takes 75% less Fire, Thunder, and Wind DMG.

700009552.description:
Increases Squire's DEF by 225%.
<color=#A835D4><Thunder></color> Enemies take 15% more Thunder DMG.

700009553.description:
Increases the Monk's DEF by 225%.
<color=#A835D4><Thunder></color> Mods recover 2% HP when one of their Thunder Skills hits.

700009554.description: <color=#ff7300><Complex Simulation></color> Increases Squire's Max HP by 50%.

700009555.description: <color=#ff7300><Complex Simulation></color> Increases the Monk's Max HP by 50%.

700009556.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color> Increases the DMG dealt by Squire by 50%, and Stuns the target for 2s when the team leader is hit.

700009557.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color> The Monk gains Super Armor, rapidly reducing their Mod Index when attacked.

700009558.description:
Increases Blackquartz's DEF by 225%.
<color=#F3751A><Fire></color> Enemies take 15% more Fire DMG.

700009559.description:
Increases Metabane's DEF by 225%.
<color=#F3751A><Fire></color> Scorch can stack up to 3 times, and the duration resets with each new stack.

700009560.description: <color=#ff7300><Complex Simulation></color> Increases Blackquartz's Max HP by 50%.

700009561.description: <color=#ff7300><Complex Simulation></color> Increases Metabane's Max HP by 50%.

700009562.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color> Increases the DMG dealt by Blackquartz by 50%, and increases the strength of their attacks.

700009563.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color> Metabane takes 75% less Light, Shadow, and Ice DMG.

700009564.description:
Increases Ethan's DEF by 25%.
<color=#88E682><Wind></color> Enemies take 15% more Wind DMG.

700009565.description:
Increases Ethan's Max HP by 25%.
<color=#88E682><Wind></color> Mods' Crit Rate increases by 1% for 5s when they recover HP. This effect can stack up to 20 times, and the duration resets with each new stack.

700009566.description:
Increases the DMG dealt by Ethan by 25%.
<color=#88E682><Wind></color> Increases Mods' Dodge Energy recovery speed by 50% for 3s when they deal Wind DMG.

700009568.description:
<color=#ff7300><Complex Simulation></color> Increases the DMG dealt by Ethan by 25%.
Adds a Mark for 15s when the team leader is hit. DMG taken is increased by 100% if hit by Ethan again while the Mark is active.

700009569.description:
<color=#ffc800><Delayed Breakthrough></color> Increases Ethan's DEF by 50% every 30s once the match starts, up to a maximum increase of 500%.
The effect of this bonus is reset when Phase II begins.

700009570.description:
Increases Kusherfang's DEF by 25%.
<color=#4EE4CE><Ice></color> Enemies take 15% more Ice DMG.

700009571.description:
Increases Kusherfang's Max HP by 25%.
<color=#4EE4CE><Ice></color> Increases movement SPD by 50% for 10s each time a Frozen enemy is hit.

700009572.description:
Increases the DMG dealt by Kusherfang by 25%.
<color=#4EE4CE><Ice></color> Extends Freeze status by 2s.

700009574.description: <color=#ff7300><Complex Simulation></color> Increases the DMG dealt by Kusherfang by 25% and movement SPD by 25%.

700009575.description: <color=#ffc800><Delayed Breakthrough></color> Restores 1% of Kusherfang's Max HP every 3s, starting from 60s after the match starts, and increases DMG dealt by 25%.

700009576.description:
Increases Visbanic Dark Metal DEF by 25%.
<color=#EC5858><Physical></color> Enemies take 15% more Physical DMG.

700009577.description:
Increases Visbanic Dark Metal Max HP by 25%.
<color=#EC5858><Physical></color> Increases ATK a further 15% if you have 5 stacks of Resonance.

700009578.description:
Increases Visbanic Dark Metal DMG dealt by 25%.
<color=#EC5858><Physical></color> Increases Crit Rate by 5% for each stack of Resonance.

700009580.description:
<color=#ff7300><Complex Simulation></color> Increases the Visbanic Dark Metal DMG dealt by 25%.
Reduces Mod Index when the team leader is hit.

700009581.description: <color=#ffc800><Delayed Breakthrough></color> Increases Visbanic Dark Metal DEF by 50% every 30s once the match starts, up to a maximum increase of 500%.

700009582.description:
Increases Haagenti's DEF by 25%.
<color=#E9E346><Light></color> Enemies take 15% more Light DMG.

700009583.description:
Increases Haagenti's Max HP by 25%.
<color=#E9E346><Light></color> Increases Haagenti's Mod Index when Light DMG is dealt.

700009584.description:
Increases the DMG dealt by Haagenti by 25%.
<color=#004C99><Modified Mode Boost></color> Extends Modified Mode by 5s.

700009586.description: <color=#ff7300><Complex Simulation></color> Increases the DMG dealt by Haagenti by 25%, and restores 5% HP when the team leader is hit.

700009587.description: <color=#ffc800><Delayed Breakthrough></color>Haagenti takes 40% less DMG 60s after the match starts.

700009588.description:
Increases Athena's DEF by 25%.
<color=#00B7E4><Water></color> Enemies take 15% more Water DMG.

700009589.description:
Increases Athena's Max HP by 25%.
<color=#FF6666><Zero Time Boost></color> Increases all Mods' Crit Rate by 40% during Zero Time.

700009590.description:
Increases Athena's DMG dealt by 25%.
<color=#FF6666><Zero Time Boost></color> Extends the duration of Zero Time triggered by Mods' Dodge effect by 1s.

700009592.description: <color=#ff7300><Complex Simulation></color> Increases the DMG dealt by Athena by 25%, and Stuns the target for 2s when the team leader is hit.

700009593.description: <color=#ffc800><Delayed Breakthrough></color> Continuously reduces Athena's Mod Index 60s after the match starts.

700009601.description: <color=#ffbb00><Survival></color>: Increases the Max HP of the Siren by 25% and its DEF by 75%.

700009602.description: <color=#ffbb00><Attack></color> Increases the DMG dealt by the Siren by 50%. Hits on the team leader also inflict Scorch, which deals damage over time.

700009603.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color> Hits landed on the team leader by the Siren or Siren's Wing grant immunity to DMG from teammates for 5s.

700009604.description: <color=#ffbb00><Survival></color>: Increases Ladon's Max HP by 25% and grants a Shield when Phase II begins.

700009605.description: <color=#ffbb00><Attack></color>: Ladon deals 50% more DMG. An additional 100% DMG is also dealt to Mods protected by a Shield.

700009606.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color> Ladon's Mod Index lowers over time.

700009607.description: <color=#ffbb00><Survival></color> Increases Uld's Max HP by 25%. Restores HP when a hit is landed on the team leader.

700009608.description: <color=#ffbb00><Attack></color> Increases the DMG dealt by Uld by 50%. This buff further increases to 75% for 5s when a hit is landed on the team leader.

700009609.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color> Uld gets a shield when they land a hit on the team leader.

700009610.description: <color=#ffbb00><Survival></color> Increases Leuce and Mintha's Max HP by 25%. Also increases DEF when a hit is landed on the team leader.

700009611.description: <color=#ffbb00><Attack></color> Increases the DMG dealt by Leuce and Mintha by 50%. Hits on the team leader also inflict Trauma, which deals damage over time.

700009612.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color> When one enemy is defeated, another enemy recovers all HP lost. Also increases DMG dealt by 75%.

700009613.description: <color=#ffbb00><Survival></color>: Increases Bifrons' Max HP by 25% and grants a shield when the Eye enters the battlefield.

700009614.description: <color=#ffbb00><Attack></color>: Increases the DMG dealt by Bifrons by 50%. Further increases the DMG dealt by Bifrons by another 75% if the Eye is not eliminated in time.

700009615.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color>: Increases the DMG dealt to the team leader by 300% when Bifrons' HP falls below 20%.

700009617.description: <color=#ffbb00><Attack></color>: Increases the DMG dealt by Orochi by 50%. This buff further increases to 75% for 5s when a hit is landed on the team leader.

700009618.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color>: Reduces the ATK of Mods a certain distance away from Orochi by 100%.

700009619.description: <color=#ffbb00><Survival></color>: Increases the Max HP of the Singer by 25% and the Max HP of the whale by 100%.

700009620.description: <color=#ffbb00><Attack></color>: Increases the DMG dealt by the Singer by 50%. This buff further increases to 75% for 5s when a hit is landed on the team leader.

700009621.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color>: Reduces the team leader's current Dodge Energy by 60% when they are hit by the enemy.

700009622.description: <color=#ffbb00><Survival></color>: Increases Halphas' Max HP by 25%. When the team leader is hit their Mod Index is lowered as well.

700009623.description: <color=#ffbb00><Attack></color>: Increases the DMG dealt by Halphas by 50%, and inflicts Stun lasting 3s on the team leader upon hit. Effect triggers only once every 10s.

700009624.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color>: Grants Halphas immunity to non-crit DMG.

700009625.description: <color=#ffbb00><Survival></color>: Increases Warbane's Max HP by 25% and grants Super Armor.

700009626.description: <color=#ffbb00><Attack></color>: Increases the DMG dealt by Warbane by 50%. This buff further increases to 75% for 5s when a hit is landed on the team leader.

700009627.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color>: Increases the DMG dealt by Warbane by 15% when a hit is landed on the team leader. Effect can stack.

700009628.description: <color=#ffbb00><Survival></color>: Increases the Max HP of the Purifier by 25% and its DEF by 75%.

700009629.description: <color=#ffbb00><Attack></color>: Increases the DMG dealt by the Purifier by 50%. This buff further increases to 75% for 5s when a hit is landed on the team leader.

700009630.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color>: Restores 5% HP to the Purifier when it hits the team leader.

700009631.description: <color=#ffbb00><Survival></color>: Increases Minotaur's Max HP by 25%. Minotaur restores HP after hitting the team leader.

700009632.description: <color=#ffbb00><Attack></color>: Increases the DMG dealt by Minotaur by 50%. Further increases the effect to 75% for 5s when a hit is landed on the team leader.

700009633.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color>: Grants Minotaur immunity to Non-Crit DMG.

700009634.description: <color=#ffbb00><Survival></color>: Increases the Max HP of Auto Armor by 25% and grants it a shield equal to 25% of Max HP.

700009635.description: <color=#ffbb00><Attack></color>: Increases the DMG dealt by Auto Armor by 50%, and inflicts Stun on the team leader for 3s when they're hit. Effect triggers only once every 10s.

700009636.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color>The Mod Index of Auto Armor automatically decreases over time.

700009637.description: <color=#ffbb00><Survival></color>: Increases the Max HP of Cerulean Plum by 25% and grants it a Shield of value equal to 25% Max HP.

700009638.description: <color=#ffbb00><Attack></color>: Increases the DMG dealt by Cerulean Plum by 50%. Further increases the effect to 75% for 5s when a hit is landed on the team leader.

700009639.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color>: Reduces the team leader's current Dodge Energy by 60% when they are hit by Cerulean Plum.

700009640.description: <color=#ffbb00><Survival></color>: Increases Firewalker's Max HP by 25% and grants Super Armor.

700009641.description: <color=#ffbb00><Attack></color>: Increases the DMG dealt by the Firewalker by 50%. Further increases the effect to 75% for 5s when a hit is landed on the team leader.

700009642.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color>: The Firewalker summons a large group of Zealots to assist in the battle.

700009682.description: Restores the team's HP by 1% every 3s.

700009683.description: Increases the team's max Dodge Energy by 20%.

700009686.description: Extends the duration of Zero Time triggered by the team leader by 1s.

700009702.description: <color=#ff7300><Complex Simulation></color> Increases normal enemies' Max HP by 50%.

700009704.description: <color=#ff7300><Complex Simulation></color> Increases the DMG dealt by normal enemies by 50%.

700009706.description: <color=#ff7300><Complex Simulation></color> Increases normal enemies' DEF by 150%.

700009707.description: Increases elite enemies' Max HP by 25%

700009708.description: <color=#ff7300><Complex Simulation></color> Increases elite enemies' Max HP by 50%.

700009710.description: <color=#ff7300><Complex Simulation></color> Increases the DMG dealt by elite enemies by 50%.

700009712.description: <color=#ff7300><Complex Simulation></color> Increases elite enemies' DEF by 150%.

700009713.description:

Grants 1 stack of Resonance when Mods land a hit with a normal Physical attack or skill, increasing ATK by 3% for 5s; stacks up to 5 times.
Reduces DMG taken by 20% when Mods have 5 stacks of Resonance.

700009720.description:

700009721.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color> All enemies gain Super Armor.

700009758.description: Environmental corrosion. Mod loses HP every second.

700009801.description: Enemies in Dream Simulation have their <color=#2ECC71>HP</color> boosted.

700009802.description: Enemies in Dream Simulation have their <color=#CB4335>DMG</color> boosted.

700009803.description: Enters Phase II when entering the battle with HP and ATK boosted.

700009804.description: Increases DMG dealt by 75% for 5s when a hit is landed on the team leader.

700009805.description: The team leader is slowed by 50% for 5s when hit by the missile.

700009807.description: Samurai Guard and Ninja Guard will appear when entering the next phase.

700009808.description: The Eye is getting bigger and more powerful!

700009810.description: Enters Phase II when entering the battle with HP and ATK boosted.

700009813.description: Dark Metal is corrupted by Bane Energy and its DEF is boosted.

700009814.description: Quartz will engage in battle when Haagenti's HP falls below 50%.

700009832.description: Grants a shield stack when a normal attack lands. Grants 1 stack for each strike that hits, up to 5.

700009834.description: When Rage is higher than 50, hitting enemies may restore HP.

700009839.description: When a normal attack hits, the Skill 3 CD is reduced.

700009840.description: Increases the DMG of normal attacks nd significantly increases the speed of normal attacks.
