700009843.description: Restores HP every second that the Mod is in Modified Mode.

700009844.description: Increases enemies' Mod Index when receiving DMG.

700009845.description: Increases Rage by 100 for every second that the Mod is in Modified Mode.

700009846.description: Increases enemies' Mod Index when hitting with normal attacks.

700009901.description: <color=#F3751A><Fire></color>: Enemies take 50% more Fire DMG, but their Non-Fire RES is increased by 30%.

700009902.description:
<color=#ffbb00><Survival></color>: Increases enemies' Max HP by 75%.
For Mods who are not within a certain range of the Visbanic Dark Metal, reduces their ATK by 100%; for Mods who are within said range, increases their Fire DMG by 50%.

700009903.description:
<color=#ffbb00><Attack></color>: Enemies deal 75% more DMG to the team leader.
There are extra supplies in the map to be collected.

700009904.description:
<color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color>: Visbanic Dark Metal no longer enters Modified Mode or Zero Time.
Mods' Normal Attack DMG +100%

700009905.description: <color=#E9E346><Light></color>: Enemies take 50% more Light DMG, but their Non-Light RES is increased by 30%.

700009906.description:
<color=#ffbb00><Survival></color>: Increases the enemy's Max HP by 50%.
Grants the enemy a Shield equal to 50% Max HP when its HP falls below 40%. Effect triggers only once.

700009907.description:
<color=#ffbb00><Attack></color>: Triggers a short period of Duel Time when Dark Metal hits the team leader.
During Duel Time, the enemy deals 150% more DMG to any team leader without Super Armor. Also, the team leader deals 50% more DMG.

700009908.description:
<color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color>: When not in Modified Mode or Zero Time, the Dark Metal has Immunity against Non-Crit DMG.
Dark Metal takes 50% more DMG in Zero Time.

700009909.description: <color=#88E682><Wind></color>: Enemies take 50% more Wind DMG, but their Non-Wind RES is increased by 30%.

700009910.description:
<color=#ffbb00><Survival></color>: Increases enemies' Max HP by 100%.
Increases Mod's Charge Skill DMG by 150%.

700009911.description: <color=#ffbb00><Attack></color>: Enemies deal 75% more DMG to the team leader, but 50% less DMG if the team leader is with Super Armor.

700009912.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color>: After Kusherfang lands a hit on the team leader, it will continue to deal DMG to the team leader every second until the battle is over.

700009913.description: <color=#EC5858><Physical></color>: Enemies take 50% more Physical DMG, but their Non-Physical RES is increased by 30%.

700009914.description:
<color=#ffbb00><Survival></color>: Increases enemies' Max HP by 100%.
Enemies in Armor Break take 75% more Physical DMG.

700009915.description: <color=#ffbb00><Attack></color>: Enemies deal 75% more DMG to the team leader. But when the enemy is inflicted with Stun, this effect will be removed for 10s and team leader deals 50% more DMG during this period.

700009916.description:
<color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color>: Increases enemies' Max HP by 50% and grants them Immunity against Non-Crit DMG.
The team leader deals 25% more DMG when they own 5 stacks of Resonance.

700009917.description: <color=#00B7E4><Water></color>: Enemies take 50% more Water DMG, but their Non-Water RES is increased by 30%.

700009918.description:
<color=#ffbb00><Survival></color>: Increases enemies' Max HP by 150%.
Enemies in Zero Time take 75% more Water DMG.

700009919.description:
<color=#ffbb00><Attack></color>: Enemies deal 75% more DMG to the team leader.
Enemies in Zero Time take 50% more Crit DMG.

700009920.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color>: Athena summons the Convallaria guards when she enters Phase II.

700009922.description: <color=#ffbb00><Attack></color>: Enemies deal 75% more DMG to the team leader.

700009923.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color>: After Kusherfang lands a hit on the team leader, it will continue to deal DMG to the team leader every second until the battle is over.

700009924.description: <color=#A835D4><Thunder></color>: Enemies take 50% more Thunder DMG, but their Non-Thunder RES is increased by 30%.

700009925.description:
<color=#ffbb00><Survival></color>: Increases enemies' Max HP by 150%.
Enemies in Zero Time take 75% more Thunder DMG.

700009926.description:
<color=#ffbb00><Attack></color>: Enemies deal 75% more DMG to the team leader.
Enemies in Zero Time take 50% more Crit DMG.

700009927.description: <color=#ff3000><Challenging Simulation></color> Restores HP to the enemy when they lands a hit on the team leader.

700009928.description: <color=#EC5858><Physical></color>: Enemies take 50% more Physical DMG, but their Non-Physical RES increases by 30%.

700009929.description:
<color=#ffbb00><Survival></color>: Increases enemies' Max HP by 150%.
Enemies in Modified Mode take 75% more Physical DMG.

700009930.description: Deals 25% less DMG when not in Zero Time.

700009931.description: When the enemy hits the team leader, a Mark is inflicted on them for 15s. Hitting the Mark will detonate it and deal an additional 75% DMG.

700009932.description: When the enemy hits the team leader, gains a shield equal to 10% of Max HP. Can only take effect up to 5 times per battle.

700009934.description: <color=#F39C12><Attack></color>: When the enemy hits the team leader, a Mark is inflicted on them. Hitting the Mark will detonate it and deal an additional {1} DMG.

700009935.description: <color=#F39C12><Attack></color>: Enemies become angered when their HP is less than 30% and deal {1} more DMG.

700009936.description: <color=#CB4335><Challenge></color>: When the enemy hits the team leader, gains a shield equal to {1} of Max HP. Can only take effect up to 5 times per battle.

700009937.description: <color=#CB4335><Challenge></color>: Enemies restore {1} of their Max HP every 6s when not in Modified Mode.

700009938.description: <color=#CB4335><Challenge></color>: Enemies take {1} less Non-Crit DMG when not in Zero Time.

700009948.description: Increases team leader's DMG dealt by {1}.

700070001.description: Reduces all units' DEF by {1} if there is an enemy unit within 5 m of this enemy unit.

700070002.description: When this enemy unit is defeated, it drops a bomb that detonates after 3 seconds, dealing DMG equal to 50% of the targets' Max HP to all units within range of the blast.

700070003.description: Summons a lightning storm around one random enemy unit in battle, dealing Thunder DMG equal to {1} of their Max HP and Stunning the targets for 5 seconds.

700070004.description: When the enemy unit takes lethal damage, its HP locks at 1 and it will be Immune to all further DMG.

700070005.description: Increases the enemy unit's DMG by {1} once its HP is below 30%, and grants Super Armor for 15 seconds. Only triggers once per battle.

700070101.description: Increases Non-DoT DMG dealt by Backstab. Tapping on Normal Attack button can also trigger Backstab within 3s of casting Skill 3: Bastet's Caprice. Backstab: Teleports behind an enemy to launch an attack.

700070102.description: Locks onto an enemy after a rear attack, and resets skill CD if that enemy is defeated within 5 seconds of lock-on. Tap Normal Attack within 3 seconds to launch another rear attack. The DMG dealt by rear attacks increases by 1% for each defeated enemy. This effect can be stacked.

700070103.description: Increases Non-DoT DMG dealt by Skill 1: Crescent Rush hits and Skill 2: Night Hunter hits by 25% when in Divine Gaze state.

700070104.description: Increases the instant Crit Rate of normal attacks and skills against Stunned enemies by 40%, and increases the instant Shadow DMG of normal attacks and skills against enemies with reduced Shadow Resistance by 20%.

700070105.description: Enters Divine Gaze state after casting Skill 1: Crescent Rush or Skill 2: Night Hunter.

700070106.description: Throws extra sheep on both sides by casting Skill 1: Counting Sheep.

700070107.description: Increases DMG dealt by the Mod by 30% when in Skill 2: Dreamscape or Phantascape.

700070108.description: Extends the duration of Shackle by 3s. Increases DMG dealt by {1} and shortens the remaining skill CD by 0.3s when normal attacks and skills hit enemies in Shackle.

700070109.description: Resets the CD of Skill 1: Counting Sheep after the Ultimate Skill ends. Within 3s after casting the Ultimate Skill, casting skills will not consume Energy, and Skill 1: Counting Sheep will not enter CD.

700070110.description: Throws sheep towards surrounding enemies every 1.5s while Skill 3: Hollow Dream is charging. When Skill 3: Hollow Dream hits, increases the Non-DoT DMG dealt by 10% for every 1 sheep thrown. Effect stacks up to 99 sheep and is removed when Skill 3: Hollow Dream hits.

700070111.description: Increases Independent DMG dealt by Skill 2: Cold Vortex by 50%. Pulls enemies together and extends the duration of the effect when casting this skill.

700070112.description: Skill 2: Cold Vortex inflicts Freeze on enemies hit for 2s. Extends the duration of Freeze by 0.1s when hitting enemies in Freeze inflicted by Skill 2: Cold Vortex or Skill 1: Frozen Land.

700070113.description: Resets the remaining CD of other skills of the Mod and increases DMG dealt by 3% when defeating an enemy with Skill 3: Polar Strike. This effect can be stacked.

700070114.description: Removes the Control RES state of enemies hit by Skill 3: Polar Strike and restores 40 Rage. Skill 1: Frozen Land can be charged twice.

700070115.description: Increases Independent DMG dealt by Skill 3: Polar Strike to enemies hit in Freeze by 50%. Resets the CD of this skill and gains 50 Rage. Skill 3: Polar Strike can be charged twice.

700070116.description:
When in Wildfire state, inflicts enemies hit by the normal attack: Fiery Dance with 1 stack of Enhanced Scorch for 20s. Effect can stack.
Enhanced Scorch: Deals Fire DMG equal to 50% of ATK immediately, and deals extra DMG once every 3s thereafter for 20s.

700070117.description: When enemies with Scorch are hit with Fiery Dance: Alt, Fiery Dance: Burst will be triggered. When an enemy is hit with Fiery Dance: Burst, they instantly take the remainder of the full DMG from the Enhanced Scorch. Effect triggers only once every 10s for each enemy but the Enhanced Scorch effect will not be removed.

700070118.description:
When in Wildfire state, also inflicts enemies hit by Skill 1: Ashen: Charge or Skill 2: Ashen: Blacken with 3 stacks of Enhanced Scorch for 20s. This effect can stack.
Enhanced Scorch: Deals Fire DMG equal to 50% of ATK immediately, and deals extra DMG once every 3s thereafter for 20s.

700070119.description: When an enemy is hit with an Ultimate Skill, they instantly take the remainder of the full DMG from the Enhanced Scorch. This DMG dealt is boosted by 100% and the Enhanced Scorch effect will not be removed. For each enemy with Enhanced Scorch hit with the Ultimate Skill, the remaining CD of said Ultimate Skill will be shortened by 2s.

700070120.description: When in Wildfire state, increases the Mod's Independent DMG by 100%, and shortens the remaining Skill CD by 0.5s upon each hit of Fiery Dance: Alt.

700070121.description: Deals extra Physical DMG equal to 100% of ATK when Skill 3: Scarlet: Scattered Flowers is cast. Effect triggers only once every 1s.

700070122.description: Gains 1 Trace and casts Skill 3: Scarlet: Scattered Flowers once when holding down to cast Skill 1: Scarlet: Tassel White, Skill 2: Scarlet: Cloud Water, and Skill 2: Scarlet: Ashen Star, increasing the Mod's DMG by 15% by 7s.

700070123.description: Increases the Independent DMG of Skill 3: Scarlet: Scattered Flowers by 30% and grants 1 Trace per hit. Effect triggers only once every 3s.

700070124.description: Shortens the CD of the Mod's remaining skills by 1s when Skill 3: Scarlet: Scattered Flowers hits. Effect triggers only once every 3s. Grants Invincible when cast. Effect triggers only once every 3s.

700070125.description: Hold down while casting normal attacks to cast Skill 3: Scarlet: Scattered Flowers. When this skill is being cast, hold down and release the Normal Attack button to follow up with another casting of Skill 3: Scarlet: Scattered Flowers.

700070126.description: Increases the Skill DMG of Skill 1: Rapid Stab or Quick Stab by 60%, and shortens the remaining CD of Skill 2: Swift Slash by 70% upon hit.

700070127.description: When Extremity Dodge is triggered, increases DMG by 30% for 5 seconds, and resets the CD of Skill 1: Rapid Stab or Quick Stab.

700070128.description: Draws enemies together and increases the Mod's DMG by 30% for 5s when casting Skill 3: Sword Shade.

700070129.description: Triggers Skill 3: Raychaser Slash once when casting Enhanced Skill 1: Daybreak or Enlightening. Deals extra Physical DMG equal to 300% of ATK when Skill 3: Raychaser Slash's last strike hits.

700070130.description: Grants 70 Divine Grace when casting Skill 3: Raychaser Slash, and increases the Mod's DMG by 0.5% for {1}s for each 1 point of Divine Grace spent during Skill 3: Raychaser Slash.

700070131.description: Increases the Independent DMG of Skill 3: Breach or Breakthrough by 0.5% for each 1 hit of Sacred Gale Crystals. This effect can be stacked.

700070132.description: Triggers Sacred Gale Crystals each time a normal attack hits. Shortens the remaining CD of skills and Ultimate Skills by 0.3 seconds for each hit of Sacred Gale Crystals.

700070133.description: Triggers Sacred Gale Crystals against enemies hit by Skill 2: Surging Wind.

700070134.description: Increases the Independent DMG of Skill 3: Breach and Breakthrough by 30%, and draws enemies together when cast.

700070135.description: Increases the independent DMG of Sacred Gale Crystals by 20%, and grants 1 Trace for each hit. This effect triggers only once every 1 second.

700070136.description: Shortens the remaining CD of the Mod's other skills by 70% when Skill 1: Thunder: Ardent Light hits, and grants 50 Rage. Effect triggers only once every 1s.

700070137.description: Draws enemies together ahead on the third stance of Skill 3: Thunder: Out of the Blue, then restores 30 Rage. Increases DMG by 20% for 8s after casting.

700070138.description: Increases the Skill DMG of Skill 1: Thunder: Ardent Light by 60%, and triggers lightning strikes upon hit, dealing Thunder DMG equal to 500% of ATK and swapping Skill 3: Thunder: Out of the Blue for the third stance.

700070139.description: Replaces Skill 3: Thunder: Out of the Blue with the third stance and restores 100 Rage after triggering Extremity Dodge.

700070140.description: Increases DMG by 3% when Seal of Thunder is removed; stacks up to 8 times. Restores 50 Rage when the first and second stances of Skill 3: Thunder: Out of the Blue hit, and swaps the third stance for Thunder: Out of the Blue.

700070141.description: Causes 3 extra explosions and pulls enemies together when Skill 1: Grenade explodes.

700070142.description: Shortens the remaining CD of Skill 1: Grenade, Skill 2: Chained Crosshair, and Ultimate Skill: Piercing Snipe by 1s when a normal attack hits. Tap Normal Attack after casting a skill or Ultimate Skill to launch a follow-up fifth strike.

700070143.description: When Skill 2: Chained Crosshair crits, extends one volley of shots and increases this skill's DMG by 20%.

700070144.description: Increases Skill DMG of Skill 3: Sniper Mode by 20%. Takes 30% less DMG when Skill 3: Sniper Mode is active.

700070145.description: Gains 1 Trace upon each hit landed by Skill 3: Sniper Mode.

700070146.description: Restores Ultimate Skill charge by 25% when a Mudra is formed, and shortens the remaining Ultimate Skill CD by 4s.

700070147.description: Deals additional DMG equal to 4000% of ATK once when the Ultimate Skill hits.

700070148.description:
Rain of Kunai: Triggers a Shuriken attack on enemies hit.
Wondrous Thunder: Deals additional DMG equal to 100% of ATK once upon hitting.
Razer Whirlwind: Deals additional DMG equal to 100% of ATK once upon hitting.
Tectonic Blast: Triggers 3 AoE impacts upon an enemy hit, with each impact dragging surrounding enemies.

700070149.description: Dodge triggers the Dodge effect, restores the Ultimate Skill charge by 50%, and resets the CD of Skill 1: Heaven's Hold and Skill 2: Earth's Hold.

700070150.description: Triggers a Shuriken attack whenever a normal attack hits within 3s after a Mudra is formed. Shortens the remaining CD of Skill 1: Heaven's Hold and Skill 2: Earth's Hold by 0.3s when the Shuriken attack hits.

700070151.description: Allows you to select up to two targets when unleashing Skill 2: Ground Blast for an additional attack.

700070152.description: Reduces DMG taken by 70% while skill casting is underway.

700070153.description: Grants 6 Divine Grace each time a hit is landed with Skill 3: Power Flame.

700070154.description: Gathers any enemies that are to the front with the casting of a charged Skill 1: Bullet Hail or charged Skill 2: Ground Blast. Increases the Fire DMG the Mod can deal by 20% each time skill is unleashed at full charge. Effect stacks up to 5 times.

700070155.description: If the Mod has more than 30 Divine Grace when a charged Skill 1: Bullet Hail or charged Skill 2: Ground Blast is cast, expends 30 Divine Grace to bring the skill to full charge. Effect triggers only once every 3s.

700070156.description: A hit landed with a Basic Attack summons a hidden drone that will also attack the target, dealing DMG equal to 200% ATK. Effect triggers only once every second.

700070157.description: Automatically summons a drone to attack the enemy. Effect triggers only once every 3s, and can also be triggered by teammates.

700070158.description: Skill 1: Precision Bombing/Repeat Bombardment can be now charged twice, and the DMG dealt with Repeat Bombardment on the same enemy from repeat hits is no longer reduced.

700070159.description: Skill 3: Pulsation now comes with two additional light beams during the attack. The Mod is also immune to DMG during skill casting.

700070160.description: Every hit landed with the Ultimate Skill: Missile Burst also comes with DMG equal to 400% ATK that ignores DEF. Ultimate Skillchains also deal DMG equal to 3,600 ATK that ignores DEF.

700070161.description: Increases the Skill DMG of Skill 1: Hunt Down by 75% and grants Unyielding.

700070162.description: After Skill 2: Roar of the Nile is cast, deals DMG of Skill 2: Roar of the Nile to nearby enemies every 3s for 12s.

700070163.description: Increases the DMG dealt with Skill 3: Wavebreaker by 125% (by another 25% against enemies that cannot be thrown).

700070164.description: Skill 3: Wavebreaker immediately defeats any enemy that has been pinned down, and also deals DMG equal to 50% of the defeated enemy's HP to nearby enemies as well. This DMG ignores DEF.

700070165.description: Hits landed grant Rage. The more Rage accumulated, the more DMG taken is reduced (up to 30%) and the more elemental DMG is dealt (up to 30% more). Defeating an enemy also resets skill CD.

700070166.description: Allows you to follow up Extremity Dodge with a Normal Attack as a counterattack. If a hit is landed in this way, another round of ice spike DMG with Skill 3: Icy Spike is also dealt.

700070167.description: Resets the CD of Skill 2: Ice Arc after a hit is landed with the same skill at full charge.

700070168.description: Skill 1: Careless Barge can now be charged twice. Hits landed on enemies with Freeze also inflict Armor Break which reduces their DEF by 50% for 6s.

700070169.description: Casting Skill 3: Icy Spike now also launches ice spikes to both sides. Also increases all-element DMG by 30% from ice spikes.

700070170.description: Increases Base DMG by 20% each time Skill 2: Ice Arc is cast at full charge. Effect stacks up to 20 times, though stack is reset when skill is cast with less than full charge.

700070171.description: Summons 2 extra phoenixes in the front when using Skill 1: Sacred Flame Dive.

700070172.description: Summons extra phoenixes on either side immediately when casting Skill 1: Sacred Flame Dive.

700070173.description: Triggers Skill 1: Sacred Flame Dive when the last strike of the normal attack results in a hit.

700070174.description: When the phoenix summoned by Sacred Flame Dive flies its maximum distance or disappears, a Burning Dance will be triggered at the starting position.

700070175.description: When the Dodge effect is triggered, Skill 1: Sacred Flame Dive will be triggered to attack the attacker.

700070176.description: For every 1 BunBun-3 on the field, increases BunBun-3's DMG by 20%.

700070177.description: Skill 3: BunBun Strike summons 1 extra BunBun-3.

700070178.description: Summons a BunBun-3 every time when Skill 2: BunBun Cannon lands a hit.

700070179.description: Summons a BunBun-3 every time when the last strike of the normal attack lands a hit.

700070180.description: Summons a BunBun-3 to attack the enemy after the Mod triggers the Dodge effect.

700070181.description: Grants <color=#FF9500>1</color> Trace when a hit is landed on the enemy with the fourth strike of a normal attack.

700070182.description: Shortens skills' remaining CD by <color=#FF9500>20%</color> each time Thunder Frenzy is triggered.

700070183.description:
Triggers Thor's Blast each time the Thunder Frenzy state is activated.
Thor's Blast: Deals DMG equal to <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> of ATK to the locked-on target, and also inflicts the hit enemy with <color=#E78300>1</color> stack of Thunderstruck. This effect can be triggered once every <color=#FF9500>0.5</color>s.
Thunderstruck: Each stack increases the Non-DoT DMG of Thor's Blast by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s. This duration is reset every time a stack is inflicted on the enemy. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>5</color> times.

700070184.description:
Triggers Thor's Blast whenever Thundercloud is at <color=#FF9500>80</color> or above. This effect can be triggered once every <color=#E78300>3</color>s..
Thor's Blast: Deals DMG equal to <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> of ATK to the locked-on target, and also inflicts the hit enemy with <color=#E78300>1</color> stack of Thunderstruck. This effect can be triggered once every <color=#FF9500>0.5</color>s.
Thunderstruck: Each stack increases the Non-DoT DMG of Thor's Blast by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s. This duration is reset every time a stack is inflicted on the enemy. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>5</color> times.

700070185.description:
Inflicts Thor's Shackle on the attacker when Extremity Dodge is triggered. After that, Thor's Blast will be triggered each time a Normal Attack or a Skill hits an enemy in Thor's Shackle.
Thor's Shackle: Inflicts Shackle on the enemy for <color=#FF9500>{4}</color>s.
Thor's Blast: Deals DMG equal to <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> of ATK to the locked-on target, and also inflicts the hit enemy with <color=#E78300>1</color> stack of Thunderstruck. This effect can be triggered once every <color=#FF9500>0.5</color>s.
Thunderstruck: Each stack increases the Non-DoT DMG of Thor's Blast by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s. This duration is reset every time a stack is inflicted on the enemy. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>5</color> times.

700070186.description: When casting an enhanced Skill 2 - Shinra: Thunderweave, grants 1 extra kick in the combo, during which the Mod takes 60% less DMG. Each kick attack will also cause an Air Burst that deals an extra Thunder DMG equal to 40% of ATK.

700070187.description:
When casting Enhanced Skill 3, Shinra: Thousandbolt, tap quickly to gain 5 extra attacks in the first half of the move. At the same time, gains Unyielding and takes 60% less DMG. Landing a hit by the final strike will also activate a Shield equal to 10% of Max HP on the Mod.
Immediately charges the final strike to full power as long as 1 additional attack is launched at least.

700070188.description: Summons an additional thunderbolt when launching the fourth strike of an enhanced normal attack, dealing Thunder DMG equal to 500% of ATK to surrounding enemies. Gains 20 Energy.

700070189.description: After casting Enhanced Skill 1, Shinra: Ragestomp, gains an extra cast with enhanced effect.

700070190.description:
Increases the Mod's Crit DMG by 10% for 7s when the fourth strike of Normal Attack: Thunder Fist or Skill 3, Shinra: Thousandbolt, hits their target. Effect can stack up to 5 times.
Increases the Mod's Independent DMG by 6% for 7s when Skill 1, Shinra: Ragestomp, or Skill 2, Shinra: Thunderweave, hits their target. Effect can stack up to 5 times.

700070191.description:
Increases the DMG of Normal Attacks by 30% and reduces the Shadow RES of enemies hit by 15% for 5s.
Bounces and attacks nearby enemies when a Normal Attack hits, each bounce dealing Shadow DMG equal to 20% of ATK.

700070192.description:
Changes the attack mode of Skill 2: Double Scattershot.
When Skill 2: Double Scattershot hits, it also attacks nearby enemies and deals Shadow DMG equal to 300% of ATK.

700070193.description:
Skill 3: Phantom Blast costs 30 less Rage.
When a Skill 3 attack lands a hit, it creates an Enhanced Instant Shadow on the spot that drags in surrounding enemies, each time dealing Shadow DMG equal to 30% of ATK to the enemy. The Enhanced Instant Shadow lasts 8s and no more than 1 can exist on the field at the same time.
When an Enhanced Instant Shadow is created, resets the CD of Skill 3 once.
When an Enhanced Instant Shadow is on the field, casting Skill 3: Phantom Blast also launches one extra attack, dealing Shadow DMG equal to 350% of ATK.

700070194.description:
After the last strike of a Normal Attack lands a hit, restores 30 Rage additionally, and creates an Enhanced Instant Shadow on the spot that drags in surrounding enemies, each time dealing Shadow DMG equal to 30% of ATK to the enemy. The Enhanced Instant Shadow lasts 8s and no more than 1 can exist on the field at the same time.
When an Enhanced Instant Shadow is created, resets the CD of Skill 3 once.
When an Enhanced Instant Shadow is on the field, casting the last strike of the Normal Attack also launches one extra attack, dealing Shadow DMG equal to 350% of ATK.

700070195.description:
Shoots in all direction while dodging, dealing Shadow DMG equal to 100% ATK, and shortens the remaining CD of a random skill or Ultimate Skill of the Mod by 1s upon landing a hit. Effect triggers only once every 5s.
Grants 25% Dodge Energy when the last strike of a Normal Attack hits.

700070196.description: Attack changes to a laser strafing of enemies to the front when in Cannon Tower form. Each attack expends 20 Divine Grace and deals seven strikes for Shadow DMG equal to 2,100% ATK in total.

700070197.description: Every hit landed increases Independent DMG by 6%. Effect can trigger once every 0.8s, and stacks up to 10 times. One instance is removed from the stack every 0.8s.

700070198.description:
Shortens the CD of Skill 2: Specter Blast by 60%.
When a hit is landed with Skill 2: Specter Blast, several cannon towers appear near the enemy and deal together Shadow DMG equal to 400% ATK in total.

700070199.description: Dodge triggers a joint attack which deals to surrounding enemies Shadow DMG equal to 100% ATK and grants 25 Divine Grace.

700070200.description:
Generates a Shadow Beacon when in Cannon Tower form. Effect can trigger once every 4s.
When the Shadow Beacon is hit by a cannon shot from the Mod, the beacon explodes and drags in nearby enemies, dealing to the enemy Shadow DMG equal to 300% ATK in total. Also grants 40 Divine Grace.

700070201.description:
Reduces the Rage expended by the enhanced Skill 3: Stir in the Wind, to 40.
Attack continuously with the enhanced Skill 3: Stir in the Wind by holding down on the button. Doing so expends 6 Rage every 3s.

700070202.description: Generates four additional wind arrows with Skill 1: Blast Squall, dealing Wind DMG equal to 400% ATK in total.

700070203.description: When a hit is landed with Skill 2: Hurricane Spin, triggers a hurricane that springs at the enemy to deal Wind DMG equal to 700% ATK in total. Effect can trigger once every 2s.

700070204.description:
Grants various additional effects for attacks made with the enhanced Skill 3: Stir in the Wind based on the skill used just before:
Skill 1: Blast Squall: Generates a wind bomb that deals Wind DMG equal to 100% ATK. Effect can trigger once every 0.12s.
Skill 2: Hurricane Spin: Generates a hurricane that deals Wind DMG equal to 400% ATK in total. Effect can trigger once every 1.2s.

700070205.description: Increases ATK by 5% for 10s each time the skill is cast. Effect stacks up to 10 times.

700070206.description: Using a normal attack, Skill 1, or Skill 2 will unleash an additional blade energy attack at the enemy, dealing Ice DMG equal to 300% ATK.

700070207.description: The fifth strike of a normal attack will gather nearby enemies.

700070208.description:
Reduces the CD of Skill 3 Higan: Chibiki by 50%.
When in the Block stance, Skill 3 Higan: Chibiki will automatically call Hisame to attack the enemy, dealing Ice DMG equal to 2,300% ATK and triggering once every 2s.

700070209.description: Attacks have a 25% chance to remove the enemy's Control RES points on hit, and deal Ice DMG equal to 700% ATK. Effect can trigger only once every 3s.

700070210.description: Hisame's hits inflict Armor Break and lower the DEF of enemies by 20% for 12s. Effect stacks up to 4 times.

700070211.description: Using Slash of Glare allows you to follow up with Slash of Glare again. Every use expends 5 Daybreak, but Daybreak is not expended when in the Verdict state.

700070212.description: When in the Verdict state, the range of normal attacks is increased, ATK is increased by 50%, and hitting with normal attacks grants Daybreak.

700070213.description:
Grants an additional attack when Flash and Destiny hit, dealing Light DMG equal to 400% ATK, while also granting 20 Daybreak and 40 Divine Grace when attacks hit.
Grants an additional attack when Brilliance and Choice hit, dealing Light DMG equal to 400% ATK. When using Brilliance and Choice, the corresponding skill CD is reduced by 3s.

700070214.description: Every successful block will trigger an additional attack, dealing Light DMG equal to 400% ATK. Effect triggers only once every 0.1s.

700070215.description: Restores Daybreak to full when entering battle, and grants 20 Daybreak every time an enemy is defeated.

700070216.description:
Every time a normal attack is used, tap normal attack again to automatically follow up with Frostbreaker.
Frostbreaker's Rage cost is reduced by 18.

700070217.description: After following up with Frostbreaker, using a non-mobile Dodge will also unleash a So-ei Strike.

700070218.description:
When following up with Frostbreaker, DMG from normal attacks is increased by 50% for 5s.
When using So-ei Strike, the remaining CD of Skill 1: Shadowswayer, Skill 2: Moonshatter, and Ultimate Skills are reduced by 2s.

700070219.description: Each Normal Attack strike grants Super Armor and reduces DMG taken by 30% for 2s.

700070220.description: Upon hit, increases Non-DoT ATK by 0.6% for every 1 Rage. This effect can increase ATK by up to 60% in total.

700070501.description: Deals extra DMG equal to 90% of ATK when a normal attack hits. Effect triggers only once every 3s.

700070502.description: Deals DMG equal to <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> of enemies' Max HP when they are hit by normal attacks.

700070503.description: Increases Non-DoT DMG dealt by <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> when normal attacks hit enemies with a higher HP percentage.

700070504.description: Increases Non-DoT Crit Rate by <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> when normal attacks hit enemies with a lower HP percentage.

700070505.description: Increases the DMG of normal attacks by 30% when they hit; stacks up to <color=#FF9500>{2}</color> times.

700070506.description: Increases Skill DMG by <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> for {2}s when a normal attack hits.

700070507.description: Normal attacks have a <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> chance of increasing Non-DoT DMG by 200% on hit, and a <color=#FF9500>{2}</color> chance of reducing Non-DoT DMG by 20% on hit. Effect triggers only once every 2s.

700070508.description: Grants <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> Ultimate Skill charge when a normal attack hits. Effect triggers only once every 3s.

700070509.description: Has a 15% chance of shortening remaining Ultimate Skill CD by <color=#FF9500>{1}</color>s when a normal attack hits.

700070510.description: Has a 15% chance of shortening a random skill's remaining CD by <color=#FF9500>{1}</color>s when a normal attack hits.

700070511.description: Grants 20 Dodge Energy when a normal attack hits. Effect triggers only once every <color=#FF9500>{1}</color>s.

700070512.description: Shortens the remaining CD of the Dodge effect by 1s when a normal attack hits. Effect triggers only once every <color=#FF9500>{1}</color>s.

700070551.description: Deals DMG equal to 300% of ATK when a skill or Ultimate Skill hits. Effect triggers only once every <color=#FF9500>{1}</color>s.

700070552.description: When skills and Ultimate Skills hit, the higher the HP of the enemy hit, the more Non-DoT DMG is increased. This effect increases by <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> for each 20% of HP owned.

700070553.description: Inflicts Fear on enemies hit by skills and Ultimate Skills, and reduces their DEF by <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> for 5s.

700070554.description: Increases Non-DoT DMG of skills and Ultimate Skills by <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> when they hit enemies with more HP than the Mod.

700070555.description: Increases Non-DoT Crit Rate of skills and Ultimate Skills by <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> when they hit enemies with less HP than the Mod.

700070556.description: Shortens the remaining CD of all skills and Ultimate Skills by 1.5s when a skill or Ultimate Skill hits an enemy with Fear. Effect triggers only once every <color=#FF9500>{1}</color>s.

700070557.description: Deals extra DMG equal to <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> of ATK when a skill or Ultimate Skill hits an enemy with Fear. Effect triggers only once every 0.3s.

700070558.description: Increases Skill DMG by <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> for {2}s when a skill or Ultimate Skill hits. Effect triggers only once every 5s.

700070559.description: Inflicts Armor Break on enemies hit by skill crits and Ultimate Skill crits, and reduces their DEF by <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> for {2}s.

700070560.description: Increases the Mod's DMG by <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> for 2s when a skill or Ultimate Skill hits. Effect triggers only once every 10s.

700070561.description: Grants <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> Ultimate Skill charge when a skill or Ultimate Skill hits. Effect triggers only once every 6s.

700070562.description: Shortens remaining Ultimate Skill CD by <color=#FF9500>{1}</color>s when a skill or Ultimate Skill hits. Effect triggers only once every 5s.

700070563.description: Increases Attribute DMG of all attributes by <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> for {2}s when a skill or Ultimate Skill hits. Effect triggers only once every 5s.

700070564.description: Grants 40 Dodge Energy when a skill or Ultimate Skill hits. This effect triggers only once every 6 seconds.

700070565.description: Shortens the remaining CD of Dodge effects by 1 second when a skill or Ultimate Skill hits. This effect triggers only once every 8 seconds.

700070566.description: Increases Ultimate Skill DMG by <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> for 8s when a skill or Ultimate Skill hits.

700070601.description: Team leader enters Zero Time for 2s after casting an Ultimate Skill.

700070602.description: Team leaders gain Inspiration for 15s when casting an Ultimate Skill. Inspiration state increases DMG dealt by <color=#FF9500>{1}</color>.

700070603.description: Team leaders gain Inspiration for 15s when casting an Ultimate Skill. Inspiration state increases Independent DMG by 50% for <color=#FF9500>{1}</color>s.

700070604.description: Team leaders gain Inspiration for 15 seconds when casting an Ultimate Skill. Combat Resources are fully restored when Inspiration is gained.

700070605.description: Team leaders gain Inspiration for 15s when casting an Ultimate Skill. Armor Pierce is increased by <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> while Inspiration is active.

700070606.description: Team leaders gain Inspiration for 15s when casting an Ultimate Skill. The remaining CD of skills and Ultimate Skills is shortened by <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> when Inspiration is gained.

700070607.description: Team leaders with Inspiration deal extra DMG equal to <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> of ATK each time they attack. Effect triggers only once every 0.3s.

700070761.description: Increases Non-DoT DMG by <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> upon hit. This effect gradually decreases to 0 over 3s before increasing back up to <color=#FF9500>{1}</color> in a constant cycle.

Pacify: Deals DMG equal to 3% of current HP every 3s.

Pacify: Deals DMG equal to 3% of current HP every 3s.

Pacify: Deals DMG equal to 3% of current HP every 3s.

Pacify: Deals DMG equal to 3% of current HP every 3s.

700071203.description: When using Skill 3, grants a shield of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000023)>Impedance</material> equal to <color=#F48800>{1}</color> Max HP for <color=#F48800>{2}</color>s. Effect can trigger once every {3}s.

When the Mod gains Ultimate Skill charge, grants <color=#F48800>{1}</color> of the total in <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000021)>Energy Charge</material>.
When <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000021)>Energy Charge</material> is full, triggers an <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000022)>Electrical Arc</material>, dealing <color=#F48800>{2}</color> <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000003)>Tactical DMG</material>.

700071208.description: When entering battle, grants a shield of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000023)>Impedance</material> equal to <color=#F48800>{1}</color> lost HP for <color=#F48800>{2}</color>s.

700071209.description: Increases Ultimate Skill charge speed by <color=#F48800>{1}</color> and decreases Ultimate Skill CD by <color=#F48800>{2}</color>.

700071222.description: When shielded, triggers <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000022)>Electrical Arc</material> once every <color=#F48800>{1}</color>.

When using a Tactical Order, creates a large shield and electrical terrain at the location of the team leader for <color=#F48800>15</color>s. 700071253.description: When attacked, produces 1 <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000032)>Sharp Blade</material> for <color=#F48800>{1}</color>s and increases the rotation speed of all <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000032)>Chain Blades</material> for <color=#F48800>{2}</color>s.

700071254.description: Extends the duration of all <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000032)>Chain Blades</material> by <color=#F48800>{1}</color>s.

700071255.description: After using an Ultimate Skill, produces <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000032)>Chain Blades</material> up to the limit for <color=#F48800>{1}</color>s and increases the rotation speed of all <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000032)>Chain Blades</material> for <color=#F48800>{2}</color>s.

700071256.description: When dodging, increases the rotation speed of all <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000032)>Chain Blades</material> for <color=#F48800>{1}</color>s.

700071257.description: After entering Zero Time or Modified Mode, increases the rotation speed of all <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000032)>Chain Blades</material> for <color=#F48800>{1}</color>s.

700071258.description: When creating <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000032)>Chain Blades</material>, there is a <color=#F48800>{1}</color> chance of 1 more being produced.

700071259.description: Reduces <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000031)>Sharp Blade</material> DMG by <color=#F48800>{1}</color>, but it cannot be blocked.

700071260.description: During an Extremity Dodge, produces 1 <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000032)>Chain Blade</material> for <color=#F48800>{1}</color>s.

700071261.description: When the rotation speed of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000032)>Chain Blades</material> is increased, skill action speed is increased by <color=#F48800>{1}</color>.

700071262.description: When dodging, shoot 3 <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000031)>Sharp Blades</material>, dealing <color=#F48800>{1}</color> <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000003)>Tactical DMG</material>. When <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000031)>Sharp Blade</material> hits, it has a chance of producing 1 <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000032)>Chain Blade</material> for <color=#F48800>{2}</color>s.

700071271.description: <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000032)>Chain Blade</material> limit is doubled.

700071272.description: When <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000032)>Chain Blades</material> hit, they also trigger <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000031)>Sharp Blade's</material> probability bonus effect.

700071273.description: When <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000032)>Chain Blades</material> are about to disappear, they will shoot forward.

700071300.description: When using Tactical Order, continuously shoot <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000032)>Chain Blades</material> for <color=#F48800>{1}</color>s.

700071301.description: When normal attacks hit, adds <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000041)>Corrosion</material> stacks equal to <color=#F48800>{1}</color> x the number of normal attack strikes.

700071302.description: When dodging, produces an <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000042)>Energy Field</material> at the dodge location for <color=#F48800>{1}</color>s. Effect triggers only once every {2} seconds.

700071303.description: During an Extremity Dodge, tally up DMG against the enemy equal to <color=#F48800>{1}</color> times the enemy's <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000041)>Corrosion</material>. This DMG will not reduce the stack count of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000041)>Corrosion</material>.

700071304.description: When <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000041)>Corrosion</material> finishes dealing DMG, the halved stack count is changed to a reduction of <color=#F48800>{1}</color>.

700071305.description: Each time a skill hits, the enemy's next tally of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000041)>Corrosion</material> DMG will have a <color=#F48800>{1}</color> chance of not reducing the stack count. If the stack count is not reduced, the chance will increase for the next time. When the stack count is reduced, the chance will reset.

700071306.description: When attacked, tallies up DMG against the enemy equal to <color=#F48800>{1}</color> times the enemy's <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000041)>Corrosion</material>. This DMG will not reduce the stack count of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000041)>Corrosion</material>.

700071307.description: Reduces the ATK of enemies inflicted with <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000041)>Corrosion</material> by <color=#F48800>{1}</color>.

700071308.description: Extends the duration of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000042)>Energy Field</material> by <color=#F48800>{1}</color>s.

700071309.description: When <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000041)>Corrosion</material> DMG is tallied, if the stack count is no higher than <color=#F48800>{1}</color>, then nearby enemies will be inflicted with <color=#F48800>{2}</color> stacks of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000041)>Corrosion</material>.

700071310.description: Increases the action speed of normal attacks by <color=#F48800>{1}</color>.

700071311.description: The intervals between <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000041)>Corrosion</material> DMG tallies is reduced by <color=#F48800>{1}</color>s.

700071312.description: When hitting with normal attacks <color=#F48800>{1}</color> times, produces an <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000042)>Energy Field</material> at the enemy's location for <color=#F48800>{2}</color>s. Effect triggers only once every {3} seconds.

700071321.description: When hitting with a normal attack, there is a {1} chance of tallying up DMG against the enemy equal to <color=#F48800>{2}</color> times the enemy's <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000041)>Corrosion</material>. This DMG will not reduce the stack count of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000041)>Corrosion</material>.

700071322.description: When an enemy inflicted with <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000041)>Corrosion</material> attacks, tallies up DMG equal to <color=#F48800>{1}</color> times the enemy's <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000041)>Corrosion</material>. This DMG will not reduce the stack count of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000041)>Corrosion</material>.

700071323.description: Grants a permanent <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000042)>Energy Field</material> around the Mod.

700071350.description: When using a Tactical Order, tallies up <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000041)>Corrosion</material> DMG against all nearby enemies every <color=#F48800>{1}</color>s. This DMG will not reduce the stack count of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000041)>Corrosion</material>. Lasts for <color=#F48800>{2}</color>s.

700071351.description: When using a normal attack, shoots 1 <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000051)>Icicle</material> at enemies that have been locked on to, dealing <color=#F48800>{1}</color> <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000003)>Tactical DMG</material> and applying 1 stack of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000052)>Chill</material>.

700071352.description: When using a skill, shoots 3 <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000051)>Icicles</material> at enemies that have been locked on to, dealing <color=#F48800>{1}</color> <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000003)>Tactical DMG</material> and applying 1 stack of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000052)>Chill</material>.

700071353.description: <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000051)>Icicles</material> deal <color=#F48800>{1}</color> times more DMG to enemies inflicted with Freeze.

700071354.description: The duration of Freeze inflicted on the enemy is extended by <color=#F48800>{1}</color>s.

700071355.description: When attacked, inflicts Freeze on the attacker for {1}s and triggers <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000053)>Blizzard</material>, dealing <color=#F48800>{2}</color> points of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000003)>Tactical DMG</material> over an area.

700071356.description: Extremity Dodge inflicts Freeze on the attacker for {1}s and triggers <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000053)>Blizzard</material>, dealing <color=#F48800>{2}</color> points of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000003)>Tactical DMG</material> over an area.

700071357.description: When dodging, produces <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000054)>Frosty Terrain</material> at the target location for <color=#F48800>{1}</color>s. Effect triggers only once every {2} seconds.

700071358.description: When inflicting <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000052)>Chill</material> on enemies that have not been inflicted with it already, adds an additional <color=#F48800>{1}</color> stacks.

700071359.description: When enemies are defeated, there is a <color=#F48800>{1}</color> chance of producing <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000054)>Frosty Terrain</material> for <color=#F48800>{2}</color>s. When elites and bosses are defeated, there is a 100% chance of producing <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000054)>Frosty Terrain</material>.

700071360.description: When the Mod is in range of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000054)>Frosty Terrain</material>, restores <color=#F48800>{2}</color> points of Rage, Energy, and Divine Grace every <color=#F48800>{1}</color>s, or <color=#F48800>{3}</color> Traces per second.

700071361.description: <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000053)>Blizzard</material> inflicts <color=#F48800>{1}</color> stacks of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000052)>Chill</material> on enemies hit.

700071362.description: Each time Freeze is inflicted on an enemy, randomly shortens the CD of 1 skill by <color=#F48800>{1}</color>s.

700071371.description: When an enemy inflicted with Freeze is defeated, they will not be immediately removed from battle, but will instead shoot <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000051)>Icicles</material> around them every <color=#F48800>{1}</color>s, dealing <color=#F48800>{2}</color> <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000003)>Tactical DMG</material> until the Freeze state ends.

700071372.description: Enemies inflicted with Freeze will produce <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000054)>Frosty Terrain</material> until the Freeze state ends.

700071373.description: When the HP of enemies inflicted with Freeze is less than <color=#F48800>{1}</color>, they will be immediately defeated. For elites and bosses, the number is <color=#F48800>{2}</color>.

700071400.description: When using Tactical Order, randomly drops giant <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000051)>Icicles</material> in the area every <color=#F48800>{1}</color>s. Every hit deals <color=#F48800>{2}</color> <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000003)>Tactical DMG</material> and adds 3 stacks of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000052)>Freeze</material>. Lasts for <color=#F48800>{3}</color>s.

700071413.description: When <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000002)>Overload</material> is triggered, grants a shield of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000023)>Impedance</material> equal to <color=#F48800>{1}</color> Max HP for <color=#F48800>{2}</color>s.

700071414.description: When <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000032)>Chain Blade</material> hits, the trigger time of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000001)>lock-on</material> is reduced by <color=#F48800>{1}</color>s.

700071415.description: When <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000002)>Overload</material> hits, it will also add <color=#F48800>{1}</color> stacks of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000041)>Corrosion</material> to enemies hit.

700071416.description: <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000054)>Frosty Terrain</material> triggers <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000002)>Overload</material> every {2}s, dealing <color=#F48800>{1}</color> <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000003)>Tactical DMG</material>.

700071434.description: When shielded, increases the rotation speed of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000032)>Chain Blades</material>.

700071435.description: When <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000041)>Corrosion</material> DMG is tallied, restores Ultimate Skill charge to the whole team equal to the number of stacks.

700071436.description: When shielded, shoots 1 <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000051)>Icicle</material> every <color=#F48800>{1}</color>s, dealing <color=#F48800>{2}</color> <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000003)>Tactical DMG</material> and inflicting 1 stack of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000052)>Chill</material>.

700071445.description: Increases the chance of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000031)>Sharp Blade's</material> extra effects by <color=#F48800>{1}</color> for every stack of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000041)>Corrosion</material>.

700071446.description: When <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000032)>Chain Blade</material> hits, it will also add <color=#F48800>{1}</color> stacks of <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000052)>Chill</material> to enemies hit.

700071456.description: When <material=underline c=#5C5D60 h=2 event=terminology args=(1000041)>Corrosion</material> DMG is tallied, inflicts Freeze on the affected enemy for <color=#F48800>{1}</color>s.

21101110121.description: Swings the scythe continuously to slash at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

21101120122.description:
Uses her scythe to slash at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. When Forbidden Blade is in cooldown, tap on the skill again to launch another Forbidden Blade strike while causing to self DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> HP (DMG is capped at <color=#E78300>30%</color>). Hits landed with this second cast of Forbidden Blade deal <color=#E78300>{2}</color> more Non-DoT DMG and grants an <color=#E78300>8%</color> Ultimate Skill charge. Can be used once every cooldown.
Use of Forbidden Blade does not interrupt normal attacks.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>{4}</color> Traces on every skill hit.

21101120223.description:
Throws her scythe at the target and retrieves it, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Traces on every skill hit.

21101120324.description: Unleashes a powerful slash attack on the locked-on enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Recovers <color=#E78300>{2}</color> HP when an enemy is defeated using the skill. Effect can trigger once every skill cast.

21101310121.description:
Launches a stream of attacks on the locked-on enemy, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Fire Warp: Hold down on the Normal Attack button to cast this skill. Asura unleashes a linear attack through space, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>220%</color> of ATK. When Asura is in Flamefetter state, the Fire Resistance of enemies hit is lowered by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds.
Fire Warp (Enhanced): Each time the Flamefetter state ends, or when the Mod re-enters Flamefetter state in said state, or when Flamefetter is extended, the next cast of Fire Warp is enhanced. Hold down on the Normal Attack button to cast this skill. Asura unleashes a heavy fist attack through space, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>440%</color> of ATK.
Using Fire Warp does not interrupt normal attacks.

<color=#297DE0>Energy: </color>Grants <color=#E78300>3</color> Energy every second.

21101311141.description:
Asura launches a stream of attacks on the locked-on enemy, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Fire Warp: Hold down on the Normal Attack button to cast this skill. Asura unleashes a linear attack through space, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>220%</color> of ATK. When Asura is in Flamefetter state, the Fire Res of enemies hit is lowered by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds.
Fire Warp (Enhanced): Each time Flamefetter state ends, the next cast of Fire Warp is enhanced, and this skill can only be cast when Asura is in Flamefetter state by holding down on the Normal Attack button, which results in Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>660%</color> of ATK in total being dealt to enemies within a small AoE. <color=#E78300>12</color> Energy is also granted. Enemy hits landed lower the enemy's Fire Res by for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds.
The higher the number of hits landed with normal attacks when in Flamefetter state, the higher Non-DoT DMG dealt with Fire Warp. DMG boost is removed when Flamefetter ends.
Using Fire Warp does not interrupt normal attacks.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>3</color> Energy every second.

21101320122.description: When Asura is in Flamefetter state, her Fire DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds. Rāhu's Fists warp to the locked-on enemy's location during the attack, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total.

21101320223.description: When Asura is in Flamefetter state, her Fire DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds. Asura casts a forcefield that traps enemies within range, ignoring any control immunity the enemy has and preventing them from gaining any Control Res for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds. When the forcefield explodes, it deals to all enemies within range Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> of ATK in total.

21101320324.description: Enters Flamefetter state, and increases Fire DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds. Opens a crack in the ground beneath the locked-on enemy, and draws all surrounding enemies to it. A heavy Rāhu Fist then bursts out of the crack, attacking enemies in range and dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total.

21101610121.description:
Brandishes the Wasteland Fiend to launch a series of attacks, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK. Hold down the Normal Attack button at the fifth strike of normal attack to unleash a special normal attack, Explosive Slash, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total. Landing a hit in this way will cause an explosion that deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK each time. Every Pressure Tank Mark active expends <color=#E78300>10</color> Divine Grace and causes <color=#E78300>1</color> additional explosion. Explosive Slash does not interrupt the strike count of the normal attack.
Spinning Slash: Expends all Pressure Tank Marks active and launches a spinning slash attack, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK in total. <color=#E78300>Each</color> Pressure Tank Mark expended grants <color=#E78300>1</color> stack of Burst-threshold and <color=#E78300>15</color> Divine Grace. Each stack of Burst-threshold increases DMG dealt by the Mod by <color=#E78300>10%</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s. Casting Assault Tactic or Siege Tactic within <color=#E78300>5</color>s of casting Spinning Slash also triggers Chainsaw Mode for said skill.
Chainsaw Overdrive Mode: Enhances normal attacks. Does not grant Divine Grace during this mode, and every hit landed with the first five strikes expends <color=#E78300>10</color> Divine Grace, dealing additional Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{6}</color> ATK in total. This mode can last <color=#E78300>10</color>s or until Divine Grace runs out.

Passive:
Only <color=#E78300>4</color> Pressure Tank Marks can be owned at a time.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace upon normal attack hits.

21101620122.description:
Greatsword Mode: Crushes sideways with the Wasteland Fiend, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Gains Super Armor for a short period of time while crushing the enemy. Switches to Chainsaw Mode upon hitting.
Chainsaw Mode: Stabs the enemy with the Wasteland Fiend, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total. Upon landing a skill hit, hold down the skill button to attack continuously expending Divine Grace and get <color=#E78300>1</color> Pressure Tank Mark for every <color=#E78300>25</color> Divine Grace expended, increasing DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>10%</color> and dealing additional Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total. Increases Non-DoT skill damage by <color=#E78300>10%</color> when in Modified Mode. Switches back to Greatsword Mode after casting.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> When attacked by the enemy in the Super Armor state granted by this skill, blocks enemy damage and grants <color=#E78300>100</color> Divine Grace.

21101620223.description: Brandishes the Wasteland Fiend to slash both horizontally and vertically at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Pressure Tank Mark when the same enemy is hit with both horizontal and vertical slashes. When landing a hit with either the horizontal or vertical slash, hold down to expend Divine Grace and continue slashing at the enemy, with horizontal slashes dealing additional Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total and vertical slashes dealing additional Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total. Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Pressure Tank Mark for every <color=#E78300>25</color> Divine Grace expended.

21101620324.description:
Greatsword Mode: Brandishes the Wasteland Fiend to unleash a series of slashes, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Switches to Chainsaw Mode upon hitting an enemy.
Chainsaw Mode: Inserts the Wasteland Fiend into the ground to emanate shockwaves that deal AoE Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total. Hold down the skill button to expend Divine Grace to continue the casting. For every <color=#E78300>25</color> Divine Grace expended, gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Pressure Tank Mark, increases DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>10%</color>, and deals to the enemy additional Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total. Increases Non-DoT Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>10%</color> when in Modified Mode. Switches back to Greatsword Mode after skill casting.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace when landing a hit in Greatsword Mode.

21101910121.description: Shu launches an attack on the enemy to her front with her lance, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK.

21101920122.description:
Shu leaps into the air and attacks the enemy with her lance, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. As she lands, she summons <color=#E78300>3</color> Sacred Gale Crystals that appear in front of her, and each crystal deals to the enemy Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>{3}</color> Traces on every skill hit.

21101920223.description:
Shu summons a rapidly moving hurricane in front of her, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Traces on every skill hit.

21101920324.description:
Skill deals to the enemy a certain amount of DMG depending on the number of Traces expended at skill cast.
<color=#E78300>1</color> Trace: Deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
<color=#E78300>2</color> Traces: Deal Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.
<color=#E78300>3</color> Traces: Deal Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total.

21101923325.description:
Skill deals to the enemy a certain amount of DMG depending on the number of Traces expended at skill cast. When the number of enemies hit is <color=#E78300>1</color>, the non-DoT Crit Rate and Crit DMG of said skill hit is increased.
<color=#E78300>1</color> Trace: Deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
<color=#E78300>2</color> Traces: Deal Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.
<color=#E78300>3</color> Traces: Deal Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total.

21102410121.description:
Launches a series of attacks, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.
Jackal Spirit's Joint Attack: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.

Passive:
The Jackal Spirit automatically attacks the enemy locked on by it using either a joint normal attack or a joint skill attack until the enemy is defeated. If the Mod's target differs from the Jackal Spirit's, when a Mod's skill hits, the Jackal Spirit will shift its focus to the Mod's locked-on enemy. The Jackal Spirit's Joint Attack is not regarded as a skill cast by the Mod. The Jackal Spirit may last on the field for up to <color=#E78300>30</color>s or until the enemy locked on by it is defeated, whichever comes first.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when the normal attack hits.

21102420122.description:
Focus the Divine Power to launch a ranged attack on the target, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Increases the Mod's Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s upon hitting an enemy. When the Jackal Spirit is on the field, skill cast also deals additional Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK, and hitting an enemy will change Skill 3 to Jackal's Gaze; The Jackal Spirit will immediately launch a joint attack on the target locked on by the Mod.
Jackal Spirit's Joint Attack: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> ATK in total.

21102420223.description:
Focus the Divine Power to launch a crescent slash attack on the target, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Increases the Mod's Shadow DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s upon hitting an enemy. When the Jackal Spirit is on the field, skill cast also deals additional Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK, and hitting an enemy will change Skill 3 to Jackal's Wild Slash; The Jackal Spirit will immediately launch a joint attack on the target locked on by the Mod.
Jackal Spirit's Joint Attack: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> ATK in total.

21102420324.description:
Summons the Jackal Spirit to attack the Mod's locked-on target if the Jackal Spirit is not yet present on the field, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total to the surrounding area. The Jackal Spirit deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total to the surrounding area. When the Jackal Spirit is already on the field, the skill will be replaced with Jackal's Gaze instead.
Jackal's Gaze: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total. The Jackal Spirit will immediately launch a joint attack on the enemy locked on by the Mod and then follow up with a ray attack upon skill hit, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK in total. Jackal's Gaze has a CD of <color=#E78300>8</color>s.
Jackal's Wild Slash: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> ATK in total. The Jackal Spirit will immediately launch a joint attack on the enemy locked on by the Mod and then follow up with another claw attack upon skill hit, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{6}</color> ATK in total. Jackal's Wild Slash has a CD of <color=#E78300>8</color>s.
Jackal Spirit's Joint Attack: Approaches the enemy and then deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{7}</color> ATK in total.
When the Mod casts Spirit Guide, Jackal's Gaze, or Jackal's Wild Slash, the Jackal Spirit will take on the Mod's current stats.

21102710121.description: Leviathan attacks the enemy with the anchor again and again, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

21102720122.description:
Leviathan dashes and strikes at the enemy, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Traces on every skill hit.

21102720223.description:
Leviathan swings the anchor to attack the target with one heavy hit, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Hold down the skill button to charge, with Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total dealt on a full charge. When, on skill cast the target enemy is in Freeze, skill is immediately charged to full.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>{3}</color> Traces each time a skill cast results in a hit.

21102720324.description: Swings the anchor to attack enemies with a row of ice spikes, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. When the spikes hit, the enemy hit is inflicted with Freeze for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

21102722141.description:
Leviathan quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect. Within <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds of the Dodge effect being triggered or a successful Break-fall while Dodge is not in cooldown, tap on Normal Attack to launch a skill attack using the anchor and deal Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total, as well as inflict Freeze on enemies hit.
Dodge triggers the Dodge effect.
When in Break-fall or when Dodge is triggered: Ice DMG dealt is increased by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds.

21102810121.description:
Swings Mjölnir to attack the enemy continuously, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Following up its derivative skill with a normal attack will start the normal attack from the fourth strike and grants Unyielding for <color=#E78300>2</color>s during the follow-up.

Passive:
Every hit landed with a normal attack or skill attack grants Thundercloud points, which can stack up to <color=#E78300>100</color>. <color=#E78300>7</color> Thundercloud are expended every <color=#E78300>0.5</color>s. Gains <color=#E78300>9</color> Thundercloud for each normal attack hit and <color=#E78300>15</color> Thundercloud for each skill hit, and gains <color=#E78300>15</color> more Thundercloud for each skill hit in Thunder Frenzy state. Every <color=#E78300>1</color> point of Thundercloud increases Independent DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>0.3%</color>, with the effect maxed out when Thundercloud is at <color=#E78300>80</color>.
Enters Thunder Frenzy state for <color=#E78300>2</color>s when casting a derivative skill, with effect duration extended by <color=#E78300>0.01</color>s for every <color=#E78300>1</color> point of Thundercloud owned (up to an extention of <color=#E78300>1</color>s).
Thunder Frenzy: Becomes Invincible for a short time upon entering the state. Thundercloud will not be automatically expended during this state, and Mod deals <color=#E78300>{2}</color> more Thunder DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Traces</color>: Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace when a hit is landed with the fifth strike of a normal attack.

21102820122.description:
Rushes toward the enemy with Mjölnir in hand, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. For a short time after skill cast, skill is replaced by the derivative skill: Hammerstrike, which can only be cast as a follow-up to Quivers Underground.
Hammerstrike: Attacks surrounding enemies with Mjölnir, expending <color=#E78300>3</color> Traces to deal Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace when a hit is landed with Quivers Underground.

21102820223.description:
Swings Mjölnir wildly, pulling in nearby enemies for a short time and dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Within a short time after skill cast, this skill will be replaced by the derivative skill: Rumblestrike, which can only be cast as a follow-up to Rumbles Faraway.
Rumblestrike: Spins Mjölnir and then smashes it into the ground, expending <color=#E78300>3</color> Traces to deal Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace when a hit is landed with Rumbles Faraway.

21102820324.description:
Swings Mjölnir, then smashes it into the ground, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Within a short time after skill cast, this skill will be replaced by the derivative skill: Tremblestrike, which can only be cast as a follow-up to Trembles Deep Within.
Tremblestrike: Swings Mjölnir and smashes it into the ground again, expending <color=#E78300>3</color> Traces to deal Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace when a hit is landed with Trembles Deep Within.

21103210121.description: Uses his greatsword to continuously attack the enemy, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Tyr is also granted max Traces as he enters the battlefield.

21103210625.description:
Uses his greatsword to continuously attack the enemy, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Tyr is also granted max Traces as he enters the battlefield. When the greatsword type held is Sword of Queen, the way the normal attack takes place is changed.
When holding the Sword of Queen: Tyr launches an attack using the Sword of Queen, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.

21103220122.description:
Tyr switches to another greatsword type and deals to the enemies around him Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. This skill may also be cast by tapping on the skill button during a normal attack. Doing so does not interrupt the normal attack but does not cause DMG either. However, the remaining cooldown time is shortened by <color=#E78300>2.5</color> seconds.
Greatswords are switched in the following order: Sword of Knight, Sword of Rook, then Sword of Queen.

<color=#297DE0>Traces: </color>When the skill is directly cast, Tyr is granted <color=#E78300>2</color> Traces. When the skill is cast over the course of a normal attack, Tyr is granted <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace.

21103220223.description:
Brings the greatsword down upon the target, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Skill cast also grants the King Mark corresponding to the type of greatsword used and places the King on the battlefield for <color=#E78300>30</color> seconds. When the King is on the field, tap to cast the skill again, with <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace expended in the process to launch a specific attack depending on the greatsword type in question.
Sword of Knight: The greatsword falls again, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.
Sword of Rook: Tyr teleports to the greatsword's location and uses it to attack the target once, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total.
Sword of Queen: Tyr launches the greatsword at the target, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> of ATK in total.

21103220324.description:
Brandishes his greatsword and launches a forward attack, expending all active King Marks in the process and dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Skill cast inflicts Shackle on the enemy for <color=#E78300>1.5</color> seconds, and as Tyr cleaves down on the enemy from on high additional DMG is also dealt. (The quantum of the additional DMG is based on the number of King Marks expended.) Shackle is removed from the enemy upon hit.
<color=#E78300>1</color> King Mark: Deals Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.
<color=#E78300>2</color> King Marks: Deal Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total.
<color=#E78300>3</color> King Marks: Deal Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> of ATK in total.

21103310121.description:
Continuously fires rays at enemies ahead using the Circles of Reason, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>3</color> Energy every 1s.

21103320122.description: Summons the Circles of Reason next to the enemy and punishes anyone who disrupts the order, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

21103320223.description: Summons the spinning Wheel of Admonishment above the enemy, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Increases DMG by <color=#E78300>10%</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s when the last strike of Final Warning hits. This effect is shared with teammates who were within the most recently generated Realm of Truth.

21103320324.description: Activates the Circles of Reason to attack the enemy from above, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Generates a Realm of Truth lasting <color=#E78300>8</color>s nearby upon skill hit, and all bonuses from the Mod's skills, Aether Codes, and the Dodge effect are shared with teammates who were within the most recently generated Realm of Truth.

21103323125.description: Activates the Circles of Reason to attack the enemy from above, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Generates an enhanced Realm of Truth lasting <color=#E78300>10</color>s nearby upon skill hit, and all bonuses from the Mod's skills, Aether Codes, and the Dodge effect are shared with teammates who were within the most recently generated Realm of Truth, whose skill damage is increased every <color=#E78300>2</color>s for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s; stacks up to <color=#E78300>5</color> times.

21103510121.description:
Launches a swift attack on the enemy using his Croc Blades, dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when a normal attack results in a hit.

21103520122.description: Dashes forward and strikes the enemies in his path up to six times, dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. When the sprint ends or when the skill button is tapped again, Sobek can cast the finishing blow, dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.

21103520223.description: Thrusts the Croc Blades into the ground and summons six circular waves to attack the enemies around him, dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
