21103520324.description: Uses his Croc Blades to get a hold on the enemy, then throws them to the ground, dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. When an enemy cannot be captured, He deals Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total instead.

21103810121.description: Transforms into several fire birds to attack the enemy, with the number of phoenixes increasing over time before the attack ends in an explosion, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total to enemies within range.

21103820122.description:
Summons The Phoenix, which flies swiftly along the target trajectory and deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total to enemies in its path.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Traces.

21103820223.description:
Uses the scepter to direct a blast at the target's feet, dealing AoE Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace upon each skill hit.

21103820324.description:
Hera starts a storm of fire around her, dealing DMG to the enemy. The amount of DMG dealt is determined by the number of Traces expended.
<color=#E78300>1</color> Trace: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK.
<color=#E78300>2</color> Traces: Deal Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK.
<color=#E78300>3</color> Traces: Deal Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK.
<color=#E78300>4</color> Traces: Deal Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> of ATK.

21103822125.description:
Hera summons The Phoenix to attack the target, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK to the enemies, and more Non-DoT Base DMG to those afflicted with Scorch.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace upon hitting an enemy.

21103910121.description:
Summons dew drops that attack enemies in front, dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

Passive:
When Divine Grace is at max, casting the skill will expend all Divine Grace and reset the cd of the skill.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace when a normal attack lands.

21103920322.description: Summons a surging wave that slowly advances to the front, dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

21104110121.description:
Swings the greatsword continuously, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK.

Passive:
When Mod is in Hummingblade state, Harmony Judgement occurs in the latter half of each normal attack strike, Adagio Vibrato, Moderato Legato or Presto Tremolo. (A follow-on attack dealt at the right time is determined Harmonious.) Grants the Unyielding effect for <color=#E78300>2.5</color>s and <color=#E78300>1</color> stack of Harmony for <color=#E78300>7</color>s each time a strike is judged as Harmonious. The duration of Harmony is reset when an attack fails to be judged as Harmonious. Harmony can stack up to <color=#E78300>105</color> times. A Sonic Boom occurs when a normal attack is judged as Harmonious. <color=#E78300>Each</color> hit landed by the Sonic Boom deals Normal Attack Physical DMG to surrounding enemies equal to <color=#E78300>261.6%, 293.6%, 329.6%, 349.2%, 392%, 440%, or 493.8%</color> ATK depending on the Harmony stack count. Harmonious strikes do not interrupt the normal attack strike count.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace upon normal attack hits when Mod is not in Hummingblade state.

21104120122.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK. When the Harmony stack count is a multiple of <color=#E78300>3</color>, Adagio Vibrato deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK, and restores HP equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK of the Mod after a hit lands. While in Hummingblade state, an Adagio Vibrato cast and judged as Harmonious increases Non-DoT DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>.

21104120223.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK. When the Harmony stack count is a multiple of <color=#E78300>5</color>, Moderato Legato deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK, and inflicts Armor Break on enemies hit while reducing their DEF by <color=#E78300>{4}</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color>s. While in Hummingblade state, a Moderato Legato cast and judged as Harmonious increases Non-DoT DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>.

21104120324.description:
Skill may only be cast when Divine Grace is full. Deals Physical DMG to surrounding enemies equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK, triggers Hummingblade state, resets the CD of Adagio Vibrato, Moderato Legato and Presto Tremolo, and replaces Concerto Chordblade with Presto Tremolo.
Hummingblade: Expends <color=#E78300>3</color> Divine Grace every <color=#E78300>0.375</color>s. Other attributes do not affect this Divine Grace expenditure. When Divine Grace reaches <color=#E78300>0</color>, Hummingblade state ends and Concerto Chordblade goes into CD.
Presto Tremolo: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK. When the Harmony stack count is a multiple of <color=#E78300>7</color>, Presto Tremolo deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK, with each stack of Harmony present increasing Non-DoT DMG dealt by the Mod by <color=#E78300>1%</color>. Increases the Non-DoT DMG dealt by Presto Tremolo by <color=#E78300>{4}</color> when it is judged as Harmonious. Presto Tremolo has a CD of <color=#E78300>12</color>s.

21104210121.description:
Controls two puppets that take turns to attack the enemy, Leuce with sharp claws and Mintha with her armored fists, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Launches attack with puppet strings instead when Leuce and Mintha cannot be controlled, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.

Passive:
Grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Chthonic Mark every <color=#E78300>6</color>s when Mod has at least <color=#E78300>25</color> but no more than <color=#E78300>75</color> Divine Grace, up to a maximum of <color=#E78300>4</color> Chthonic Marks. For <color=#E78300>each</color> Chthonic Mark owned, increases Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>3%</color> and Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>5%</color>.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Expends <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace when Leuce lands a hit with a normal attack or a skill, and gains <color=#E78300>3</color> Divine Grace when Mintha lands a hit with a normal attack or a skill. The expenditure/gain of Divine Grace from Leuce and Mintha is not affected by other attributes.

21104220122.description:
Switches around the puppets, and the next time Puppet Show: Prelude or Puppet Show: March is cast, Leuce and Mintha both go into Dance Partner mode. When the Chthonic Mark count is at max, hold down on the Normal Attack button to expend all of the Marks, which causes Leuce and Mintha to go into Dance Duo mode.
Dance Duo: Increases the Mod's Crit Rate by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>, Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>{3}</color>, and Fixed DMG by <color=#E78300>6,000</color> for <color=#E78300>9</color>s; Leuce and Mintha launch a joint attack, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total for <color=#E78300>5.5</color>s. When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104203)>Dance Duo state, skills can not be cast, no Chthonic Marks are granted, and Leuce and Mintha can not gain or expend any Divine Grace.
Casting Shadow Dance Twirl when Dodge is not in CD triggers the Dodge effect against the locked-on enemy. Dodge effect goes into CD after this effect is triggered.

21104220223.description:
Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total when Leuce is the puppet being operated. While the skill is in action, inflicts Darksea on the enemy for <color=#E78300>12</color>s. Inflicting Darksea multiple times does not refresh the duration.
Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total when Mintha is the puppet being operated. While the skill is in action, inflicts Deathswamp on the enemy for <color=#E78300>8</color>s. Inflicting Deathswamp multiple times does not refresh the duration.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104205)>Darksea: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK every <color=#E78300>2</color>s for <color=#E78300>12</color>s.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104204)>Deathswamp</material>: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK every <color=#E78300>2</color>s for <color=#E78300>8</color>s.
Dance Partner</material>: Replaces Puppet Show: Prelude with Puppet Show: Waltz, in which Leuce and Mintha launch a joint attack, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> ATK in total.

21104220324.description:
Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total when Leuce is the puppet being controlled. Leuce also slightly drags surrounding enemies while the skill is in action.
Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total when Mintha is the puppet being controlled. Mintha also slightly drags surrounding enemies while the skill is in action.
Dance Partner: Replaces Puppet Show: March with Puppet Show: Rondo. Leuce and Mintha launch a joint attack, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total.

21104810121.description:
Fires a series of shots at the locked-on target, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Energy every second.

21104820122.description: Shoots a laserbeam at the target, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total and inflicting Shackle to enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

21104820223.description: Summons airstrikes to bomb the target area, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

21104820324.description: Unleashes a continuous Pulsation attack of <color=#E78300>16</color> strikes at the target, with each strike dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK.

21104821125.description: Launches <color=#E78300>9</color> rounds of bombardment at the enemy to her front, with each round dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK. Also inflicts on enemies hit Shackle for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s. Bombarding the same target multiple times in a row during a single bombardment reduces the DMG dealt on subsequent hits.

21105010121.description:
Buzenbo swings her katana continuously to slash at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces: </color>When the final strike of the attack results in a hit, <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Trace is granted. The total of number of Traces that can be obtained this way is capped at <color=#E78300>1</color>.

21105020122.description:
Slashes the target in 3 attacks, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color>% ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces: </color>Gains <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Trace(s) when the skill hits.

21105020223.description:
Slashes a cross light blade at the target, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces: </color>Gains <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Trace(s) when the skill hits.

21105020324.description:
Buzenbo launches an Iaido move and unleashes a blade array at the locked-on enemy. Traces can be expended in the <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds following skill cast to launch the next move of Scarlet: Scattered Flowers (the attack range of the blade array will also be increased). There are a total of three moves in Scarlet: Scattered Flowers, and Traces obtained with Scarlet Skandha Slash are expended first.
Scarlet: Scattered Flowers Move I: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Scarlet: Scattered Flowers Move II: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.
Scarlet: Scattered Flowers Move III: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total.

21105022141.description:
Slashing by Buzenbo sends a cross light blade flying towards the locked-on target, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Enemies hit are also afflicted with Armor Break for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> When the first strike of the attack results in a hit, <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace is granted; hits with the cross light blade granting another <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace.

21105210121.description:
Fires two volleys using the Rage Serpent, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Then, calls in a drone in Storm Mode to bombard enemies in the front up to 12 times, with each bombardment dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK. When the Base DMG buff of Skill 1, Total Firepower, is active, the last strike of the normal attack also summons a drone in Storm Mode that rolls forward and launches three cannon shots, with each shot dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK.

Passive:
Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Firepower for every <color=#E78300>1</color> Energy expended. When the third strike of the normal attack concludes and Marduk reloads, gains <color=#E78300>40</color> Firepower. Firepower cap: <color=#E78300>300</color>. When Firepower is full, hold down the normal attack button to unleash Hissing in Rage.
Hissing in Rage: Maxes out the Rage Serpent's firing rate for a firepower deluge that expends <color=#E78300>12</color> Firepower every <color=#E78300>0.2</color>s. Executes a <color=#E78300>5</color>-strike attack. Each strike deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> of ATK. Effect lasts <color=#E78300>5</color>s and no Firepower is granted during this time.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Restores <color=#E78300>2</color> Energy every second, and <color=#E78300>{3}</color> Energy every time a normal attack or Hissing in Rage hits.

21105220122.description:
Fires three consecutive cannon shots at the enemy with the Rage Serpent, with each shot dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK. Increases the Base DMG of all team members' Skill 1 by <color=#E78300>5%</color> for <color=#E78300>5</color>s upon each hit. Effect can stack up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times. Refreshes and extends the duration by <color=#E78300>1</color>s for each stack. Each cannon shot also grants <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Energy. If there are cannon shots not fired by the end of the skill cast, each shot not fired reduces the remaining CD of the skill by <color=#E78300>20%</color>. When Energy is full, the skill is replaced with Firepower Assist.
Firepower Assist: Expends <color=#E78300>30</color> Energy and calls in ranged bombardment to enemies in the front, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total. When Hissing in Rage is active with Energy at max, Firepower Assist will be cast automatically and the required Energy will be expended automatically, too.

21105220223.description:
Bombards the enemy with the Rage Serpent, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total and inflicting Stun on all enemies within range for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s. Upon landing a hit, calls in a drone in Rafale Mode to conduct an area bombardment, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total. Skill casting reduces Firepower expenditure by <color=#E78300>20%</color> for <color=#E78300>7</color>s.
When the Mod or a teammate lands a hit with this drone, reduces the skill's CD by <color=#E78300>0.4</color>s (up to a reduction of <color=#E78300>6</color>s in total) and increases the skill's Energy cost by <color=#E78300>2</color> (up to a boost of <color=#E78300>30</color> points of Energy in total).

21105220324.description:
Throws an implosion grenade that deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total and pulls in the enemies for a short time. Then, calls in a drone in Bourasque Mode to conduct an area bombardment, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total. Skill casting increases the Firepower gain rate by <color=#E78300>20%</color> for <color=#E78300>7</color>s.
When the Mod or a teammate lands a hit with this drone, reduces the skill's CD by <color=#E78300>0.4</color>s (up to a reduction of <color=#E78300>6</color>s in total) and increases the skill's Energy cost by <color=#E78300>2</color> (up to a boost of <color=#E78300>30</color> points of Energy in total).

21105222125.description:
Bombards the enemy with the Rage Serpent, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total and inflicting Stun on all enemies within range for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s. Upon landing a hit, calls in a drone in Whirlwind Mode to scan and bombard the target area. When there are teammates on the field, reduces the enemy's certain type of RES based on said teammates' DMG type and DMG amount by <color=#E78300>5%</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s. Same effects can stack up to <color=#E78300>2</color> times.
When the Mod or a teammate lands a hit with this drone, reduces the skill's CD by <color=#E78300>0.4</color>s (up to a reduction of <color=#E78300>6</color>s in total) and increases the skill's Energy cost by <color=#E78300>2</color> (up to a boost of <color=#E78300>30</color> points of Energy in total).

21105223126.description:
Throws an implosion grenade that deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total and pulls in enemies for a short time. Then, calls in a drone in Hurricane Mode to drop up to 6 traps with Sluggish debuff and continuous damage in the target area, with each trap dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total over time, and slowing enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{3}</color>s. The slowing effect can stack and will increase slightly with each stack.
When the Mod or a teammate lands a hit with this drone, reduces the skill's CD by <color=#E78300>0.4</color> s (up to a reduction of <color=#E78300>6</color>s in total) and increases the skill's Energy cost by <color=#E78300>2</color> (up to a boost of <color=#E78300>30</color> points of Energy in total).

21105610121.description:
Unleashes fist and kick strikes against the target, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.
Landing a hit using Shinra: Ragestomp or Shinra: Thunderweave enhances the skill.
The last strike of the enhanced version of Thunder Fist summons an additional lightning strike against enemies in range, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>3</color> Energy every second.

21105620122.description:
Delivers two kicks to the locked-on enemy, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.
Landing a hit with the final strike of a normal attack or Shinra: Thousandbolt enhances the skill.
The second strike of the enhanced version of Shinra: Ragestomp also inflicts Stun on enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

21105620223.description:
Attacks the locked-on enemy with a flurry of kicks, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.
Landing a hit with the last strike of a normal attack or Shinra: Thousandbolt enhances the skill.
Tap repeatedly with the enhanced version of Shinra: Thunderweave to get additional kicks. Every kick deals Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK.

21105620324.description:
Unleashes a string of attacks at the locked-on enemy to deal Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total, then launches one last punch to deal Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK.
Landing a hit using Shinra: Ragestomp or Shinra: Thunderweave enhances the skill.
The final punch of the enhanced version of Shinra: Thousandbolt automatically charges up to <color=#E78300>3</color> stacks, and can be unleashed with a subsequent tap or when charge is full, dealing Thunder DMG equal to either <color=#E78300>{3}</color>, <color=#E78300>{4}</color>, or <color=#E78300>{5}</color> ATK depending on how many stacks it has.

21105810121.description:
Brandishes his nodachi and slashes at the enemy, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Each time an attack results in a hit, his DMG taken is reduced by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>10</color> times.

Passive:
Tap on the Normal Attack button within <color=#E78300>7</color> seconds of landing a hit with Ashen: Blacken, Secret Sword: Blacken, Ashen: Charge, Secret Sword: Charge, or Ashen: Smelt to cast the skill: Fiery Dance: Alt.
Fiery Dance: Alt.: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>255%</color> of ATK in total. Skill cast grants Kagutsuchi Unyielding for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds. Every <color=#E78300>3</color> times Fiery Dance: Alt. is cast, the skill: Fiery Dance: Burst is triggered.
Fiery Dance: Burst: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>360%</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>3</color> Energy every second. Hits landed with Fiery Dance: Alt. also grant <color=#E78300>10</color> Energy each time.

21105820122.description:
Unleashes two sweeping attacks, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
 Ashen: Blacken: Alt: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK. This skill has a <color=#E78300>12</color>s cd and is replaced with the derivative skill Secret Sword: Blacken.
Secret Sword: Blacken: Unleashes an upwards attack, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total. This skill has a <color=#E78300>6</color>s cd.

21105820223.description:
Rushes and stabs at the locked-on enemy, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Ashen: Charge: Alt: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK. This skill has a <color=#E78300>12</color>s cd and is replaced with the derivative skill Secret Sword: Charge.
Secret Sword: Charge: Kagutsuchi cross-slashes a total of two times, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK in total. This skill has a <color=#E78300>6</color>s cd.

21105820324.description:
Swings his nodachi upwards, casting a sword wave that deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Skill cast also sends him into Wildfire state for <color=#E78300>18</color> seconds and resets the cd of Ashen: Blacken, Ashen: Blacken: Alt, Ashen: Charge, and Ashen: Charge: Alt.
Wildfire: Ashen: Blacken is replaced with Ashen: Blacken: Alt, Ashen: Charge is replaced with Ashen: Charge: Alt. Every normal attack is regarded as a skill attack.

21105910121.description:
Fires off a stream of shots at the locked-on enemy, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

Passive:
For every <color=#E78300>20</color> hits landed on the enemy, <color=#E78300>1</color> Solar Arrow is granted. Up to <color=#E78300>3</color> Solar Arrows may be held.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> <color=#E78300>3</color> Energy is granted every second.

21105920122.description: Takes a leap to the back, jumps into the air, then fires three times at the target, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

21105920223.description:
Dashes at the enemy and fires spinning shots, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
When Apollo has at least one Solar Arrow, in the <color=#E78300>4</color> seconds after Thorn of Light is cast <color=#E78300>1</color> Solar Arrow can be expended for a follow-up attack.
Following attack: Apollo leaps into the air and fires a light arrow at the target, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK. The follow-up attack may also be used when Apollo is in the air and has at least one Solar Arrow.

21105920324.description:
Fires four light arrows, each arrow attacking enemies in its path and dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.
When Apollo has at least one Solar Arrow, in the <color=#E78300>4</color> seconds after Interweaving Light is cast <color=#E78300>1</color> Solar Arrow can be expended for a follow-up attack.
Following attack: Apollo leaps into the air and fires a light arrow at a nearby enemy, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK. When an enemy in the center zone is hit, they take <color=#E78300>{3}</color> more Non-DoT DMG. The follow-up attack may also be used when Apollo is in the air and has at least one Solar Arrow.

21106610121.description:
Ookuninushi summons BunBun Iron Fist to attack the enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Rage: </color>Grants Rage when a normal attack results in a hit.

21106620222.description: Fires BunBun-2 at enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. After landing a hit, it continues to attack up to a max of <color=#E78300>5</color> enemies around, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK.

21106620323.description: Ookuninushi leaps into the air to attack enemies in a circular area in front, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

21106623124.description: Ookuninushi summons BunBun-3 to descend from on high and attack the surrounding area, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK. The BunBun Mecha also exerts a drag effect on surrounding enemies during attacks.

21106810121.description:
Attacks with the power of the wind, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK. Grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Windchime Mark with the last strike of a normal attack (no more than <color=#E78300>3</color> Windchime Marks can be owned at a time).

Passive:
When the Mod owns <color=#E78300>3</color> Windchime Marks, all Marks will be expended upon skill casting and the skill will be enhanced.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when a normal attack hits.

21106820122.description:
Condenses wind energy into a wind arrow, dealing 2 strikes to the enemy. The first strike deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK while the second deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK. Skill casting also grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Windchime Mark.
Enhanced Blast Squall: Generates <color=#E78300>3</color> wind arrows, each of which deals 2 strikes of DMG. The first strike deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK, and the second deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK. When a wind arrow generated by the Enhanced Blast Squall hits the eye of the storm created by Hurricane Spin, the wind arrow's second strike turns into an explosion, which deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> ATK in total.

21106820223.description:
Attacks with the force of a hurricane, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Skill casting also grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Windchime Mark. An eye of the storm forms when landing a hit.
Enhanced Hurricane Spin: Deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total and generates another <color=#E78300>3</color> hurricanes, with each dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> ATK. When a wind arrow generated by Blast Squall hits the eye of the storm created by the Enhanced Hurricane Spin, the wind arrow's second strike turns into a cyclone instead, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total.

21106820324.description:
This skill can be cast without expending Rage. Increases Skill DMG by <color=#E78300>{1}</color> for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s after casting and subsequently reduces the skill's remaining CD by <color=#E78300>60%</color>. Casting Blast Squall, Hurricane Spin, or the enhanced version of Blast Squall or Hurricane Spin while skill effects are active grants the following effects.
Hits landed with the wind arrows from Blast Squall reduce the enemy's Wind RES by <color=#E78300>10%</color> for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> s.
Hits landed with the wind arrows from the Enhanced Blast Squall reduce the enemy's Wind RES by <color=#E78300>20%</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color>s.
The eye of the storm generated by Hurricane Spin drags surrounding enemies.
The eye of the storm generated by the Enhanced Hurricane Spin drags surrounding enemies with a stronger force. Grants additional drag effect when a wind arrow hits an enemy already hit by the hurricane.
Enhanced Stir in the Wind: Turns into a hurricane and becomes Invincible. Skill casting is prohibited during this skill. Deals Wind DMG to the enemy equal to <color=#E78300>{5}</color> ATK in total.

21108010121.description:
Swings her axe continuously to attack the enemy, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when a normal attack results in a hit.

21108011125.description:
Swings her axe continuously to attack the enemy, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Normal attacks have a certain chance of inflicting Freeze on enemies in front for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s when landing a hit. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>6</color>s. Whenever a normal attack hits an enemy in Freeze, an additional <color=#E78300>6</color> Rage is granted and an AoE skill attack is launched on other enemies not hit by the normal attack, which deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>125%</color> of ATK.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when a normal attack hits.

21108011141.description:
Swings her axe continuously to attack the enemy, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Normal attacks have a certain chance of inflicting Freeze on enemies in front for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s when landing a hit. Effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>6</color>s. Whenever a normal attack hits an enemy in Freeze, an additional <color=#E78300>6</color> Rage is granted and an AoE skill attack is launched on other enemies not hit by the normal attack, which deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>250%</color> of ATK.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when a normal attack hits.

21108020122.description: Swings her axe to attack the enemies around her, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK. The second strike also inflicts Freeze on enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.

21108020223.description: Spins with her axe to attack enemies continuously, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK.

21108020324.description: Leaps up and unleashes a mighty cleave at the target, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK. When an enemy is defeated with Polar Strike, the cd of the skill is also reset.

21108110121.description:
Brandishes the Typhon Sword carried on the Waverender and attacks the enemy repeatedly, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Hold down the button to unleash the charged attack Frostbreak following any strike in a normal attack. The Waverender vessel prevents Mod from Knockup.
Frostbreak: Deals Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.
When in Cruise Mode, launching a normal attack automatically locks on to the target and fires two Piercer tracking missiles, with each dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK. Fires two additional Piercer tracking missiles when the locked-on enemy is in Freeze.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> When not in Cruise Mode, gains Divine Grace when a normal attack or Frostbreak hits an enemy. When in Cruise Mode, both moving and drifting grant Divine Grace.

21108120122.description:
Uses the Typhon Sword to slash the enemies in front at high speed, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Icebreaker Mark with every enemy hit up to <color=#E78300>3</color> Marks in total. Every <color=#E78300>1</color> Icebreaker Mark active increases the DMG of charged skills by <color=#E78300>20%</color> and her Ice DMG by <color=#E78300>10%</color>. When in Cruise Mode, Cold Front is replaced by Polar Blizzard.
Polar Blizzard: Expends <color=#E78300>1</color> Icebreaker Mark to launch Freezer tracking missiles at the enemy, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK to enemies within range of the explosion, and inflicting them with Freeze for <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds. Polar Blizzard has a CD of <color=#E78300>4</color> seconds.

21108120223.description:
Charges forward at high speed with assistance from the Waverender vessel while slashing furiously, forming ice spikes and dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Replaces Flash Freeze with Crystal Smash when in Cruise Mode.
Crystal Smash: Casts only when Divine Grace is full. Expends all Divine Grace to unleash a dash attack at the locked-on enemy with a short window to trigger Dodge, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total. Increases the launch speed of Piercer tracking missiles by <color=#E78300>75%</color> for <color=#E78300>2</color> seconds upon skill cast. Crystal Smash has a CD of <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>15</color> Divine Grace when Flash Freeze hits.

21108120324.description:
When Divine Grace is full, triggers Cruise Mode for Waverender by expending all Divine Grace, lasting <color=#E78300>15</color> seconds.
Cruise Mode: Grants Super Armor and disenables the use of Glacier Age. To change the direction of Waverender quickly, make a wide turn to "drift" on the water. Cruise Mode ends when using the skill again or when its duration runs out, clearing all Divine Grace. Then, Skadi disappears momentarily beneath the ice and emerges again at a point close to the target, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

21108410121.description:
Verthandi swings the Runic Blade continuously at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace: </color>A normal attack grants Divine Grace after landing.

21108420122.description:
Stabs forward a certain distance, dealing to enemies in her path Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK. Rapid Stab is replaced by Daybreak after it is cast two times.
Daybreak: Verthandi deals to enemies in her path Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.
All Runic Marks present are cleared if a skill hit was landed on an enemy with a Runic Mark.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>50</color> Divine Grace when an enemy with a Runic Mark is hit is landed using Daybreak.

21108420223.description:
Slashes at the enemies around her, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total and applying the Runic Mark to enemies hit for <color=#E78300>4</color> seconds. The cd of Skill 1 is also reset.
The Non-DoT Crit Rate of hits landed on enemies with a Runic Mark with other skills is increased by <color=#E78300>{2}</color>.

21108420324.description:
Unleashes several light blades towards the enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. The cd of Skill 1 is reset with skill cast. All Runic Marks present are cleared if a skill hit was landed on an enemy with a Runic Mark. When Divine Grace is at max, the skill is replaced by Raychaser Slash.
Raychaser Slash: Expends all Divine Grace to use all summoned swords in a wide-area attack, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total. Skill Crit Rate is increased by <color=#E78300>100%</color> and the cd of Skill 1 is reset.

21108421225.description:
Stabs forward a certain distance, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK to enemies in her path. After casting this skill, Verthandi's DMG is increased for <color=#E78300>5</color> seconds. Effect stacks up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times, and the skill is replaced by Enlightening after being cast two times.
Enlightening: Attack enemies along the way, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.
All Runic Marks present are cleared if a skill hit was landed on an enemy with a Runic Mark.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Skill casting grants <color=#E78300>10</color> Divine Grace, and every hit landed on an enemy with a Runic Mark using Enlightening grants <color=#E78300>50</color> Divine Grace.

21109310121.description:
Uses a shinobigatana to swiftly slash at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Mudra: A combination of two types of Hold, Heaven's Hold and Earth's Hold. Forming a new Mudra when a Mudra already exists clears the existing Mudra. When Divine Grace is at max, casting Ninjutsu expends not Mudra but all Divine Grace.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> A normal attack that results in a hit grants Divine Grace.

21109323122.description:
Ninjutsu: Kuninotokotachi unleashes a large amount of Kunai to attack surrounding enemies in a large area, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK.
Can be cast using the Mudra combination of Heaven and Heaven.

The Ultimate Skill Truth and Nothingness: Rain can be cast using the Mudra combination of Heaven and Heaven, dealing to surrounding enemies Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total, and enemies hit have their Physical Res lowered by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds.

21109323223.description:
Ninjutsu: Kuninotokotachi transforms into thunder and deals to enemies in front of her Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Skill can be cast using the Mudra combination of Heaven and Earth.

The Ultimate Skill Truth and Nothingness: Thunder can be cast using the Mudra combination of Heaven and Earth. Skill cast deals to enemies within range Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total, and enemies hit have their Thunder Res lowered by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds.

21109323324.description:
Ninjutsu: Kuninotokotachi makes a dash at the enemy to her front, generating whirlwinds along the way and dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Skill can be cast using the Mudra combination of Earth and Heaven.

The Ultimate Skill Truth and Nothingness: Wind can be cast using the Mudra combination of Earth and Heaven. Skill cast deals to enemies within range Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total, and enemies hit have their Wind Res lowered by <color=#E78300>{3}</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds.

21109323625.description:
Ninjutsu: Kuninotokotachi detonates the target enemy, dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total and also leaving a circle on the enemy that will intermittently blast for a total of <color=#E78300>9</color> times. Each blast deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK, and the blasts stop when the target enemy is defeated.
Skill can be cast using the Mudra combination of Earth and Earth.

The Ultimate Skill Truth and Nothingness: Fire can be cast using the Mudra combination of Earth and Earth. Skill cast deals to enemies within range Fire DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK, and enemies hit have their Fire Res lowered by <color=#E78300>{4}</color> for <color=#E78300>{5}</color> seconds.

21109410121.description:
Fires a series of shots at the locked-on enemy using her Magic Handgonne, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace when the normal attack hits.

21109420122.description:
Sprays shots at enemies to her front using her Magic Handgonne, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Divine Grace when the skill hits.

21109420223.description:
Ganglati takes on the Magic Cannon form and fires a shot in the locked-on direction, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Divine Grace when the skill hits.

21109420324.description:
Ganglati takes on the Cannon Tower form and fires multiple cannon shots in the locked-on direction. Each shot deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total at the cost of <color=#E78300>20</color> Divine Grace. Other stats do not affect Divine Grace expenditure from cannon shots.
When in Cannon Tower form, the Mod is immune to control effects though she may not move, use skills or the Ultimate Skill, and she can only rotate horizontally to aim. Reduces the DMG taken by <color=#E78300>20%</color>, and every <color=#E78300>1%</color> of Max HP lost also expends <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace. Ganglati exits Cannon Tower form when Divine Grace runs out or with a manual exit.

21109610121.description:
Launches a series of attacks at the locked-on enemy, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

Passive:
Moves at an increasing speed until Vector Acceleration is triggered.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Gains a certain amount of Rage when the normal attack hits.

21109620122.description:
Launches two kicks at the locked-on enemy, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Also applies the Windchaser Mark to the locked-on enemy upon the last hit.
Windchaser Mark: Lasts <color=#E78300>10</color>s. Increases the Non-DoT DMG by <color=#E78300>{2}</color> when attacking an enemy with the Windchaser Mark from downwind.

21109620223.description:
Quickly moves some distance.
Hold down on Ride with the Wind while moving to enter Vector Acceleration state at an additional cost of <color=#E78300>5</color> Rage.
Expend another <color=#E78300>5</color> Rage in Vector Acceleration state to mount a follow-up attack.
Follow-up attack: Delivers a powerful flying kick to the locked-on target while in Vector Acceleration state, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. This skill has a CD of <color=#E78300>5</color>s.

21109620324.description: Moves swiftly to launch a series of attacks, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

21109710121.description:
Fires a flash of rainbow light at the locked-on enemy, dealing Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>4</color> Energy every second.

21109720122.description: Flings the little sheep forward. The sheep bounces and deals to the enemy Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Also inflicts Shackle on any enemies hit in Dreamscape for <color=#E78300>{2}</color>s.

21109720323.description: Enters sleepwalking state and creates a Dream Bubble. In sleepwalking state, Mod can only move slowly, restoring HP to all allies within the Dreamscape generated by Skill 2 equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK <color=#E78300>every</color> second. The Dream Bubble shatters when Mod stops charging, takes a hit, or when charging is at max, dealing to surrounding enemies Light DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total. Hold down on the skill to charge it up to <color=#E78300>2</color> times, with each time increasing Non-DoT Charge Skill DMG of the Dream Bubble by <color=#E78300>50%</color>.

21109910121.description:
Continuously slashes at the enemy using Saku, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> A normal attack that results in a hit grants Divine Grace.

21109920122.description:
Slashes continuously and throws Saku at the enemy, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Each hit grants <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Divine Grace.

21109920223.description:
When Divine Grace is at max, Saku: Lunar Eclipse is replaced by Bo: Lunar Eclipse, which expends all Divine Grace when cast.
Saku: Lunar Eclipse: Tsukuyomi dashes forward, dealing to the enemy Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK.
Bo: Lunar Eclipse: Tsukuyomi unleashes Bo, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total, and enemies hit are also afflicted with Trauma for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds.
Trauma: Deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK every <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds.

21109920324.description:
When Divine Grace is at max, Saku: Moonlit Night is replaced by Bo: Moonlit Night, which expends all Divine Grace when cast.
Saku: Moonlit Night: Tap continuously to use Iaido to deal Shadow DMG to the enemy and enemies with Trauma around them, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK each time except on the final instance, when Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK is dealt.
Bo: Moonlit Night: Charge to cast a Bo light blade which deals Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK. Hold down the skill button to charge the skill up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times, with Non-DoT skill DMG increased by <color=#E78300>30%</color> when the skill is charged.

21109923142.description:
When Divine Grace is at max, the remaining cd of Sakubo: Final Moon is reset and Saku: Final Moon is replaced by Bo: Final Moon, which expends all Divine Grace when cast.
Saku: Final Moon: Tap continuously to use Iaido to deal Shadow DMG to the enemy and enemies with Trauma around them, dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK each time except on the final instance, when Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK is dealt.
Bo: Final Moon: Charge to cast three Bo light blades at the enemy, with the primary blade dealing Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK and the each secondary blade, Shadow DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{4}</color> of ATK. Hold down the skill button to charge the skill up to <color=#E78300>3</color> times, with Non-DoT skill hit DMG increased by <color=#E78300>30%</color> when the skill is charged.

21111110121.description:
Summons a scythe and continuously slashes at the target, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Judge of the Underworld mode: Osiris unleashes sword wings to mow down the locked-on target, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> The third and fifth moves of her normal attack grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace each. When a hit is landed with the fourth strike of a normal attack while Osiris is in Judge of the Underworld mode, <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace is also granted.

21111120122.description:
Throws her scythe at the target, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Judge of the Underworld mode: Osiris fires sword wings at the target, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.
After Darkwing Scythe is cast, <color=#E78300>2</color> Traces can be expended to unleash another attack, which will however not grant any more Traces.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Each time skill cast results in a hit, <color=#E78300>2</color> Traces are granted (regardless of the mode Osiris is in).

21111120223.description:
Sends the scythe into a deadly spin dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Judge of the Underworld mode: Osiris summons sword wings that surround her and attack enemies in their way a total of <color=#E78300>26</color> times, with each attack dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK. Lasts <color=#E78300>6</color> seconds.

21111120324.description:
Slashes her scythe upwards at the target, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Judge of the Underworld mode: Osiris gathers the enemy in front of her, and deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.

21111910121.description:
Brandishes the two spears and attacks the enemy, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

Passive:
Increases Thunder DMG dealt by <color=#E78300>0.7%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> Wind DMG boost owned by Mod.
Mod may own up to <color=#E78300>6</color> Lightning Rod and Hillshook Marks in total.

<color=#297DE0>Rage</color>: Grants Rage when a normal attack hits.

21111920122.description:
Brandishes her spears, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total while switching between the attack stance and defensive stance. Grants Unyielding while in the defensive stance.
Regardless of whether Shifting Winds is in CD or if it is replaced with Shifting Squall, tap on this skill button when casting Storm Howl, Whirlwind Whisk, or Shifting Squall, or when launching follow-up attacks/counterattacks will immediately switch the Mod's stance without interrupting the current move or dealing any damage. And then expends <color=#E78300>7</color> Rage.
When in defensive stance and hit by the enemy while casting Storm Howl or Whirlwind Whisk, blocks the damage and triggers a counterattack, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK and grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Hillshook Mark and Invincible upon hit and then expends <color=#E78300>15</color> Rage.
When the Mark count is at max, replaces Shifting Winds with Shifting Squall. Shifting Squall has a CD of <color=#E78300>15</color>s, regardless of the stance being used.
Shifting Squall: expends all Marks to deal Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total.

21111920223.description: Dashes forward while brandishing the twin spears, then launches a series of ferocious stabs at the enemy, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Hitting an enemy while in attack stance triggers a follow-up attack, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total, and grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Lightning Rod Mark upon each hit. The follow-up attack will stop if Mod switches to defensive stance.

21111920324.description: Imbues the twin spears with the divine power of lightning and brandishes them in a wide area. The spears then turn into dozens of phantoms that attack the enemy from above, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Hitting an enemy while in attack stance triggers a follow-up attack, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total, and grants <color=#E78300>1</color> Lightning Rod Mark upon each hit. The follow-up attack will stop if Mod switches to defensive stance.

21112710121.description:
Brandishes Countertide Whalesong and calls upon a group of sea creatures to help with the attack, dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace for every <color=#E78300>15</color> normal attack hits.

21112720122.description:
Summons an ocean wave that surges forward, out of which jump various sea creatures that attack the enemy, dealing Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Countertide Mark upon skill cast (no more than <color=#E78300>1</color> can exist at a time). Increases healing effect by <color=#E78300>5%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1</color> hit with Leapin' Krakens; stacks up to <color=#E78300>4</color> times. Increases the Non-DoT DMG of Leapin' Krakens by <color=#E78300>1.25%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> healing boost, up to a maximum of <color=#E78300>100%</color>.
After the Countertide Mark is expended, this effect will last <color=#E78300>1</color> more second before being removed. Boosts activated during this extra period will not be added to the existing stacks.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace upon each skill hit.

21112720223.description:
Opens up the Access Key to summon two sea creatures on the spot, dealing AoE Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total while they are on the battlefield. Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Whalesong Mark upon skill cast (no more than <color=#E78300>1</color> can exist at a time). Increases Mod's Crit DMG by <color=#E78300>10%</color> upon each <color=#E78300>1</color> hit with Tide Summon; stacks up to <color=#E78300>6</color> times. Also increases the Non-DoT DMG of Tide Summon by <color=#E78300>0.8%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> Crit DMG boost, up to a maximum of <color=#E78300>100%</color>.
After the Whalesong Mark is expended, this effect will be removed after <color=#E78300>1</color>s. Boosts activated during this extra period will not be added to the existing stacks.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace upon each skill hit.

21112720324.description:
Immediately gains <color=#E78300>1</color> Trace if Mod has fewer than <color=#E78300>4</color> Traces. Replaces Undercurrent with Azure Aid when Mod has <color=#E78300>4</color> Traces.
Azure Aid: Unlocks the power of Mod's Access Key and expends <color=#E78300>4</color> Traces to create a ring of healing, which restores to all allies within range HP equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK. Azure Aid has a CD of <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds. Skill cast expends all available Traces and grants additional skill effects.
Expending the Countertide Mark deals to the locked-on enemy Water DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total. Also increases the Non-DoT DMG by <color=#E78300>1.25%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> healing boost, up to a maximum of <color=#E78300>100%</color>.
All nearby allies take less DMG when expending the Whalesong Mark. And also further reduces DMG taken by the Mod by <color=#E78300>0.12%</color> for every <color=#E78300>1%</color> Crit DMG boost, up to a maximum of <color=#E78300>15%</color>, lasting <color=#E78300>{3}</color> seconds.

21113910121.description:
Summons ice crystals to attack the enemies to her front, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

Passive:
Poseidon can have up to <color=#E78300>2</color> of the Snowy and Icy Marks.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Poseidon is granted <color=#E78300>3</color> Energy per second.

21113920122.description:
Summons an ice spike to attack her target, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Tap on the skill again a short time into the skill action to also cast Additional Chant.
Additional Chant: The ice spike breaks into pieces and attacks again, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total. <color=#E78300>1</color> Snowy Mark is also granted.
Poseidon is granted certain effects depending on the number of Snowy Marks expended to enter Edgy state:
<color=#E78300>1</color> Snowy Mark: Poseidon's Ice DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>10%</color>, and casting Zero Mansard shortens the remaining cd of Zero Mansard by <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds.
<color=#E78300>2</color> Snowy Marks: Poseidon's Ice DMG is increased by <color=#E78300>30%</color>, and casting Zero Mansard shortens the remaining cd of Zero Mansard by <color=#E78300>7</color> seconds.

21113920223.description:
Summons an icicle to pierce the locked-on enemy, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total and inflicting Freeze on enemies hit for <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds. Tap on the skill again a short time into the skill action to also cast Additional Chant.
Additional Chant: Generates a continuous ice blast around the enemies hit, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK. <color=#E78300>1</color> Icy Mark is also granted.
Poseidon is granted certain effects depending on the number of Icy Marks expended to enter Edgy state:
<color=#E78300>1</color> Icy Mark: Hits landed on the enemy lower their Ice Res by <color=#E78300>1%</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds, up to <color=#E78300>20%</color> in total. Casting Matter Frozen shortens the remaining cd of Matter Frozen by <color=#E78300>4</color> seconds.
<color=#E78300>2</color> Icy Marks: Hits landed on the enemy lower their Ice Res by <color=#E78300>2%</color> for <color=#E78300>{4}</color> seconds, up to <color=#E78300>20%</color> in total. Casting Matter Frozen shortens the remaining cd of Matter Frozen by <color=#E78300>9</color> seconds.

21113920324.description:
Casting Snow Echo after a Zero Mansard or Matter Frozen attack will repeat the previous skill attack and grant the corresponding Snowy or Icy Mark. Said casting will also come with the corresponding Additional Chant follow-up attack. When Poseidon has <color=#E78300>2</color> of either Mark, Snow Echo is replaced by Silver Frost.
Silver Frost: Expends all Marks for the corresponding effects when cast. Poseidon fires three silver frosts in the direction of the locked-on target, dealing Ice DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK to enemies along the way. The cd of Zero Mansard and Matter Frozen is reset, and Poseidon enters Edgy state for <color=#E78300>8</color> seconds.
Edgy: When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy state, Poseidon may not use Skill 3 and will not be granted any Snowy or Icy</material> Marks, though a Zero Mansard or Matter Frozen attack will be followed up with the corresponding Additional Chant attack.

21114810121.description: Zenkibo continuously fires at the enemies around her, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

21114820122.description:
Zenkibo throws a Grenade that explodes after <color=#E78300>5</color> seconds or when it makes contact with the enemy, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Traces: </color>Grants <color=#E78300>{2}</color> Traces with each skill hit.

21114820223.description:
The Mod automatically locks on to the enemy and fires, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total at first. Then, the Mod fires at the enemy for two more rounds of five shots each, each round dealing in total Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK.

<color=#297DE0>Traces: </color>Grants <color=#E78300>{3}</color> Traces on every skill hit.

21114820324.description:
Zenkibo's weapon changes into a sniper rifle, and Sniper Mode is turned on for up to <color=#E78300>10</color> seconds. Using a Dodge immediately ends the mode and send it into CD.
Sniper Mode: Mod cannot move or use other skills. Tap on the Skill to aim at the target, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK.

21118410121.description:
Uses her sword and shield to attack the target continuously, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> When the third shield strike of a normal attack results in a hit, <color=#E78300>5</color> Divine Grace is granted.

21118420122.description:
Brandishes her shield and hurls it to her front, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> ATK in total. Enemies hit by the flying shield take Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> <color=#E78300>Each</color> hit landed on the enemy with the flying shield grants <color=#E78300>10</color> Divine Grace.

21118420223.description:
Hold down the button to raise the shield and deal Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total over <color=#E78300>3</color>s. A strike is unleashed when the hold is released or when the time is up, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK. Should Mod take a hit while the shield is raised, blocks any incoming DMG and also triggers a powerful counterattack which deals Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> ATK in total. Also triggers Zero Time for <color=#E78300>2</color>s.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace: </color> Grants <color=#E78300>15</color> Divine Grace upon a successful block.

21118420324.description: Gathers all her power and leaps into the air, then smashes downwards, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total with all Divine Grace expended. Doing so grants her a Shield of value equal to <color=#E78300>5%</color> HP which lasts <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds. Every <color=#E78300>1</color> Divine Grace expended also adds <color=#E78300>0.1%</color> HP to the shield..

21119910121.description:
Swings her katana at the enemy, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when a normal attack results in a hit.

21119920122.description: Dashes forward and slashes at the enemy along the way, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Enemies hit get Seal of Thunder.

21119920223.description: Uses double katanas to slash at the enemy to her front, dealing Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total. Enemies hit get Seal of Thunder.

21119920324.description:
Uses Battoujutsu to slash at the enemies to her front, clearing the Seal of Thunder from enemies that have the seal and enabling the next move of Thunder: Out of the Blue. There are a total of three moves in Thunder: Out of the Blue, and when the third move is used Rage is not expended, and neither is the Seal of Thunder cleared from the enemy.
Thunder: Out of the Blue Move I: Deals Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Thunder: Out of the Blue Move II: Deals Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{2}</color> of ATK in total.
Thunder: Out of the Blue Move III: Tsukuyomi unleashes four lightning strikes, each of which deals Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{3}</color> of ATK. The second and subsequent strikes that hit the same enemy deal progressively less DMG, and each enemy is dealt Thunder DMG up to <color=#E78300>2.8×{3}</color> ATK in total.

21119930525.description:
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge can be used two consecutive times, and triggers the Dodge effect. Tap on the Normal Attack button after Extremity Dodge to unleash a skill attack that deals Thunder DMG equal to <color=#E78300>{1}</color> of ATK in total.
Dodge: Entering Zero Time significantly slows all enemy movements for <color=#E78300>3</color> seconds. The skill attack launched by tapping on the Normal Attack button inflicts the Seal of Thunder on enemies hit. Dodge effect can trigger once every <color=#E78300>{2}</color> seconds.
